Otterbox box was also imprinted in the case. This “cover” does not have Otterbox on it anywhere. Returning immediately.** Added pics. I purchased a real one from Best Buy on left. They price matched Amazon. You can see the flimsy fake in second pic and the true Otterbox in last two pics.

I've had this case for almost 10 months so I think I can speak definitively about this.Look I know I'm the kind of person who drops stuff. I'm also the kind of person who likes to go out which makes me a 2x kind of person who drops stuff. So when I'm getting a case, it's a short term relationship.Not this son of a gun. Let me tell you the ways I've dropped this - off of a desk, off a ladder, accidentally threw across the street, sneezed so hard it flew out of my hands and hit the wall, angrily made hand movement and it slipped out, demonstrating how good it is by throwing it on a couch, demonstrating how good it is by throwing it on the floor,  dropped in a pot of water (that probably has more to do with the phones water resistance but STILL), thrown as a joke, thrown as not a joke, adamant gesticulation, demonstrating how hard my brother's head was by hitting him with it (would not recommend), trying to impress girlfriend, dropped every day.Seriously, as someone who drops their phone both intentionally and unintentionally, I cannot recommend this case enough. Also it looks good, I love the color, it's light and is the slimmest case that will still protect your phone to a degree that you legitimately don't have to worry about it if you're a class A phone dropper.

Case seems to protect the phone well enough but it scratches very easily and the scratches make it very slippery and hard to hold. After only having the case for a short time it already looks terrible. Not a good design, next time I’ll be going with something other than OtterBox.

Original: Trust me these shirts are worth it. I go to sites that sell shirts like this for $30-$50 just for this kind of quality. The softness from the polyester and cotton blend is what makes this shirt worth it. I just had to get rid of all my 100% cotton shirts because they felt too rough after I started wearing these. Not even my favorite brand store have this type of quality. I at least expected Hollister or Abercrombie to match this but even if they do They charge 3 times the price (on clearance too). I recommend this shirt brand too everyone. Just make sure to get 60% cotton and 40% polyester. The blend makes a huge difference. Not 50/50, Not 70/30, a true 60/40 is the one you want. Oh I almost forgot they even gave me a discount off my next purchase and I just started buying from them. Well Guess I'll starting buying from them now. See ya Later everyone.Edit 1. Where Do I even start. I was once so proud to be a customer for this seller but now I don't know what I'm getting. I just placed an order for the exact same shirt (size, color, and quantity). I was sure they would just send another shirt my way and I just pay for it like I regularly do on Amazon. I was glad to have been able to receive a quality shirt at first but now I just received something I can't even tell. They sent me not a 60% cotton / 40% polyester shirt but a Shaka Active shirt which is 100% cotton. The difference in the blend is very big too me. I like my 60/40 blend because of how soft the fabric is and how much more comfort I get wearing it. The brand Dream USA makes wonderful quality shirts and I admire their products. But for the Shaka Active shirt I receive was awful. Smells strange, and I don't even know why they sent me such a hippo-size shirt. I ordered a small. fabric was rough and poorly made; nothing compare to the 60% cotton / 40% polyester one I order 2 days ago. I just don't understand why they sent me this. Was it a mistake or a mix-up? Or perhaps they are trying to get rid of past inventory of Shaka Active shirts? All I want right now is just a replacement. I'll even take a different color (size: small [60% cotton / 40% polyester]).  I will buy again only if they truly do have a 60% cotton / 40% polyester shirt. I do not want to buy any more lies. Please I really want to buy more shirts. Here are some photos, The shirts may look alike but the texture is very different. First set is Shaka (100%) and Second set is A Real Dream USA shirt (60% cotton / 40% polyester) I'm repeating this a lot is because I do not want anymore 100% cotton shirts.Edit 2: Okay Okay You got me. So, as I was writing this review, it turns out they listen to me then sent me a replacement on the same day. I got my new shirt and it was a Dream USA shirt. I am confident now to start buying again. I just hope this does not happen again. I am also sorry to have said anything negative. You guys working in customer service, delivery, and manufacturing have done a wonderful job. I am more than satisfied and will be buying more shirts. In fact I'll be buying 2 more shirts right now. Thank you so much for your hard work.

It's always hard to guess how a shirt will fit when you buy online but I personal love this shirt. I'm 6'2, 190lbs, and I went with the XL size and it fit just how hoped the slim fit would! This is the 6th one I’ve bought. I absolutely love these tops. I'm not sure of the value of yet another review w/1000+ reviews for these shirts. However, I'll add my two cents... These are great if you want a v-neck that stays hidden (the shirt is relatively wide V at the neck) under a dress shirt with the top button(s) unbuttoned. These are great if you want a v-neck that stays tucked in to the pants (the shirt is relatively long). These are great if you want a v-neck that fits relatively well as an undershirt (the shirt isn't tight but it is not a loose fit around the arms and torso). These are great if you want a v-neck that works well under short-sleeved shirts (the shirt has relatively short sleeves). Hope that helps...

I bought these shirts in July; I now bought many more to fully replace my other well made T shirts. I said that these "fit as expected" because there is no "fit entirely better than expected" category. The manufacturer's claim of super-soft material and lack of coming untucked rang so true to me when I was reading the description for my re-order. They are so comfortable for both reasons. Again, I am replacing all my T shirts with these; my others are reasonable--hopefully someone will benefit via Goodwill--but these are just great as far as I am concerned. Note also that it takes a lot to motivate me to write a review. Parenthetically, I have benefitted greatly from Amazon reviews, so for anyone writing incisive comments, thank you.

Based on the reviews, you’d think white v-neck undershirts might be the most inconsistent product for sale here. Every time I go to reorder some, the model is no longer available and I have to go searching for another version. When I could not find a good Hanes ComfortSoft version to reorder, I tried this one, and I’m glad I did! It’s fitted in the chest and arms, which doesn’t make you look like a dweeb with extra fabric hanging off. It’s also long enough to comfortably tuck in without looking like a belly shirt after one wash. I’m 5’10 and 180 lbs and the medium is perfect.

Finally a shirt that fits my body shape - tall and lanky. I'm 6'1 and 155 pounds. Regular large size t shirts fit in length but are too baggy, and mediums fit in size but are not long enough. These fill both categories. Be careful washing on high heat though, some of mine have shrunk to the point that they are quite tight in my chest area, and just barely long enough to keep a button up shirt tucked in. Only negative is that the sleeves are very short, like almost a tank top. My armpit hair sticks out when just standing there, and I am not an overly hairy guy. TMI.

I'm fairly large, not huge, and I can bench press 300-something pounds, do lots of different weird push-up variations, hundreds of sit-ups, ride scores of miles on my bike, etc. So I'm in decent shape. Bit of extra padding, I will admit. My pants have a mix of 36, 37 and 38-inch waists. I'm not into dieting, and not really trying to impress anyone with my 18 pack. I mainly don't like being weak or tired. In size XL, this shirt is made for weak, tired, skinny-fat dudes, not muscular slightly chubby dudes.I usually buy shirts in brick-n-mortar stores. The last one I bought online was a Patagonia flannel shirt size XL, standard fit. I literally swam inside it, and could pull it out nearly a foot from my waist in the front (so I exchanged it for an L, which is fine, slightly looser than this XL). This shirt is VERY slim fit by comparison. Not much to pull out. It doesn't look horrible, and actually would be nearly ideal under a jacket if I never planned to remove said jacket. It just looks like I don't know what size I wear, or I really let myself go over the holidays. It's also a little short, like a bargain Untuckit.Quality-wise, it seems fine. Haven't decided whether to keep or exchange for an XXL.

I love the colors - they are soft, subtle and even more pleasant on the eye than the already decent picture of the ad - I ordered the purple/blue checked shirt in size Large.  The cotton is soft.  It is well constructed, easy to iron and did not shrink when I tossed it in the washer.  The fit is nice in that it is not too loose fitting and is not at all restrictive.  I measure out at a 43 chest, arm lengths run between 34"-35" & 15 3/4" neck.  I'd say this neck is a little larger than that, so it is comfortable for casual wear.It looks great with jeans and my Big Lebowski Pendleton sweater.  I received compliments the first time I wore it.  The shirt has a well-worn, old shirt feel - principally because it is so soft.  Grab a couple.  You won't be disappointed.

I ordered this button up shirt and I’m happy with it. It fits really well and since I got the Standard fit, I’ve got room to move around in it. I could probably wear a Slim fit Large or a Standard fit Medium but I don’t want it to look as if it were painted on my 5’11” 190 lbs frame. My only complaint is that the shirt is a lighter color blue than the picture. It’s not a bold, deep color blue but more of a washed/faded type blue. All in all though, this is a very nice garment and I’m happy with my purchase.

I wasn't too sure about ordering this shirt from Amazon. I usually order from J Crew factory for all my long sleeve shirts. I was mostly worried about the sizing of the shirt. I got the shirt today, tried it on, and the fit is prefect. If you buy J Crew factory shirts these fit exactly the same. It is a bit tailored compared to some other brands, but fit me really well. I'm 5' 6" 155lbs and the small regular fit perfect. The material is fairly thin, which is perfect for warmer climates. I will order more of these shirts.

Goodthreads make some fantastic men's shirts. This is my second Goodthreads shirt I've purchased on Amazon and I have to say I'm pleased as can be. And I got it on sale, which makes the whole thing even better. The material feels wonderful and the shirt itself seems to be very well constructed. The fit is just right, not too small and not too big. I purchased an XL and it is exactly the size I need it to be. The colors are just right--exactly as pictured--and the collar perfectly tailored too.What I also like about these shirts is the fact that the bottom is short enough that they're perfect for wearing untucked. Get this shirt and look through all the Goodthreads inventory. I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by the quality, especially given the prices.

I started out thinking these shirts were going to be made from some awful feeling fabric like a table cloth.  For the price and being so affordable I had skepticism. I initially bought only one just to see how it fitted and how the fabric felt.  While Amazon has fairly good return policies I still would rather not mess with that if I can.  This purchase was worth the buy.As soon as I pulled this shirt out of the packaging I knew instantly that the material was going to feel great.  It's a soft smooth cotton material sturdy enough to hold up to daily use.  The fit is spot on, I'm 6'1" at 210 pounds and the size as listed is correct. I bought the large and it fits great with a enough room to not be squeezing your body.  The shirt feels nice and light, breaths well, I typically wear these kinds of shirts with out an undershirt, the material has to be comfortable for me to do this and this shirt has it.  It's still 80 something degrees where I am at with the sun beating down, yet wearing this in the middle of summer feels just fine.Worth your money.I highly recommend Goid Threads. I really hope they start offering some don't stylish jeans.  $40 a pair of not unreasonable.

For the price, it's an excellent casual button down that works well with jeans or shorts.  Don't expect a dress shirt to wear with a suit for this price, that's not reasonable at all.  The fit is a bit smaller comparative to a standard size chart so getting the proper size may require ordering several sizes and fits to see what works best.  This particular shirt is a great color and pattern.

Great cotton shirt, these are my favorite now. I grew tired of mixed fiber shirts that made me feel like a Duracell battery with all the static they produce. Going back to a 100 percent cotton product has made a great difference to me personally.

I wanted some contemporary fit shirts for work that looked like they were made after 2003 so I tried the Goodthreads long sleeve slim fit shirts.  I went through the Goodthreads section and just picked out long sleeve shirts that were on sale and tried not to pay more that $15-$20.  I am very impressed by the comfort, style, and fit of these shirts and I am in the middle of cycling out my current work wardrobe for new patterns as they come on sale.The patterns are pretty generic and forgettable and blah but for work shirts, that is fine.  Some vertical stripe shirts would be great.Highly recommended for daily drivers for work.
Little tight in the chest area and the shirt was not long enough (I usually wear a tall but can sometimes make a regular length fit, this one wasn't even long enough to tuck in.

These t-shirts will shrink bad. I am including a picture of my 6 month old t-shirts (same brand, black) vs. brand new white ones. They're tagless and all, very comfortable and won't fade much, but the shrinking factor might be of your concern especially if you order "L". Mine are "S" and now they fit like a slim-fit t-shirt which is fine for me but for some this may be relevant.

I bought a couple packages of these in black to use as undershirts for my work dress shirts. I tried them on when the first arrived and the length was good. After a single wash (cold) and dry (warm) they have lost at least 2" in length, making them near impossible to tuck in and remain tucked in. So for anyone wondering... Yes, these shrink quite a lot in the length.  Interestingly they did not really shrink at all around the chest/waist dimension.A couple other issues I had with these, that I have not had with other brands is that the seam along the bottom of the shirt and around the ends of the arms was not flat. If these were not meant as undershirts I envision I would be going through and having to do some serious ironing to ensure all the seams were down nicely.Lastly, the elastic around the neck seems to be of lower quality material and is not as taunt as I guess I would prefer. It definitely seems like a few washes in, the neck is going to be very loose and "bacon-ie" looking.I certainly will be looking to other brands from here on out.
Great Deal. Great Feel! Nice & Long to tuck in. Comfortable around Neck

The shirts are not 100% Cotton as stated in the Hanes banner on web page (feel like mostly polyester); the sizing is completely off as measured and compared to the sizing chart on the web page; the 'black' that I ordered appears to be gray/charcoal; I have purchased many 'ComfortSoft' T-Shirts made by Hanes and these are not like those that I have purchased from other retailers in the past: they are course to the touch, heavyweight, and sized inappropriately.  Finally, the shirts arrived in a white plastic bag.  When opened, there were four shirts crammed in as if they were grabbed off a shelf and shoved into a bag.  No Hanes packaging, etc.  Odd.  Unlike any Amazon purchase I have received in the past.

Hey not sure how helpful this will be given Im a female an this is a mens tshirt. But long story short needed a red shirt for a job didnt matter the style just had to be red. I buy smalls in hanes mens tshirts at the store just for around the house so i knew my size atleast for the plain white ones. I dont like it fitted but i dont wanna look like im drowning either. Im more of a athletic build size 4 or a 26 pants or 3-5 in juniors. Tops in womens i always get smalls im not overly busty 34c an these fit great. I prefer hanes for the simple fact the are longer than other brands an dont look boxy after a few washes not to mention no tags truely a great tshirt. Fyi i notice white tshirts always tend to shrink more than the colored shirts not sure why but in my experience thats what happens but still fit just a bit more form fitting. An just an fyi if a female is lookong for a tshirt for lazy days or whatever or just to wear on ick days if you have a little belly on ya nice cover for those days but if you have yourself a belly that is more obvious this may not be what your looking for or maybe try a size up.

Nothing close to "ComfortSoft" at all as stated. Even after several washes and dry, these shirts are still itchy and uncomfortable and if you are wearing it during warm days you will sweat in them and it will become itchy on your skin. I wear this as my undershirt for work while wearing my uniform-issued short sleeve button down shirt and I'm already sweating within minutes. I had 3 older versions of Hanes ComfortSoft Ts  just like these ones before and they were very soft and not itchy to wear. The material was perfect and not too thick or too thin. These newer ones here are just ridiculously too thick and itchy.

I have ordered these on multiple occassions and received a great shirts. Those were tagless and made in dominican republic. It stated clearly that they were 100 % cotton. These are made in Honduras and have tags. In addition no where on the packaging does it state that these are 100 cotton. And they sure dont feel like it. Feels like I'm wearing a bag filled with sweat. Dont breathe at all.
Washed these shirts in cold water and dried on low heat.  Shrunk 8" in length.  Buy extra large if you are 4' tall.  I can't believe how a name brand is so shoddy.

These are definitely NOT comfort soft as advertised. My husband has been getting Hanes for years and we made the mistake of ordering them here because we found a good deal. Well, you get what you pay for..these must be a knock off or something. They were rough and itch even AFTER a wash. When we got them we realized there was no way they were true Hanes shirts. We submitted a return request but the seller was going to charge a 20% restocking fee and we had to pay for shipping so beware prior to buying. We tried washing a couple times to see if they would get any better but no luck. So we are now using as cleaning rags. So if you’re okay with low quality itchy and rough undershirts, then buy these!

I first bought these at a physical store when I was in the military. They were perfect. The material was soft, the neckline did not bunch up and there were no tags. I used them for years until the material was worn out. So, I thought I would buy more. Amazon sent me HeavyWeight shirts with tags. So I returned them and hoped to get actual ComfortSoft shirts. The second ones sent by Amazon were close, but still incorrect. They sent ComfortSoft HeavyWeight shirts. The material is thicker and slightly scratchy. The neckline bunches in the front. I will not buy these again through Amazon.

I love how slim this case is and how well it protects my phone. However, I could not rate this product a "5" for two reasons. First, it is not a "stay-clear/anti-yellowing" case. After exactly a month of using it (purchase January 7, 2018 and today is February 7, 2018), the front/face of the case has turned yellow. So if you hold the phone case on its side, the front is a yellowish tint and the back is still clear like the day I bought it. I thought it was my make up rubbing off on it, but after cleaning it with soup and water (more than once) it still has a yellowish tint. Also, the back of this case is not a "hard scratch-resistant shell". Within my first week of using it I already had numerous scratches. Today, a month later, the back of my case is completely filled with scratches. I will admit, the case does protect my phone. The actually case has cracked but the case is so thick that I can see the crack but I can not feel it and most importantly, my phone is unharmed. By the way, I NEVER write reviews. But I felt the need because I love this case but hate the issues I have encountered within my first month.

CONFIRMED: This case does work well with the iPhone X and does support QI Charging through the case! It's a snug fit the first time popping the device in, but once it is in it gives great all around protection as expected from OtterBox.My only complaint is that with my Glass Cover which wraps on the sides, the case forces it up and creates a bubble. I will need to try and re-apply the glass with the case on. I would suggest that others do the same.I will also add that the case feels great in my hand with the iPhone X in it, I think this will hold up to anything I throw at it.

Got this case and put my brand new iPhone in it. I dropped my phone 2ft to the kitchen floor, and it shattered (front and back) into pieces. I even had the Otterbox brand tempered glass on the screen. I have always used the commuter with my previous iPhones and I swear by it. This one is awful, do not trust your $1100 phone in this case. I was stuck making an insurance claim to replace a brand new phone within 2 weeks of buying it and placing it in this case :(

I don't know about you but the objective of getting a clear case is to show off how elegant the iPhone X really is. My go-to case "was" Otterbox because of it's durability. Within a week's time however, the sides started to turn yellow; within 2 weeks even more yellow. So I call the Otterbox customer service to ask if the case is supposed to turn yellow. They say no, so I ask for a replacement. To their credit, they replace it with no problem, albeit, a $6 shipping charge. I get the 2nd one and within the same 2 weeks, it was pretty yellow again. I call Otterbox again and they send me a 3rd one, free of charge this time because I insisted (since they won't admit it turns yellow). Sure enough, after 2 weeks it was yellow again. Folks, it just looks awful with a yellow tint around the sides...it just removes the beauty of the phone. Fortunately, I had known a person who had a Speck Presidio clear case, and theirs had not turned yellow. I finally bought the Speck case in July. We are now in September and it has not turned yellow. Go Speck if you HATE that yellow tint. I'm careful with my phone so I don't usually drop it...I'm not sure is Speck can handle drops better than Otterbox but it sure looks good without that DAMNED yellow tint.

After a long stay away from this company I decided to give this case a try for my iPhone X.At first glance it’s bulky and rounded, and makes me feel like I’m holding an old Android phone.Incredibly it seems as if the techs at Otterbox have created a completely frictionless phone case. This made my iPhone X slide into places no phone should ever go.  Consistent only in the fact that the surface chosen to rest the phone on must be plumb and level or else suffer yet another trip to the floor, nook or wormhole.However the case did manage to protect my new IPhone from the dozen or so drops it sustained within 24hrs due to the case itself.Just long enough to order a new case which is perf and return this warm stick of butter surrounding my sweet phone.

The product is horrible. It says that it has anti yellowing features and it’s already yellow after only having just about three weeks I am very disappointed in the product and would like some explanitaion on this.
I LOVE this case. Not only is it efficient and 100% genuine in its function, it's also SO PRETTY.
The case is amazing, but the clear version does scratch easily on the back, returning for the black version now2 weeks later.  The whole back is scratched pretty bad

Installed on an Iphone XS (2018)This cover was meant to be used in an IPhone X. It fits fine on the XS, except for the speakers at the bottom. Left speaker was shifted to the right and now has 2 of the holes covered up by the case. This does not affect performance of the speakers at all though.The cover is made out of hard plastic with semi rigid rubber areas inside and on the sides. It was very hard to install on the phone because the case does not flex. I thought I was going to break my brand new phone, but eventually got it in.This case provides plenty of protection for the rear cameras. The camera bump sits around 1-1.5mm deep inside the case. This was exactly what I wanted. Most other cases Ive seen are practically flush with the camera.Buttons operate correctly, though a little hard to push. The silent mode switch I find a little hard to get as it sits very deep inside the case. I need long nails to reach the switch.I find the case a little on the slippery side. Particularly the back side. I installed a metal plate such that I could use my magnetic phone holder that I have in my car. Due to the thickness of this case, the phone is held up fine, but not as tight as my previous phone. The slippery back makes me nervous that the phone might slide off.Overall I like it. Plenty of protection, to be tested when I drop this phone eventually.Might eventually change it for something more stylish though.

I’m not one to write reviews but I felt like I need to for this product. First off, I had this case for my iPhone 8 Plus and it was great. 3 weeks ago I go the iPhone XS and purchased this case thinking it would be great like my last one. Boy, WAS I WRONG. On week 2 of having my phone, I dropped my phone from maybe 3 feet off the ground. It landed flat on concrete. I picked it up and the upper right corner of the phone slipped out of the case which caused the phone to crack between the case and the screen protector. So I thought to myself, maybe user error.... I ended up replacing the cracked screen. A WEEK LATER my phone fell 2 feet from my hand as I was leaning over and fell to the ground. AGAIN the phone slipped from the case and it cracked the bottom right part of my screen protector (thankfully not the actual screen). I am not sure if the case is not tight enough or what, but I DO NOT recommend this case to anyone with an X or XS. I just ordered my MOUS case and cannot wait to throw this one out!

Great shirts!  Don’t order the Long/Tall unless you’re over 77” tall.  I ordered the long/tall first and returned it for a regular size.  I’m 72” tall, wear a size Medium in most shirts.  This shirt is the perfect length in regular sizing and will stay tucked all day.  I took my picture in the long/tall and held my fingertips at my belt.  Regular size comes 8” below belt.

4XL is like 3XL but still too shortwhatever size you need, go 2 sizes biggerIf you have a GUT, as in being fat, or more circumference around the stomach, NOT your hips, then these need to go up 2 sizes over what you think you needreturning 8 of them different colorsTOO SMALL

Review update: This shirt in a large fits me like a Dickies medium. I now have four of these shirts and I prefer them over other short sleeve work shirts. They are light weight and appropriate for Texas summers. You can wear them right out of the dryer with no ironing and the top snap button is handy. Returns on this item are a hassle so my advice would be to order one for sizing, then order more.

My husband loves these shirts.  They hold up very well and handle all sorts of stains that are easy to remove. The starch does take a long time to break down so for the men that do not wear an under shirt it may rub your nips raw.  My husband loves these compared to the other brand because they breath very well since they are thin but that does not stop the structural integrity of the shirt.  He is a mechanic/fabricator so they hold up great to weld splatter and grinder sparks.  Those also embroider and heat press very nicely.

This could be a great for the price work shirt for those that are not very slim. I am about 6' and 195lbs and the Large size fits perfect in the shoulders and arms but is HUGE in the middle. Looks like I am 25lbs heavier due to all the extra material in the middle/lower portion of the shirt puffing out. If they had a slimmer fit I would buy a dozen for work. If you are of a thicker build, this is a great shirt for the price.

These are nice work shirts. The reason I purchased these were the open pockets with no flap and they have a slight taper on the sides of the tail.  Which, I prefer when wearing un-tucked. The other brand has boxed tail (no taper) with flaps on the pockets and is made with a little heavier material.than these. I have several on them but these had a couple different options that I wanted to try. The price on these were great and just like the other brand they come out of the dryer pretty much wrinkle free and the are color-fast with no fading. I have recommended to friends and will purchase again.

These shirts are great in my opinion. My closet it full of a variety of Red Kap button down colors / styles. They fit well. I typically wear a 2xl tshirt but I order these in xl. If you're not sure how it will fit, order one and give it a test drive. Then modify future orders as needed. This brand is all I wear to work now. Oh, and i wouldn't call them "industrial" though. I can't imagine that they would stand up long term to significant abuse.

Decent shirt, it is a good summer shirt, light weight, strong and comfortable cloth.  Which is what I wanted. I need a blue shirt for work.  Except the pockets are very small. I have to carry a lot at work. One of the reason I bought this shirt is because it has pockets. Unfortunately the pockets are very poorly designed and executed. The pockets are very small, undersized, far smaller then any other shirts I have owned and own. One of the things I need to carry is a pen and note pad. I like to put the note pad in one of the chest pockets. This keeps them from becoming torn up as they do in a back pockets. The pockets are to shallow and narrow to hold a note pad and pen at the same time. The left hand side pocket has a stitch to separate a pen holding area. This stitch is only on the top of the pocket which means anything else put in this pocket will get tangled with the pen. Such as eyeglasses. Unfortunately the remaining area in this pocket is too small to hold eyeglasses in the standard soft case.This means I have to find and buy different shirts.

Very disappointed. After having our tailor sew my husbands name and unit patch for the USAF on his civilian shirts,  I washed them. We had just picked them up from the trailer. I followed the directions on the tags as always, and the collar seam is already coming undone,  it's unraveling. I have pictures.  I would like something to be done about this, as it is unfair that I had to pay full price for shirts that are  obviously defective, or very poor quality.  It's a shame, because we have always purchased this brand, and we have never had problems. The shirts usually last for years.

Cheap material, wrinkles bad and baggy. Looks cheap. The size is way too big. There are loose threads all over it. The grey color has a yellow-green tint that my phone isn’t picking up. Would return in a heartbeat.

Add soon as I opened it, I noticed 2 spots on the stripes. Then the blue had bled into the white stars. I tried it on and it fit like a large. It did not fit like a 2XL. Not to mention, you can see RIGHT THRU IT!!! This is so cheaply made it should be sold for like $3. Not almost $20.... The highlight of this shirt is that it has free returns thank God. Sending it back tomorrow.
Buying this has made me realize how bad I look in a tanktop.

The tank top fit as expected, which was nice. I am usually right between a medium and a small, depending on the sizing of the brand. I am 5' 8.5', 150 pounds with a lean athletic build, a 30 waist and 32 chest. A medium tank fits me just how I would like it to, not too lose but not too tight either. The material is a slick synthetic material which is comfortable for exercising or just lounging around it. It doesn't stretch, but it doesn't need to. The colors are vibrant and haven't faded over the 9 months I have had it. All and all I got what I wanted out of this tank and am satisfied!
This tank workedfor what I used it for . 4th of July .  Nice print and non faded . Lite to wear and comfortable!

This Shirt fit great and looked great. The material seemed a bit thin, but for a muscle shirt that's not necessarily bad. Unfortunately after trying it on I noticed a big tear in the shoulder seam.  I was not happy and ended up returning it. Because the price changed I could not get Amazon to just replace it and I was not about to pay more for it. After examining the shirt some more I could really see all the loose, shoddy stitching on the shirt. Basically its a nice shirt but the quality is terrible.

Because of the material, it looks a lot smaller than it is. But size wise, it's only a little smaller than true size. My boyfriend has an athletic build and wears a large-xlarge, it fits him just fine but it appears that the xlarge would've as well- depends on which fit is more of your liking. Keep in mind that it's 'fitted'. Material is light and will keep you cool because it's not cotton! We're gonna match for EDCLV20!

Expect a Slim fit muscle Tank. Use common sense. I had to return my xl because I used wishful thinking, it was too tight. Gorgeous graphics front and back and really nice material. Just not for the above average sized people, e.g. 6'4" 250 athlete

I wear an extra large in everything.  I ordered this product in an extra large and it is very small.  When I try to return it I find out I have to pay 1/ 3 of the price of the product to return it. It is extremely frustrating.  A company should stand by their product and give you all of your money back if their product is not what you wanted.  Instead of returning it and ordering the same shirt in the next size up I will be taking my business elsewhere.

I was looking for a little snugger fit in product described a "slim fit".  I ordered an XL based on other reviews.  I am 6' 1' , 190 lbs. Even if the fit was great, it looked better in the picture.  The actual product was not as vibrant and seems K-mart quality.  OK for the price, but won't be ordering again.

I love the graphics on this tank top it is awesome however it is kind of tight on me. I'm 6'2 and 220 pounds and its kind of tight around my stomach and waste and not to long. I have over 20 tank tops and actually ordered one from another company along with this one and it fit perfect so I know exactly what I'm talking about. Besides that it had a horrible smell with it....guess I'm just going to have to donate it since its to much work to return and theres no XX-L....BUMMER :(

DO NOT BUY GILDAN TEE SHIRTS ON AMAZON.I love Gildan tee shirts, they make a great quality tee shirt that fits comfortably at a great price. I purchased Gildan tee shirts on Amazon without issue for years.  But this year, starting around February 2017, Gildan tee shirts are sold exclusively by third party Amazon Marketplace vendors, not by GIldan directly.  These third parties continuously stock orders with tee shirts that are anything but Gildan branded and quality.  I went though several transactions with several different Marketplace vendors, I never once got an actual Gildan tee shirt, all of them were junk, and I wound up fighting for my money back each and every time, over a period of weeks.  It's a nightmare, don't do it.  The actual Gildan tee shirt advertised here is a great tee shirt, but there are really only two ways of actually getting it - one, buy directly from Gildan, but they are expensive and have very stringent return polices, so be sure you are ordering exactly what you need; or two, buy from a limited number of third party online vendors besides Amazon that guarantee authentic Gildan merchandise.  There are a very limited number of online vendors besides Amazon but they are out there, I found one and I'm finally happy with the products that I received.Trying to help out the next person from making the same mistakes that I made here.Again, DO NOT BUY GILDAN TEE SHIRTS ON AMAZON.

not gildan brand! came from china with no label denoting brand. shrunk from 2xl to a small! my 5'5" wife can't even wear them. i might be able to give them to my 5 year old grand-daughter! that's how much they shrunk! DO NOT BUY

When I first got this shirt it was the perfect size which is difficult for me because I'm quite large and I wanted a baggy shirt. But I feel the shirt sizes are as expected. But after only wearing it one time it started to pill. And it is bad. The only good thing I can say about this shirt is that it didn't shrink in the wash.

These shirts are just awesome. I was looking for a poly cotton blend t-shirt. I was going to pull the trigger on some under armour shirts when I stumbled upon these. I got 3 shirts for the price of 1 Under Armour shirt. I wear these to the gym, around the house, sleep in them, and pair them with a nice pair of cargo shorts when I go out. I cold water wash them, tumble dry low, and so far they've shrunk very little and are holding up nicely. I like how they fit slightly athletic and they have a good weight to them. I was glad that they weren't slinky or thin like most polyester shirts are these days. I have zero regrets and these are cheap enough that you can trash on them all year and replace them every summer. I plan on doing just that.

I ordered several of these shirts in different colors for my husband who wears them under long sleeve plaid button front casual shirts. All T's were great, but the dark blue was a different type of fabric than the rest so 4 stars. I tried this knit vs. another I had from this brand which was heavy and felt very synthetic. The navy was the only disappointment and the others were just perfect and softer. The neckline on these t's hold up well and don't stretch out which many do with multiple washing/wearing so I keep on buying them. Fit is pretty spot on for a large!
Love the fit, but several seams had fraying. Posting a picture of one place of it as an example, but it was all around neck, and down the arms.

Very good t-shirts! I have a printed t-shirt that is over 20 years old. It's worn and stretched and I love it! It's still in great shape, as in no holes or loose threads. I specifically checked this old t-shirt and found out it was a Gildan shirt, and immediately found them here and bought some more.I marked "somewhat small". I normally wear a medium and they are slightly snug. I find a Gildan Large to fit me perfectly. They seem slightly smaller than an "industry standard" medium (as if there is really a standard that anyone else follows - hehe).

Great shirts! Unfortunately I'm at that stage where I'm too big for a "shmedium" but too small for a large. I got a large anyways and it somewhat dwarfs me. I'm 5' 9" with an athletic build and its somewhat larger but it's good motivation to fill it in! :)

Based on the reviews, I was expecting more. This is truly just a cheap cotton t-shirt. It is a nice heavy weight and I'm sure will get softer with time, but nothing special here. There are better options for the same price.
We bought this to wear as matching pjs on Christmas Eve. These were perfect and an EXCELLENT price for the quality I got. I would definitely buy this again!
Not nearly as colorful as advertised. Dissapointed its not what was pictured

We needed two matching shirts. We ordered these shirts at the same time, are the same brand and style, yet are two different colors.We will be shopping at the local mall to find matching shirts, and we should not have trusted unseen items to be color consistent.

Very nice tailoring on this baby. Bottom hem perfectly straight and level, not high or low in back or front. Perfect contemporary sizing: roomy but not sloppy. Nice stiffener in collar to make it "obey." Just a hint of tapering at the waste - I look just like those private detectives in the 70s (suit the first day when they meet the client, safari-type shirt the second day when they're "on the job") in this shirt. 'Scuse me, I think that's Charlies Angels at the door!

I'm very impressed with the quality of this shirt. It's well made and looks excellent.It fits like a real shirt, not like all of the modern items of clothing that are too tight and barely have sleeves. If you like clothes that fit in a more traditional manner and don;t make you look like a sausage when you wear them, you'll love owning one of these!I bought burgundy and the color was true to what I expected. In all likelihood I'll be ordering a couple more in different colors.

After trial and error with so many other distributers, finally I found JD Apparel Men's Short Sleeve Cuban Guayabera Shirts that are well worth it. These Guayabera’s are made well and fit accurately according to the size chart. All other distributors were hit or miss and mostly miss when it comes to quality and size. When I got one that fit, then my next order would not. But JD Apparel got it right with these and they look and feel great. Can you tell I’m happy?

These shirts are okay for the money.  The Omegas and Maximos are the identical same shirts with different tags sewn in.  I mean they are what they are.  I’m keeping both of them as knock-around pool shirts and boat shirts but I will say this.  Thank gosh I read the reviews first and ordered mine one size larger than I normally wear or these shirts would be too small and definitely too short.  Keep that in mind.

In the steamy climae of Malaysia where I live (4 degrees above the Equator) guayaberas are the perfect shirt. Comfortable yet dressy enough for dinner out or even church in Equitorial Asia. Good fit, and widely admired decoration. I love these shirts. I have black, grey, green, red, orange, yellow and light blue.

Guess I'm not as fat as I thought. Lol. But being a Polynesian, a big shirt works fine. Got the 4xl tall. Wanted a shirt made for the heat that I could get here as shirts from my country are harder to come by. This is the closest I found and it looks great. Gonna have to buy some more. Also, would have been five stars but I originally ordered the short sleeve, they sent long sleeve instead. Looks good rolled up, though.

This shirt might have been correctly sized for the measurements given, I didn't check, but the medium was larger than I expected from this size. It was also missing the bottom button. I know there are replacement buttons inside but I'm still sending back because the size; ordered a small instead. I went with this one because someone said contemporary fitting which I took to mean more slim fit and less boxy. It seemed to be decent but I'll know better when I get the small in. Other than all that the material and embroidery seemed pretty great for $24! I'll change to five stars if the small fits well and it has all the buttons!UPDATE:The small came in, fits very well except a little tight if I extend my arms all the way forward. A small sacrifice to get a more form fitting shirt; really don't want to wear anything boxy. Just doesn't look good. It had all the buttons! Material is pretty good and stains come out easily. I never need to iron it and it does well in a standard wash cycle and low heat dry cycle. The collar will bubble up a little bit but can be mostly ironed out. I've seen the happen on a lot of guayaberas and it doesn't bother me. Can't beat this for $24.
There is no way this item is a 4xl. I wear a 3xl but ordered larger to use as an over shirt and it is about 5 inches from even being able to button.

It's my fault, but I didn't notice the material.  It sticks to you when it's hot, and there's really not much stretch.  I reach for this shirt only when I have no other tanks available...this isn't going to happen very often--probably not at all--so that's a good indicator of my feelings on this shirt.The pattern is exactly as pictured so that part is reliable.  I just don't find it comfortable, and I hate the fabric.

Order this a size OVER what you usually wear. I wear XL in athletic tank tops and this fit me like a Large. had to return it and get a 2XL. Still, these tank tops are AMAZING and comment inducing. I have an athletic, 'V' build with a big chest, and the cut fits well around the chest and aren't too baggy in the torso. The 'Sunset' tank top I received had white ringers around the neck and arms but I was good with it. Four stars, missing a star for fit and the rings (even though I like them). Must buy.
I really liked the shirt, it’s one of those dry fit feel, wasn’t loose around the neck or arm pits. I’m 5’10 and 175 and the medium fit perfectly!

The idea of a 3D shirt blew me away! But the shirt that I purchased isn't as bright as the image on here and the colors aren't as stand out as I thought they would be either. Come on makers, you are all sitting on a GOLD MINE!!!! The clothes ONLINE look fantastic, so surpass that high standard of quality that you are setting by delivering on what matters THE MOST, which is the look/3D design of the clothes IN PERSON. You can do it!!

The taco-cat tank top was a huge hit on a week long bike ride across Iowa. They were light weight and breathable & pleanty of length. We actually bought an extra, & cut it up to sew pockets on others, like a real bike jersey.

I bought this shirt for my husband, and LOVE IT. He may not entirely love it, but it made me, our children and our cats happy to see him wearing this funny shirt. So I'm five-staring it. It fit him well, and the graphics were crisp and bright.
This is the perfect summer maxi! It is a great length and I love the pockets. It is also really stretchy and soft.  I am 5'7" 145lbs and a medium fits perfect!

It's super cute but a little looser than I expected. I thought it would be skin tight but it is looser like a fitted t shirt. I think anyone size 8+ it would most likely fit snugly. If you are under a size 2 you'd prob have to wear a bandeau with it bc the arm holes will be loose. Still very cute and funny!
This is a great shirt and good quality.  But it is sized small.Note to the manufacturer: If one orders an XL Tank Top, you can be pretty sure a snug fit is NOT what they are looking or.....

I ordered it to pull a prank on my gym trainer. It worked wonderfully. As a female I ask how my changing body looked and recovered an overcoat. Everyone was laughing. Thanks for the laughs it was great. Very happy.
Had to send this one back.  Material was horrible, screen print itself was horrible, nothing redeeming in this purchase...

I ordered these shirts for a last minute 5K race my team wanted to participate in. For fun, I decided to order these shirts in at the last minute and accidently ordered all 2X's but actually worked out fine. They seem to run a little small but I HATE wearing tight clothing so it could be me! The material is of excellent quality and my printer company had ZERO issues with imprinting them. The team LOVED the shirts and had many people ask for them or where I got them. They were very cool and seem to be of wicking material which I might have missed in reading about them. These arrived early, thank goodness! THANK YOU FOR ACTUALLY BEING WHAT YOU SAY YOU ARE! I was worried for nothing!

This is an extremely cool tank. The same print is on the back also. I am a music, cat/animal lover... and who doesn't love pizza!  Takes me back to my days in the '80s. Awesome shirt...you won't be disappointed 😊

Sometimes it is hard to find clothes online that fit as you want. This is a very simple shirt and was not expecting too much. Bought for a trip to DRM and I think this would be perfect. The fit is nice, nice material and the graphics are great.
Really love this tank, bought it to match the bottoms I bought a year ago. I look like a walking Universe, which is SO ME lol. That aside,  the material washes great and is incredibly comfortable.
This is a really good product. Quality is excellent, but runs a little bit small.  If you are going to purchase this item choose one size up from your regular size.
Great tank, my husband loved it, and everyone we meet while out loves it too. Unique and colorful. Easy to wash.
I LOVE this tank top so much! The image does look a bit blurry in person, but that kind of adds to the trippy effect. I'm usually a Medium, but I ordered this in a large and it fits perfect!
Looks different than photo
Fits as expected, great quality, great colors, get many compliments.  Done side, well I feel "warmer" than other tank tops as it does not breathe as well.

I am completely satisfied with the A-4 line of shirts, as an HVAC Technician in Texas it's HOT. Having a bout with Melanoma I need protection from the sun. My shirts are tougher than others I have tried and clean up very well. I highly recommend the A-4 shirts for any outdoor activity .

I ordered a men's small for my 6th grader who usually wears a YXL or adult S.  And this thing swims on him.  I wear a women's 3XL and I can put it on.  There's no way this is a small.  I had no idea that it wasn't returnable either, or I wouldn't have ordered at all.  I'll be contacting Amazon customer service and hoping for resolution since it's not at all as advertised.  The only reason I didn't give it 1 star is that the shirt itself is nice enough.  I just don't know how you can find a proper size given that another reviewer showed it running super small.

I don't know if this was a labeling problem or just terrible sizing.  I purchased the Large, and it didn't nearly fit as other large shirts do.  I've included a photo of the shirt laying on top of a Nike Dri-fit shirt of the 'same' size.  As you can see, this shirt is much smaller in all dimensions.  The price was low for a shirt, but high for something that will only be useful as a rag.

I ordered two of these and have been wanting one since I saw them (or something similar) being used by personnel in Cabo Mexico that work outdoors all day. I didn't want to pay $50 for a Nike dri-fit as I won't be wearing it often. Package arrived in four days and the shirt fit perfectly. That is it fit loosely, hangs/drapes on my frame, which is what I wanted, not a tight fit. I purchased size medium in silver and white. I'm 6'-1", athletic build and the fit is perfect. I haven't had cause to wear them yet (maybe this weekend in Tahoe), but I also got them to wear beneath my vest while riding my Harley this summer so my arms don't get sunburnt. Should work and for $8 it was a good value.

I wear these on my bicycle.  They're thin enough you can see shadows of chest hair, nipple, or undergarment if you look closely.They wick away moisture REALLY well and are comfortable by themselves between 45F and 75F (6'6" or 197gm, and 266LBS or 125kg).From 34F to 45F, these are fine as an undershirt with a thin jersey or jacket over the top, though at 34F, it's a little chilly until I'm warmed up.They don't block any wind, so if you're not pushing hard enough to huff and puff, move your temperatures up a bit.Fabric is durable, as is the stitching.  They are inexpensive shirts, and I like that.  If I tear it on something, no big deal.I've sent a few of these through the wash several times, and I always run them through the dryer on low-heat + very-dry.  The fabric has suffered no shrinkage, embrittlement, etc.These are the same shirts that some of the local print shops sell for 5x with a single-side print.If you run such a print shop, the price here seemed to be lower than what some local wholesalers had.If you are an end-consumer and don't need prints, or have your own dye-sub shirt printer, these are cost effective.Know that when I bought them, shipping for one was the same as shipping for 10. Buy in bulk if you can.These compare really well to all of the major sports shirt manufacturers such as Champion and Gildan.

My husband wanted these as an undershirt for his scrubs. He finds them extremely comfortable and fit true to size. That being said, I'm not fond of how they come out of the wash. They go in with no stains and come out covered in them unless I use a gentle cycle with pretty much just these types of shirts together. They cannot have fabric softener used on them either. The first few days he had them the seams had loose threads. This is something I can fix but don't want to worry about in a brand new shirt. Just some things to keep in mind when purchasing. They aren't awful, just a little more work to care for and with 5 kids, not something I prefer.

I now own three of these shirts in various colors. I'm a road cyclist and I bought them mostly for use as athletic wear. They provide better protection from the sun than short-sleeved jerseys and probably keep me cooler on hot summer days too. On the hottest days I'll "prime the pump" by dampening the fabric covering my arms and chest before I start the ride. The shirt feels comfortable and cool as the breeze evaporates the moisture. On cool days these shirts work as a windbreaker and help keep one warm. To replace the pockets on the back of a true cycling jersey, I wear a small waist pack Everest Signature Waist Pack - Standard, Black, One Size.The shirts (especially in the other colors) are handsome enough to wear as casual clothing.

I really like this shirt. Just biked 20 miles in cool weather. This shirt, unlike my normal shirts, stopped most of the cooler air from coming through. When the weather turned warmer, I was surprised that it didn't over heat me, and was really thrilled about how comfortable it felt- weather wise and material wise.

Completely absurd. I’m 6’1 and weigh 205lbs and the Large fits me like a trash bag. The large fits like a xxl. I go back to amazon to return it and turns out it’s not “eligible for return”. It’s really cheaply made. The sizing could not be more off. I’m usually an XL in t shirts, I got this in Large for a tighter fit to run in, and it’s the oppoisite of that. Pretty stupid, horrible product, waste of money.

I have bought this item several times, different colors. However, the last two items were sized wrong. Extra large on package, but shirt inside was a Small. Mis-labled somewhere. Check inventory. Not eligible for return, so donated to nursing home closet for other patients. Disappointed, because Dad loves to wear these shirts and pants. Vicki Reynolds

Very disappointed. I regularly by Ralph Lauren Polo shirts so I am accustomed to the quality of products that they produce. I purchased a green polo shirt from you all on the same day that I purchased a couple of more polo shirts from the actual Ralph Lauren website. When my package came from Ralph Lauren it was perfect as always but when I received my package from you all I was shocked to find that the tag had been torn off and the shirt had noticeable pieces of thread hanging from it. I don’t even think this product is real. I will never purchase from you all again and I hope anyone reading this thread will take my advice on it if you like quality products.

Nice shirt but too short. I bought the large for my husband who is 6'2" 200 lbs and it was wide enough but at least 2-3 inches too short. I'm 5'4" and it would have fit me in length ending around my hips.

Fit was a little small, bought this for my son which is 5'10" and 150 pounds. He normally wears a M, ordered a L and it fit like most M's. He has a long torso and this is still long enough after being washed in cold and not dried in a dryer, but just barley.

I ordered this shirt along with 5 different colors from another seller, this shirt is not the same fit and after I asked it the shirt was like a medium. I ordered XL men’s 100% cotton this should not have shrunk or be so different in size from supposedly the same brand as the others....
If you get this tee wet, it turns different colors so you think you ruined it. Not to worry, once it dries it goes to it's original color. I really thought I ruined it.
Loved I also got the purple, lightweight no clingy spandex. Soft as can be. I want one in every color now. I’ve been wearing Polo T-shirts for 30 years and they only get better with time!
Shirt out of the package had very noticeable stains and no new tags. Really needed the shirt for an event and not have time to return and order again.
Good quality shirt. Looks really good. Washed them about 6 times now kinda stretching out a little bit and I been using woolite.. If they had a little elastic they would justify their price bigley..
This does not look or feel like a Polo tee shirt. Thin flimsy fabric and super (really, really) small. Should have known based on the low price.
After wearing this shirt twice its becoming so loose at the buttom i dunno why

•Those of you guys, like me that are out of shape-I highly reccomend•I’m out of shape, thus on the heavy side, (waist size 44w X 31L pants size) for perspective. Shirts I buy either 2xl or 3xl I’m very self conscious, & picky, those on the heavy side no what I mean when I say most t-shirts/a-Shirts are never large enough, which is why I shop around. I bought this JC DISTRO brand on a whim, I bought 2) one harbor blue & one charcoal gray. They’re very comfortable. The arm holes aren’t huge so my “arm chub” isn’t totally open, also they’re a good length so the chances of my gut &/or love handles sticking out are slim! Not to mention, the fabric is an awesome, thick & soft 100% COTTON. These imo are more outer tank than undershirt tank. Although I feel can be worn either way. It’s July1,18 & I live  in NYC area and we’re in a 95-100degree heatwave, I wore the blue one today as my regular shirt.Buy w/ Confidence!
My husband uses this tank top for working out and he really likes them. So much so, that we own most of the colors. Runs true to size and is a good length.

Fits strangely. It has a great, athletic but not too tight fit in the chest and shoulders, then seems to give up as it heads toward the waist. Has at least two inches too much in the waist. It fits like a male, maternity tank top. If you have an awesome upper body and a wicked beer gut, I guess look no further. Meh.

I"m not happy with this tank top. It is quite baggy at the hips and waist. It does not look the way that it appears in the photo on Amazon. I did not return it because I needed another tank for my workouts and, quite frankly, I don't need to look like a fashion model in the gym, but, nevertheless, I wish it fit better.

I prefer muscle (sleeveless) t-shirts and I'm not big on tank tops, but this particular tank top with the two-tone color looked good on the model, so I decided to try this product.I have a 36" waist and my shoulder to shoulder measurement is 19" so the medium size fits quite nicely on me. Plus, the organic 100% cotton fibers feels good on my skin as opposed to those sports shirts with synthetic fibers (which can cause me skin irritation despite the pluses of drying fast and whisking away moisture).So, the sizing, the color and the thread stitching is nice and I have no complaintsRecommended t-shirt product.

Bought 6 of these and they fit great. Fabric is soft and not too light or heavy.  I have broad shoulders and narrow waist, but am only 5'6".  Most shirts blouse up on the chest or in the waist.  These fit nicely - not tight, not baggy.  Will see how long they last.  I don't put them in the dryer, so so far so good.

Bought a few before vacation to Aruba colors are accurate I’m 6’ 210 out of the box xl fits perfect after 5-6 washes still fit as in picture the xxl shrank as expected a little longer for the gym.for the money its a bargain with free shipping in my book!!
Nice, soft shirt but the cut is strange. The arm openings are very deep and the waist of the shirt billows away from the body.
I'm 6'3", so finding an XL that's long enough can be a challenge. These are perfect!!! Ill definitely be buying more!

I love the fit on this. I didn’t want something that hangs too far below the arms and is baggy, and it looks like I hit the jackpot. It’s fitted but I can move comfortably. Material is also pretty comfortable and seems to be well made. I just ordered more in other colors.

So I am not even sure if these things are authentic or not.  I have rocked many a Hanes white-tee in my day, always preferring the V neck for business (I rarely wear a tie).I had gained some weight (and recently lost it!), so I ordered a new size of shirt as I realized my tried and true XL under shirts weren't fitting anymore.  I ordered these in 2XL, and dealt with them for about a year, but they were honestly not much bigger, if bigger at all, than the XL was.  At least in the front or 'belly' section of the shirt.  I did not feel like I got any additional coverage by going a size up.  On top of that, the V is pretty deep in these shirts.I can't return them, I've worn them regardless of the bad fit and just dealt with it.  But I figured this might help someone else.  Also, I didn't have any issues with the quality of the cotton or anything else.  The shirts are still in great shape - they just aren't as big as they should be.I will be buying a different brand next time, and a couple sizes smaller due to having lost some weight!!

The shirts are comfy enough. However after the 2nd wash, the shirts have fallen apart! I use gentle detergent and the normal cycle on my washer. I have never had a piece of clothing fall apart like this. Ever. I will not be able to return because I've already tossed all the packaging...and I've purchased 3 packages. Highly disappointed. Quality of these shirts have gone down for sure. Spend your money on another brand.

As expected. I buy these every few year when the ones I have wear out. The material is thin, but I knew it would be. I sleep in them so it doesn't matter to me, but if you are looking for material that is thicker and more durable, there are probably better choices. For three shirts the price was right.

They're what I expected and are suitable for what I needed: thin undershirts with a neckline that didn't show above my work shirt's collar.  Keep in mind that they will shrink in the wash.  I have a smaller build and was expecting them to shrink, so it wasn't an issue for me.Also, note that these are *not* the types of shirts you wear by themselves or with an unbuttoned shirt.  I'm not even particularly fashion-conscious and I don't like spending much on clothes, but these are too thin and the v-neck is too deep for it.  Look for a midweight or heavyweight material for those, and get comfortable with spending a little more for quality (the next tier up of Hanes shirts can work for this).

These t-shirts are satisfactory.  They are too thin, even compared with the "same" Hanes t-shirts that I got my husband two years ago.  And one thing about Hanes t-shirts, they run several inches shorter than other t-shirts I buy, which affects tucking in and staying in my husband's pants.  But he does say they are comfortable, nonetheless.

I said the t-shirts were to SMALL because I ordered TWO different packs BUT BOTH packs were SUPPOSE to be 3x. I opened them up and put away the shirts and went to work. After a few days and I was then off work I went to wear a nice, white t-shirt so I could cut my grass which is 3 acres so I wanted white to reflect the sun. I am not a small man at all but when I put it on felt awfully tight. After wearing for two hours I came in house to take a shower and looked at them and they were the WRONG SIZE. They were 2X and NOT 3X so know I have several shirts that I cannot use. I guess it is my fault a bit for NOT looking but one would assume AMAZON can fill an order and KNOW the difference between 2X and 3X.

I am Very disappointed in this Hanes T-Shirt. Very poor quality. The material is so thin it is practically see through. They do not hold shape well in the wash. This shirt does not seem true to size like other Hanes T-Shirts.  I will not buy again nor will I recommend

Wow. What happened to Hanes? They usually have a decent reputation but I got these for my husband and could definitely tell the difference. You could almost see through them because of the thinness and the sewing on the V-neck is a bit off. Hey, it's Hanes so I wasn't expecting something grand, but at least their normal standard. Unfortunately, this product was beneath that.

What's not to like about these t-shirts? they're sparkling white when new and they fit better than the fruit of the loom brand. They're a decent thickness as to not be too see through even with my tan complexion. It seems to last about a year before they start showing signs of thinning and holes with a wear/wash cycle twice a month.

These are the loosest t-shirts that I have ever received. I bought the medium size. The height of the shirt is good; however, the shirt is designed for someone with a much larger belly. I would not buy these again.

I purchased this for my husband for Christmas because we are HUGE office fans! Like we have it going nonstop in our house in one of the rooms. It just doesn’t get old! Anyway the shirt- for reference my husband is 5’9” and 250. I purchased the XL and it fit him perfect. However, after washing it shrunk. Not a lot but enough to take away one of the stars. He can still wear it, and he does. It gets washed at least twice a week and it’s now June 1 and it has held up well! I do recommend it.Every time I purchase something online, I always check the reviews. I count on others to help me choose the best option. My reviews are always my honest opinion and I try to include photos if possible.If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below so that I know! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!

This is one of my favorites tees, I wear it all the time. Its perfectly comfy, nice material, and still holds the image after tons of washes. I got a small because I think its a men's cut and I'm a 5 ft girl. It fits loosely but not in a baggy way and the bottom hangs just across the zipper of my jeans. I will 100% buy another one when this one is officially worn to shreds. For any girl looking for size advice, I buy girls mediums and this small fits very comfortably. Old snapchat picture uploaded but I don't think it really shows how it fits and I don't feel like taking another. It does show the scale of the image nicely though.

I was really excited to receive this shirt, and I washed it right away when it arrived so I could wear it the next day. Unfortunately, the printing on half a letter and part of another letter flaked off and re-deposited on the sleeve of the shirt. It's just very cheap quality - you get what you pay for. Very disappointed.

I waited to review this shirt until we had washed it a couple of times. I bought this for my son who is a huge fan of The Office. It fit great, he is 6'7 and the length was good for him so I would say it runs long. It washed well, I always hang his shirts to dry to prevent excess shrinking but the decal still looks great with no fading. The cotton is of a thicker variety and not the see through, thin fabric that a lot of t-shirts are nowadays. Great quality t-shirt.
Um, it's a Dunder Mifflin shirt, so of course it's great. It's not the greatest quality in the world, but it's not intended for wearing to the Dundies or any other fancy event.

The material is good and the logo seems decent quality. Mind you, I haven't put it through the wash yet but I can already tell it's going to need to be hang dried and not thrown in the dryer. It fits as expected which is nice, and the material feels decent against the skin and breathes nice.My only complaint about my purchase(I purchased two) is that one of the shirts came and the logo was pretty off center and crooked. So I got one that was decently straught(blue) and one that wasn't centered/crooked(black) and that's a little frustrating. But all in all, it's decent and I'm decently happy with my purchase.

My husband typically wears a size Large in Shirts. So I ordered a large for Christmas. He wore it and loved it. It was a huge hit at his office. And was a bit large for him. We washed it with our other shirts as regular, and it shrunk. It literally shrunk like 3-4 inches in length. It’s more the size of my Medium Women’s shirts now. He tried wearing it and it kind of chokes him now.

This shirt was a gift for my husband since he finds humor in the ridiculous show it references. He instantly loved it and insisted he get to wear it to a family function--an argument he inevitably won simply because I gave up the fight. Whenever he wears it, loads of people comment on it. Once we were strolling through the mall and a man walked by abd startled me with his "Dunder Mifflin" shout out. Surprisingly even other women compliment his shirt, but they must only get the reference because their husbands also force them to watch the show. Anyway, if you've got a significant other who is an avid "The Office" fan, this shirt is perfect for 'em. The shirt comes slightly larger, but nothing a good wash and dry can't fix. The lettering wasn't 100 percent perfect, in fact, the opacity is a little off, but it creates a little bit of vintage to the shirt. It won't really matter if your husband doesn't sort laundry and thus doesn't care about the item fading anyway.For size reference, my husband is 5' 4'', 120 pounds with glasses and regularly a small in men's clothing.

I just got it out of the box and the wording looks very worn. As if it has been washed multiple times. It has a very faded look to it. I love this forest color green, the material seems nice, and the shirt looks like it fits well. It just disappoints that it has a very faded look to it already.

This shirt is good quality cotton and looks exactly as pictured. It seems to fit as expected. I had an issue where the package was lost in the mail (not a fault with the supplier), and I emailed the seller and he immediately reshipped for me. The package came quickly. The customer service is excellent- that alone would cause me to be a return buyer. Worth the purchase!
Poor to cheap material. On first ware the armpits changed from gray to pink.

I absoulutely LOVE this shirt!! I am pretty picky about the way t-shirts fit me especially cotton. You just never know until you try a shirt because every shirt fits differently. I was pleasantly surprised on how comfortable it is! Not heavy, not too thin, and the quality is perfect! I have worn it a few times already & I have received so many compliments on it! So don't let the low price fool you!! It's WELL worth it!

When my husband opened this up on Christmas morning, everyone laughed... probably because we're all old enough to appreciate the humor.As for the shirt, it's a very nice soft cotton quality and the printing is great. Fits nice too. My husband loves it.

Husband really liked this one and so does everyone who sees him in it. I ordered it as lagniappe Valentine’s Day gift to go along with his other goodies and he was happy. Quality is decent for a tee shirt and the print was done well. No issues or malfunctions on this one. Has washed well so far also, but we’ve only had it almost two months so we’ll see how long it lasts. For the price, this is a great purchase for someone who has everything or who you don’t know what they need or want, especially if they are older than the millennial generation! (Also, I ordered the dark green because I was pushing for time and it was the only one in the size I needed that was available for prime shipping, and I’m very happy to have gotten this color. Stands out so much more than the normal black shirts I buy. It’s not a common color. Yet it’s srill subtle, so it is a good one to go with for people who don’t like to stand out too too much in crowd.)

Female-I weight 250lbs(yes i know i'm big-working on it)  height 5'3"  ordered a size 3XL for halloween, it fitted just right little loose but not too much just the right amount, love the color, texture and all about it, the reason i gave 4 stars not 5 is because i have bought or tried size 3xl clothes before and its way looser on me than this shirt. But overall I do recommend buying it.

This shirt is made of decent quality materials and feels like it will last a long time. The artwork on the front is nice quality. The screen art is clear, heavy, and durable. This shirt should hold up to wear and tear quite well. I hope that it holds up to many runs through the washing machine as I really like the look of it and plan to wear it as much as possible.
This is a fun t-shirt.  My son got it for me for Father's Day.  (Actually I'm older than all those items and remembered when they came into existence.)  This makes me and people who see it laugh.

A gift for my HUSBAND.  He loves his run about T's.  He is 6'3 and 230lbs., with a stought build and the T's fit him comfortably for around the house and errands.  The colours are bright and nice after a few washes the T's have kept both colours and integrity.  Good purchase.

Print is centered, very sharp and clear. Pleasantly surprised with the quality of the fabric, I ordered the white t-shirt and it's solid and matte, so I don't need to wear a cami underneath at all. Did notice --and was counting on it-- that the shirt shrunk a bit after the first wash. If you are in-between sizes, I'd consider sizing up to account for the material shrinking.

LOVED this shirt! Not only was hilarious and brought back memories to our childhood but the QUALITY, COLOR, FIT, and PRICE we're PERFECT!!! Definitely recommend this shirt. This was a gift and everyone was talking about it! Hahaha Just BUY IT!

I weigh 290 pounds and this shirt fits great. I'm fat around my belly area and needed a shirt that had the hang style in the back so my butt crack wasn't showing all the time. Yeah I could lose the weight, but now that I found this shirt (and I plan to buy more) no weight lose for me!!! And my man boobs don't show to much in this shirt either. Only when my nipples get hard, but hey, what woman doesn't love to see some nipple action on a man! Am I right? Or am I right?

This is a great quality shirt and has a good color too (burgundy). The only problem is how far the back flap goes. The front flap is at a great length but the back flap goes down pass my butt and looks like I'm trying to pull off a half dress piece.  So I recommend this shirt to talk guys and I think girls could pull this off just get the smallest model.

Hello athleisure shirt! I've been trying to get these specific designed of shirts for a reasonable price, unlike those sold by YouTubers and other fitness-community fam like Gymsharks or Alphalete. I was skeptic at first in terms of fit since I've never worn clothes that is designed like this so I went for my 2 types of sizes that I would normally wear: my regular size of Large and also a Medium to see how it fits. Overall, both fits me well out of the bag/fresh from delivery (more on that later). I'm 5'8" and 177 lbs. As you can see by the picture, I'm not too muscular nor overweight, just a good mixture of fatness and muscle--roughly 20% - 21% body fat. Anyway, I am wearing a MEDIUM here and my arms are hugging the sleeves and so is my pecs (chest) and it's nicely tapered down and shapes my lower body/waist area. Now for the large, I didn't take a picture, but basically it's almost the same minus the sleeves not hugging my arms as much and also it's slightly longer. BUT I washed and machine dried both of them right away like I would for any of my clothes and both the large and medium shrank a tiny bit, though not enough to make it unwearable. Overall, these are great and fits as expected not only for outing but also wearing it at the gym. I love my first 2 pairs that I instantly ordered some more since, why not? The price is right and it makes anyone out there refresh their looks by having a versatile and stylish shirt in or out of the gym!Note: you dont' necessarily need to be a gym goer to wear these by the way. Anybody can wear it, plus it makes you stand out of the crowd since the design of the shirt is not very common unlike your regular t-shirt or v-neck!

I bought an XL in this because a men's XL usually leave me plenty of room to wash and dry without too much shrinkage.  Since I had never bought this brand before, I washed it in cold water and hung it up to dry - no heat ever touched this shirt!  Not only did it shrink a little in the chest, it shrunk considerably in length.  Before washing, I had extra room in the chest and it was long enough to cover my rear end.  After, it's a little snug across the chest and only comes halfway down my rear end.  I would recommend sizing up at least 2 sizes if you want to have some room after washing.
Really good nice product

I read reviews before buying this shirt and saw that it is a little thin and the stiching is not the best. I figured still worth a shot for the cost. I was plesantly surprised. The shirt i got was not as thin as i had imagined it is still thin but also soft and comfy. It did shrink a little after first two washes but again i expected that. The stiching is light and can easily be ripped but again for the cost this is not as bad as i expected. I got the 2xl and im 6 foot 2 280lbs with a large chest. I was worried the bottom of the shirt would be clingy but it actually fits really well. I was hoping for a little longer so i may go up a size on the next one but only for length reasons.

Update: I just ordered a second one in white to replace the first one that I got which was sewed crooked. This one is a completely different fit and length. It is way longer than the first one I had and a little slimmer throughout. I wish it fit as nicely as the first one minus the defect. I won't be ordering another one of these. I'm very disappointed, I feel like I'm wearing a nightgown with this one.Original review:This shirt fits perfectly. I really love the way it hangs. Unfortunately, I'm giving it 3 stars for the poor quality control. The shirt was sewed crooked and the scalloped bottom was totally asymmetrical, off to one side. The seams on each side were in two completely different places. One side seemed to be in the correct spot, while the other side was clear around on the side of my back! Fortunately, Amazon refunded me. I'm reluctant to order another white one and have the same issue be happening, despite how much I loved the fit of the shirt.I also ordered the charcoal grey colored shirt in the same size and it fits entirely differently. It's much longer and more narrow. It felt and looked too tight for me. I had to return it.Perhaps I'll get the nerve to order another white one soon and fingers crossed that it will be symetrical.
