Awesome fit, long, just what I needed.Helps conceal my firearms as I have a longer torso and my normal shirts pop over my firearm.Quality is really really nice, should last a long time.Fits even better once washer.Neck is slightly larger (one star drop) but I did learn they have a premium version which corrects this.Anyways for the price these are amazing.

I love these shirts. I ordered 3 of the olive drab color in size large ( I'm 6', 200lbs, athletic build). After reading some of the other reviews, the first thing I did was look for defects and check that they were all the same size. These are about as thick as a fruit of the loom under shirt (basic white tee) and you cannot see through them. At least in the color I bought. I normally buy the Bella + Canvas long body tee but wanted some color besides black, white, and grey. Comparing the two, these are shorter and thinner but you don't have to pull them up to sit down, they don't interfere with your movement. They cover your rear and fit really well.

The quality completely depends on what color you get. White/Grey 100% cotton so even when washing on the coldest setting they will still shrink about half in size. Maroon/Dark grey is a softer polyester hybrid. Stays soft and doesn’t shrink. Have about 6 of these shirts, just wish they were more consistent.

Using the Canon TS 9120 printer, you require 6 ink tanks. This Combo pack only contains 4 ink tanks (3 photo color inks, plus the pigment black for documents. You will still need to purchase a 281 black and 281 PB to replenish all 5 photo inks. Im not interested in the photo glossy paper II included in this "combo" when this pack does not even cover all the photo inks needed. CanonInk Printer Ink (2091C006) pack on Amazon contains all 5 of the photo inks. You will still need to purchase the separate PGI-280 pigment black ink used for printing documents, but it makes more sense to purchase the 2091C006 combo.

While I like the quality of these Canon inks--they print both photos and documents quite well, I'm disappointed in how long these cartridges last. I put these in the printer about 10 weeks ago and as the photo here attests to, they are already low on ink.  I don't print an extraordinary amount of documents.  By my estimation, I printed less than 200 pages, most in black and white, in the time that I've had this set installed.I like the printer, so I'll be keeping it and ordering the XL size cartridges from now on.

These cartridges are described by Amazon as new, original Canon cartridges. My printer detected that these cartridges were used (see photo) and would not print properly from them. They showed as empty from the time I installed. I tried to override but the ink monitoring chip in the cartridge detected they’d been used. Unfortunately, I didn’t need them until after the return deadline. I will call to complain and request a refund. I replaced the Amazon cartridges with another set from Office Depot and the printer worked perfectly for text and photo.

It’s original canon ink. or it says so. Worked in my canon printer. Wish canon ink was cheaper. At the rate I’m going through canon ink it might be cheaper to buy a NEW printer (on sale), that already comes with ink, each time I need ink....
The ink is fine....but the cost is high.
Ink cartridges work as they should. Print quality on this canon is always good.  Wish the ink would last longer. But quite happy with the purchase.

I am hoping I will not use this for a very long time.  When I purchased the printer it was not clear that it came with the required print cartridges so I bought this set that turned out to be a backup set.

I like that this pack has all the colors that ran out first after the initial purchase of the printer. I later bought the black ink cartridge by itself directly from Canon because it seemed nobody else sold single colors (or the prices were insane), even the big box office supply stores.
Ink works as expected.  Next time I will order a generic brand due to the high cost of Canon ink.

It looks like it’s all there but there’s one ink tank missing- need the additional black- which isn’t easy to find. Also per print it’s far from comparable to printing at a photo lab. Canon= expensive.

Very disappointed. I would negative star it if I could. I thought it was authentic from the photos. The photos had the proper logo on the tag and sleeves. This is the worst knockoff. I could have printed an iron on better than this.

Ordered the Champion LIFE Men's Heritage Tee in "oxford gray/left chest champion script" in a size Small from Amazon Marketplace seller "shopAKIRA." Can confirm that the product I received is authentic and the quality is on point. Material feels thick, with "champion" embroidered on the left chest area, and my biggest concern was relieved as there was another champion logo embroidered on the left sleeve. My initial worry was if there was a champion logo on the left sleeve since the picture does not indicate one. I'm 5'5, 125lbs and went with my true size in clothing, Small. Fit exactly how I expected, not too snug, length of t-shirt and sleeves fit me fine.

First, Champion ruined the best athletic socks in the world.Now, they produce a fine, high-quality t-shirt with Mystery Sizing.The Amazon description says, "THIS STYLE IS UNISEX. PLEASE ORDER A SIZE DOWN."What the heck does THAT mean? I went by the Amazon size chart: my waist is 35-36, and chest is 42, so I ordered an L.It's too small. If I had "ordered a size down," I would have ordered a Medium, and it would have been MUCH too small.Dear Champion:  Please just stop being stupid.Thanks.
So cute!! This is a men shirt, I usually wear a large in women’s so I ordered a medium. It was perfect - I loved it!!
Way too big but a run through the washing machine on hot shrunk it down to the perfect size.  Well made and I like the Champion logo, but the neck hole is huge.  Made for George Costanza's head.
Came as presented online, official champion tag also. So idk if other people received a knock off but mine was official. Comfy too with thick material.
So they sent me a blue shirt with the champion across the front even though I ordered a white one.  Don't feel like sending it back. Very heavy material but it's a nice classic champion shirt.

I bought the same T-shirt on the Champion web site and it didn't shrink at all.  This one shrank from large to small.  This one had a tag (the Champion product didn't.  The size was printed on the inside of the back of the shirt).  The material on this one was coarse. (The Champion product material was smooth.)

I like it, the only thing is, material is thick and not very comfortable. My 15yr old doesn't like wearing it unless there is nothing else to wear then he would. I kept it but i wouldn't buy it again. Again it's everyone preferences on the material, we likes comfy feel not harsh.
Way to wide and the shirt is short. Not happy.
Came as pictured. Bought an xl and works well for a taller person. Holds up through several washes.

The only problem is that it did shrink upon washing about one size. Fortunately, I ordered it a size too big. Unfortunately, it will no longer hide my firearm. That's why I ordered it a size larger. I'm going to give this to my kid to wear, because he doesn't have to worry about concealing a weapon

I recently moved from Bellingham Washington to Dartmouth Nova Scotia Canada. I bought this to go to the USA vs CANADA rugby match in Halifax, which is a 15 minute drive. Product seems to be well made and was delivered ahead of schedule.

Graphic on this tee is awesome.  Both my brother and husband love their shirts.  These t-shirts are not too heavy/too thick.  Perfect weight for a t-shirt.  The navy is a true navy and the design looks great on it! The best part, it's made here in the USA!
The only problem I have with this was all the long threads hanging from the seams that if pulled start to unravel the stitching.
Amazing style and fit. I love it! I am 5'7' and 292 lbs with a size 42 waist. And a 3XL fit perfectly right out of the box.
Outstanding Product! Worked Perfectly! Great Quality and Style! No issues with it whatsoever! I don't know about you, but, I'm happy :-)
My husband is about 6'1 and 220pds. I ordered a XX Large, same as he would wear if bought from a store. It was perfect. And he loved the design. It's a very nice looking shirt.
I was really excited when the shirt came in until I opened the package.  The logo was not centered and angled slightly.  Had high hopes and was disappointed.
Decent tank top. It's material is a little too thin almost like a woman's it's also slightly tapered and gets larger around the waist. I personally wouldn't buy it again.
Great fit - I am 195lbs 6'2'' ordered an XL. Don;t like the tight fit of a L on Tanks and glad I went with the Xl.
Fits great and is a very soft material.
Fits a little large than some Men's Large. But, that's what I was looking for. I wanted it to be a more relaxed fit.
Awesome color, looks even better than I expected!Fit as expected and arrived on time, I would definitely recommend.
Love this line of clothing
Fast shipping great price
This is not 100% cotton. It’s 80/20 cotton/polyester. It’s also cut poorly and surprised that Hurley would put their name on it. The stitching is also cheap. It’s going back.
Shirt is good quality and fits well!
Love Hurley Nike stuff

I ordered this shirt and also the "Gildan 5.3 oz. Heavy Cotton T-Shirt" to compare them. This"Gildan Men's Ultra Cotton Tee" is definitely a heavier weight cotton than the "Gildan 5.3 oz. Heavy Cotton T-Shirt".So basically the "heavy cotton" shirt is thinner.I am guessing this "Gildan Men's Ultra Cotton Tee" is 6.0 oz. or more. It's better quality. The "Gildan 5.3 oz. Heavy Cotton T-Shirt" is getting returned.

the fit is as angular and sturdy as you'd expect from a heavier gildan tee. it's solid. but after even one cold wash, the bottom hem WILL begin to flip upward and there's no real solution for it except maybe ironing for each wear but i haven't tried that. i got multiple ultra cotton tees (seven colors including three whites) and they all have this same problem. luckily all of them together only cost about the same as buying one or two high-quality shirts. still a bummer though.

I'm 5'9" tall and weigh about 170 lbs. In a tailored suit or jacket I would be a 40R. That puts me right on the separation point between M and L in  t-shirt sizes. Some larges can be too large  on me, but this one fits great. A medium would have been too small. These are a quality weight t-shirt also.

In this global manufacturing economy, I have a hard time finding consistency in size and quality from order to order on any clothing.  I was very pleased to find Gildan's Ultra Cotton Tee is still true to the size and quality of material they used three years ago.  I now intend to order a 5 year supply.
I was surprised at the quality when it arrived. Nice thick material that appears to be able to withstand my husbands torture lol! Highly recommend
I love all the Gildan products I have purchased.  I have a number of long sleeve shirts, but I have found the best are called "ultra cotton".

It's tough to review this. When I bought these shirts they fit as I liked, if a touch big, but I was satisfied. The let down for me was that after I washed them they shrank significantly, to the point I consider them too small. And I'm quite paranoid about shrinking clothes, I'm a big guy, so I always dry my laundry on the lowest heat available and do not overdry anything. I would not recommended these shirts.

The shirt is accurate size-wise, albeit a bit shorter than most t- shirts,  but the material is like scratchy canvas- not soft at all! I purchased a couple similar looking t’s from another brand, paid a couple dollars more and got a much better quality, soft cotton. I’m not really complaining, as this one only cost 7 dollars but it will be relegated as a work shirt and probably just be thrown away soon.

My son stated that the t-shirts were just what he wanted.  The fit around the neck, sleeves, and waist were perfect.  The t-shirts were a light grey and were of good quality.  I ordered an x-large, and my son weighs about 155.  The t-shirt fabric is soft, and I think the t- shirts will survive multiple washings, especially if shirts are laundered according to the garment label directions.

I really like the Gildan high-vis construction shirts, so I thought this was going to be the same.  It's close, but the cotton isn't quite as thick and the length of the shirt is shorter.  I wear XL and this feels a bit closer to a normal Large.  But for $5, I'll deal with it.  Still earns 5 stars for not being super thin like other brands.

This is my third purchase of this case. I love it and highly recommend it!PROS- I drop my phone constantly. My kids have thrown it as hard as they can on the floor. I have never had a screen crack or a phone break.- Super protective but still has a slim profile- My toddler threw my phone in the bathtub, it sank to the bottom. I grabbed it out and opened the case to dry off my phone and it was completely dry.- love that you can see the Apple logo design on the back of the phone through the clear back.TRADE-OFFS- I have no issue with talking on the phone in the normal, typical way, but the case makes it hard for people to hear my when I am talking on speaker phone. I get around this by using a headset of the Apple headphones to take hand free calls.- listening to music on the phone speaker means hearing some reverberation of the case. Solution - just use a WiFi speaker- I replaced my case after a year because the plastic over the camera was too scratched and was effecting picture quality. This is cheaper than replacing my phone.- it can be hard to swipe from the bottom sometimes, you have to swipe on the sides not the center of the bottom, where the case exposes the edge.

I got the plum color and some people are saying it's not the same color as described...if you compare to a plum it's obviously not the same, but it you compare it to the picture in the description that's the exact color you'll get, so I didn't feel mislead at all.Definitely works like it should. I can talk and listen to music just as before or with other cases.Yes the lock and volume buttons are a little stiff but I feel as though they may loosen up, if not well...I think I'll be ok.The mute button is pretty cool, at first I was like "great it's not going to work", but it actually works perfectly.I did have to register new finger prints, but I'm not sure that has anything to do with the case. Definitely works though, only fingers registered work.Straight contact to phone screen. Super nice! Definitely ordered a screen cover to fit this case because well the 7 is far from cheap and I get really nervous. 🙃Swiping up from the bottom, just swipe up from the sides. You can't directly above the home button but still have plenty of room to the sides of the home button, shouldn't be a problem.Ummm ummm...cameras aren't covered in corners, quality still very good.I think this can answer most people's questions and concerns. Overall a great case!

Just received my new case yesterday. I love it even more than I thought I would. Its not nearly as bulky was other lifeproof cases that I have owned in the past and I really like the feel of the smooth, clear back of the case when I am holding my phone. The mermaid color is definitely more of a light minty green than a light teal or turquoise but it has grown on me and I have already gotten several compliments on it. Plus is looks great with my white/silver iPhone 7.Prior to purchasing it, I read several reviews that said its hard to hear during calls and that it is hard to access the dashboard menu from the bottom of the screen - but I have not had any issues with either. I was able to hear people just fine and they haven't had any complaints about being able to hear me. As long as you swipe up from either the left or right side of the home button the dashboard menu comes up just fine for me.I wish that there were better color options overall for the Nuud as they all seem fairly childish but I was able to find one that I didn't absolutely hate. I also wish that you could buy the alpha glass screen protector for Nuud separately instead of in a $140 bundle directly from Lifeproof. I do have a teqii mini2 glass for Nuud screen protector on the way, hopefully it fits well enough to not bother me too much.

I'm rough of my phones. I actually destroyed a LifeProof case after two years on my last phone (I drop it on the floor, into a sink, into the bathtub, spill coffee, etc.) My previous phone somehow survived all of those things. Since I was eligible for a new phone, when my last case broke I didn't invest in a new LifeProof case and eventually my phone took a trip into the washing machine. It didn't survive. I ordered a LifeProof case for my new phone before I picked it up at the store. In this case, my new phone has survived a trip into a kiddie pool thanks to my toddler, numerous drops onto hard floors at work, and even coffee! I will always keep my electronics in LifeProof cases from now on. They are the best! 100% worth the investment.

This case does what's it's supposed to - it protects the device from water and impacts. The unfortunate side effect is this case makes the device a misery to use. You practically have to smash the sound and lock buttons to get them to work, and it interferes with the shortcuts on lock screen- it completely eliminates the swipe-up control center capacity of the iphone. The speakers sound odd, and the case makes the phone too bulky for anything but high impact use.I'll use it for field work or on the water, but otherwise it's going to sit unused in my desk.

I purchased this case on August 6, 2018.  Today is November 3, 2018 and the door at the bottom for the charger literally “fell off”!  I contacted Lifeproof and was told that because I didn’t purchase from them the warranty was void.  Since I purchased from Amazon I reached out to them.  I’ve been a member since 2013 and have had very few issues with Amazon...  Up until today.  IReached out via chat and explained my situation and was told to contact Lifeproof.  After explaining to the rep what I stated above, I was offered a $10 “courtesy credit”.  I appreciate the gesture but I paid $30 for something that is literally supposed to be “life proof” and it failed by simple opening the charging port door.  It wasn’t dropped or thrown or misused in anyway.  It was simply opened and it broke.  I will now purchase an Otterbox but won’t be doing somthrough Amazon.  And once the new season one “The Grand Tour” is over, I will most likely cancel my Prime account.My advise.  Do not buy Lifeproof cases!  They do not hold up to normal use and no one stands behind them.

I wish I could write a good review because I was happy with the product... until it broke.The sound quality is better than most waterproof cases on the market. The microphone is not buffered and sound quality on the recipient side is near unaltered. The recess of the phone screen into the case is adequate so even with no screen protection, it is protected. I would recommend developping a specific screen protector like the standard ones on the market, sized in a manner that the case seal sits on it. It would create a really good product. I like the grip on the outside edge which compensates for the bulkiness of the waterproof case (which is to be expected) and provides good handling, while the sleek front and back permit easy pull out of pants’ pockets. The home button Touch ID is still functional although  I am not crazy about the plastic film on top of it but it still works properly. The swipe from bottom of screen up to access tool bar is altered by the case seal overlapping that part of the screen making it hard to operate, and the volume buttons are hard to operate and requires excessive pressure.That’s for my review of the case until it broke.The small door which seals the power plug clips onto the case. It happened to break on me. Not at the hinge but at the lip which makes the clip to close on the case. It is unfixable and may reveal a poor design making it to thin to be durable.So overall happy with the case but disappointed that it only lasted 3 weeks. I am a standard user, no extreme activity, always respectful of my tools, so it is again disappointing.

This is the second NUUD case that I have purchased and used.  I bought this for my work phone and I am happy with it.  I can’t exactly review this specific case but I have the NUUD on my iPhone 8 Plus.  I am happy with the durability and waterproof rating.  I am hard on phones and this case has done a fair job protecting my outrageously priced tech.  If I could fault LifeProof on anything, it would be the durability of the rubber on the sides.  I haven’t had mine for more than a year yet and I’m already missing the lock button (mind you I crawl in and out of machinery on a regular basis).  The case also squeaks after a fair amount of wear and tear.  The charging port doors on these cases are finally a durable part of the product.  I’m impressed that this part holds up as well as it does in comparison to their earlier NUUD cases.  Overall, I’d buy a third one if I had too.  I wish they made these for the 6th generation 9.7” iPads.

This is the third Lifeproof brand iphone case that I've bought (I had one for a 5s, one for a 5c, and now this one), and I love them! They're great. Very durable: survives trips to the shower, the river, the swimming pool, as well as keeping my phone clean and un-shattered when I drop it (which happens more than I'd like). I'm clumsy and these cases work for me, so I'd recommend them, but the only downside is that it's virtually impossible to be heard when talking on the phone. I think the microphone might be covered by the case, but headphones and/or a bluetooth mic are a must when calling.

MY FIRST REVIEW IN JAN 2019: Glad so far that I went with nearly identical Lifeproof case as I used to have for my previous iPhone. There are no cracks popping up in the top with this better case. I am glad it came in white with the light gray accent and the clear back. Please don’t let that color combo go away. Lifeproof has that unique look that I love. It’s great how the entire back of the phone shows through so it feels in a way that I am still enjoying my actual phone and color I picked out.  The back on this model case is so much nicer feeling than my previous Lifeproof case for my older iPhone. And do far I don’t see any scratches.  Even the front white material seems to have been improved because I haven’t seen any dirt build up on this case. The sound quality talking with it on is tremendously improved. The charging port opens with a pry of my thumb nail and it isn’t so bad. And my nails are nicely painted. I haven’t had a chance to use it at a pool or ocean until the summer, but I did do the water test according to the instructions.MY FOLLOW REVIEW APRIL 4, 2019: A couple days ago, without doing anything to the case (I am always careful), the lip of the charging port door cracked and a piece broke off. It is where your fingernail prys it open. I am very disappointed because this case was great up until then. I loved this specific style with the clear back and being waterproof. I loved the white with the gray because it is a nice look. I haven't had this case for 3 months yet and it broke already.

Let's start with the reason I bought these here. I was shopping at my local big box store for a pack of black undershirts. I was shopping for these specifically, but they only came in mixed packs (grey+black). When I accepted that I noticed the price, outrageous. I quickly pulled up Amazon and realized they were a third of the price shipped. Being the thrifty/realistic person I am I went ahead and ordered 3 packs. Same quality and three times the amount of undershirts. Either order your size or even a size up since they fit snug in a good way. Not something I'd ever wear in public without a shirt on, but they fit/feel great. Order a pack and enjoy. Remember the grey goes under light colors and black goes under mid-dark colors.

These fit and feel great however, poor quality. I've had two of them rip at the should strap already. One in the wash after wearing it once. The second one while wearing it the second time. These came in a Hanes package but far from Hanes quality. Extremely disappointed.

I'll make it short. Everyone else is right. I received what I ordered it is just really bad. Thank God for the free return. The shoulder stitching is ugly and weird. The shoulder strap part is way too thin as well it's like a string is hanging over your shoulder. Picture is of this item on the left and the fruit of the loom premium a shirt on the right. The fruit of the looms shoulder doesn't have stitching like that on the shoulder part. This shirt is soft tho but idk why u would want this

Not As Described: The product description distinctly states Hanes Men's 4-Pack Assorted A-Shirt Color: Black/Grey.  There are two black A-shirts and two grey A-shirts shown in the product photo, . Both of the packages that arrived contain 4 Grey A-shirts.  I've now noticed a number of other reviewers state that they did not receive the correct colors either.  Either, the packaging description is incorrect as the package states "Assorted Colors" or what was put into the sealed package from the manufacturer is incorrect.Now to the fit:  The arm holes are enormous.  The lower part of the arm hole comes down to the midriff and the armholes are cut very wide.  It makes the back almost like a racerback and the front openings  are barely wider.  While the description states that these shirts are long, they are about 8" to 12" too long if you are a short to medium height.  The fit of the width seems to be correct.Quality:  The material itself seems to be of good quality for the price; however, the construction is just okay.  There's an open loop serger type seam on the shoulders that doesn't appear finished with a knot or double seam end and the thread loops extend past the material. I can only imagine that trimming the excess seam thread would create unraveling when washed.  The bottom seam is folded over and causes a lumpy appearance.  These are not the same quality as Hanes A-shirts that I've purchased in stores in the past.  I wonder if these particular shirts are overruns or irregulars.Smell:  Very strong smell of pesticide or formaldehyde.  I know many fabrics are treated with chemicals, but I also know many people wear clothing items prior to washing.  If you decide to keep this product, be sure to wash before wearing.Disappointing to say the least.  I will be returning the product.

Many others have commented about the excess threads at the shoulders.  I bought them anyway thinking I could live with it.  When I got the shirts, I saw what everybody was talking about - the thread tape on each side of the shoulder seam extends at least a 1/4 past the end of the seam on every shirt.  The thread and tape are long enough to make wearing the shirt uncomfortable.  So far, I've thrown 3 shirts away without even wearing them - the shoulder seams came apart as I was putting them on.  Had to take one off, put another one on, that came undone, took it off, put a third one on, took that off, and put a fourth one on.  So, of the 6 shirts I bought, I'm only able to wear 3 of them.  (I hope.  I haven't put the last two on yet.)  Horrible quality and comfort.  Much too expensive considering you're going to throw away at least 3 of the 6 you buy.

Hanes has really big fat fail here with this product and I typically find Hanes to be a decent product. I ordered XL because that's what I usually wear in every other manufacturer's undershirt (Dockers, Alfani and Merona) and they fit fine. After putting one on, I looked like it was spray painted on. You should buy at least the next size up as these are way snug if you are buying these. My son had the same problem with the Medium ones he got for Christmas (and he's skinny!)  Kinda thin material too, almost sheer. They don't look like they'll take too many washings. I guess the upside is that I have plenty of future rags for when I'm painting or working  on the car.

I've worn Hanes Undershirts for years now, though this is the first time purchasing them online instead of through the store. As expected they fit much like the store bought kind, kind of loose near the underarms but mostly form fitting. The loose underarm bit however does cause one to occasionally adjust the undershirt, which can seem a little awkward in public; almost like a woman adjusting her bra.So while I do think this is the best undershirt I've worn yet, I don't doubt there are better choices out there. (I've just yet to find them.)

Looks like Hanes: packaging looks just like it does at WallyWorld, logo on inside, etc.; however all four shirts in pack looked like they might have been seconds. The seams at the top of - right where the front meets the back at on the shoulders - appear to be unfinished with a ton of extra thread on both sides of seam, which this reviewer found odd and uncomfortable, like they skipped the last step to trim the excess,  and it’s like the shirts are crooked and don’t sit evenly on my body. I compared them to my old Hanes, same size, and my old ones have none of these issues. Befuddling.

My only advice for people would be to go one size larger than your expected or normal size, because after the first wash these shirts tend to get a little shorter. Once that first wash happens though, you are good to go for about six to eight months or until you feel the elasticity using its affect. These are very good undershirts and will do their job for a long time. There's no point in buying fancy undershirts if you can only afford two and half to wash them all the time. Buy a few of these packages and you'll be good to go for a couple of weeks and really extend the life of these shirts.
Great fit and very comfortable. 6ft 170lb and the medium was perfect.

Awful. I bought these shirts after reading the reviews with regard to the neck stretching out. I have worn each shirt once after pre washing all of them a few times. They do not fit as advertised, are too thin, lack elasticity in the neck and are of poor quality overall.Highly disappointed in this product.I'm wearing one of them right now with my uniform as a matter of fact, haven't even made it to work yet and the neck is sagging to the point where it looks like I have no undershirt on at all.I have avoided purchasing Soffe t-shirts for the last 10 years or so due to quality issues, I should have known it was too good to be true to think that they had improved their product quality.

I had so many questions based on the mixed reviews before ordering these shirts; Now, after receiving them I wanted to settle everyone's mind with a review... I would highly recommend this product. These are with out question AR 670-1 compliant with the most recently issued OCP uniform. The color is 100% accurate. The fabric being 50/50 Cotton/Polyester does give the shirts a lighter hue under natural light. However, this does not change the color in any way shape or form. I have provided a photo to compare a military clothing and sales product that is 100% Cotton vs the 50/50 Cotton/Polyester. The color is perfect.As for the fit, They feel softer on the skin than any other shirt I have worn in uniform. The neck will have a tenancy to expand for soldiers with larger size necks. However, Soffee has done an outstanding job re-stitching the neck to accommodate that issue extremely well. The neck stitching is a bit informal looking compared to the PX version as shown on the right. This is of no concern after reviewing the AR. As long as the shirts are serviceable you are good to go. I hope this helps!

Alright, so first let me start off by saying that I served in the USAF and I've been wearing Soffe M280's ever since boot camp. Although I'm no longer serving I still wear the heck of these undershirts on an almost daily basis for working out in or just kickin' it around the house. Never have I seen any of these like the ones I just received - all of the necks are extremely big and look stretched out. I ordered a replacement and hopefully those will come in right. Check out the pic below and you'll see what I'm talking about.As far as the "product fit" above, the shirt fits great except for the neck and even my 20" neck is swimming in these, lol.Hopefully, this is just due to a bad batch from the manufacturer.
Not for Navy NWU type III.... The darker brown shirt is one straight from the NEX

Whats with the big necks now??  These new ones have much bigger neck and thicker material. Problem is I work in a warehouse now and I need the tight neck to keep my harness from rubbing up against my skin and the light material to keep me cool. Thats why I came back to soffee; but no more these are awful. I could get bad shirts like these anywhere, I really need the old style with smaller neck and lighter weight material back. 2 stars since they are black t shirts and that in essence is what I ordered. Very very disappointed.Update: 5.30.19 images of shirts direct from military clothing 2004 vs soffe 2019 vs amazon 2017 the shirts direct from soffe seem ok as far as neck size and material like original military clothing. But the shirts through Amazon have a thicker material that creates fuzz over time and a much bigger neck.

This was honestly a bad purchase. I was in need of Tan shirts for the military and I saw that this was a good price and had great reviews but the item was bad. When I bought them they looked great and fit good so I was happy with them at first. After They washed I wore them again and man the neck area stretched out with the wash!! I looked ate up when I wore them again with my uniform. It looked like I didn't  even have a shirt under my uniform. I wouldn't recommend this item.

If you're in the military... you want the neckline to stay snug. It does that. Basically the best compared to some other cheaper brands.I guess what would count as a con is that it fades over time and wears out. I'm talking months over every day usage.  I would consider it wear and tear.  That's what we get paid for in uniform allowance every year. This is the last time I'm getting them, lol. Just got my avocados.

These shirts are extremely comfortable and the body fits well.  The color is good and the material is very soft and seems to be weathering the hot water washes well.  However, the neck hole is HUGE!  I wear an 18.5 neck for dress shirts and the XXL has at least 2 inches space on all sides compared to most of my other tees.

Great shirt sizing, I started wearing size large shirts in Gildan since the length would actually fit, but the shirt would be baggy. If I got a Medium, it would be too short but the right fit. Soffe gets it right with the length (which is meant to be tucked in) and the fit which compliments my body type.6'0, 162 lbs slim/athletic build, 32/32 waist for size comparison. I wear it as a regular tee despite its thickness (thin) since the dark olive color doesn't reveal any skin under the shirt. Would definitely buy again, and probably will be in other colors.

In the picture, the top is this tan shirt that I bought and the bottom shirt is the tan shirt that I bought at an Air Force base. So if this isn't tan 499 then I don't know what is. If you need a Tan 499 shirt this is a place to get it. Not sure what shirts these other people got because there is an obvious difference.

I should warn that this is tightly within specs for me.  It's a HI shirt, so don't expect to tuck it in.  And honestly I think I got lucky on size.  If you have a gut, go one up.  Believe me, I wish someone who doesn't get these free from Amazon had told me exactly this.  Please help me put an end to these freeloaders who are giving inaccurate product reviews through their vine program.  They are poisoning all of the product reviews you know and trust.  Personally, I worked a ten hour day today.  These professional reviewers stayed home to get free products you and I pay for.  Thank you.

I now have six of these shirts, but in different colors. While I like Hawaiian shirts, I am at that age where you see too many retired looking guys walking around in hibiscus and plumeria combos. While those shirts do look nice, I like something a bit different and not so "look at me I'm retired and wish I lived in Hawaii". These shirts are unique and I have been complimented on them. The material is comfortable and seems durable. I have washed and dried them a few times and have not seen any color loss.I had some older shirts that I hated to part with, but they were looking a bit long in the tooth and starting to fall apart, so it was necessary to replace them. These fit the bill nicely.I was NOT given these shirts as a discount and paid full pop. You really do have my honest and BIASED opinion. Cheers

I love this shirt!  This is not the shirt to wear if you don't want to be noticed. The colors are vibrant.  This shirt is truly art. The material is strong but comfortable.  The design is unique.  I was a bit worried about the colors bleeding given how vibrant they are and the fact that they are hand made.  But there was absolutely no bleeding on the first wash.  Nor did the shirt require ironing out of the drier.  My only caveat is that it is somewhat on the smaller side of XL.  It does fit well, but just not as loose as some of my other XL's. So, if you are near the size limits, go for the larger size.

Cool shirt but runs a little small.  Suggest getting one size bigger. I am 6', 265 lbs. 46" chest and 53" belly.  Usually can fit into a 3XL.  This oneis ok, but snug when I sit down.  But a nice shirt.

When Amazon asked me, "How does this product fit?" I had to think about my reply.  I typically find that clothes I buy online, when I've never ordered from the manufacturer before, are smaller than expected.  So, I ordered a size larger than I typically wear, both because I wanted a roomier-than-usual shirt for vacation, and because I was wary of the typical online buying experience.I'm pleased to say that a size larger than I'd normally order was pleasantly roomy.  I probably could've bought my usual size, and had it fit well.It's a thin cotton but not an unpleasantly or cheaply-feeling material.  I like the colors.  I washed it in warm water, to see how that affected the size and was pleased that it didn't shrink much if at all.  Thumb's up.

I don't actually like "Hawaiian" shirts. By that I mean shirts with purdy flowers and hula girls with thier pineapples (!) and such. I'm not "Magnum PI!"  I don't think of these as "Hawaiian Shirts" however. To me, they are like those "tribal"tattoo designs. These are great for going out during those hot, hot summer evenings. Or being a little more dressed up at a Saturday pool party, without looking like a cheesy "hey baby I went to Hawaii"old guy. You can be cool, without looking like you are trying too hard.  One mini-quibble: the color of 'lake' was a little bit greenish, (like a lake) I was expecting more sky-blue. It still looks cool (like a lake), anyway.  The fit and design of these shirts is always perfect. I have 14. You cannot go wrong with Johari West. I didn't get a free shirt or anything to say nice things about Johari West. I'm just an old retired guy who knows how to dress well.

Husband is 6' 1"  (weighs 220 lb) and I ordered the XLG shirt, which fits very nice.Had previously purchased another Johari West Hawaiian print shirt in XXL,  but it proved to be a bit large - also, the sleeves are an inch or so longer..Overall, very pleased with this purchase!

My husband wore this Christmas gift when we went out last night and he looked GREAT!  He took it out of the package and put it on - it looked like it had just been ironed!  It fit him like it was tailored made for him. It can be worn either in or out of his pants. The best part was when I just washed it and took it out of the dryer and it looked like it was freshly ironed.  I would most definitely this product and the seller to others.

Absolutely fantastic. The cotton is a peculiar one, I've never felt this type of cotton before. its smooth and crisp and feels very nice on the skin.The color is deep, the black contrast is engaging and overall I'm very happy.  The shirt is a bit large, but in the heat this is perfect and recommended for air flow.I will definitely buy another shirt and different color in the near future.

Awesome sky color XXL and first shirt that comes out of the package wrinkle free!! Pocket is nice too. For those inquiring about XXL fit here is some good info to determine fit rather than all the reviews about too big too small etc. My chest is 52, waist 42, and 6-1". The XXL is a good fit but a bit large even with a T shirt underneath. The length is perfect.

I got this for my dad for father's day and he loved it! In fact the second he opened it he opted to change into it and wore it for the day. He's quite tall and I was worried about the length but I ordered his normal size (or my best guess) and it fit him perfectly. It's normal tee shirt material (cotton I believe) and the print is well done. Great purchase!

I bought this for my grandpa for his 85th birthday. He means the world to me I can’t imagine anyone else having a better grandpa. When I gave him this and my mom gave him the presents she got for him he literally had tears from his eyes because he never had anyone give him such a good birthday present. He was so happy. Thank you.

Very happy with this purchase. I bought it for my Husband as his 1st gift as a Grandfather. He wore it proudly at the hospital when our Daughter was having our 1st Grandchild. Color is bright, didn't shrink not bleed during wash and drying. Fit was great.
My husband has already had people ask about this shirt & we recommended you on a great saying, soft shirt & speedy shipping. Will buy from you again.

My Dad was so happy and surprised when we gave him this shirt for his birthday. He loved it a lot. Only down side was the the sizing was too big, but once he washed it, the size went down a bit and fit much better. Great product overall
Bought the wrong size but love the saying, had to return but would recommend to others if you know their measurements and stay with that don't go an extra size up.

I’m giving this to my dad for his first Father’s Day as a grandpa! I know he will love it and that it will fit well. I took the measurements of one of his shirts before buying this one. lolAnyway, it came just as expected!
I got xl for my father he slim& tall  and it was little tight,length wise a little short.  Other than that i like the shirt like fabric.
I got this as a gift for my Dad. He loves tshirts and wears them all the time. He wears an XL and that is what I bought him and it fits as expected.
Shirt good quality and unique color.  Price excellent and arrived asap.
The wrinkles won’t come out

l loved the Tee Shirts they were real nice,  l always have trouble ordering clothes online cause you order one size on one web site and it fits great.. Next time l order l think it's the same size as my last order.. Wrong.. Just cause one size fit's you on one web site, That don't mean it's the same size at another web site.. But l would recomend the XXL Mens in this Tee Shirt is for a teenage boy not a Mens XXL  l was hoping the shirts would fit cause l hate returning stuff it's a hastle running around to return stuff that don't fit..

Great for summer, bought them for my grandson for camp. They are comfortable, the Vneck is not constricting, they are not tight to the body or overly baggy, just comfortable. The sleeves are not too long as to be elbow length, just an overall good quality shirt that I think will wash and wear like iron all summer long without fading or wrinkling. Always happy with amazon recommendations. JMG

Lightweight.  A bit stretchy, but hangs nice.  Fits great!  Sleeves are long (the way I like them!).  Pretty color, just as shown. Washes and dries nicely.  Did not shrink.  Love this shirt.  Came back and ordered another color!
I ordered an XL size because everything I own is XL but these shirts are very tight, I will not but any more of this type of shirt

I purchased the 5 pack and not all of the shirts fit the same. Some are tighter in the shoulders or sleeves. The material is light and breathes fairly well, though sweat does accumulate and takes a little longer to dry the other similar shirts.
Do not buy. These shirts look like a blind person put them together drunk. Poorly stitched and poorly cut. The shoulders look like I could put should pads in and still have room to spare.
So 1 out of the 5 shirts came defective. They also fit pretty big for a medium size and a little awkward. I really liked the material though.
They came just in time for the last half of Summer . . . fit well and I love the way they look on me!
Love this hoodie.  Fits well---much prettier than the picture shows.  Love the color.
all good
6’0 250 (chunky) got an XL didn’t like how the shirt felt but it was nice & fit good

The colors and graphics are really cool and stick out. The shark puking a rainbow while a cat is riding it is sure to spark a conversation and who knows where that will go. The quality is good and the shirt has not shrunk or faded after several washings.

Size fit nomral. The main photo is not the same color pattern though, feel tricked. The color pattern I received was orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink. So no, this is not a Pride shirt with the classic rainbow as advertised.
Tank looks nothing like the picture. Colors are blurry and faded and looks nothing like the sharp lines and colors in the picture. Was part of a gift and did not have time to return.
Fits good, and I like the material and color.

This shirt is a PRINT of the shirt in the picture and not cut exactly as the shirt in the picture. I got a lot of compliments on the shirt..however I was personally not pleased because it’s not the EXACT product being advertised, only a representation of it.
Bought this for Stagecoach festival. It was a hit with the "cowboy kitty". Fits well too and doesn't shrink when washed.
Very comfortable shirt for physical therapy; perfect fit, comfortable feel during exercises involving contact with mat, wall, etc.
Very comfortable.  Bought it for running and the gym.  Very light weight and a perfect fit.
Labeled XX, but it's not.  Medium,  perhaps.
We are taking a cruise and so bought it for my husband. He can wear sime medium shirts, but most of the  time , i buy large. Got this in a large and he couldn’t even get close to buttoning it up

Bought my brother this shirt for Christmas. Was supposed to be the banana Hawaiian shirt. It said it was coming the Saturday before Christmas... so it’s delivered, I open it up... and what do I see ? Oranges. NOT BANANAS. It was mislabeled because the label states bananas. Guess we’ll see if he likes the oranges so he has something to open for Christmas.Gets 3 stars because it is a good shirt. Just not the fruit I wanted.

Received the watermelon garnished shirt.  I ordered a XXXL and am usually skeptical when ordering shirts from the internet.  Unfolding the shirt it appeared to be a little smaller than I expected and once I tried it on...it seemed like more of a XXL. Material was thinner than I prefer.  Rule of thumb: Order at least one size larger than you think you will need.  Not going to send this back as I will just give it to a buddy of mine to wear.

I purchased this shirt to match a my dress that is the same print for vacation. My husband approves of the shirt and looks forward to wearing it.The fabric is very nice a light. It will breathe nicely in the Jamaican heat. The shirt is very thin; which is great for our purpose. However, it is slightly see through and I would recommend wearing an undershirt if worn anywhere other than a beach/lake venue.My husband is about 6’1” and 220lbs with a thicker neck, broad shoulders, and muscular arms hence why I ordered him and XX-L. He usually wear and XL but since the shirt has a collar I decided to order one size up; which was the perfect size.The shirt lays nicely when worn and does not easily wrinkle. At this time the shirt has been worn once and washed twice. I gave this shirt 4 stars as it has only been through the wash twice and worn once.Also, the shirt came with about five thread hanging out. The five threads were easily tied off and cut as to not stick out while wearing. Furthermore, the shipping was more than a few days.I would recommend this shirt for fun casual waterside outings or theme parties. It is not an office shirt though. Additionally, order this item with an expectation of waiting for it to arrive (about a week or two).

Wanted to get a Hawaiian shirt from my trip to Brazil. I'm 5'10, 150lbs and it fits perfectly! The overall quality is questionable, I feel like it might degrade with heavy use but so far so good. I'll update my review if I run into any problems, if your reading this a couple months from now and my review hasn't changed, assume it held up well. In the meantime, I'm definitely buying another one.

um.. not sure if even Asian sizing. I should have checked the 1* reviews.I wear a Large. I couldn't even get it close to closing on my chest. if I tried, I could pull the bottom button to close making a crazy V shape with no hope of buttoning more.I really liked the shirt so I'm about to buy a 2xl if they have it

Color is great, material is thinner than expected, but it didn't matter, I wear a XL normally but I ordered a 2X to be sure it fit. My wife tired it on and wears a Med or Large normally and it fit her just a little loose. She got another Christmas present. Won't buy another from JOGAL.
The colors were so clear and crisp and I even sized up when ordering. Sadly elves must do the measuring because it was WAY too small.

Wow, I got this shirt kind of as a gag gift because I’m obsessed with watermelons and wanted my boyfriend to have a shirt to match some of my watermelon type dresses this summer and when it got in we both LOVED IT. Really nice breathable material, fits great and the design is so bright and it looks really cool in person. There were a few loose threads when we took it out of the package but those were easy to take care of. He’s a size medium 6’0 170lbs
I couldn’t get my arm in the sleeve.  Like.  Not at all.The seems weren’t sewn - just open cloth flapping loose.

I'm 6'3" 215 lbs with about a 37" waist. The XL have been fine.  I really like longer shirts that stay tucked in at work instead of bunching up under my dress shirt.  I've ordered Jockey shirts that were way more expensive but were obviously better quality material when comparing side by side.  But since it's just an under shirt, these are perfect.  They do shrink up A LOT.  I ordered a second pack and compared one to a shirt I had been washing/wearing and there was a difference of several inches in length, at least an inch in sleeve, and probably a couple inches in chest.  So when you open the pack, keep that in mind.  They start out huge but shrink down when washed.

My husband is 6'5" and 225 lbs (very tall and lean). We usually have to purchase XXL, which means the shirts fit him in length, but are wide, which you don't want in an undershirt. These fit him perfectly! More of an athletic fit. He is so happy with them. They are also super soft. Great buy!

Love these T-shirts. Prob my favorite under T on the market. Personally I love then cause you can get them in talk sized which is what I prefer. I'm sure there's other guys out there who can't stand how short a lot of the T-shirts are. I hate it when you lift your arm and it looks like your wearing a friggin belly shirt. Im average height 5'10 and If In having these trouble than I know there has to be others as well. Do yourself a favor and order a pack if these. You can thank me later!

Never was a fan of Fruit of the Loom, but these tee shirts changed my opinion. I am 6’6” and have a very hard time finding shirts long enough. I was always a Jockey fan, but price and poor reviews lead me to check other brands. The amazon reviews for Fruit of the Loom were really good so I ordered a 3 pack of 3x long, a size larger than usual. Should have stuck with the 2x long, but very happy with my purchase. Extremely high quality, very long, and a terrific price, (around $4.00 per shirt).. order some, you won’t regret it.

These are my favorite undershirts. It's hard to find tall clothing in the stores with out them being big as well, and the subscription service is the best. one pack every 3-6 months and my wife doesn't complain about me staining them any more. I wouldn't wear them by them selves, but I'm also a big fat guy that just wanted some undershirts that didn't shrink up after washing a couple times.

These aren't perfect, but darn good enough.  Especially when you factor in the price.  It's tough to find a true big and tall undershirt - many brand I've tried are way to short, or the sleeves are too long, or the neck holes stretches way too much, etc.  But these are just a good, basic undershirt with no major problems in my opinion.  This is the second time I purchased these and the only issue I've noticed is that one shirt in the first package seemed to be slightly smaller than the others.  But after the second package I'm thinking this was not the norm.  I will purchase these again when I need more undershirts.

I AM 6'4", AND DURING THE WINTER I WEAR UNDERSHIRTS WITH LONG SLEEVE SHIRTS.  I BOUGHT 2 AND 3XL AND THEY WOULD RIDE UP ON ME.  BOUGHT THESE AND ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM.  THEY ARE A GOOD 4-5 INCHES LONGER THAN MY PREVIOUS ONES.  THEY HAVE NOT COME UNTUCKED ONCE.  I KNOW PEOPLE SAY THEY WILL SHRINK WHEN WASHED BUT EVEN IF THEY SHRINK AN INCH OR MORE, I SHOULD BE GOOD.  WILL JUST WASH THEM IN COLD WATER.

These shirts advertise that they don't come untucked.  While that's probably impossible without velcroing them to your underwear, they do seem to come untucked less than the competition.  To be fair, I'm not sure whether this is actually a feature of these shirts or whether it is because they are "tall."  Either way, they work for me.  They are comfortable and seem durable.

I bought these shirts for my husband who has a really long torso and works in carpentry. He is always complaining about his under shirts coming un-tucked, and he gets a sun burn about 3" above his pants, not to mention the "plumber's crack". I looked into getting him shirts from another company that advertises extra long tees, but found the price of $24.95 per shirt crazy for under shirts! I found these and figured even if they weren't long enough that they would be comparable to what he was already wearing, but they are perfect! Extra long without being too big everywhere else. Not sure if they will shrink up after washing but they appear to be long enough even if they do shrink a little. I am reordering more right now!

At first when I put it on they were WAY long!  I thought this would be an issue... but I washed them in hot water with some towels and they are perfect.  They are true TALL fit.  I have gotten other brands that did not meet my expectations... but these are TOP notch.  I went ahead and ordered another set.  THANK YOU!The FIT: Normally I order Large Tall because I like my undershirts tight under my dress shirts.  but the XL Tall after a HOT washing are just perfect!

I ordered up 2 sizes based on other reviews: 1, because it's 100% cotton and 1 because reviews stated the shirt runs small. It's a comfortable size prior to washing, so I'll see how the fit is after washing.  The dad loved the design and comfort of the shirt material.
Came in a clear packaging.  Cute color in olive it really does come with a certificate. Great Father's Day gift .

This was the perfect father's day gift from a little girl to her daddy, and from a young adult daughter to her dad.  Both dads enjoyed them thoroughly and wear them proudly.  The shirt did bleed significantly in the first wash, so you may want to wash it alone, but it did not fade or shrink very much.  We are very happy with this T Shirt.

I helped our 11 yr old gr’daughter buy this for her dad for Christmas . It was a decent quality shirt and reasonably priced. Our gr’daughter was excited when it arrived on time and looked exactly like she thought it would. The gift was a hit for her dad and all who saw it at our Christmas gathering.

Got this shirt for my dad for his birthday (among other things- I'm not THAT horrible a child... LOL) and he got such a kick out of it! He wears it all the time and sends me a picture of it every time he puts it on! It fit well, too, and has held up well since I first gave it to him.

My sister and I always get my dad some kind of funny little gift to go with his big gift for Christmas and Birthday. This product was a lot better quality than I would have expected and the certificate was an added bonus to our "fun" gift!

Daughter loved giving the shirt to her dad & dad loved it even more since it was from his daughter.  Quality is great.  It may shrink a little bit when you 1st wash it but that's expected with cotton shirts.  Has been washed multiple times since & has held up well - printed words & all!
It arrived in a timely manner and exactly as described by seller, my husband wore it this weekend and many people stopped us to find out where he got it.  Fits great.

I bought this shirt for my dad for Christmas. I am trying to convince him that he likes me by making him advertise it across his chest. He laughed and it fit him but I don't think he will wear it in public.

My husband got this for father’s day. The color is fantastic and has not faded in the 2 months we have had it with weekly wearings and washings.  The screen print is holding up. The T-shirt itself is thick and good quality. Would definitely buy again.

I got this for my husband he looks really nice in it.  He's 6'1" and around 250 lbs and I got this in the 2XL Big in navy and it fits him right and is a very attractive fit.  The material is awesome and it's one of the nicest t-shirts that he's had. He has a bigger stomach and some t-shirts can really emphasize that but this one minimizes it and looks great on.  He's in construction and he likes it because it doesn't cling and the material breathes.I usually get him t-shirts in tall sizes, but this one falls at a great length on him and I wouldn't have needed to get it in tall.

I was looking for a straight black Nautica T-Shirt identical to undershirts they sell in white only evidently. But, these are not 100% Cotton, rather 95% Cotton and 5% Spandex which gives it a snug but comfortable fit rather than the loose hang of a pure cotton. T-shirt It also has a more refined and smooth feel to it than pure cotton.

These stretchy t-shirts are excellent.  My husband is used to the JC Penney brand, but these look so much nicer and keep their fit, wash after wash.  He received 3 of these as a gift several years ago and asked me to find them for him again. The sleeve length is perfect, not too short and not too long.  Nautica is a great brand.

I was looking for a cheaper version of some other companies t shirts that have just gotten way to expensive. I saw these listed and figured why not give these a try. Best move I could have made, sold cotton, comfy, and best of all $30 cheaper than the other company. Check these out. Great product

Excellent fabric, well made, but after wash it shrinks, you should buy at least one size up, the sleeves are too short...nothing like the old fashioned T shirts of the yesterdays, now they are more for the younger muscular generations...this one clings to your skin.........be aware of this ,sorry that I bought it

All I want is a regular cotton non-printed t-shirt.  This feels like plastic on my skin with the elastine and looking at the photo cut the sleeve length in half. That was my major issue.  I don't even have big guns and they were like woman's sleeves.
Love these Nautica t shirts. I ordered 4 in different colors. The fabric is soft, stretchy and comfortable. We hang dry these. They look perfect after every wash.

Shirt came ripped at the chest and I didn't even notice till i had already taken off the tags. Shirt was a 2XL but fit like a 4X. On top of that the item had this overwhelming feeling of being made purely out of a spandex/polyester material instead of mix with cotton. Never buying again from this seller.

I have multi colors of this shirt and this color (true black) feels like the material it too thin. Feels more like a dri-fit shirt. Once I received the item I had to check if it was the 95% cotton 5% spandex like my other shirts. Very disappointed is an understatement

Ordered regular fit XXL for big guy comfort. They sent XXL in Trim Fit, which is indicated on the collar and I discovered later. . Accidentally recycled package data before washing. Now I have a nice T-shirt to give away.

I worked out last night in this new mk-1 underarmour shirt and here is what I noticed:1. A medium shirt fit my 40” Chest. I’m 5’11” 167 pounds.2. The shirt bunched up around the upper chest during pull-ups more than a regular shirt3. This shirt is long. Probably 3-4” longer than most of my regular shirts. But that’s in style now I suppose.4. The front “apron” of the shirt is a wonderful polyester fabric that has exceeded all my other polyester shirts from Columbia and champion. This material is very thin and smooth and stretchy. The sleeves are also made of this material.5. i got the Charcoal (019)/ Black  one and it did show the sweat marks in an obvious way.6. The back mesh isn’t as interesting as the front material but you can get some breeze through it.

After buying one of these, I bought 2 more, and then after, 3 more. They fit amazingly. The style is great, and they work well with breathability. I can tell you my major sell on these is the length at the waist down. I've bought so many athletic shirts over the years and they all shrank up to the point where I could barely keep the shirt from going above my waistline. The shirts have at least a couple of inches of length to where they are never going to shrink up to the point of no longer being usable. They also never ride up during workouts to where I feel I'd have to keep pulling my shirt down while doing things. The fit is very athletic. I'm slim but I have some muscle on me and these shirts fit perfectly but also have some room to where it's not like a compression shirt.
Good quality. I'm 5'11/fit. They fit well and look great. Though a bit too long You can't go wrong with Under Armour anyway.

I have a few pair of these MK-1 shirts and the fit is great along with the moisture wicking properties. Definitely very happy with this purchases and I've bought a few. I'm muscular and am 6'2 220 and I get a XL. To me the fit to size but still hang nicely if you know what I mean. Some really cheap workout shirts have no shape to them and hang terribly. These look good on.

Close fitting, but not tight. Breathes reasonably well. Not heavy. Doesn't get weighed-down with sweat like cotton does. I've bought this before and will continue to purchase. I got size M. I'm 6'1" 175 lbs.
Great fit ! However, it will vividly illustrate the bad as well as the good about your body. Very smooth fabric. Highly odor resistant. Exactly what you would want for effective training.
Nice quality my husband is 6'3 and about 190 got him an LT but it fits long. all under armour products usually fit normal as an LT .but this one is about about 7 inches past his hips

Loved the color and look of this.  However the first time he wore it, it snagged in the back.  Can't figure out what would have snagged it, it's in like 3 places :( very disappointed that it snagged so easy.
The short itself was very breathable, but it wasn't the most comfortable. Great price but if you're going to buy you may want to go one size up.
Bought this for my grandson for after class sports activities and relaxation (college freshman). He’s partial to UA and loved it. The fit was great too (he’s 6’3” and 220).

I typically wear a Mens Large t-shirt, preferable on the small size because I like them to be fitted but not tight. After reading the reviews I went with the Large with the expectation that the shirt will shrink a tad (like all 100% cotton t-shirts do after the first wash/dry). Pre wash the shirt was a little long for my taste and the sleeve had just a little extra room. Post wash the fit was just about perfect in the length, sleeve and chest. This t-shirt is NOT thin like some other review suggested and feels like a good quality 100% cotton shirt. It is authentic Grunt Style and fulfilled by Shophydra. In the pictures i'm 5'10, 176 pounds, chest 39-40", waste around the belly button 35", jean/short waist size 32", arm/bicep 14". I hope this review was helpful.
I love this shirt so far,  hopefully after I wash it No defects occurI wear a large, ordered large, up top it wears fitted,  in the mid section it's loose.

This shirt is awesome, not only does it fit great, but its also comfortable and makes a great shirt for work, everyday use, or working out. And its perfect for anyone who is a patriot. I will definitely be buying more shirts from Grunt Style. And the best part is that the shirts are made in the USA, and Grunt Style is a Veteran owned company which just makes it even better.It just feels great to buy from an American company. Although there is one problem I have, while the cotton is home grown, and its printed and designed in the USA, the shirts are assembled in Mexico, kind of takes away from the 100% American label.But I still love this shirt.

Arrived earlier, nice quality and design.  A mix of comments about the size and some  saying to buy one size up than what you normally would was not the case for me.  Glad I leaned towards the others comments saying get the size you normally would. I typically wear a large and I got the large and in my opinion fits like a normal large.  Hopefully it doesn't shrink much after washing and drying, otherwise good purchase.

I don't know why people say this T-shirt is fake, I bought this one and bought another from the original Grunt Style website (because of the bad reviews) and I can't tell the difference, both of them have the same fabric, the same logos in the same place, the same good quality of the rubber, I really like this T-shirt and my boyfriend loved it.

True to size initially. Soft shirt that fitted great.  It's gone through the wash a half dozen times so far and help up good.  Only complaint is that it has shrunk a little from going through the dryer.  Still fits, but fits like a large now, I ordered an XL.  So maybe order 1 size up to offset the shrinkage if you put it through a dryer multiple times.

The Grunt t-shirt line is nice. Great graphics. They have one drawback. They need to use a better quality t-shirt. Absolutely no reason to cut corners and use a cheap t-shirt. I have several of their t-shirts, some that I have purchased from Amazon and some from them direct. You do need to go up one size or not put them in the dryer. Your call.
I bought a black shirt and a white one, they are not grunt style. They are a low quality knock off. Very dissatisfied and returning them.

I don't understand why some buyers have submitted reviews claiming these to be fake because that was certainly not my experience.  It fits perfect, looks great and strangers have come up asking me where I got it.  Finding athletic fitting patriot shirts was harder than it should be but that's no longer an issue with Grunt Style.  Have already purchased more styles.

Perfect fit on my husband. He normally wears large but they all are usually a little short. This shirt fits him so perfectly that we are not ever putting it in the dryer. It will be air-dried as it is the perfect length. Looks great with the gray in his go-tee as well.

I can't believe I wasted money on this! My husband was so excited to get this, but it's total crap. I washed it and hung dried it. It's super short for a 3x and its discolored from where it was pressed. The gray is faded and looks funky on the front. Paid over 20 bucks for something not wearable. Not worth my time and cost to send it back for a refund. I'm not happy at all and will never again order from this company.
Didn't even get to wear this shirt because the print came off during washing..

This Is one of those odd size shirts where it's an xl but the length is a medium so when you put it on it comes to just a above your belt line. Plus after washing it once it has the appearance of being slept in for a week.

The fit was just right.  I am 6'4", 300 even, and chose a 3x. You say that man is a big, sexy beast. I say you are right. The material is soft and comfy, so if you have man boobs (MOOBS), you might want to order up a size, as this awesome shirt will grab your body.  Its not a workout type shirt that sticks to your body, it sits loose, but the material will accentuate.  I LOVE THE SHIRT!  I get comments every once in a while about it, its a generational thing.  Great shirt.
Not happy at all with this shirt, the material is thin and cheap and hugs the body like wet fabric. If you order one order big I ordered my size and it was snug as can be so be careful.

Shirt looks so good, nobody has even recognized and commented on it.  It's like they think its a real company shirt. lolI had to go with the 2XL to accommodate my beer belly and am very happy with the fit.  It fits well, it isn't all short and super wide like most cheap 2XL shirts, and doesn't hang off my gut like a curtain.  Material is comfortable too.  I wish all 2XL shirts fit like this.

I ordered one size up based off of some reviews stating that the shirt was short and snug and i couldn't disagree more the 2x seems like a 4x its way to long and wide so i would definitely order true to size.

The cotton is pretty standard thickness for a shirt of this type and price.  The thing that really makes it stand out is the stitching: the seams look really solid, like I could wash it 100 times and they'll still hold together just fine.  Better than similar shirts I've purchased from other sellers.Decent fit, but a bit on the long side for me. I ordered a small and this seems halfway between a small and a medium in length. The shoulders and sleeves are a good fit for my body type.  We’ll have to wait and see how much it shrinks in the wash. The tag is also going to drive me crazy unless I rip it off (not hard to fix)

ordered this shirt and.......from another seller... a few other shirts.... this shirt arrived, fit was perfect! feel was perfect! graphic is awesome! color perfect! at the end of the week,did laundry.....the "other seller shirts" shrank,became too small...... this shirt- AWESOME!!! still same size still fits perfect! would order from again! perfect!

The shirt fit fine other than the neck opening being way too large that I had to wear another shirt under it. First wash and it shrank so much (at least a size). Now the sleeves and bottom are too short. Only able to wear it once. :(
comfy

I was in love with this case for the first two months and then one day I dropped my phone and the whole back of my iPhone 8 completely shattered INSIDE THE CASE. I bought this case as an investment and I was completely let down.

I have owned many “nuud” cases and they ALL have stood the test of time. I have worn out cases and Lifeproof replaces them no questions asked...ya know....”Lifeproof” is Lifeproof. So I highly recommend them!!One thing that does go great with the nuud case is Bluetooth headphones. Who needs cords flying around getting caught on everything?  Unfortuantley, you will experience some minor speaker dampening. But- I can still hear people and people can still hear me without Bluetooth. So don’t let that be the deciding factor.I own a business in the Pacific NW that requires us to work outside 9-10 months of the year (rain/snow) on ladders, roofs and inclines (height,dirt,dust and mud).This is personally my 5th Lifeproof case. All my employees have one! I needed to return one ONLY because it wore out after over 2 years. GET SOME!

I do really like the case.  It has taken some time to get used to the feel of it.  Especially after using the phone carefully for about a month without the case.  I really works well with my iPhone 8.  I had a nuud case for my 6s as well and I like this one even better.  It seems sleeker than the other one was.

I originally did a lot of research on these cases. I found them on the original website for $100 and couple others on Ebay for $75. I would have paid for that price to get this case, but when I found this one on Amazon for $50, I was sold and my case works great! I've taken it cliff jumping with me 5 times and there have been no issues with the case. Yes it is hard to swipe up sometimes to pull up the widgets tab, but overall worth the money for the protection and feel. Plus, my phone still charges on my wireless chargers in my car and at home!

I thought I was really going to love this case.  I was looking to replace my last case which was an otterbox that had taken a beating.  This Nuud case is a pain to open to get your phone in, and is hard, smooth, slippery plastic.  I could see myself dropping this often.  Then the there is the issue of accepting phone calls on speaker or not, and any noises the phone makes, gets turned into a vibration of muffled sounds. I did not like this case at all for that reason.

Last week, I was working and got out of my car in a rainstorm and my phone slipped out to the curb into raging run-off.  I cursed and picked it out of the water and took it inside to assess the damage.  I dried the entire outside then removed the case.  Nothing inside the case was wet!  I work outside in the elements often, which is why I need a weatherproof case.  I like the slim profile (the OtterBox case is much chunkier) because I mostly keep my phone in my pocket.  Drawbacks are that the selfie camera lens has to be cleaned often with a cotton swab because dirt gets trapped in there.  And the swipe-up screen (for flashlight, etc.) is hard to get your fingers to because of the case rimming the screen.  I've dropped my cased phone countless times.  The other 2 cases I had eventually chipped around the edge, and was no longer water-tight; I replaced them both with this same case, as it works great for as long as it lasts.  My screen has never cracked.

The product is very good to protect your phone but at the same time does not let your phone perform. After two days using it I had to stop because no one I called could hear me. The speakers and microphone do not work properly with the cover.If you use your phone to make and receive calls, this product is not for you. A lot of money for a product that does not let you talk on the phone.

I’m kinda confused why there are bad reviews on this. I really like the case and it keeps my phone from cracking. The only bad thing is that the case vibrates a little bit when your volume is all the way up. (I think it does this since it’s life proof and the sound has no where to travel so it vibrates in the case.) but other than that, it works perfectly.
Happy with it only wish the back was more slip resistant.  Other than that it’s perfect.

For many years I relied on a LifeProof case for my previous iphone (5c), with great results. Their case for the iPhone 8 is even much better! If you install the phone in the case correctly (which takes just a minute after the waterproofing test), there is no objectionable distortion of sound quality. The button moldings in the case are designed perfectly to fit and operate the buttons on the phone. Seriously durable protection is provided by this attractive case. Customer service (phone number is on their website) will walk you through any installation glitches. 5 stars.

XXL fit perfectly on me (loose, the way I wanted it); I normally wear XXL shirts, I'm a fat tall guy with long arms and big chest as well as fat belly.Did great snorkelling in Hawaii, went all afternoon for a few days, very comfortable, and didn't get sunburned. Also ran over some sharp rocks & stuff and didn't get scratched at all, underneath the shirt.

I bought this swim shirt for a week of snorkeling in Mexico's Yucatan Peninsula. It continues to serve me well -- offering excellent protection from the sun. It fits more loosely (and comfortably) than previous swim shirts I've used, but stays on my body without lifting up when in water.

I needed a shirt to protect my torso from the sun for an upcoming trip to the Caribbean.  This seemed like a great option and so I purchased it.  I really like it, but the size was not right.I weigh about 180 and am 6'1" and typically wear large shirts, and so I purchased a large one of these.  It was a mistake.  The shirt was crazy baggy and would not work.  I returned the large (thanks Amazon) for a Medium and am much happier.

Took the advice from others and ordered a size smaller, and glad I did. Photo shows black with white panels, which is what I expected to receive. Arrived black with charcoal panels. Would have preferred the white as represented. Please fix the photo, or send the right thing!

This shirt does protect my husband from the sun; however, when wet it is almost completely see through.  I kind of thought that when I bought it, but white matched best with all of his swim trunks.  He wears it anyway, but I wish it was less see-through.

As other reviewers have pointed out I can also confirm that the sleeves are extremely long. The shirt fits loose as expected but the sleeves come down to at least where my fingers begin. Its almost like this shirt was designed to have a thumb hole and cover even some parts of your hand from the sun. I really had high hopes for this shirt because long sleeve swim shirts are generally pretty expensive.

The sleeves are a little long, though I shopped according to the measurements given. I am 6'0 tall and have a 46" chest. But unhappy about it. The gray stripe on the side sets it off from my black Speedo swim trucks, so I like that as well. Looks good, fits a little larger than I thought it would but is not skin tight either. Happy, and now looking forward to playing in the sun soon!

I bought his shirt to hang out on a boat and on the beaches of Hawaii and it was prefect for both those uses.  It fits a bit loose for swimming but it would work for that as well of needed.  I just prefer something a little more snug when swimming/snorkeling.  This shirt would be great for a day of fishing on a boat.  All and all a great quality product.  I would recommend this product.

The sizing is off.  I ordered a medium and it is more like a large.  I wear a 34 inch sleeve and the medium shirt sleeves go down to the beginning of my palm.  I would advise anyone who orders this shirt to order a size smaller than usual.

A really nice swim shirt except that the sleeves seemed rather longish; I am guessing to keep the backs of the hands out of the sun.Speedo cut it slightly roomy so that it does not bind; i.e.: same fit as the Speedo Easy swim shirt.If you are on the cusp between Medium and Large, then go with medium.
Not as soft as the other flag ones I've ordered, and not as long. I own alot of under armour shirts and this is the worst one I've ever gotten. Feels cheap. Fits small.
