Not the same material as the other under armor shirts. Made in Malaysia and the original ones are made in China.Fits tight, and not as long, material feels more like cotton than polyesterWill be returning
Ordered XXL, shirt fits like a medium even though it's supposedly a "loose" fit.
Shirt feels good quality. It’s not super thin. It does stretch if you pull on it which is good and it holds its shape back again.
My husband loves these shirts he has had so many  complements everyone wants to know where we got them
Terrible thin material and cheap printing. Definitely thought I would get better quality for the price. The sizing is all off too. Will be returning for a refund
Great T shirts! They are my son’s favorite
Great quality and seems very well made..surly recommended
I dont like mostly cotton shirts but this one is ok.
No complaints

I've found they're an excellent "travel" t-shirt. They can be easily washed in the shower/sink, then hung up to dry overnight. I've bought several and rotate them during trips, which cuts down on what I carry in my bag by quite a bit. Used them for hiking/biking/anything active as well and they're lightweight, breathable and wick away the sweat.I bought a couple about 4 years ago and found they've held up well, though I'd recommend just leaving them out to dry instead of using the dryer.I'm 6' 2" at 185 lbs and the medium size is a perfect fit. It hangs well without looking loose. The shirt in the photo is the "Sunset Red Heather" color.

I ordered a few Columbia Sportwear shirts after taking my measurements and reviewing sizing guidelines on the manufacturer’s website. The shirts fix perfectly upon arrival. However, once washed/dried according to instructions (hand wash cold & tumble dry low), all the shirts shrunk a whole size and no longer fit. Buy a size larger than needed or risk throwing money away.

I absolutely love these shirts. There's no real delicate way to say this, but I sweat - a lot. Summer is miserable for me, and I just had to stop wearing cotton shirts entirely between the months of May and September. I started wearing athletic-style shirts, but I don't really care for the way they feel. I bought one of these shirts on a whim a year ago. Now I have five. They're a bit expensive for a "plain t-shirt" (at least I think so), but they're totally worth it. Soft, roomy, and they wear well. They dry super-fast for a poly-blend, and they don't or feel like an athletic shirt. Just a great cool and casual shirt for summer.

I work in a hospital and regularly put in 12, 13 or 14 hour days.  I'm a pretty sweaty guy and would wear performance shirts to stay dry, but after a long day you're gonna get stinky wearing polyester.  These shirts are a perfect balance; they are a cotton/poly blend and feel much better than normal performance shirts.  Also, when i'ts the summer and hotter than hell, they keep me dry as I'm running at my job.  I've bought these several times and never beed disappointed.

I work in Florida, so it gets warm, and the UV protection is great. Very happy. Buying more with my next paycheck. wear very well over time, don't shrink much depending on how long you dry them. READ AND UNDERSTAND THE LAUNDRY INSTRUCTIONS before washing to maintain protection.
These t-shirts make it possible for me to hide my massive beer belly! The slimming effect is so great I'm able to date girls half my age once again! Thank you Columbia!

6-stars.  These are my favorite t-shirts ever.  They are super soft, lightweight, comfortable, and they have great color selection.  They don't shrink or lose color in the washer/dryer.  I now have a Super Blue Heather color, black, red element heather, nocturnal heather and cloud burst heather. I feel like a weirdo because this is the only t-shirt I wear now. I plan to get the long sleeve version next summer.

Best shirts I have found for my line of work. I work in construction so my shirts see alot of abuse. I'm constantly buying new shirts due to staining or holes due to nail snags. Not with these shirts, they last. You truly get what you pay for. I have a long torso so the fact that they have a Tall size is great. These are so comfortable and perform very well in hot humid weather. Even when they are soaked with sweat they aren't heavy, and they dry out very fast. I ordered a ton of these shirts after trying the first couple. I need more right now!

I love this shirt.  It's got a nice modern fit that's slim but not too tight or too short on my 6'2/200 frame (size XL).  The cotton is soft, the stitching on the logo and subtle contrast stitching on the shoulders are all well done.  It's a simple, timeless look that pairs well with jeans and feels great to wear.  I've already ordered another.
Have been wearing this style for years. They fit well, don't wrinkle, dry quickly and don't stretch out.

As others have posted, quality is definitely not on par compared to the same Hanes shirts bought from Target, Walmart, etc. First, the label on the shirts are not "Red Label" as described; they're black and almost seem generic. Second, they definitely feel and look thinner than the older a shirts they're replacing. Disappointed as I thought these were the same quality as what I usually purchase. Not even worth the hassle of returning; will end up as rags in the garage.

well.....im not too happy with these. if you are used to regular hanes tanks WITH the lables...you wont like these either.1. these are WAY smaller.2. these are WAY thinner/cheaper.3. the ones i got dont look the same as the image....mine have all blue printing on the "tag"...dont know if thats important but im mentioning it.the quality difference isnt even close. i feel like i could poke a hole through it with my finger....these things are paper thin and partially see through. simply put....these are NOT like normal hanes tank tops.

I've purchased these before and had good luck but not this time.  As with any new garment I wanted to wash these before wearing them.  I estimate these shrunk 30-35% of their original size. The "tagless" label almost completely washed off 4 of the 6 shirts.  There seems to be a serious quality control issue.  Of course now that I washed them I can't return them.  These will be expensive dusting rags.

I am 5'8", 165lb. I have a 44" chest, 16" arms and a 31" waist. I have a hard time finding shirts to fit my girth vs. my height. These shirts are a good fit. They are pretty long (down to the crotch of my pants) but they do not ride up. The chest is a bit tight, but they are fresh out of the package. I can see they will loosen in time. The material is comfortable; not too scratchy, but not too soft that it shifts. The thickness is good for an undershirt. The shoulder strap has a little extra thread on the upper seam that I removed with scissors and some seam glue so it would not stick out if I wear these without an over shirt. I will be buying this product again.

When we moved from Wisconsin to Florida my teenage son really was having a hard time handling the heat and I was sick of watching him walk around with his shirt off. This was the perfect compromise. The shirts fit well, are made with quality, are comfortable and don't make you overheat. My son now wears these happily rather than walking around shirtless and I couldn't be happier. The price is also unbeatable for the number of shirts you get. I definitely recommend if you are looking for a shirt that you can be in the heat in that will keep you cool.

These seem to be very different from what I have ordered in the past for my husband. I washed them like normal in cold water and the shrunk in length by 3 inches. So now they are not usefull to my husband because he wears them under hsmis dress shirts and tucks them in. But with not having that extra length and these shrinking as much as they did made it even worse!

These shirts seem to draw up from the bottom, so I would advise getting a size larger than usually needed if you will be washing them frequently.  My husband wears them every day under his work uniform, so washing them frequently is necessary.  He’s average height, and would really be happier if they would just make them slightly longer so this isn’t  an issue.

I went ahead a bought the next size up, large, after reading the other reviews and l sure was glad that l did. Very tight around the middle. I have a bit of a belly and bought these to work out in. I would say they are border line too tight in the "middle" area. I hope that if / as l lose  some weight they would fit better. Not bad for the price but not great either. They would function fine as a cold weather under shirt. Shipping was quick. Price was good.

I thought these were the super comfortable ones my wife had previously bought for me. I was wrong. These undershirts are perfectly serviceable as long as you don't mind them being a tad coarse. They're also just short enough to where they will come untucked at least once during the day. Other than those two negatives, they get the job done.

These tanks, right out of the bag, exude a quality feel: thicker than you'd expect a tank to be and very soft. I'm 5;10" and 178 lb and these are pretty snug on me, but then if I got back down to my cycling weight of 160 they'd be about perfect. They're dazzling white to start with an retain their brightness if washed in hot water with bleach. A quality product, recommended.

love the fact that the tank top parts on the arm pit sections are lower than normal, rather than riding up close. I tend to buy a lot of tank tops for casual wear or everyday wear and these are the first in over 2 years that are perfect. They have thickness, but not overly thick, two toned colored making them stand out instead of the basic one color style, casual looking but still nice and breathable. I also uploaded an image of the logo tag on the back of the shirt itself. Also the inside is tagless, while the tag logo part on the outside is 3 dimensional. Ordered this in grey/dark grey and blue/light grey and solid white one that should be in a few days from now.Very impressed and will definitely buy the other colors soon.

great tank top. Fits as expected. I'm 5'11, 170lbs, fit and got a medium. The only issue I had is the tag located at the bottom seam, and only sewn on one edge of tag. It always wants to flip/stick out from under the tank. A couple of people thought it was a sticker and pulled on it; only to find it attached to the tank. Kind of awkward when someone secretly touches your butt to help remove what is believe to be a sticker stuck to your butt. So, I cut it off. It documents the material of the tank and  washing instructions. I suppose it's important to have, but maybe Champion should stitch it to the shirt so it won't stick out from under the tank.

Good price, great fit and incredibly comfortable.  Extremely soft feel to the fabric that has a slight elastic quality that stretches to match your movement but doesn't constrict.  It also seems to limit wrinkling after washing or wearing. In addition it has a modestly stylish look that is a cut above the average cheap tank top I've seen or purchased.  I just bought it for a wear around the house comfortable summer top but it looks good enough that I don't mind wearing it out of the house to walk the dog or for a quick trip to the store.

Can't go wrong with this if you're looking for a classic tank at an unbeatable price. They're not too tight like most shirts are nowadays, they have more of a classic fit that you would have expected in the 90's. Great for those of us who have average bodies and prefer a little extra room rather than the modern day slim fits.

A U.S. large is usually tight on me, this large is actually a XXlarge tall.  The shirt was not advertised as xxlarge tall, as a matter of fact tall sizes aren't even available for this shirt.I am 5'10 and 180 pounds with a 46 inch chest and this shirt looks like a baggy dress on me.It's bad enough that shirts from Asia are about two sizes to small but now apparently I have to worry about other companies making their shirts two sizes too big as well.I don't know why the other reviewers are saying these are a perfect fit, but if you wear an extra large you need to get a medium for it to fit correctly.I expected much better from Champion, like maybe possibly a large that is actually a large.  This large looks like a seven foot tall overweight womans sun dress.Not worth returning, I guess I'll just give this to my girlfriend and tell her it's a dress.

Really wanted to like this as I am a big fan of Champion clothing, but the quality on the one I got was just not on par.  The width of the fabric at the top of the shoulders/traps ended up being 1.5" on one side and 2.25" on the other.  It looks terrible and I'll never wear it for this reason.  Not worth returning due to cheap price...

The fabric used for this tank top traps in heat and moisture. Just try wearing it in hot weather and you'll see what I mean. It makes you feel hot, icky, and uncomfortable. I made the mistake of buying five and washing them before really trying them on. I have three Fruit of the Loom tank tops (Fruit of the Loom 5 oz., 100% Heavy Cotton HD Tank Top) to compare these to. The Fruit of the Loom ones were really cool and comfortable in comparison.

So far this is a great cutoff.  It's comfortable and the arm holes are large enough so they're not all up in your pits (which I hate).  I normally wear a large but the x-large seemed to fit better.  I'm 6'3", 200lbs.

I ordered a size smaller after losing a lot of weight, otherwise it would have been a bit large. But I would recommend these as they're very nice shirts for the price. If you're thin you may want to consider a size smaller than you usually go with.

I got this shirt for my husband and ordered a large as that is his usual size. Well, after opening the package, I immediately knew it was not going to fit. First, it was a lot smaller than expected and second, the armpit holes were very short and wide so it just looked awkward.

I received 4 shirts and they were very nice.  But be careful about washing and drying.  I recommend low heat as 2 of the shirts shrunk.  But NDB made it right and sent me 4 replacement shirts with clear laundry instructions on the tags.  Very good shirts and a real pleasure to buy from a company that really cares about selling quality products and making sure the customer is happy.

Update:  NDB Shoes contacted me and reshipped my entire order in a bigger size... The went above and beyond... I highly recommend them!  Thank you NDB Shoes!Original post: Ordered 12 XL shirts but all do not fit the same.  Half of them fit tighter than the other half... wish I could just return the half that were too tight... HELP!!!

Material quality is good but the shirt shrank upwards significantly after first wash. I'm a tall guy and decided to donate them. Wouldn't purchase again.Update: After posting my previous review, customer service contacted me and made the situation right. They were friendly and supportive. Top notch customer service.

As they say.....You get what you pay for and with these shirts that is true.  Two have stiching coming unraveled along the bottom hem after being worn once. I'm using them as work shirts and I work in a factory so it isn't a problem for me but that's me. Just know what you're getting before you order.Update: The sellers saw my review and reached out to us. They offered either a half refund or replacement shirts. We chose to get replacement shirts and sure enough received them the other day. I'll update this further when we have a chance to see how the quality is and if there is problems with the stitching again. I am very impressed with the company's customer service. They reached out to me to make things right not the other way around. You have to give credit to any company that is that stand up!

Item arrived and packaged well. The only thing is that they run small. So if you wear a xxl get a 3XL. Looks like these will just become rags. Last time I buy clothes from amazon.Edit: since the shirts didn’t fit the seller has made it right with me. Great seller. Would recommend to anyone just if you are buying shirts order one size bigger.

The shirts are soft but not the soft material that I wanted. But very good quality t shirts they look like Calvin Klein t shirts that cost double the price. I will definitely purchase these shirts again.

A little disappointed in these tshirts. I bought 2xl but they fit more like xl. I havent even washed yet because i know they will shrink even more. I guess they will make some decent undershirts for when i wear my jerseys.

Great T-Shirts.. Fit Perfect, They stretch a little Also! They smelled a little funny coming out the package but the washing machine can fix that, haha. Highly Recommend.. Will be buying again in the future.
Soft, rich colors, good color grouping. I'm very happy with them.
This company is incredible to deal with and the shirts are nice and soft. My husband loves them.

This is a very reasonable, sub-ten dollar long sleeved T-shirt. The size was as expected; however, the black is not jet black, which was apparent even after one washing in only cold water. It is also on the thinner side. If you are looking for something as a layering item, something to throw on for the gym, or similar, it as very adequate for that purpose and is priced fairly for that use.I personally would not wear it for other than outdoor chores, working around the house, sleeping on a cold night, or the gym. Your mileage may vary. If the colour had held better, I'd give it another star. While thinner, it has held up well fabric-wise, as well as the stitching.

I ordered the Oxford grey. It is NOT 100% cotton. It is 10% polyester, so it didn't shrink much when washed and tumble dried. I buy 100% cotton shirts one size bigger because they always shrink in the clothes dryer (especially the sleeve length), regardless of whether it "preshrunk" by the factory. The seller needs to correct the information for this item to show that it is NOT 100% cotton. If some colors are 100% cotton and other are not, then the seller needs to clarify this in the product information.

I bought 2 of these, one cardinal red and one olive green.  Colors are fairly representative as advertised.  Great price but material is thinner than I had hoped.  Won't provide much for warmth but would be a nice layer to an outfit.  I am 5" 8" and fluctuate between 210-220 pounds with the extra weight being around the mid-section.  Size is everything and buying clothes online has always been a challenge for me.  All in all, this is a nice long sleeve shirt if you can match a size to your body.  The XL fit is close for me but probably better suited more as an undershirt for layering purposes but a bit too tight for wearing on it's own on my size frame.  An XXL would most likely hang too long on me and perhaps a bit too loose but would be OK for something to sleep in.  Since I am not with the perfect body, the trick for me is finding the fit for the purpose.

Good fit. Looks just like the product photo. Maybe slightly darker.  My issue with it is I bought this due to the product description advertising it as being 100% cotton...it's not.  The tag says 50% cotton/50% polyester and it feels like it.  It is still a good shirt for the price, just don't expect 100% cotton.

It's pretty light in the collar department. I think(?) most men, me at least, judge a T Shirt by it's collar. Whimpy collar, thin collar, collar that doesn't keep it's shape etc, that's a bad shirt. Thick collar, beefy collar etc, that's what manley men want on their T Shirts. This shirt's collar is not the whimpiest I've seen but it's just not up to the Fruits and others. Colors good, collars bad.

Here in East Tennessee, I need to protect myself from the sun and from poison ivy when I'm working outside.  A neighbor had the idea, which I stole, to use long-sleeved white T-shirts when working outside.  Probably quite a sight:  old guy in a long-sleeved T-shirt and long pants in 80 degree weather, wearing "grandpa" wrap-around sunglasses and a straw hat and gloves.  Better than having to deal with another bout of skin cancer or poison ivy!

I'm not sure how these 100% cotton T shirts came to be so rough but they feel like 120 grit sandpaper right out of the bag. I would return them if it weren't for the hassle and the fact that they are a low priced item. I purchased a multi pack Fruit Of The Loom short sleeve T's this summer and they were perfect. I should have taken note and purchased their long sleeve version. I have never felt 100% cotton that had this rough texture, hopefully they will improve with some washing's, if not I will donate them to a shelter. Cannot recommend this product and read no comments to the quality of this 100% cotton that were negative.After washing cold and drying hot the material of this shirt softened substantially.

Horrible material, I washed it multiple times, soaked it in Downy and it stayed like thin sack cloth.  I wore it and the material is uncomfortable and the rim on the inside of the neck was an irritant to my neck.  This is pretty much the same crap material that is sold on the internet to people who are looking for a 'soft' comfortable shirt.  While the name "MJ Soffe" is an old name, it, in my opinion, gives one to believe it is 'soft'.....NOT>>I won't even donate this over priced rag to a thrift store.

I bought two of these T-Shirts having my reservations on the quality verses the price. I was surprised that they were a great fit but waited to post my review until after I washed them. Surprise again, not much shrinkage at all after a few washings.I really like the fit around the neck and the length is much longer than the "Fruit of the Loom" shirts I previously purchased.I just ordered five more!

I actually like this brand better than Russell. Better fit for me and material seems a bit thicker. Never heard of MJ Soffe before but the price was comparable so gave them a try. Wasn't disappointed. I like cotton shirts as they get softer and softer over time and breathe really well. Everyone has different body shapes so will have different opinions about clothes. If MJ Soffe is still around when I need more shirts I will buy from them. I noticed that in the clothes world that if you find something that fits well......buy several more now because when you need more they might change the product or might not be in business in the future.

Love these shirts and have been wearing them +/- 10 years... I own quite a few, wear them often on casual Fridays at my office, will replace them once they wear out, and once I’ve replaced one I use it for outdoor purposes (I.E., fishing mostly)... Just a note, if you’ve never worn the Columbia Perfect Cast shirts, know this.... Columbia Perfect Cast Shirts fit bigger than others (approximately 1 size bigger), I believe these shirts were designed for mostly fishing...  For instance, I usually wear a size XXL but, I buy a size XL when I buy this specific Columbia shirt...

The shirt is the BIG catch -- not in the good way if you are 5' 5" like I am! Oh, yeah, it's quite comfortable, stylish, and the fabric seems tough enough. But, I looked like a kid who got into daddy's closet! I really wanted this shirt, so I went to a local store, just to try on a medium. Yeah, it's within the definition of fitting me, so I ordered one from Amazon. Columbia lists this as a relaxed fit. Well, be assured, it's all that and then some.

I have owned these shirts before. Getting my size is always hard. These are great all weather shirts but I really like them for hot humid wear. They stand up to repeated washings, don't wrinkle easy and make great travel shirts.As others have said, these run large, which for me is a good thing. If you want the current euro cut tight muscle shirt, buy a size smaller.. But for a roomy shirt that moves with you this is great.These are very well made of a heavy synthetic.....not some paper thin stuff that shows chest hair underneath.I work in construction so a shirt that looks good after a day of sweating in it is great....this is it.They don't develope that chemical/ onion sour smell over time like cheaper shirts do.The vents in the back work well on breezy days as well.

I read the reviews before ordering this shirt. I bought one size smaller than what was needed. He wears an XL, I bought a L, and it fit absolutely perfectly. The material is so nice on your skin, like synthetic. It has a very nifty "vent pocket" on the back of the shirt as well, for breathability, and it is an omni-shade....... this shirt is an amazing find, great fit and texture, for an amazing price (especially for Columbia). I would definitely recommend this product to ANYONE. We love it!

My husband loves this shirt. He wears the button down Columbia shirts all of the time so I took a chance and ordered this one for him for Father’s Day. It is lightweight and looks a little dressier than other PFG shirts. Washes well and doesn’t seem to wrinkle, making it a great shirt to pack for vacations or traveling.

This is a very comfy polo that fits perfectly and is light and attractive with lots of breathability (if that is a word) features. A+ product at an A+ price from an A+ company. It even came with fast perfect shipping and packaging. Thanks!

I love this shirt!  It is comfortable, airy, and well designed for full upper body movement and air circulation.  You can wash it in a sink and it's dry in no time ... hence a great travel shirt.  My only criticism (and the reason for not giving it five stars) is that either the weave or the fabric is prone to "pulls" if it gets snagged on anything sharp, and those loops are almost impossible to pull back into the weave,  Unlike cotton polo style shirts which are a tighter weave and less prone to pulls, this shirt which is meant for active outdoor sports is just a tad too delicate.
This polo was slightly larger than normal in material as well as in the sleeves. If I was jacked up on steroids and couldn't comb my own hair this would fit me fine.

Typical Columbia, top quality and slightly oversized. I order Columbia shirts a size smaller than normal for a good fit. Color is more muted that in the pictures, not as bright orange but still a good color.
I ordered this shirt for my husband and got him an XL.  It was huge!  I exchanged it for a Large and that fit him perfect.  Very nice shirt and will be great for golfing or fishing this summer!

I have never ate a taco before because of my rare stomach disease that I have, but the green in the shirt was a pretty color and the only color I am allowed to wear by my guru El Shareed Ta E'Tay. He enjoys it. I feel like we have connected.

Very comfortable and cute style for men or women. Lightweight, soft, good quality material. I love it! I'm 5'9 and 220lbs and it fits perfectly. It is a men's shirt but I prefer the fit to a women's shirt since I'm curvy. Product arrived sooner than expected. Blue is beautiful. My husband wants to steal it from me so I may have to buy him one now.

Some of the other reviews said that it ran small... I normally buy an XL, so I bought an XXL just to be safe. I would have been totally fine with the XL. It's soft, washes well, and I like the fit. The sleeves aren't longer than they should be, the length of the shirt is right... It's not really thick, but definitely thicker than a standard "vintage" style. Which is nice, because it makes it hang nicr. All around 5 stars. I recommend and would order again.

This is the second time this has happened with this vendor. I don't like the unisex style of tshirt and make sure it's a male style before ordering. It still ends up being the unisex style shirt. Not worth sending back but not going to buy again.

I ordered the wrong size. My fault. Have called customer service twice. Both calls were disconnected. Not a good sign. I'll try again today but I'm not holding my breath. Should note to order a size larger than needed. On the good side, it was comfortably soft and looked as pictured.

I'm grateful to the reviews that say to order one size larger, they are spot on.  The XL is the size of a normal large T-shirt.  It always feels so good to get the right size on the first try when ordering online.  This T-shirt is made of a very soft cotton fabric, not the usual dense, rough cotton you find in a normal hanes or fruit of the loom t-shirt-the sleeves don't stick out all goofy, the drape down properly on your arms.  I usually don't go for graphic Tees because, as a 39 year old man, they make me look like an immature degenerate, which, truth be told, I am.  This one however, is legitimately too hilarious to pass up.  I love it, it's my new life partner and I will lament its eventual passing.

These shirts are great. My husband is very particular about his shirts and these are a nice light fabric and very soft. They're great quality and funny, of course! Have bought a few from this company and will buy more!

First of all, it does fit as expected, perfectly actually. T shirt and graphic looks identical to what the picture shows. When I first put it on, it felt like a medium quality shirt. After washing, you can tell the quality isn't so good.  I've only wore and washed this shirt about 5-6 times now, and it's already shrinking length wise. (I wash my whites on a "warm" temp that is not hot and not cold, and I always dry my clothes on medium heat. This doesn't effect the other clothes) The shirt is now terribly thin, and nearly see through as well. Love the shirt, and it was a great price, but don't expect to get much use out of it or for it to last very long

My husband and daughter both own this shirt. EVERYONE loves it. They stop him and tell him how funny it is. It’s also very soft, fit as expected, and washes and dries nicely. I just updated this review to add a photo. Clearly my husband loves this shirt. It’s slightly faded... but that’s because he has worn it 88,362 times. I swear. I think it’s his favorite. It is REALLY soft.The company, Crazy Dog TShirt, is great to work with as well. We had a shipment delay and they rectified the situation immediately. Great company.

I had high hopes that the material would be as soft as they claimed, but it's stiff.What's worse is that the light blue color has sloughed off in several areas, leaving huge bright white patches. Mind you not one drop of bleach has entered my house in years.

Awesome shirt! My kids wanted to get this shirt as a Father's Day gift to their dad, he loved it and wore it out to lunch on Father's Day! He received many compliments. He is 5'11" around 160 and the large fit him well.

I was super excited for my daughter to give this to her dad for Father's Day- he is always impersonating batman for her- but unfortunately the logo is way off center and just looks sloppy, a total mishap. If it was slightly off it would be doable (life isn't perfect right?) but this is just bad. I just read a review of someone else getting one with the same problem, only to be given another with the same off centered logo in response for her complaint.

I was so excited to give this as a Christmas gift for my hubby who just became a new daddy. He was thrilled and washed it immediately to wear right away, but did not read the drying instructions and does not hang dry anything. I thought it would be fine, as we dry everything on low and it was supposed to have been preshrunk cotton. However, after one wash and dry the Large I bought now fits like a Medium and is too tight to be comfortable. So disappointed! Also, the "supersoft ringspun cotton" was, in my opinion, stiff and scratchy even after washing and using "free and clear" fabric softener. I don't know yet whether I will try to replace it with the next size up or not, as it shrunk in length as well as width. It's a cute idea, but I am disappointed with the quality.

This is such a cute idea. Wouldhavebeenperfect if thebat were centered....should have listened to other reviews... Am I missing something are they SUPPOSED TO BE OFF CENTER?  Or are you selling mistakes at full price???

It came a little smaller than I thought. I ordered an x-large because my cousin wears a medium to a large so I wanted to account for any shrinkage. It came in and it was more of a medium (in my opinion). The logo is really cool though and the shirt fabric itself was good quality. If you buy it I would really consider ordering maybe 3 sizes up (if they have it). The shirt really does run small.

It's not printed exactly like it should be, kinda hard to tell in the pic and it also had a small stain on it as soon as I pulled it out of the package. Otherwise I'd give 5 stars. It's for my husband, he hasn't tried it on yet but looks like it'll fit right.
Was small to start with and shrunk sooo much in the wash (despite low heat). My hubby wore it once before it became so small it barely fits me (small woman)

I got this for my dad as a birthday present, he likes Batman. He loves to wear the shirt and it looks great on him. The material is good quality, soft and it fits him great. He has a very muscular build and usually wears a XL, but I got a 2XL instead since some posts said the shirts run small.

Just received this in the mail. Good quality material. My husband will love it! It, however, does not fit like an extra large. It runs small and fits him more like a Large. Luckily he will still wear it, that he definitely would have preferred it to fit him like an Extra Large
Super fun shirt, friends husband loved it! He is a new Dad to 3 kids under 2.  Great material, doesn't shrink, and logo holds up well to washing.

I have worn Didkies Pocket T-Shirts almost exclusively for the last 7-8 years.  The manufacture and country of the shirts I just received has changed.  I usually purchase the 2XT or 3XT.  The sleeves on the new shirt are shorter than my previous purchase and the material isn't nearly as thick. You can almost see through this material which wasn't possible with my previous Dickies.  This is not the quality heavy material Dickies were know for.  The price was about a dollar cheaper than I normally pay and it shows in the quality.  The T-Shirt is still better than a 3-pack of Hanes or Fruit or the Loom, but your only getting one shirt.  I think a better price point for this shirt should be about $3 cheaper, which would earn it 5 stars.

My SO often has difficulty finding shirts that fit well because he is big and tall (6'5''), not one or the other.  The problem is that shirts often are too short and ride-up when he raises his arms, even if the rest of the shirt fits well.  This one fits well - there's no obvious ride-up. There's really not a whole lot to say - it's a shirt! It fits well, it's comfortable, and the fabric appropriately soft.Edit:  I forgot to mention that he purchased an XLT version of the shirt.  So, if you are both tall and big, make sure you purchase the "T" size.

I am not returning the tee as a reminder to myself not to make the same mistake again.The Dickies Men's Short Sleeve Pocket Tee Big-tall appears to have been made by an entity that generally knows the human form.The length is shorter than a regular Tee, and the pocket might be handy if arm pits needed a place to put things.Come to think of it, I do not think I have ever owned a piece of clothing made by Dickies that quite fit right...

This is the second Dickies t-shirt I have purchased from Amazon. The first one tore in the armpit area, this one near the waist. It’s not really a tear, it’s just bad sewing and no quality control. Each of them were wore just once, then washed and hung on hanger to dry. The weight and material are nice, just very poor sewing. Quality control is terrible. I have purchased a few dozen of the Hanes Beefy-Ts, not a single bad stitch.

It was supposed to be a big and tall shirt, that's why I bought it. Tall, meaning long.  My husband has a long torso and it's hard to find shirts that are the length he needs.  I was hopeful for this one,  but it disappointed. It's wide and not long at all. I guess I have another night shirt. Very dissatisfied

I really like the price, the look and the feel of this t-shirt, and I've imagined ordering more, except for one thing: it looks like the inner edge of the collar is getting a bit frayed and I've only had the shirt a few weeks.  It may not get worse, and it isn't super noticeable yet, but that part of the shirt shows beneath any outer shirt and it concerns me that it may deteriorate to the point where I would only want to wear it around the house, not out in public. I can't afford to buys t-shirts that will only be totally useful for a short time.  I'll try to remember to check back in a month or so and report on this.

I have been wearing Dickies work clothing for many years, it's always been very durable wash after wash. This is the first time I have tried their line of t-shirts. Normally in a t-shirt I buy just a regular length shirt. This time I decided to try a long tall version. I wanted the extra length primarily because I get tired of my rear being exposed when I bend over! I'm around 6ft tall, and this shirt takes care of that issue well. Compared to my regular length Hanes t-shirts, this shirt gives me an additional 3 inches or so in length. The material is not real heavy, maybe slightly thicker than a Hanes t-shirt, but that's just what I wanted. It's extremely soft and comfortable to wear, and I am very happy. I have purchased a few of these, and plan to purchase more. I believe me standing at around 6ft, the long tall is a much better fit for me, and overall it looks better on me than regular length shirts.Although it is tagless in the neck area, the care label is on the inside bottom at the side seam. I don't find this to be irritating, however some of you might. At this point, I have laundered mine several times now, and have not had no noticeable shrinkage. I washed according to the directions, in cold water, and drying on low.I am overall very pleased, and hope this may help someone else make their decision. It's really a great quality shirt.

The quality of Dickies products is well know. No exceptions here. Thick and heavy enough to wear in the shop, light and comfortable enough to lounge around the house in. My only complaint is with quality control, not sure if it's on Amazon or Dickies, but mine arrived with a white stain, a little smaller than a dime, on the right sleeve. I don't live near a post office or UPS store so a return would be incredibly inconvenient. Hopefully whatever it is will wash off. Wish me luck.

Really soft cotton from Pakistan, and a good weight to the fabric.  My boyfriend is 6'7" and very slim.  I ordered the LT because he is used to buying large t-shirts, doesn't like a close or slim fit on his shirts.  The length is great on him, he is very happy with the length and the t-shirt overall.  The charcoal is a really nice color, in my opinion.

I purchased 5 of these shirts. All five arrived with the proper size labels on the shirt and also the printed label inside the shirt neck. FOUR of the shirts are sized properly. ONE of the shirts is Waaaaaaaay too big. If I had to guess at a size for the 5th shirt (which, by the way is labeled XLT) I would guess that it is a 4XLT.I tried to return to Siberman but their automatic label wanted me to pay for shipping. This is a manufacturer error and I should not have to pay for shipping.I have contacted the company to resolve this shipping issue. I would rather return the shirt and just have them send me another one that is sized correctly according to the label. I don't care about a refund. I just want my shirt.On to the praise. I REALLY like Dickies pocket shirts. Love em. I will continue to buy these T shirts and I will keep getting them from Siberman's Work Wear. It's all in how the company handles it when problems arise. We'll see. I will update this review as this issue evolves.Thanks !

I’m 5’10” and often wear medium T-shirts... large when I’m going for more of a relaxed fit.  Here I ordered a large and this shirt is still ridiculously short on my torso. I was disappointed by that as well as it’s propensity to wrinkle... I feel like it won’t be long before the design is all crackled. Also note it they are a little slow to ship. I have prime, ordered on a Sunday, got the shipped notice Monday night, and it didn’t arrived until Thursday.  Other than that it’s good for short-term patriotic grins

this fake  tux tee shirt from the distance looks like  a real tux till you get closer,this, well i will even wear it to a wedding.because its so comftable and light to wear , i love wearing fake . real looking clothes, they are so kool and kool too. thanks

This is by far the best wedding attire ever!! Even though we were the only ones wearing tux t-shirts, we were styling.  The fit was great, the look even better.  I am very satisfied with this product.

This tuxedo shirt was a big hit at our Carrie-inspired “prom” party. Perfect costume for my husband, who didn’t really want to dress up. Many people asked where we got it. Seemed to run true to size and good quality fabric, not that thin cheap stuff you see so often in novelty tees.

I purchased this for my husband, he’s a veteran and it will be fun shirt to wear Celebrating the Fourth of July at our Vfw.  The shirt is spot on when it comes to the size the colors vivid, and the quality of this shirt is good. Don’t hesitate to purchase.

This shirt is amazing.  I got so many compliments, and people really seemed to respect me a lot more.  In fact the judge thought I looked so spiffy that he only gave me probation instead of jail time.  My mom was so right when she told me to wear a tie to court!
Great seasonal novelty shirt. Well constructed and has survived two heavy duty washings with art work in tact. Generated plenty of favorable comments because it’s unique.

I use this shirt in my shows and I than you. I did have issues with the seam under the arm coming loose. Of course being a puppet designer I fixed the problem. Hopefully it want be a problem on my next order.

This shirt is surprisingly nice for a white-trash tuxedo shirt. It is printed on a Gildan t-shirt in a medium-weight. I was worried I have to return it if it came on one of those super thin cheap shirts that most garbage t-shirts come printed on. Fortunately, this was a quality product.
If you love America like I do and still want to be comfortable while showing your patriotism this is the shirt for you.  The only bad part is it isn't made in the USA.  Go America!

I have the blue, and the color is very pretty, better than I expected.  Based on the size chart I would be a L (5'6", 38B, 138 lbs)  but I did over one size larger, the XL, because I like mine roomy and  relaxed, and also just in case the rayon shrinks, which Rayon usually does, but not much at all in this case, thank goodness.  I wish there are hidden pockets, which make this dress perfect ... but otherwise a great easy piece to wear around the house or go out.  as to the chemical smell, there is a little bit of it, but I washed mine and use a nice fabric softener, so it is much better now, not bothersome at all.

Comfy, cute casual summer dress. This fit great! I’m 5’4”/200lbs and got the XL. It hits me just barely above the knee and looks great. The fabric is soft and not too heavy, which is perfect for August. The color is pretty much dead on to my iPhone or iPad screen. I got the Daybreak color.
So comfortable and flows nicely! Im 5'4, 165 and I purchased a medium and it fit me perfectly!!!!

I’m in love with this dress!! I ordered another one in a different color because I liked it so much. I’m 5’2”, 155lbs, 34DDD and the large fit great. I could’ve possibly went down to a medium (it’s roomy). I like the fit though for my chest area. The material is pretty thin, but I love that for the summer. I think it’ll be cute with leggings for the winter. Great buy!

LOVE THIS DRESS! I was worried about the material maybe showing every little lump and bump, but this is great! Its flowy and not super fitted, yet still gives a good shape. The quality is comparable to that of piko clothing. The color was a little more brown than I expected, but its not like a dark brown. It still works for me. The length comes right about my knee cap, similar to the look that you see in the model. I am 5'5, 155lb, athletic build, and I purchased a medium.I am currently stocking up on some fall clothes and I plan to buy more things from this company! I was thinking about maybe even getting more of these in a different color or in long sleeve.

I have a lot of dresses with this same material so I knew that would not be a problem. It was the style I was concerned about....but to my surprise I love this dress. I am 5'2" 198 pounds and this dress fits my curves well on top and flairs at just the right spot for the lower half. I am planning to buy another color!!

This rating is based on the fact that the dress cost $18...  Well worth the money!  Super comfortable, but you can dress it up easily, too.  I am 5'7" / 145 lbs. - M fit perfectly.  4 stars because it comes with a strong odor.  Make sure to order with enough time to let the dress air out before you wear it.

This dress runs pretty true to size and it's well made. I wear it to hack around on the weekends or on a very casual work day in the summer. It launders great...didn't shrink or fade at all. I liked it so much I ordered it in several other colors!  Highly recommended:-)
Love these dresses! I have two so far and they are so flattering. I’m 5’1” and 165 and the large fits perfect. Def buy this. I plan on getting them all 🤗

I love this little dress. Even though its source is China, an XL fit me. (I usually wear L to XL, whichever fits.)  I read the reviews, ordered the XL, and hoped for the best. And my two Levaca styles fit me nicely, even lengthwise. I thought I would like the flowing, draping style of the other garment better but I love this one as well:  simple on top with tiered gathers on the skirt. I like the simple ease of this dress. I am 5'4", and "the new forty". Was looking for something cool and casual but nice-looking to wear at home and around town this summer, with leggings, or without. The fabric on both items feels wonderful; smooth and feather-light. The construction seems well engineered, although the waist on this garment wants to place itself a bit too high on me. (Busty women might find the waist crosses the bustline.) The waist is easily adjusted to only slightly high, but short of empire, and it doesn't bother me. I ordered the dark blue, which is purple.  The darker fabric doesn't draw attention to the waist, and will be lovely with brighter accessories for summer.

I bought 5 shirts so far this past week off Amazon and this one fits ! Its feels light and comfortable ,but not see though (I got green). I'm 5'3 and 165. I got XL and its probably my new favorite shirt. As long as it holds up in the wash we definitely have a winner and I'll get one in a different color also:)

I love this shirt! It goes with jeans or dress pants. For me, I do have to pull the neck down multiple times because I have broad shoulders that make the off the shoulder fit difficult to maintain. But, when it’s sitting in its place it looks fantastic.  I could have sized down to a medium instead of the large that I got. I’m 5’3, 160 lbs. but it still fits great as a more blousy fit.
Love this shirt. Ordered the exact size that I normally wear and it fit perfect.
Fits well, looks good on (hides my tummy rolls.)The collar occasionally flips under and needs to be adjusted at times. Sleeves have a weird texture, but not so annoying that I don't wear it.

I like this one.  I've tried a few similar shirts.  There are so  many brands on here that look alike.  But this one is the cotton feeling one, doesn't wrinkle so bad and fits good.  It's a little loose, but I really like it.
This is my wife's shirt and she looks great in it.
Soft, cute, looks great with shorts and Capris.
Very comfortable!

The web description listed the fabric content as polyester and cotton. The garment tag is labeled 95% polyester and 5% spandex. I ordered the shirt at least a size too large in case it shrunk. That won't happen with a garment not containing natural fibers plus I sweat like crazy in tops that are primarily polyester. For those who do like polyester, the material is soft and the color as depicted.

I ordered this shirt based somewhat on the glowing reviews.  It's always hard to choose a size online, but since my normal size for items that don't shrink is Medium, I started there.  It arrived and was super tight through the arms and shoulders.  So I returned and tried a large.  although the large was bigger through the core  (where I didn't need it to be), the shoulders were still snug.  The neck line flapped around and didn't hold it's shape.  The fabric is paper thin.  I just didn't like anything about this shirt.  So the large too, went back.

Its a cute top but definitely not true fit. I ordered a 3XL, 2 sizes bigger then I normally wear so I could get that flowy drapey look. Nope. Instead I look like a patriotic sausage casing. I am 5'7". 230 lbs. 1XL usually. So disappointed. Also, the material in the picture looks like a nice soft cotton. The shirt that arrived felt like spandex blend.

This is a cute shirt. The bow sold me. The vintage colors are less vintage and more fake design looking. I got a large according to the size chart. I’m 5’4, 150lbs, and a 34DD and feel the large is a little frumpy looking.  I hate when things are too short and this may be a smidge too long, almost like a tunic. I’m hoping after a wash it will shrink down just a little to be the perfect size.
Perfect shirt, the length was just right! I'm 5', 107lb, size xs

Bought this for my wife.  I was concerned that it would get here and only fit Asians or that it would be low quality but it fit well and was cute. Couldn’t ask for more.  Of yes you can, it was comfortable too.
Comfortable silky fabric. A little loose on me but hangs nicely.  Needs to be worn with a cross-strap bra if you don't want straps to show. I washed it in a garment bag and hung to dry.
I thought it would have more fabric because of the photo at the bottom of the photo, but it was actually more of just a tank. Still rocked it ❤
Comfortable and fits perfectly.
Bought this for my daughter.  It was so cute and she loved it.
Very cute tank top!  Quick deliver too.  Bought for my daughter and she loves it!  I almost kept for myself because it is so cute!
This shirt was perfect for the 4th of July!  It’s super cute and fit well!

Let’s start with shirt facts:- 95% Cotton (not 96 as described)- 5% Spandex (not 4 as described)- Bright, mustardy yellow- Delicate wash- Medium iron- Hang to dryI washed separately and colors DO run, so don’t wash with anything the first few times out. Didn’t hang up to dry, I laid it flat so there’s no weird stretching.While it is a little stretchy it’s not rubbery. Enough spandex to make it softer than a regular tee, but not so much it’s silky and you can fit another person in there (they tried).Purchased size Small for 5’3”, 90-lb. teen (skinny) and it surprisingly fits really well. See pics for measurements as I know those can be tough when buying online and the description itself says it may be off.It is NOT slimmed at the waist or fitted in any way. Straight, boxy cut.Lettering is good and seems like it will hold shape and not crack! That was my big worry for such a cheap shirt.Awesome message and decent quality, so definitely a recommended buy if you’re a Mom of happily gay and trans kids or are just a fabulous human yourself!

Wore to a T shirt expressions party and MPLS pride.  Received so many compliments.  The fit is on point and I love the add of spandex to keep the shirt form fitting.  The yellow is a bright happy yellow.  The words are printed on nicely and have survived the wash twice! Would definitely buy again!
Wore this shirt during Austin Texas 2018 SXSW. It was a hit! Dozens of people asked me where I got it, several photographer wanted to snap it. Perfect fit, color, everything.

I’m 5’8 155lbs, 38D & I ordered a Medium. The material is comfy & stretchy & it fit just the way I like it not too tight but not too lose either. If you’re looking for of a more loose type of like I recommend you go one size up. Other than that I’ve received so many compliments on it! I’m happy with it

I was pleasantly surprised with this shirt! I ordered it specifically for pictures because I believe in spreading positivity on my social media platforms. I thought I could wear it for a few pics & that would be it. But it’s actillay a soft stretchy material & seems to be made better than I expected for the price. I normally wear a large/XL shirt, 10/12 jeans. I’m 5’4” and weigh about 175. I ordered the XXL & it fits good by itself & since it’s stretchy I’m able to knot it too. If you’re thinking about getting this shirt, do it! For the price you can’t beat it!

Giving this shirt 5 stars, not only for the awesome quote on the front, lol. This shirt can be worn casually, maybe with a cute jacket, paired with jeans and some sunnies or, it could be worn out for a jog with shorts or yoga pants (my favorite attire). My point is.. this shirt is versatile and can be worn many different ways and the quality of the shirt is just as amazing. I wear it quite frequently and wash it just as much, so far it’s held up great and really looks like it can take a beating.

I would like to point out that it runs small. I read some of the other detailed reviews before purchased. That being said, it's the only drawback of the shirt. For the price the quality, softness, and lettering are excellent! I can't believe people would give this less than 5 stars for something that costs less than $11 bucks! Geeesus. Every Unicorn deserves to have such a positive message for themselves and in their closet! HIGHLY recommend this product.

The Quality of the Tee is excellent. It's your typical, no, it's actually even better than a typical woman's tee shirt bc it's so soft. It's  not to thick but nor is it transparent. The orange is more of a vibrant gold and the lettering is bold and black, large enough in block to get the message across w/out being obnoxious. I love the  Libtard Message (my words). BUT - folks, ignore that Size Chart and the "Child's T-shirt" description - both are incorrect.  I am a Small-Medium but ordered a Large & X-Large based upon info in the size chart.  The Large was like wearing a really short dress, didn't even bother trying on the X-Large.  Am exchanging them for 1 Medium and 1 Small.  A nice Shout-Out to UPS for throwing another delivery into a bad spot.  Day 18 in a row. A brown mailer with clothing inside was tossed inot a tar and leaf filled puddle so close to a public sidewalk that any passerby could have easily grabbed & go w/it.  Like FedEx, they don't care anymore about our hard earned money and refuse to leave parcels into  the safe places in which we instruct and they do it with impunity because shippers don't hold them accountable when items are arriving damaged or not arriving at all.  I will not bring filthy boxes or bags into my home any longer and am forced to open every order outside regardless of weight or weather.  My front deck, only 6' from an urban sidewalk is tiny but UPS can't be bothered to leave parcels in the clean safe place created for deliveries.  And with no vehicle I can't get to "Access Points".  They also never show up for Pick Ups anymore, but the thieves do.
Love the saying, not loving the material. There is no way it’s 95% cotton, it’s too stretchy to be mostly cotton. It is soft and comfortable, but not like 95% cotton. Too lazy to return.

I have a love/hate relationship with this shirt.First of all, I searched for months to find a shirt with this saying (and had decent reviews) and was excited when I found this one. It was a decent price and it seemed to have pretty good reviews. I bought this shirt specifically for a Kesha concert but thought that I would wear it for more than that.The size is smaller than expected (especially after you wash it) but I wore it anyways. It was a tighter fitting shirt so I stretched it out a little before I put it on. I would recommend ordering one to two sizes up depending on how tight or loose you like it to fit. I got SO many compliments at the concert and the more I wore it the stretchier ( more comfortable it became.I do have to tell you though, the quality of the shirt is great. The lettering has stayed on well (it's not peeling off at all). the vibrancy of the shirt is brighter than this picture shows (it is more of a sunshine yellow rather than mustard) which didn't bother me!I would like to see a V-neck option though. I would have probably bought that style instead.

Overall I'm pleased with these 2 tops I got and attached photos. I followed the sizing in the photos section and I would say that they are true to size according to that measurement system. I hate to put my size but since it could help, it's 38" (34D) and 34 waist and 38 at the hips. So even though I usually wear a small or medium size, I purchased size large in both shirts. The thing that I realized is that because these tops can stretch so much - as you can see in the photos, I could have got a size smaller and it would have been tighter on the chest which I wouldn't have minded but not been as large below the chest which might have been slightly cuter on me because they do look a bit large on me.The brown packages were so cute that they came in that I took a photo of them which I attached.The material feels great - like a soft cottony, stretchy rayon - it says on the tag 95% viscose (rayon) and 5% spandex. It says to wash low 30 degrees celsius (which is 86 degrees fahrenheit), mid-iron and hang to dry.The arm holes are good in that they are high enough that you don't see the regular bra that I was wearing.The reason for the 4 stars is that the reddish/burgandy and white one - you can see that the white stripe at the top by my neck is not perfectly horizontal and that's annoying because then all of the stripes go down to the left instead of running level straight across.It is interesting to note that although they are both sized large, the multi-colored one is a full one inch shorter than the reddish/burgundy and white striped one.Overall, they're super comfy and nice for the price! And they arrived in just a couple days - I love it when you don't have to wait long!

Ok so I was a bit confused on the sizes given. So I took a chance and purchased this in a size XXL. I tried it on and it fit perfect. I wear a bra the size of 38 D and I have no problems with this top and my size in bust area. I’m 5’2 and weigh around 180. So if you are my size and want to try this, I recommend it. Now this particular top is not as dark looking as it is in picture. I would say it’s more a red orange. But hey I still love it. I loved it so much that I have purchased almost every color it is available in. So I would recommend it.

Im really disappointed in this shirt. I thought with the 4.5 star ratings it would be great. Not so much. The killer for me was the cut of the top. It comes in at the shoulders so that both bra straps show. I guess that’s ok if you’re 16 but that’s not the look I want. It’s also not a flattering cut for larger chested women. It’s more square cut which is not ideal for a bust that is a D size. I think if you’re 16 & small chested, you may love this top. I had no issues with the smell or wrinkles because I always wash everything before I wear it anyway.

Love this top and am back to buy more. It’s soft and comfortable but well constructed. I’m 5’6” 155 and pear shaped. I got a medium and it fits perfectly. It’s long enough that I don’t have to worry about hanging out but not so long that it looks sloppy or is unflattering.

What a beautiful top! I ordered a size mesium and it fit perfectly.  I am 5'2" and my weight is 124 and it is not long or big on me.  The feel of the fabric is awesomely soft.  I ordered 2 and definitely will be ordering more.  A must have!

This is a nice top for the price. I got the purple and it's more like a deep wine/purple color. It's very nice material and it has somewhat of a light sheen to it. It can be dressed up or down,, depending on your mood. I normally wear a size large, and after reading the reviews, I ordered a 2xL. It fit perfect, and the only downside is that the length is long. I am 5'3", and it went past my butt. So, if you're taller, this will work well for you. Also, the armholes are just a big too big. I am going to wash and dry it in hopes of shrinking it down just a bit. Other than that, it is a beautiful and comfortable top. I may order other colors as well!Update...I washed and dried it in a regular cycle, and it still looks good. It did draw up from the length about 1 1/2 to 2 inches, which is what I needed because I'm 5'3". If you're taller and need that extra length, wash it on delicate cold water cycle and line-dry.

These tops are so cute!  Soft, flowy, and flattering.  The material is nicer than I expected and looks nice enough to wear to work under cardigans or blazers, but could also be a casual look too.  They are true to size, I am 5'4", 140 lbs and 34D chest, and the medium fit perfectly.  If you are between sizes and/or less busty, I would size down.  I bought two of these (the black/white stripe and the paisley), and the paisley is a good two inches longer than the stripe far some reason, but they fit the same in the shoulders and chest, just the length varied. Also, the arm holes aren't as big as they look in the picture, so no worries that your bra is going to show!
I ordered a 2X and it was the the size if a women's small. It's useless to me.
This is the perfect loose fitting business casual type shirt. Fits as expected. Wrinkle come out easily. Soft, stretchy, and very comfortable. Highly recomend.

The back of this shirt is sewn really awkwardly. Where the button closure is in the back, there is all this extra fabric that surrounds the opening, so when I put the shirt on, it takes ages to get it to sit right. Throughout the day, the extra bits kept sticking out. It's like the tag that won't sit down, except three times as big.

Can I tell you how much I HATE wearing an undershirt on a hot day?! It’s so frustrating to look to look for shirts in the store and have them all be translucent, too tight, too baggy, or have words on them. I saw these and figured I could send them back if I hated them. Well, I LOVE THEM. They are soft, they aren’t see through, and they fit amazingly well. I get complimented on them every time I wear them. Can’t beat the price either. I can even wear the white ones without an undershirt. I have several colors and will buy more.

I'm 5'5 about 118 lbs with a long torso and I generally wear a size small in tops. I ordered this in xsmall after looking at the photos and other reviews. 3.5 stars would be a more accurate rating but that wasn't an option so I bumped it up instead of down due to the nice fabric.The bad: It does my figure NO favors. I don't like tight t shirts but ones that just have a little bit of shape that hint at there being a female form underneath and not a cardboard box. Unfortunately this tshirt gives me a "shoebox" body shape. I've attached a photo of how it hangs naturally vs when I pull it back at the waist so show how my body is actually shaped. If it was just tapered in around the waist even a tad more I'd be much happier with the silhouette.The good : It's SUPER SOFT. Extremely comfortable. The sleeves are the perfect length in my opinion. The neckline is also perfect for a casual tshirt. Not constricting at all but not flashy either. Great length. I'm wearing a nude bra underneath in my photos and I could not see it at all through the shirt. It has a nice thickness, but as you can see at the bottom you can see my shorts through it so don't expect to be able to wear a black bra without noticing it.All in all I think I will keep these as "around the house" shirts since they are affordable and so comfortable. If you want a nice weight, soft, non-sheer tee and don't care about it having any shape whatsoever, then it's a great option.

Good quality shirt, true to size but clingier than I had expected. If you want to camouflage your stomach, try a different shirt. I like that the shirt is longer than most Ts, which pairs nicely with leggings. I'm 5'6, 190lbs with a gut and ordered the XL.The colors are kind of muted, with the 'purple' being more of a periwinkle in good lighting. The blue is your standard navy.The material is on the thicker side, so i plan on saving the shirts for the end of summer/fall. It'll pair well with items that will give belly coverage like a hoodie, jean jacket, or cardigan. I wouldn't order again, but I'm not considering a return either.

I absolutely love them. I had read a lot of reviews, but I was still genuinely surprised at the quality of the material as soon as I opened the package. The material has some weight to it - doesn't feel cheap, thin or flimsy at all, and is soft to the touch. Be warned though on hot humid days it'll really cling to you if you're sweating a lot.The fit is perfect for what I wanted. I ended up getting the xxl because I wanted it to be huge on me and it did not disappoint - it goes well past my hips and fits very loose. I wanted something that was comfortable to do some working out in and lounging in and these turned out to be perfect. The color is absolutely beautiful as well. As soon as I got these and tried them I had immediately ordered another set! I'm contemplating ordering another one too.For the quality and quantity the price is definitely worth it and I say its a really good deal. Buy these and I guarantee you won't regret it.

These shirts are extremely high quality for the price you pay. I’m 98lbs and 5’2 and the XS are slightly a little loose on me but I’m very petite so I run into that a lot. Still it’s not a problem and they feel and fit great! Very stretchy and they are a little long but I am short. Get these though! You won’t be sorry!

I needed a few nice basic tees to round out my wardrobe.  I ordered these and a 2 pack of the v-neck as well, based on reviews I went with a medium.  I'm 5'5 140 lbs and 34B and the medium fit loose and was just too boxy for me, I'm going to reorder in small to see if it's a more flattering and feminine fit.  The fabric is nice and light, not too spandex-y like workout tops.  As to the white being see through- I was wearing a nude bra and could not see it, however the waistband of my black pants was clearly visible through it, so if that sort of thing bugs you these probably wouldnot bee good for you. They were long (mid hip), but I personally like alittle extra coverage over my hips especially with skinny jeans. The fit of these really reminded me of Old Navy - the vanity sizing kings of retail.  I always get size small in tops there, if that helps anyone.

The material is soft and not thin - two important qualities I look for in a casual T.  I like the round-neck slightly better than the 'v' only because the latter tends to stretch in the collar a little.  I recommend sizing down if you have a smaller chest; otherwise, order the size you would normally get.

These shirts are a really great deal - much thicker and higher quality than I was expecting! There's even some stretch to the fabric. The length is slightly long - not quite enough to cover my butt like a tunic, but still a skosh longer than most of my other t-shirts, which might be nice for people with longer torsos (For reference, I'm a little over 5'4). As for sizing, I'm a pretty solid L-XL in shirts, but as I like my t-shirts to fit a little looser I went for an XL here and they fit just how I wanted, so I'd say these are true to size. I got the heart print/black striped set and the pattern is really cute! I'm already thinking of the outfits I'll create...All in all, these are really nice, high quality shirts and a steal for the price - thanks Amazon! You're killing the game.

These shirts are fantastic! The material is nice, and not see through (on the black and darker colors at least-I did not order white or lighter colors so I'm not sure about those). It's been so hard to find women's t-shirts anywhere that aren't too short, or see through, or boxy, or just plain cut weird so I am so glad to have come across these. I will be ordering more to replace all my old t-shirts I've been hanging onto for eons because I couldn't find anything I like anymore in stores. I wear an XL because I am busty, and these shirts in XL are perfect for me.

These shirts are AWESOME. Super soft comfortable fabric that is thick enough you can wear over light colored bra without it showing. Great length and just tailored enough to not fit as baggy as a dude's shirt. I have been on the hunt for a flattering decent basic t-shirt & I finally found it!

Covers my bra straps completely, even under the arm (while NOT cutting off my circulation under the arm). I like the length, I'm 5'6" and carry my weight in my belly so I was specifically looking for longer. The melon color is a little brighter than the picture and my immediate reaction when I opened it was hunter-orange! But I'm pleased with it now that I'm wearing it.

I expected this tank to flare a little at the bottom as it's pictured. That's exactly what I need. My hips, bottom, and thighs are much larger than my waist, and upper half. Its so hard to find tank tops that fit in the bust, shoulders and does not have HUGE arm holes while still bring wide enough for my hips and bottom. I though this tank would work. It doesn't, really. I mean, it's better than most. The arm holes are not atrociously large, and upper portion isn't ginormous. But there is no flaring going on at the bottom. The talk top is pretty much one width from top to bottom which means it pulls around my hips. So, if you're buying this because it appears looser toward the bottom with a bit of a swing/flare, don't. All that being said, it was cute under a long in front, open cardigan.
I'm a size 12 with a 38 C bust. The 1X I ordered is perfect! Comfortable, breathable material that's hard to wrinkle. Doesn't bunch around my armpits BUT is snug around my bust..
I did not like the way the material seemed to cling to the body.  I guess it fit OK, but I just couldn't get past the "body contouring" cling.  As usual, I gave both to my sister.

Clingy.Good material, however, it's not flattering in the least for a woman who's had 3 kids.I don't have much of a tummy, sized up 2 sizes, and this thing STILL clings like a loser blind date.I do not recommend at ALL.
This top fit as expected. The material is smooth to the touch and the color is vibrant. It definitely held shape after washing. Highly recommend.

I love this top and you can't beat the low cost.  The fabric is soft and smooth and good quality; doesn't cling or pick up static.  The fit is perfect and it is comfortable and cool.  I bought the black since it goes with most all of my clothes.  I do wish they had one in ivory.

I got several of these to use around the house on warm/hot days. It's very light and you could even use it as a sleep shirt or under semi-transparent tops. I got it larger than my usual size 3x, as I found this runs a bit small. I also got it in 4x, but that's too baggy. One size up should do it.

I love this tank top. It fits as expected with a bit of a flare below the bust that makes it comfortable to move in while exercising. I tossed it in the wash with a full load then into a medium heat dryer. It came out unwrinkled and looking like new, so I'm a happy camper. It feels thin but in a good way. It is not see through! It looked like a regular shirt, so I even wore it to my office untucked over cropped summer trousers with a little jacket and realized that I can use it as a layering piece on work trips when I want to haul fewer clothes. Wear it to the office layered then pull on exercise shorts to workout, and this top can do double duty!
It's OK I'm sure if I read what the material was made of... I usually do it's like a polyester top it's comfortable but I'm not fond of polyester

My daughter and I purchased 6 of these tops for our 5 week trip to India. We wore them constantly and washed them almost daily. After hand washing and wringing, we simply hung them on a hanger and they dried quickly and wrinkle-free. Even the ribbing around the neck kept it's shape! They also breathed well and were so comfortable to wear. We were originally going to pitch them after we got back but they are still in such great shape and so comfortable I think we will be wearing them for a long time.

I was excited to receive these shirts because I needed new plain t-shirts for summer. I read other reviews because I wasn't sure what size to order and the size chart said it was for reference only. (The size chart is way off.) I'm 5' 3" and 190 lbs. so I'm kind of short and stout, but I have an hourglass figure. I like my tops a little loose fitting, but not really loose. I ordered XL because other reviewers around my size said it worked for them but these are pretty loose on me. If I had tried these on in a store, I probably would have bought large instead. However, I'm happy with the quality of the shirts and I'm too lazy to exchange them. They're pretty stretchy and I like that they're a bit long. I hope they shrink a little in the wash though.The only reason I took a star away is because if the fits/sizes are all the same across your brand (Amazon), provide an accurate size chart so we don't have to guess.

Love these basic T-shirt! I will be ordering more colors. The fabric is super soft and no scratchy tag. The V at the neck is the perfect length and the shirt overall has a great length. It has just the right fit so it’s not like wearing a boxy men’s undershirt but not so fitted to make me uncomfortable about my muffin top (fat hanging over top of my pants). The sleeves are nicely fitted giving the shirt class.  I am 5’4” 140lbs and purchased Medium. I might have fit into a small but have broad shoulders (and thick waistline) and prefer a little room.

Ordered the 2-pack of white in size Small based off reviews and that is the correct size. I'm 5'6", 34B bra size, size 4-6 in shirts (usually a small), 28" waist (usually 28 in premium denim and size 6 in pants), and somewhat pear shaped due to having narrower shoulders and wider hips.I would give this shirt 5 stars for quality of the material at this price point. I love a modal blend and this shirt is soft and smooth, but not tissue thin. You do need to wear a nude bra with the white, but the material has a nice heft to it.The V neckline is moderate and there's no danger of cleavage or full coverage bras peeking above the neckline for me.I took off a star because this shirt is extremely long. You can see in one of the photos on the model that it's almost covering her behind. I would have to stretch the shirt to actually cover mine, but this definitely hits well below the start of the hip and I have an average length torso. I would say that this shirt fits like it was made as a tall. Ladies that are 5'4" or shorter should be prepared for this to be tunic length.You can sort of tell from the photos that this shirt is cut to taper in slightly at the waist and then flare out across the hips. I find this flattering and I would say it fits in the bust and waist as shown in photos. If you have slim/narrow hips, then this shirt won't fit right on you.I purchased these shirts to be able to tuck into pants and they are certainly easy to do that since they are so long, although the shirt does end quite a bit beneath my pants' waistline.Note: I could have sized down to an X-Small and still have the shirt fit in the shoulders, bust, and waist, but I'm confident it would be very tight around the hips. I'm ok with it being only slightly fitted (as shown on model) and staying with the Small. But if you're hoping for a more fitted look, then this shirt isn't for you.UPDATE September 25, 2018: I wore these shirts tucked into belted jeans and pants throughout the summer and came to really love them. Fit stayed the same after numerous washes (I was on cold and dry on low heat). The material did not pill, but it's not as smooth and perfect as when I first purchased, which is to be expected. I still think the shirt should be slightly shorter, but I've come to like how I can tuck these shirts into any rise of pants. I'll be purchasing more of these 2-packs in the spring for next summer.

I love that you cannot see through this white shirt. It’s is a fairly thicker material. I am 5’5” and weigh 185. I purchased a large hoping it would fit. And it surpassed my expectations. As you can see in the picture I probably could have sized down but because it is a somewhat stretch materia, I’m glad I didn’t. It is a bit long as well so you could pair it with leggings to cover the bum and a sweater.

Great quality, not see through.  I got the small and it fits perfectly-not too tight and not too loose.  I'm 5'8 143lbs, waist 28".  Neckline is perfect, not too deep.  The shirt is a little too long, in my opinion, and i'll probably be take the bottom 3 inches off.  Still a perfect shirt though, I will be ordering more.
Perfect fit!!! I’m a 38DD, 5’10” size 16 woman and the XL is true to size. Not to mention did not shrink in the drier. I’m ordering more!!

Purchased XL. I usually go with L or XL. Size 12. I'm 5'9", 175 lbs, 38DD.  Loose fit around middle (which I wanted). A tiny bit tight around bust.  Probably won't throw in dryer.  Nice fabric weight.  Not too heavy or too thin.

This shirt made of a good, thick, stretchy, opaque material. I purchased in white, size small. If it helps, I am 5’4” 130#, 32dd. If you are looking for a men’s style, relaxed tee, like I was, this is not it. This has more of a woman’s cut to it, it is loose around my midsection and hits just below the hips, covers the midsection completely. Great shirt for the price.

I am a 32 year old SAHM with two active little ones. I am 5’7” tall, 135 lbs with a long torso. I purchased a size MEDIUM. These tees are perfect for my lifestyle! I love the look, feel, and durability of these tees. They can withstand a very active 12-hour day that involves heavy lifting (picking up a long, wiggle-worm baby boy multiple times) and various physical activities (chasing around an energetic toddler). I’ve washed them twice and they’ve held up nicely. I highly recommend these tees!!

I didn't buy any hooded towels when I had my baby because I thought regular towels would be fine. Nope. It was always tough getting her head dry and quickly covering her body before she realized she was out of the warm bath and in the cold air. I wanted to get some towels for her, and I am so happy with this towel! I got the unicorn towel, and my 2 month old daughter loved it! She didn't cry when she got out of the bath and was smiling instead. This towel is perfect. Also, I washed and dried it immediately, and the unicorn face kept its shape. The only negative thing I'd say about it is that it came in too much packaging. A bow, lots of plastic connectors to keep it folded, and a hanger. Too many things to remove. But all in all, it's great for the price.
