I love these towels. First of all the price is great and the quality is wonderful. The stitching is consistent and finished well. The towel is soft and absorbent. Who doesn't love a little bundle of joy with an animal head. I use these as a topper for diaper cakes. I will be purchasing other animals in the future.
Great towel!!! It's big enough it will last a long time for baby to use
Those are just too cute!!! Love them!!

We bought this to use for our baby boy. It’s very cute, but I knocked one star off because it feels a little flimsy and too thin. We have a couple of other baby towels that were gifted to us that are a little thicker and softer, which are preferable when taking baby out of the bath so he feels warm and secure right away.My hope was that this towel would last our baby through his toddler years but I don’t anticipate it holding up for that long.The price is decent, but when you think about the nice thick bath towels you can buy for a comparable amount, I’m not sure if it’s worth it or not. This is a really silly and minor detail, but when the hood is turned inside out (which we do before putting baby in it so we can just flip the hood over his head) the bear’s face looks really creepy because the embroidery is not covered.
so soft and cute! I  have washed it but haven't used it yet. It is hanging on my daughters nursery door waiting for her arrival!

I LOVE these towels!! They are very thick (but soft) and the perfect size to wrap up my baby after his bath. (I have a 10-month-old). I also love that they have a hood, of course, to keep baby's head warm. I've used other towels for my son before, but they were all super thin and too small compared to these. I currently have the giraffe, elephant, and the cute little fox. I think these towels will still be great even when my son is a toddler. You can't find these types of towels at another store for the same price. I would definitely recommend these to any other mom for their baby.
Ordered for a baby shower, and its just like the picture

I was trying to find some extra cute items for a friend who is expecting her 4th boy and this was an item that I thought was cuter than average.  I was worried about the quality but it is well made, no loose threads and the material is not rough.  It is fairly thick and soft and was very well received by my friend.  Shipping was quick as well.
Nice size towel, cute, good absorbency!
Well made design and is very cute! Plus sizes are  pretty close to accurate. And the quality is nice for the price you'll pay. I would buy again!🤗🤗🤗

I got this shirt in size X-Large. Although the chart says it's for 41.3" bust, my bust is 42-1/2" (for reference, I'm 5'3", weight 185 pounds and normally take a large or x-large shirt in American sizes) and was comfortable in that area. The body shapes to an A-line, so it's looser around the middle and very forgiving if you need room around the stomach and hips. I previously bought an XX-Large in another color and it was HUGE, but I kept it to wear as a pajama shirt...the X-Large is perfect for me and goes great with jeans or even a pair of black dress pants.The shirt came out of the package a bit wrinkled, but that was easily remedied by using a hand-held garment steamer. I would recommend this shirt to my friends, but unlike similar shirts of Asian sizes which usually correspond to American "Junior" sizes, this one runs more true to American  "Misses" sizes.

I had a really hard time deciding what size to order. I am 5'9 145'ish and I ended up getting a large based on some of the reviews I read. When I pulled it out of the bag it looks HUGE! When I put it on it was okay. I would have been fine with medium also.  The print is adorable. I feel like this runs true to size. If you normally wear a medium, get a medium. I am not planning to send this back, I will be able to shrink it some! Very cute!

I’m normally a small, and ordered a small. It is slightly right in the sleeves, but I have chubby arms. I’m 5’, 143, and busty. I found this top top be exactly as described. The stitching is clean and the seams lay nice and flat. I like the color contrast, which adds a bit more variety. The floral pattern is only on the front, while the color and stripes are on the back. It has a curved hemline, which is way more flattering than a straight one. The shirt is also flowy, and gives a good bit of room in the waist area if you are self-conscience there. I’m not sure this would be long enough to wear with leggings, but you could probably size up to have it longer. The fabric is thin, but really soft and not see-through with a nude bra.

Super adorable top! Ordered a large and Wore on a cruise, tied a knot on the side as I wasn’t a fan of how long the front was but as soon as I put the knot in I was good to go and super happy with my outfit! I am 5’6 198lbs and wear a size 12-14.
I ordered 1 size up for a looser fit. At 5'1 & around 205 pounds, I ordered a 2XL. This is now my favorite tank too i own!

It fits perfect. I love the length and fit. Not tight, loose fitting. I'm 5'3 220lbs and I got a large and fits extremely well. Long enough to cover my butt and would be cute with leggings, shorts, or skinny jeans. Would highly recommend.

I have had this shirt for about a month, now, and have washed it about 4x. It has held up well. Although, keep in mind that I have only air-dried it. I am 5'11'' size 10, so I ordered a large. I love that this shirt is long and fits somewhat loosely, without clinging anywhere. Also, I live where the temp. routinely reaches 110F+ and this top has kept me cool and almost has a wicking quality to it. To top it off, I have received multiple compliments while wearing it, so it's definitely a keeper!

I am very happy with this shirt. I got the yellow one and paired it with black leggings. Very cute summery look, even my hubby complimented it. I am 5 ft tall, and wear a size 38 F bra, and I just had a baby 2 weeks ago, so I'm on the heavier side, about 170 pounds. The shirt is very flattering, and the loose fit hides my post baby belly. The material is very soft and while it is thin, it is not see through.

Beautiful shirt I ordered a 2X in pink.If it helps, I'm 5'2, 235lbs and my measurements are 45" bust, 41" waist & 47" in hipsVery loose fitting so it runs large. The material is very soft and comfortable.

Toms are a tight fit until the shoe conforms  to your individual foot shape. I recommend buying your actual size not downsize or upsize.  Even with horrible bunions the shoes will work. Just give yourself a couple days and you will love the fit.  I can wear Toms shoes and foot problems go unnoticed. If you are a person that can’t wear just anything and waisted money for comfort and style, you just might have found a solution.  Try Toms

I have had these shoes for less than a month and they are absolutely destroyed!  I guess the chambray fabric just isn't sturdy enough!  The shoes are super comfortable but I'm going to go back to canvas TOMS from now on.  Incredibly disappointing!

I was always curious about Toms shoes. So many people I saw had them and after a few years, I finally decided to join the bandwagon. I chose a fairly neutral blue to match much of my wardrobe. As previous reviewers have said, I agree that they are (oddly enough) very comfortable for quite a simplistic shoe. The first day I wore them, however, I did get red marks on the top of my foot (from the “triangle” section), but I wore them again the next day and didn’t. I figured I just needed to loosen them up a bit. Overall, I’m pleased with my purchase. I wouldn’t buy them full price, but I’d wait for another deal.

I have never tried TOMS brand shoes before, but I'm always on the lookout for comfy, stylish walking shoes. While I like ballet flats, sizing and fit is always tricky with my narrow, in-between sizes feet.I really liked the feel of these shoes, and they seem like they would be really comfortable, however they're too big. Depending on the shoe brand, I usually fall between a 7 and 7.5. Some reviews said they ran small, so I ordered these in 7.5. I probably should have gotten a 7. Perhaps the sizing varies across the different models and materials. I like these enough that I will try to exchange for the right size.I ordered the Rose Gold Crochet Glitter pair, but I would call it more of a champagne than rose gold. It's pretty close to the product photo.

I love the look of these shoes, but the quality is absolutely terrible. These shoes squeak like crazy and it's really obnoxious. I have two pairs, unfortunately, because I thought they would last. One is a 13 and one is a 12 (in black) as I am right in between sizes. Therefore, I can rule out it being a 'fit' issue. It's definitely the shoe. Additionally, I've worn these maybe 7 times and had them for just over a month and the material is already tearing. It'll be another couple of wears before they are complete trash. The seller should do the right thing and replace them.

So these came too small, different sole, different.... everything... yet they looked like Toms. I wondered if they were fakes. But maybe I just had to break them in again? I stared at the box, it looked legit, even though my old ones didn't come in a box (got them at Urban Outfitters). Something was just off, and too much of it. Then I went online and read the reviews... my hunch was right. These are fakes. I don't know how they were able to manipulate their reviews or how they're still on here, but I'm so glad I caught this in time!

I ordered the Ash Women's classic Toms which as pictured have the animal inside print. I have owned these shoes before and they are more expensive than the Gray color pictured with the striped interior print. I paid the higher price, but received in the mail the gray shoes with the interior stripes exactly like the picture when you click on gray as your color. They had a tag attached that said Ash, but this was not what was pictured when purchased. Very disappointed as my previous ash shoes were my favorite Toms, but I wore them so often that they had a hole in them.

I really wanted these to work as I've been looking for a slip on shoe for casual use. The denim looks good and it was a lot softer than I expected which made them so comfortable. Unfortunately, I'm right between sizes 12 and 13 for Tom's which is right where they stop making half sizes. I even tried a few other standard loafers from Tom's and have the same issue which is a pity. Their 12's feel like they're pinching too much and I can feel the edges of the sole under the sides of my feet. 13's go on and off too easily so they'll just be loose slippers when they break in. If there was a 12.5, these would get a 5 star. I did like them besides sizing.If you're like me and have slightly wider feet or fall between sizes, check out Tom's Avalon Sneakers. They're similarly priced, look somewhat similar but the main difference is they'll have a thicker and slightly wider base which will be more forgiving size wise and honestly a bit more comfortable walking in them. I fit into a size 12 so size down if you're in between.If someone is playing detective on my reviews, I am copying this review to the other Tom's that I tried on.

I love my TOMS! They run a little small so I had to return the original size I bought for a bigger size, but these fit great (I’m usually a 9 but had to buy a 10 in those shoes). At first they feel a little tight, especially around the toe box, but after using them a few times they stretch out and fit your feet better. These are my go to goes to go out and about like grocery shopping, etc. They are comfortable and love that I can just slip them on without having to tie any laces. Recommended!

I once wore toms and had about five pairs at one time about 4-5 years ago and although I normally wore a 7.5 shoe size, I would get a 6.5 in TOMS because at that time they ran big. With that being said, after reading the reviews and understanding that over time the sizing may have changed... I purchased my true to size, size in these TOMS and got a 7.5. They were a little hard to get my heel into the first time (without socks) but with “no show” socks my feet slipped right into them and they had a nice tight feel. I know TOMS stretch out over time so I liked the snugness of them and comfort in knowing they weren’t going to end up being too big after a little stretching out. I wore them an entire day and they already feel like they’re forming to my feet for an ultimate better fit.For reference,I true to size wear a 7.5 in vans, most nikes, boots, etc. I do have slightly wider feet and with some shoes like sandals or ones I know will have a snugger or slimmer fit I bump up to an 8. Hope this helps as this was the type of review I needed when debating on what size to get.

I purchased this shirt to go with loose fitting pants that I owned to wear for the local renaissance festival. I was looking for a loose fitting shirt with a lower neckline to wear with a bodice that I intended on getting at the festival. This shirt was perfect! I purchased a size small and it fit me really well. If you don't want it too loose, definitely size down and reference the size chart in the photos that the shop provides. They helped me. The best part of the shirt was the quality for the price. It was very soft and the button were sturdy. It's a lighter material and definitely kept me cool in the Florida heat. I would definitely recommend!

I would suggest to go down a size unless you have bigger arms. The arms are snug stretchy fabric but the body is kind of maternityish(see photos) it is nicely made and fabric nice (thin stretchy nice feel) but I didn’t care for how it cut up on the sides.  I am 5’3 weigh 170 with smaller shoulders/bigger hips.  I ordered my typical size- large but think the med might be better for me in the stomach area.Hope this helps

Nice material and a very flattering cut. I bought the short sleeve in dark brown. Its extremely comfortable and very flowy in the front. It's a great length to wear with Jean's or leggings. I might buy another with long sleeves.

Cute top to lounge around in on cooler nights. Material is very soft but I wouldn’t recommend this top in a light color because it’s thin. If you hold it up in the light you can see through it. I’m a 38C and the medium fits perfectly.

This top is very pretty. The actual color was slightly lighter than the picture, but not enough of a difference to change my opinion. The fabric is soft, yet it feels very sturdy, I think it will last a good while. I washed it for the first time last night and the color didn't run, which is good because I didn't think about that before washing! The buttons seem stitched securely, and I found no problems with construction or fabric integrity. For size reference, I am 5'0", 38C bra, 40" hip, 36" waist. I could have easily fit into the medium, but the large is comfortably loose, not too loose, the way I typically like to wear my tunics. It covers enough that I felt comfortable wearing jeggings with it, but not regular leggings, about an inch below the crotch line and hip line. It pairs very well with dark colored jeggings and cowgirl boots. I love the detail at the top with the yoke sitting higher on the bust. It helps hide bulges lower down (*ahem* waistline) and still flows wonderfully. It helped keep me cool on a hot Southern day this weekend. I'll definitely be ordering other colors, and ordering the long sleeve.

This shirt is amazing! Perfect for post baby body, or anyone wanting to camouflage a little love handle/belly action. It’s got a really flattering neckline, then softly flows away from the sides. Nothing too flows, doesn’t look maternity at all. I am 5’2”, 160 and medium is perfect. I am muscular, with muscular arms, and the sleeves are great.However, all that said, my shirt came and I tried on quickly, hand washed and line dried, and wore the next day. Soon after putting it on I noticed a small fabric hole right on the boob. I emailed the company 4 days ago with no response. I have already worn and washed it, so I don’t feel right returning it through amazon, but the company did zero to help. So, if you do order this, inspect it before you settle on it.UPDATE: CS got back to me and resent a new top. I plan on ordering a couple more colors, since I love the fit so much.

Amazing customer service! Love this top.  I’ve purchased 3-4 different colors.  Quick refunds when the color wasn’t what was expected.  The light brown was closer to a beige and the navy had a purple hue to it so it’s not a typical navy.  The top is silky soft, light weight and comfortable.  Now my sister has purchased 2 as well.  Washes very nice, stays wrinkle free while wearing and the colors I’ve purchased are not see through

Very happy with it, pretty, soft. This shirt is so comfortable, and the fit is perfect. It’s long enough to cover the belly. Front pleats are flattering with a nice drape. The material gives it a greater casual feel and makes it perfect for leggings!
Sizes must be Asian sizes, not even close.

I love this top!!! I have a hard time finding loose, flowy tops that aren't plain Ts. This top is soft, comfy, the color is awesome, and after washing is still soft and nice! I ordered one size larger in case there was any shrinkage, but there wasn't at all. Will definitely order more!!

I am currently 3 weeks postpartum, 5'5", approx 145-150lbs, 34C-D bra size. I wanted long layering tanks that have enough stretch for me to pull down from the top to allow me to breastfeed easily. I initially ordered size Medium thinking I would want a snug fit, but I found it was too snug for my liking and a little shorter than I was hoping. I actually benefited from a mistake where one of the tanks was a Large incorrectly tagged as a Medium, so I knew I liked the fit better! I returned the initial order, reordered size Large, and I absolutely love them! I've already worn them numerous times. They have good stretch, which allows me to nurse easily, and they're just the right length for me. The bottom hem falls right below the fullest part of my hips, just covering my butt.

Buyer beware. I'm really dissapointed.  I had purchased the 4 pack, all black and loved everything about them. The length, material, everything! So I ordered another 4 pack of different colors and same size. But I got a completely different product. The brand, material and length are completely different than my original order, from the same company.

These tank tops go with everything. They can be worn under shirts, for working out, or as pajamas. They are a soft and comfortable material, and they're also very stretchy and long. I got a medium. I am 5'10, 145lbs, and have a 28" waist, 35" hip, and 36D chest. I also love that the straps are adjustable. It can be hard to find tank tops for me because usually they are not long enough, and they have built-in bras, which annoy me since a lot of times the bra doesn't come down far enough to cover my chest. These tanks are very long and there is no shelf bra. I will definitely be ordering more in other colors, and I might try getting a small instead of a medium, too.

Horrible.  This is the worst cami I have ever purchased.  First, I searched for cami with built in bra and this was the first item.  I figured it was because it matched my search criteria.  I opened these the morning after they arrived because I was tired and too much to do before bed.  Upon discovering they did not have a built in bra I was going to return them except they only accepted returns on the DAY OF ARRIVAL.  Okay, so I figure I will suck it up and just wear these for bed.  The first one I open the shoulder strap comes completely apart because it ISN"T EVEN SEWN.  Total garbage.  The absolute worst.  It will be long time before I order any clothing from amazon again.

I ordered these 1 year ago from two sellers, Absolute Accessory and ClothingAve. in size XL. Both sellers sent the Active Basics brands and they are amazing.  Now I tried to order size L and M from seller ClothingAve. and they sent brands LaVictoria (size L) and Sofra (size M.) Both are 95% cotton, 5% spandex. But they feel very thin and scratchy. Definitely not the quality that the Active Basics brand is. They are also very tight fitting, like 1 size smaller. (For reference, I usually wear a M or L in tops depending on brand.) Appropriate for wearing to bed or underneath another shirt,  but I don't think I could wear them on their own. The LaVictoria camis are very long, which I prefer.  But then the straps are sewn on backwards so the adjustment part is on the front.  Don't like the look.  The Sofra camis are 4-5 inches shorter in length. So I am not happy with that either.  I'm keeping them cuz it's not worth my hassle trying to return. But I am not happy that I did not receive what was advertised, and I did not receive what I ordered.

From reading reviews I ordered a size 1X.  I'm 9 months pregnant due on June 14, 2017.  Bust size is 39", since I have no waist at the moment I measured the fullest part of m belly which is 44 1/2", hips 44 1/2" and I'm probably 175 if not closer to 180 lbs and I'm 5'5.  I thought this would help someone else who is interested in these camisoles as they are very comfortable and fit perfectly for me.  Not too tight but fit to my shape.  I expect my bust to get a little bigger once I've established breastfeeding which will be perfect because there's room to grow.  They cover my belly perfectly and they go just above my behind.  I have a little gather as I don't want to pull them straight down, but I'm sure they could go a little further.  The material is really comfortable and seems like a good quality.  I've not washed them yet, but if anything negative happens in the future, like broken strap or messed up in the wash, I will post again.  I will be buying more of these in the future, smaller size as my belly shrinks.  I hope this review is helpful to someone out there as I took a chance on ordering a 1X.  Most people only list how much they weigh, but that's not enough because we all carry our weight differently.  Thank you to those that did post their reviews as it helped me in choosing this product.

This is the third time I have ordered these. The first time they were AMAZING! Great quality and fit. I loved them so much, I ordered another pack to have on hand when the first batch wore out. By the time I opened the second order to use, it was too late to return. I could immediately tell the fabric was different.  The brand was the same. Upon donning, they were ill fitting and I could feel the straps were sewed in at awkward places so didn't stay on shoulders. After one wear each, the straps came apart altogether.  Probably a year later, I decided to give them one more shot in hopes I would get some like the first order. Not only are these an entirely different brand but are even cheaper, thinner material and are very small. Straps are better positioned but not at all like the first order.

I ordered the 4 pack of black in 2xl.  After washing all 4, I wore 2 with no issues.  When I went to grab one,  I thought that it had shrunk, however I looked and one of the tank tops was a size SMALL? just a little off from a 2xl..... Then today, I wore the 4th tank top and BOTH straps broke.  It's like the stitching on this particular tank top was poor quality.  I am only giving this a 3 because luckily I have had no issues with 2 out of the 4.

I love these camis! I am 5'10" tall and finding a cami that is long is a BOUNS! The fabric is soft. I really  like the satiny edge on the blue one( I kinda wish all were trimmed this way ). I have another pack on the way because I really like these. I got the medium. The straps do have the adjusters on them if you need that. Usually I use these as sleep ware, but occasionally I will wear them under a sweater or a button up and for yoga. I do think I will be ordering another pack next payday long camis are few and far between when you find 'em, buy 'em!The company was fast to respond to my inquiry. Stephanie was very helpful.

I bought a mixed pack of blue, purple, black and "emerald" green. The green ended up being a super neon green, so I probably won't wear it, except maybe to sleep in.Other than that, these tank tops are fantastic. I'm 5'9 and very hourglass shaped, and no camis ever fit me without rolling, sliding and constantly needing to be adjusted, but these do. If anything, they're probably a little too long for most people, but I love them. I can tuck them in and they'll stay that way, under skirts, jeans, whatever. I'll definitely be buying more.

Super cute shirt! The waffle knit is really soft and comfy not scratchy at all. I ordered my size a large (I’m 5’9”) and it fit like expected. It would be long enough to wear with leggings if you were a little shorter or sized up for a little longer or looser fit. The arm holes are not loose and don’t show any bra. I would say it would be best to wear a white/nude bra or tank top under as the material is a tad see through. Would be so cute with shorts, jeans, or leggings.
Love this tank for Spring/Summer. Material is really soft and breathable. The white was pretty see through but the pink/mauve wasn’t. Got a lot of compliments. I’m 5’ 1” DD, wearing a small.

This tank top is a must have! I read the reviews and checked the size chart and decided to go with my normal size Large ( I am 5'6" and a US12), and it fit perfectly. No need to size up! It was looser in the tummy area and long (hit about 2-3 in past my hipbones) but the arm holes weren't so loose my bra showed. It wasn't sheer but a dark color bra could possibly show through. I'm going to order one in every color! I may order an XL in another color just to wear with leggings. The only thing to note is that I ordered the red color and what actually arrived was a very dusty purple/mauve color, but that's not a deal-breaker at all. I actually like the color MORE than the one that was pictured.
The material is very soft and lightweight and I love the texture. It’s perfect for any occasion, casual with shorts or dressy. The fit is perfect, accurate for your size.
Very nice quality. I got a xl. I’m 5”8 175 36DD and I could have sized down to a large too. I’ll buy this in other colors for sure!!

Okay, let's get the obvious out of the way first. The tank top color is not red. Depending on the light, it's either dusty brick or burnt mauve. Based on another review I expected it and don't mind, but I do think the listing should be updated to accurately show and label the available colors. Otherwise, this twist knot waffle tank is so comfortable and looks cute with shorts and jeans. I have it in black also and personally, I couldn't commit to purchasing any of the light colors because the pattern allows for peeks skin through the fabric. The tank top is light on a hot day and I can see myself still wearing it into the fall under a cozy sweater. It should be noted that I haven't washed either of my tanks yet so I don't know how it holds up with laundering. I'm probably going to wash on delicate and flat dry rather than risk damage.
Love this top so much, very classic and the fit is perfect. I'm 5'6" around 170lbs and ordered a large.I plan on buying this in every color!

So I always look at reviews before I buy something off of Amazon. And I really like when people say their sizes and whatnot. Well it didn't work out with this shirt at all. I am 5'8" and about 150 pounds give or take and I ordered a large. This shirt was soooo big on me. I was literally swimming in this shirt. Besides the shirt not fitting, I love the style and feeling of the shirt. If this shirt actually would fit, I think I would really like this shirt. Hopefully this review will help you with your purchase!

I would say if you're buying this shirt it is fitted, not loose fitting.  In the picture it looks like it was sized up a size.  I am a XL and I bought the XXL and it fits but it's not as loose as shown.  But the color and fabric is great.  I'll be buying more in different colors.  The fabric is thick and soft and you think you'd be too hot in it but you're not.  The front knot also came higher for me and I'm only 5'5 so if you're tall you might end up with a shirt that just meets the top of your pants in the front.
This is very soft material, but a bit see through.  It runs way too big for me.  Style is cute, but a small fits like a medium on me.

OK, folks, I don't often leave product reviews, but the moment these amazing sandals/flip-flops were placed upon my feet, I swear I could hear my little tootsies SING!  I have plantar fasciitis, and so I need supportive, cushy footwear. My feet are also a bit on the chubby side, so I can't wear "normal" sandals because they are always too tight...which means I normally just have to settle for flip flops, which are not always the perfect match for the outfit and situation that I am in.These sandals are perfect! They look dressy enough to wear with a nice summery dress out to dinner, and yet not so stuffy that I couldn't throw on a pair of short and a t-shirt and head out to the park.  They are a DREAM to walk in!!! The "strap" material is stretchy enough to accommodate moving around and walking, and yet supportive enough to feel like these shoes won't fall off. They do give a very slight tug back into place, if that makes sense. The cushion is perfectly squishy without being too squishy - just enough squish for my plantar fasciitis to be happy walking in these all day. No, seriously...ALL DAY.I am currently wondering what is the appropriate amount of time to wait before I tell my husband that I'm buying several more pair in other colors? Psssshaw, I'm going to just go ahead and do it!! You should, too!I normally wear a 9 1/2 to a 10, depending on the brand of shoe. I got these in a 10 and they fit me perfectly with a little room past my toes and behind my heel, but that's how I like it. Sometimes when I'm sitting or walking in just the right way, my feet always tend to shift in whatever shoes I am wearing, so I like a little room to move around.p.s. I hate it when people leave reviews saying they got their stuff for free or discounted (and, gosh, why aren't companies offering ME free stuff or discounts, eh?!)...so I'm happy to report that I am a REAL person who paid full price for these. Worth every penny!

Ok, I put these sandals through the ultimate test: Disney World.I'm overweight, and I don;t like closed shoes - my feet don't swell and aren't deformed or anything like that, I'm just accustomed to wearing sandals. So I started off in Magic Kingdom w/ my Addidas sneakers. This lasted a full two hours. I switched into my yoga slings and began to walk... and walk...and walk some more...and we walked until our backs were screaming. However, my feet were happy. Tired and achy, but NOTHING like what the sneakers or regular sandals do to your feet when you risk taking them to theme parks. That was day 1. Day 2, we went to Epcot - I wore my sandals ALL DAY LONG. I was the HAPPIEST in my group. No pain, walking was a breeze, and the head didn't make your feet sweat as much with these on. I wore them again on Day3...Ya'll, I've NEVER worn sandals to ANY theme park out fear of that burning sensation after walking too much. These are legit. I literally wear them for my daily walks, to the office, for errands, everything. I bought them in black and the sandy beige color and I will buy them in other funky colors as well. These are amazing! I cannot recommend these enough!

I've been trying to avoid dropping $30 on a pair of flip flops but after searching tirelessly for something both cheap and comfortable with no luck, I finally broke down and got some yoga slings.  Ordered the same pattern in 2 different colors and absolutely love them!  I would prefer a little more arch support but overall they are very comfortable and super cute.I pretty consistently wear an 8.5 and after reading all of the reviews, I decided to order up and get a 9.  They seemed a bit big but I was leaving for the beach in just a few days, so I quickly ordered them in 8 and planned to return whichever didn't fit.  I snapped this photo of an 8 (back/left) and a 9 (front/right) in the hopes that it might help the other in-betweeners.  Maybe it's just because I have short toes but there was just too much extra space at the front for my liking.  The 8's fit great and the 9's were returned!

I racked up a whopping 68 miles across six park days in Disney World wearing only these flip flops. My steps are often missed while I'm pushing the stroller so I'm sure there were even more miles than that. I always wear broken-in tennis shoes on big walking days and packed them with me just in case these flip flops didn't work out, but I never needed them! My feet normally get very hot and swell and I really hate wearing tennis shoes. I never wore these before our trip and was so happy there was no break in period at all. It even rained for hours on end one day and my feet were still comfortable in these. I just dried them with the hotel hairdryer that evening and wore them again the next day. The only time they were even the slightest bit uncomfortable was when my preschooler accidentally spilled orange juice on my feet and the piece between my toes got a tad sticky and rubbed. Fortunately it never caused a blister and once the fabric dried out, it was comfortable again. I would highly, highly, highly recommend these! These are going to be my forever disney, zoo day, travel, etc. shoes!! As for fit, I felt like these were a bit big. I usually wear a 7.5. I have pretty wide feet, so sometimes I need an 8 just because I need the width. I ordered an 8 in these since a half size wasn't available. The 8 felt fine enough to keep but if i order another pair, I believe I will go down to a 7.

First off, if you're reading reviews of this product because you're considering purchasing a pair -- I can easily say just do it. These are great, comfy and adorable shoes.But I'm going to go against popular opinion here regarding going up or down for half-size people. I'm an 8.5 in everything -- boots, flats, pumps, trainers. Against my better judgement -- I followed the advice of other reviewers and went with a size down.When the shoes arrived I knew instantly that I loved them. However -- I had mixed feelings about the size. They fit -- but they *just* fit. When it comes to flip-flops I like a bit of overhand at the heel. Call it an OCD or whatever, but i like the shoe to extend ever-so-slightly from my heel.So I wrestled with what to do -- conquer my obsessive attitude and DEAL WITH IT or get a size 9.Not only did I buy a size 9 -- I bought two pairs in size 9.  AND they are PERFECT.I'm not returning the original size 8, either. I'm going to gift them to my sister who wears a 7.5 -- I just know she'll love these too.
I have 4 pair of Sanuk Yoga Slings. I love them that much!! I normally wear a 7 1/2 shoe and I took the advice to order a size 8 since they don't come in half sizes. Good advice!! They fit perfectly!

I am normally a 7 1/2 in sandals. I ordered a 7 and hey fit perfectly.These shoes are so comfortable and I wear them everywhere.Work, class, shorts, dress.I adore them. I plan on buying a few more in different colors and patterns.

I love, love, love these! I was worried about how they'd look on my feet, I have chubby feet, but they feet like a glove. They are great. And oohh so comfortable! I originally bought them as beach shoes but, I'm not gonna lie, I'm gonna wear them all the time!

Love these sandals.  I am annoyingly someone with hyperhidrosis so my feet sweat like a running faucet and I can never wear rubber flip flops without sliding out of them, they just make my feet sweat more.  I know, sounds gross and embarrassing.  We do go on vacation to lots of warm places, and who wants to wear socks and shoes with dresses everywhere you go??  Not me!  These sandals are amazingly comfortable for walking, my feet don’t get sweaty, they are super cute, and they fit just fine.  I wear a size 11 (I know I know, big sweaty feet😰) and the size 11 fits just fine.  Pretty. Stinkin. Happy!

I bought these shoes to take to Barcelona Spain for a week vacation.  I am a size 6.5 in the majority of shoes I wear aside from running shoes (size 7).  I bought the size 6 and they fit perfectly.  The straps were easy to put on and the soles are very comfortable.  I wore them all day yesterday and walked approximately 5 miles around Dallas, TX with no blister and very happy feet.  I would highly recommend these!

Super cute shirt! I ordered the forest green and it is a beautiful color. It has the split right at the hip and covers your bum so you can wear leggings with it (score!) The back is a little longer than the front. I ordered a medium and it is a loose-fitting medium on me (I usually wear M-L depending on brand). Very soft and comfy!

I love these, soft, not clingy and not running small at all - I am currently between a size 10 and 12 and the Medium fits me loosely, flattering.  Tail is  longer in the back.  I will order more, they are thin but not "see through" and do not stick to your curves, the fabric flows.  Also, I am not a small-boned woman, nor young and sinew-y

Super soft and comfy T. Just what I wanted for summer. I don't think it shrunk after washing it. The neckline is perfect, not too deep or too high. Very lightweight! I love it and already ordered a second in another color. I'm 5'11 135lbs.

Pretty shirt however I have wider hips and it hugs at the hips, go a size or 2 larger then what you would normally wear if you want it to be flowey if you have larger hips- other then that it is extremely comfortable and soft!!

I am 5'4 and 150 lbs.;  bought a navy blue, Large, because I like my tops to be comfortable and loose...and this one is just perfect.  Material is soft and I like the way it looks on me.  Ahh, and it is long enough to be worn with leggings...Very pleased with my purchase, will buy more colors!

ABSOLUTELY love this shirt!! I purchased this so I could create a birthday shirt to wear on my night out and it worked great! The vinyl attached great and held up nicely after washing. Didn't shrink after wash either! I am 5'5 and 150 lbs and ordered a large and normally can wear a either a medium or large depending on the style shirt. It fit a little loose just how I wanted it to! I ordered the black and the army green and they turned out great! Definitely buying the other colors for future shirts!

So glad to have tried this, I ordered it in white which is a very stark white. I'm a 40C and ordered a medium instead of my usual large. Wish I would've ordered a small due to the 5% spandex in the fabric that causes a lot of give in the bustline. Its a great top! I noticed from the pictures that the slit is different for some. I'm grateful I have a ling enough slit that makes this high low top perfect for skinnies or leggings. Shop away!

I have been looking for an over-sized t-shirt that can be dressed up or down. This would be that shirt, except it is not over-sized at all. I am usually a M - (8) top (large if the shirt is fitted). I'm 165, 5'3", 36D. This top if very fitted and not long. It hits just below my waist in front and not even close to covering my bum. I do like the green color - it's very unique - not too bright. I am keeping it because it fits, I'm just disappointed it isn't over-size as described. I would probably have to get the XL for it to fit like the picture. it is comfortable for a regular t-shirt.  If it were over-size, I would give it 5 stars.

Warning, sizing between colors is not consistent. I have a shirt already in the blue and it fits beautifully. Or did the same shirts in the room and in the same size and it is one full inch mi warning, sizing between colors is not consistent. I have a shirt already in the blue and it fits beautifully. Ordered the same shirt in the maroon- in the same size -and it is one full inch smaller. I also ordered the green and they sent a different shirt.Would really love to have the same shirt as my blue one in different colors, skins over my waist and hips in a very flattering way.
Update: The seller was very fair in this transaction. Shirt ran small, but still useful. Thanks!

I got the medium red wine shirt and it is true to size and color. I'm 135 lbs, 5'3, and B cup for reference. It's a good shirt to wear with leggings and easily covers my butt. However, since I carry more weight in my stomach it does make that area more noticeable, whether it's because of the fabric or just the way it hangs on my body. Kind of the way bra straps look on some tight shirts. Just a personal annoyance but I know some people aren't bothered by that.

BEST T EVER!**5'7", bodybuilder/powerlifter hybrid 170 lb young(ish, 28) lass. ***- Great for ladies with big arms and shoulders (gym ladies let me hear ya!)- layers perfectly with jackets and sweat shirts- fast delivery- washes & dries with other clothes great without shrinkingI first ordered the black and instantly fell in love. I have huge shoulders that could dominate in a bull fight. It is incredibly difficult to find nice T shirts with my build that are both form fitted but loose enough without making me look like a square/rectangle. I was searching for something that would be longer and look great layered with a jacket or sweatshirt...THIS IS PERFECT! I was a little nervous when all of the medium whites were sold out, but a couple days later they were restocked.Very happy and I will definitely be purchasing again! I purchased a medium in black and white.

This is the first product review I ever done in the years of shopping online with Amazon. Most clothing purchases are kind of “meh, ok”This t-shirt is sent from the heavens!It’s soft, fits beautifully, is a great length for curvy gals - but not long and frumpy. The first shirt I’ve ever put in from Amazon and said I have to buy more!Ps - hugs “the girls”  just right for a feminine T-shirt look but not too much!1X - I’m 5’5 / 200 / 38DD

I normally wear XXL, so that is what I ordered. Fits me just right. Good value for the money.The pictured I attached is the "burgundy" color. Which is brighter in the sun than the ad picture. Inside lighting the burgandy is similar to the ad picture. I also bought black and blue.It is thin material, but I like that in hot Southern Ca weather. Soft, cotton blend, but not see through. Nice for layering warmer clothing over it.The cut is nice, I think. The V-neck. which is not too low, is always flattering and shows off a nice necklace well.I washed in cold and hung to dry. Shrinkage was minimal, if any.One thing I do not like it the scratchy, stiff tag sewn into the side seam, most sensitive waist area. Cut out right away. That is common in clothing, so I wouldn't take a star away for that, but would request that the manufacturer sew the tag in at the hip instead.The TAG READs: "95% Cotton, 5% Spandex. made in CHINA""wash with like colors. dry clean recommended"

I am so happy with this shirt! The shirt fits just how I hoped it would.  It is loose fitting, has good coverage in the back, and I love the length of the sleeves.  The shirt is a little thin but I was happy to find I don't need to wear anything under it. I am very happy with this shirt!(If it helps, I am including a sizing reference.  I am 5'8'' and weigh 200 pounds, and ordered the XL.)

Perfect white tee! It fits great and has a nice lightweight feel!  I was worried when I received this  shirt it was a bit wrinkly. But all I did was wash it and I hung it to dry and it is completely wrinkle free!

Very nice quality top. It’s not to revealing, very comfy, and fits nicely on every part. I’m somewhere between a small to medium but this shirt is definitely a looser fit. If you are usually a medium I would try the small

I bought this shirt for St. Patrick’s day. And I love it! The green is close to an army green. The fabric is light and soft. The fit was a little loose (which is what I wanted) and the length goes to middle of my butt. The only negative is that the fabric is a little clingy around the mid section (just gotta suck it in!). I’m 5’5” 145lbs and wear a 32C bra and I got a medium. It was fitted around my busy and arms which I like!

*** UPDATE ***After the seller saw my order they contacted me and tried to make it better. The offered me a refund without me having to send the shirt back. I think this says a lot about their brand. Very nice people.I definitely didn’t get the same shirt as advertised. I also didn’t realize this was a microfiber-ish material when I ordered it. I usually wear a small, but got a medium in this shirt. It was very tight around my stomach and was not flowy at all. It hugged around my waist and I was hoping for more coverage around my butt.

Sleeves are not as shown. The picture shows a slightly longer sleeve, and in other reviewer’s pictures I see some did get the longer sleeve. I did not. This is a standard short sleeve that just barely covers the shoulder.  It also fits weird. Big and boxy (everywhere, including the neck, which causes it to slide around and look sloppy.) It’s also much shorter than pictured and the material shows every imperfection. I alsways wear a camisole under my shirts and this shirt shows every single seam, bump and ripple from the cami, the bra and any extra pudge you may have under it. This is not worth more than $5.  For reference, I am 5’4”, 126lbs and I ordered the small in white.

I had read reviews to size up, so that is what I did and I am glad I did. I normally wear a L and ordered and XL. It isnt a womens fit shirt so the sleeves are longer than i would have liked. the shirt is thicker than a normal cotton shirt and I feel like it would shrink after the first wash making it too short. I would of liked it to be a tad bit longer. but overall not a bad shirt.
Super cute shirt.It is very bright yellow but the white wording stands out. It is casual cute for any day wear.A patterened bra would show up underneath, I wore a nude bra just fine.I am 5’4 and 135
Just as expected.
Washed a few times and lettering hasn't faded, it's a tighter fit and I sized up- sleeves are not folded

Cute shirt with a great message! I ordered a size medium since I wanted a bit of a looser fit, and I like how it fits. Shirt material is pretty standard T-shirt feel. I’m looking forward to many wears.
Really cute design!!. I liked the design a lot! It was an AMAZING SHIRT!! But the shirt ripped and shank after washed.
Loved this shirt! The fabric is pretty stretchy, so it’s supee comfy! Totally recomend this and lots of people ask where I get it from!

I don't know how to properly explain this but this whole shirt felt awkward, but It also technically fit. It fell to my hips (i'm 5'3 135bls) and wasn't baggy or tight. I couldn't leave it on for more than 2 mins without being completely agitated. The sleeves fell at a really weird place on my arms. It's a v neck and in my (probably a bit conservative) opinion, is cut a little too deep. The print was really the problem. It was too low on the shirt. It sort of sat toward the mid stomach area. I intended to wear this with a maxi skirt, but I could only see "Be" because "kind" was completely covered by the skirt. The material of the shirt and the yellow color was alright though.
Perfect fit ,comfortable shirt.
Nice comfy T shirt and even with the V isn't too low. Have washed it twice now with no shrinking issues.

This is my favorite style of Columbia shirt! I have it in white and clear blue, and can't wait to buy more. The colors are fantastic, and the fit is tailored nicely for females. The snap buttons make it a quick shirt to throw on, and super simple to roll or unroll the sleeves. The shirt itself is super thin and keeps you cool, while also providing excellent sun protection. I always wear one when kayaking, fishing, crabbing, etc. and never get sun burned. For size reference, I bought an XS and am 5'5" and 120 lbs. The XS isn't too snug, and allows me extra room to move my arms around comfortably. In the picture, I'm wearing the XS white shirt. My friend is a couple inches taller and is wearing a S in cool blue. If you want a good looking, cool, sun protectant shirt, this is definitely worth a purchase.
True to size, very thin, not too hot (I live in nm and it was 98 with no wind yesterday). Great shirt will be buying more. I have a Large chest 38DD, and the XL does not have the dreaded button Gap

I ordered this shirt but ended up returning it for a few reasons. 1) There are no buttons, only white plastic snaps. To me this cheapens the look. I worry about the white plastic yellowing over time or the shirt popping open on me. 2) I ordered white because I thought it would look really fresh and cool. While I liked white, it was extremely sheer in the parts not lined with mesh. The lower back especially would show any tattoo, mole, bandaid etc. I think if you wore it really roomy, that would be okay but I was looking for a more fitted look.

Was lost in the woods for 12 hours in this shirt. Had to slide down a mountain in it. The evidence of my slide has not completely washed out of the back, only negative. I started out with it snapped up, sleeves down and ended up with it unsnapped, sleeves up. After hiking for 12 hours in it with few stops I had no chaffed areas. If fits close like a hiking shirt should. I'm a bit hippy so things from North Face in a 12 were too slim. The woman in the store told me I needed to look at Columbia so I came home and looked on Amazon. I leave the bottom snap unsnapped just because I don't like things too snug. I'm going to hike to the bottom of the  Grand Canyon in a few days and I will not take another shirt. I'll rinse this one out that night and wear it back out the next day. It dries quickly and I washed it in the washing machine and dried it on a hanger. The stain on the back is proof that I can survive in the deep woods. I will be 69 on June 3rd.

I have some Columbia Bahama button up shirts & wear a medium in those (I'm 5;7" 165 lbs), which may run slightly large, but in this shirt I get a large and it fits perfectly, very flattering fit and I still have some room to move. Love the yellow color, bright and vibrant, but if you don't like flashy colors you'll feel like you're wearing a banana Laffy Taffy wrapper.I am a biological technician doing field work. Between the Tamiami and the Bahama, the Tamiama is more lightweight, which is nice if it's hot out, but snags more easily and therefore doesn't hold up well if you're doing daily field work in shrubby areas.

It is very cute, but the Medium fit me like a Large.  I then ordered it in SM, arrived just now, and it's perfect! Still plenty of room to cross arms, since the back ventilation "shawl" is roomy--it does come down farther than most shirts like this, but seems more stylish.Big plus: FINALLY a roll-up sleeve that covers more like a 3/4 sleeve (for the M, just below the elbow for the S).  Most hit above elbow and are NOT flattering!The "fossil" color is sort of like the old Necco chocolate flavor wafer candy.  Will not show dirt much.The "button-down collar" uses velcro so tips can be easily opened to lay spread out.There are TWO zippered pockets near the waist.  These will be fabulous for travel.  (PS I threw away one shirt--another brand--that had chest pockets.  Unusable because they make you look lumpy, VERY unflattering, and if you tried to unbutton some top buttons, the mesh lining hung out like bad underwear.)AND the "Columbia" tag is velcro-ed so that it could hold a water tube or lip-balm.  LOVE this shirt!

Polyester ripstop is my favorite material for shirts.  I have so many varieties of this style across several brands.  The material keeps you cool in the summer and warm in the winter.  The material is soft, washes well, retains its color and doesn't wrinkle.  You can wear this shirt to the office and then step on a hiking trail after work without changing.  The sleeves fit well both rolled up or unraveled. A mesh flap in the back provides for ventilation.  These make great travel shirts because of the low maintenance.  Wash and ring them out and they dry out in a few hours.There are two side pockets above the hips for perhaps small wallet or phone or keys.  The pockets are a bit out of the way so as to not create bulk across the chest.I picked the vibrant rose red and will soon get other colors.  I noticed a large difference in price between the colors.

This was my second columbia shirt that I purchased from amazon the first being a different material...https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0089FB73W/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o03_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1I LOVE this shirt. The material is super soft and fast drying. I order the medium in the other style and it fit really big. The small fits perfect! I am 5'6" and around 135lbs I would recommend the small vs. medium.

I have almost every color. Things I really like are: lightweight, easy to wash and I hang dry, you really stay dry (and I tend to sweat alot and easily), the colors are really nice, roll up into a small ball (great when traveling), they are very complimentary in looks. I also like the snaps --when you roll up the sleeves they stay up well, i.e.  do not unroll in places where the snap band isn't present.I am a curvy size 12/14 and the X-large fits great, the tailored fit is particularly nice without being snug at all.Now the BUT part ---- if you get the lighter colors // like yellow it is somewhat see through -- so I add a thin cami----which then + to the retaining of any sweat, not a big deal for me as I love these shirts.
Bright, lightweight. Fits perfectly. All as described. Washes well. Took it on a boat trip to the Caribbean. Will definitely buy more.

Phone doesn't look as sleek in the case, but how could it? Color and looks show through well. Bumpers on top and bottom protect well against a drop. No raised bumpers on sides, so it is possible for my phone to fall screen first.

I was really excited to get my first OtterBox for an affordable price. The only thing is, as you can see in the pictures, the border/bumper of the case yellows EXTREMELY fast. I've only had the case for a little over a month and it's already turned yellow. I've ordered cheaper, clear cases that don't even yellow that fast. So it's something to be aware of before you purchase. If the discoloration doesn't bother you then by all means purchase it because the case is very durable, after all it is an OtterBox.

I really like the case but it did not fit my phone so I returned it.  Not the seller's fault......I didn't pay attention and ordered the S9 instead of S9+.  It was delivered very quickly and I received my refund promptly.
I received on June 1, I have now had to file an Otterbox claim as the case is scratched but more importantly the back of my phone is shattered.  This case did NOT protect my phone when dropped.

I mostly love this case! Great design, easy to put on and take off, doesn't interfere with buttons, in other words a great otterbox case. However when it does get scratches it seems to scratch quite deeply. The edges also have picked up a dirty looking blue from living in my back pocket, and the rubbery material makes it impossible to clean (if anyone has tips I'd love to hear them!). The phone is also more exposed due to the curved edges, so the 2 or 3 times I've dropped my phone the phone edge has caught and cracked my glass screen protector (previous phone and otterbox was for the S7 with a full edge wrap/ more protection)
I love how it gives my screen a bumper zone if dropped face down, easy to put on, works with screen protector, and is wireless charger compatible

Probably the lightest of the OtterBox series, This case will give you OtterBox protection with half the weight. The sides come up higher Knouff to protect the curved screen address and your screen protector. Particularly if you were using a ZAGG SCREEN PROTECTOR which has a tendency to crack if an edge touch is a hard flat surface.
Buttons are very stiff which makes it hard to lock/unlock the phone or use the volume buttons.

I've had this less than two months and the clear is already yellowing. I specifically bought it because I thought it would stay nicer for longer. Very disappointed in this case, not worth the extra money.
Fit well, Clear Case, does not block the Biometric button on lower back side of Galaxy S9 I recommend this case..

Great shirt for the price. I was skeptical at first but decided to give them a try and I was really impressed. I went up a size...I'm usually a medium but went up to a large since the reviews I read suggested to go up in size. It fits just right. Here are a few pictures of different angles of what the shirt looks like on.I love the length... it offers coverage for curvy women like myself.I'm 150lbs 5ft 4in.

This shirt is awesome!! I'm 5'4 and 165 pounds. The fabric is soft and the cutouts are cute on the sleeve. I didn't wash it before I wore it and the only thing bad I would say about this is that some of the dye came off on my skin.

This shirt is cute. I am 5'3 170lbs size 11/12. I usually order a Large but I ordered a size up, an XL, and it fits me fine. It hasn't been washed or Dried yet, so I wish it were a tad bit longer. Overall, a worthwhile purchase.

Shirt is great, very lovely fits like a charm, would have preferred a little bit looser of a shirt but not a big deal. What is a big deal and i don't know if it's the shirt I received or all shirts come like this but this shirt bleeds color like crazy, my arms, bra, undershirt, anything this shirt came in contact with transferred color.I passed the shirt through the washer and even after that it still bleeds, can you imagine the embarrassment I had to go through when i went to have my blood drawn when the lab lady passed the alcoholic napkin and it was all dark and dirty from the shirt I had on. I had to explain myself as to why my arm was so dirty because of this shirt. I ordered a different shirt in burgundy color hopefully that one doesn't bleed as the black one does.If it wasn't for the color bleeding i would have given it a 5 star rating.Here i added a few of my personal favorite pics of me being silly but also of the outcome of wearing this shirt.The shirt tag is dirty and so is my bra straps which won't wash out no matter the number of washes i do. Where was this shirt made?

Love this shirt! Made well for the price, not skin tight but flattering. I bought a small & it's just long enough for leggings. To help with measurements I'm 5'2 115 1lbs. Definitely buying this again.
Fits very comfortably! 5'6 about 170 pounds and a large is perfect, not too tight not too lose :) decently made as well

I am about 145 lb, 5’7”, wait 34 in, bust 38in, hips 40 inch.. I ordered a Large. it fits loose, but that is how it i. it covers my but, a little long but that is the style. I could have ordered one size smaller for tighter fit.
It's so  comfortable

I bought the white and red colors. This review will talk about the colors, the fit and matching to your bra.Colors: The white was a bit more see-through than I was hoping. It didn't show my bra, but it did show the line of my pants. So it isn't super thin, but I wish it was just a bit more opaque. And the red is not a deep red, but a super bright orangy red. So if you want a bright red - this red is for you. But if you are hoping for a darker/deeper red, like you see in the photo, then I would pass on the red.Fit: I read in other reviews to size up.  I am normally a L or XL. (6' tall, size 12-14) So I bought the red in XL and I liked the fit. I also bought the white in XL and XXL. I don't think I have ever purchased an XXL before because they are normally huge, but I wanted the white to be "flowy" over my belly. This XXL in white was not overly huge and did float over my belly in a nice way - and at 6' tall it was perfectly long enough. But I could see it being too long on someone else.Bra: I choose white and red shirts because I have white and red bras - and I figured that the bra strap would coordinate nicely with the shirt. So, when deciding which color shirt to buy, you may want to think about your bra. Plan that the strap will show and you may want to match the bra and shirt - or wear a strapless bra.In sum - this shirt is cute and at a great price! But I would probably get the black next time since the red was too bright, the white was a bit too thin and I have a black bra. I hope this is helpful to you.

Size ordered: SMeasurements: 5'2" tall, 102lbs, 32DDD bust, size 0-2 pants, usually S/M topsI bought both the wine red and blue colors and the colors are true to the photos and very pretty, however I feel like they fit like mediums when they are actually smalls. The sleeves fit me loose, the length is longer than I expected, and it is no where near tight on my torso like it seemed to be on others, but overall I am still very pleased with the quality of them and I like the look, but I think an XS would have worked better for me if it existed.

I first gave this shirt a 1 Star, because The side cut showed unlike the picture shows and also fits one size too small. After reviewing the product I called amazon and asked for a return label. I immediately got a call from the seller who said they were sorry I was unhappy with my purchase and would send me a size up free of charge, they also asked if there was anything else I could recommend. First of all Amazon refunded my money, so I wasn’t expecting anything better then that. This seller went out of their way to make sure I was happy. I told them I should have purchased a size up and in black instead of silver bc the nursing slit may have been more camouflaged. They are sending me a larger black shirt for free.Update: rcvd my new shirt in black, LOVE IT!!!! Very comfortable and easy to nurse. Buy a size up.

It's stylish I like the way it looks on. The only downfall is the material is that kind that shows when you get just a little wet so not the best for breastfeeding if you happen to leak or when you're burping your baby in the light color shirt like the turquoise it will definitely stand out. Or if you are sweating a lot your SOL. But if you go with a black color you should be good. last downfall is the material snags easily I have a few already and I just opened it out of the bag. Other than that is super soft material that looks good when there's not many options out there I'm happy. Easy functioning when use for breastfeeding.

I love this shirt. I bought one while I was pregnant and it fit the whole time (large; 5'7" 150lbs pre-pregnancy, 180lbs full term). I just bought a second one for breastfeeding- it is so discreet and camouflages my post-pregnancy belly. *Photo is from when I was 7 months pregnant.

I ended up buying 5 of these shirts so I can easily pump at work. YOU CAN ACCESS BOTH BREASTS AT THE SAME TIME TO PUMP! Very easy to feed baby discretely through the shirt as well. Very comfortable, lightweight, flowing material. Very happy with the product, highly recommend!

I love this shirt! I bought lavender and mint, loved it so much I bought the blue and coral ones. It is loose in the right places for my postpartum body, and is fitted through the bust just enough to make you feel feminine. It is also very easy for nursing, just move the fabric to the side, no buttons, and there isn't an ocean of fabric to get tangled in.

This is my first piece of "nursing wear" and I love it!! I am 5'8 around 155-60 lbs and I ordered a size small and it fits well. Many nursing tops are very obviously for nursing and this one is a little bit more discreet. If you are really modest, you will probably still want to use a nursing cover, but you can definitely don't need it- this shirt will cover almost everything. I plan on wearing this when we take our baby on his first plane ride so I can nurse discreetly on the plane.

This is a great nursing top!Pros: doesn't look like a nursing top. The black color hides the vertical side seams that pull towards the center of the shirt to allow for discrete nursing. Material is good quality, washes and dries nicely- didn't shrink or change from washing. Long, almost tunic length is very flattering.Con: the tiny, tiny gripe I have is that the arm holes are a little bit loose which shows your bra. Other than that this is a perfect shirt and I've ordered it in other colors too.

I wore this shirt most days this summer, no one can typically even tell that I am nursing which is why I like it better than most other nursing tops I wear. I don't need to mess with putting a blanket or hooter hider over. I can even nurse in church and party settings very discreetly. Normally men wouldn't stand and talk to me if they knew I was nursing, but they just think I'm holding the baby with this shirt.I bought it in another color! For my first purchase, I bought a medium which fit perfectly right after the baby was born, but I feel like 3 months out it was a little too big so I got a small for the second shirt and it's perfect. 5'9", 170 lb.Only con for me is that it stains so easily. At this point even fresh out of the wash, it looks stained. But, I'm not real worried about that.

My pre-pregnancy size is a medium, and I purchased a size medium in yellow and black.  The tops fit as I expect a US size medium nursing top to fit (maybe a little more fitted than on the model, but it wasn't too clingy on me).  The fabric is a soft, thin, drapey, rayon-type material, which is so nice for spring and summer.  I plan on wearing these tops in the fall and winter under my cardigans as well. I like how the armholes are cut - they don't show my bra straps on my shoulders or my bra under my arm.  I washed and dried the black one in the dryer and it did not shrink. The yellow color isn't see-through with a nude bra, but both tops do show some lumps and bumps due to the type of material. I haven't had any milk or spit-up stains on the tops yet to know if they permanently stain as other reviewers have stated.  I will definitely purchase more colors and check out other nursing styles from Smallshow!

Bought four different colors for my daughter - they arrived today - she loves them!  They are exactly what she needed; comfortable, discreet, easy, and soft material that doesn't bother the baby.  Three cheers for finding something awesome!  My daughter is around 5'8" and 220 lbs; the XL is perfect and even a bit loose.

Literally just bought two more since receiving this in white. It’s so soft, and so cool which is important in TX summer. It maintains its fit no matter how many days you wear it or how often to wash it. This might go down as my favorite find on Amazon!! When in it has the look of a higher style of T. Not some cotton thing you find at the super market.
Such a beautiful color.  I ordered size S. It fits perfectly. Very soft and and stylish.  Great addition to my wardrobe. A basic piece that can be used in multiple ways.

I like the silky feel to the fabric but it ran large and it wasn't as long as the picture portrays. I bought it assuming it would be tunic length, but it's more like a regular shirt length, hitting at the top of my pants.

I love this shirt except I wish it had a little more of a “shape” for a more feminine figure instead of falling from the chest down and it’s one length. I also wish it were just slightly longer but I still love it and plan to order more in other colors. I am 5’6 and 140 and the medium fits almost perfectly!

I ordered three , not knowing how the fit would be, but I am more than happy with this purchase!I am 5’ 4”, 165 lbs.I like loose clothes and these do run large. I got XL and for me they are perfect!Hope this helps with your purchase.

Beautiful shirt, great fit I ordered a large and it was perfect. A little extra room but that’s what I like. It’s worth the money and came within a couple days, I ordered two different colors and I love them
I'm 5'4" size 14. Ordered XX-Large.  Fit is looser than I expected but it still looks good.  I will order another color in X-Large.  The quality is very good.  Wrinkle resistant, bright color.

This material was surprisingly very good quality. It fits perfectly for a v-neck tee shirt. And the fact that it comes in multiple colors/patterns is great too. I usually wear a small, so when I purchased the small it was the perfect fit. I would definitely buy this again is another color.

Shirt fit smaller than expected. I’m 145, 5’7 and got a large and it only goes a little below the hip. I got white and it’s fairly see through and thin as well. It’ll work for an under shirt...under a jacket or cardigan, but the fit is too odd and shear to wear alone even with nude bra.
Fits TTS, super comfy, soft, & not tight at all. Love the colors in it, not too bold but not dull either 🙌🏻

Cute top. I normally wear a medium, bought this in medium and fits perfect. Arm holes are perfect, doesn't expose bra. It's longer than I expected but would be perfect with leggings.  I'm 5'4 abd 117lbs.

When I first opened the package I wasn't impressed with the quality.  But once I tried it on and saw they way it fit, it really is nice and thin for summer use.  I'm 5'9 140lbs 34D athletic build with a long torso and a medium fit just fine and long enough.  This is a replica of a shirt that I found on another known site and it sells for $39.  So definitely a great price even if I do only get only one summer out of it!!
Love this top, its what I would consider full length instead of crop as most tye shirts are.. bought in another color I love it so much

Cute top and it is true to size. I ordered about 2 sizes up thinking this would be Chinese size like so many other apparel on Amazon. I normally wear a sz 14 and I ordered a 2x; it’s big and long. Contemplating whether or not to give it to my Mom or keep and wear it with tights. Top part still loose though; bottom would probably be too if I didn’t have hips to grab it.

OK first things first -  After reading reviews and most of them saying this was like a bathing suit material,  that couldn't be farther from the truth!  The material is more like a light tent or gazebo type material.  No stretch or give like a bathing suit.  The top is very cute very stylish great material.  Long enough that it goes past your waist.  Brilliant color,  Great price it's a keeper
I Love this shirt.  Beautiful colors and material.  I went by reviews and ordered up a size to a medium  I should have ordered the small.  I am returning and ordering a small.

The design and colors on this top is pretty for sure. The most significant thing I can say is that this particular color is made of a different fabric than all the others and the cut (much longer) and sizing (runs small) are also different. It's nice, but definitely prefer the others over this one. They are more flattering and are made well. This one is cute for sure,  but the fabric is a little thin.
I’m surprised at how flattering this is. The fabric drapes nicely. I’m usually a medium and I bought a large and it’s perfect.
Material very different than I expected,  but the shirt still looks and fits great.  Material is almost shiny is the best way I can put it. But it harder to wrinkle than my other shirts.

I bought the yellow / navy and I LOVE it!!I'm 30w pregnant, and the material is soft and flowy over my belly, while nice and form fitting up top.I'm tempted to buy a few more, just for for value and fit alone.

These are exactly what I was looking for! I wanted a pair of shorts that had a 5" inseam that were loose fitting and easy to move around in. I was worried that the inseam would be too short, that the waistband would be too tight and uncomfortable. I hate when I'm wearing shorts and the inseam is too short or the leg is too tight and the legs ride up. I love that these are simple. I bought a L and am 5'1" 180lbs. The waist band is PERFECT it's not too tight and isn't falling off of my waist. The short length goes slightly past my finger tips and it doesn't hug my legs. I really aprreciate when people mention their measurements as it helps those who use reviews to figure out how they'd measure up too. I will continue to buy these ❤️

Perfect sleep shorts!!!!!!Living in Hawaii I have been looking for the perfect sleep short that is very soft and comfortable..washes well ...and one that covers adequately so I can go to the mail box...answer the door w/out embarrassment..and can even run ...ok...walk around the corner for a quart of milk...I am 69..waist 35 hips 44 and wear a 14 in shorts and skirts. An XL would fit anyone who wears a 14 or 16 comfortably...if you are a 12..get a L. Hope this is helpful...I have already ordered more.....

My favorite, most coziness shorts!!! They are slightly shorter but I would wear them out if need be. I came back and bought these in 4 total colors and have been wearing them for pajama shorts. So so comfortable and such a great price. Highly recommend!! :-)

i love these shorts!!! great for home, warm weather, sunny days, beach trips. Very comfortable and light, but not thin, sheer or flimsy. Ordered XL, my waist is 36, hips 44, and even though the XL fits, I would probably order L next time because they're a bit big. I know they're supposed to be loose on you anyhow, but i can order a size down and still be safe. The XL would probably even fit someone with a 40-44*** waist, because the waistband has a lot of stretch.*** i'm guestimating hereOK, just measured and i was right. i stretched out the waistband of the XL to capacity and it measured 48 inches. So if you're a bigger person and, following the image supplied, you know the part of body the waist band will fall on will measures 48 or less, go ahead and buy.They reach me about 4-5 inches above the knees. I'm short...5'1"

This is my third pair of these shorts, which should tell you how much I like them! The only thing they're missing is pockets; other than that, they're perfect.I'm 5'9" and about a size 12 or 14 (42-33-42), and I get these in XXL because I can't stand tight clothes. These give me lots of stretch, they don't fall down or ride up, and they're a nice length (I never have to pull these down). I normally can't stand to sleep in bottoms of any kind, and I can comfortably sleep in these (and have many times).My previous pairs are still going strong after MANY trips through the washer and dryer, so the quality is pretty great, too.

Although the color, quality and material are fine, these shorts were specifically purchased based on the article description stating that they have a 5 inch inseam, which they clearly do not.  Having measured them, they should properly be described as having a 2.5 inch inseam. Too short for someone is who is quite tall.(5'8")
Love these! They are so comfortable and cute. I’m 5’3 145lbs and I ordered a medium. Will be repurchasing.

Perfect for shorts for lounging or working out at home. I was looking for shorts that would allow movement and not ride up or constrict in the crotch area (ladies you know what I mean). These are soft, they fit well, wash well no lose threads. I happy with them and intend to purchase more. I ordered a size med based on the size info provided and they fit perfectly I am 5'5 129. Highly recommend if you are looking for a casual short. Arrived timely.

Shorts that don't roll up to my bum! Based on the reviews originally I ordered a medium in the dark grey, I'm 5'2" 136 lbs  and wear a size 10 in bottoms and have an hour glass figure. The material is definitely what I consider sleep wear, at least for the grey and the medium wasn't large enough, I was constantly pulling them down. So I ordered the black because they're mostly cotton, got them in a large and was hoping the fit would be more to my liking.  Not so much sadly. They roll right up to the very top of my leg. Even when I wear them to just water the flowers in the morning I'm tugging them down and unrolling. Frustrating.  Other than that, at least the waist band is comfortable and I like the black far better because of the cotton content.

I'm going to order more.I am 5'4 weigh 160.Wear a 12.Have fuller tummy and thinner legs.I am 55.About an inch longer for my age would have been nice, but I pull them down a little on my hips.Bought to wear to the gym, and wear them as a summer version of sweat pants!

This tank top is very cute. It is well made and a bit of a thicker material. I read that one some reviews and wasn’t sure what it meant. The material is not see thru. It is heavier material than a cami. The tank top is nice quality with a vibrant pink and black and white stripes. The picket is a kind of crocheted material and adds nicely to the tank. I am 5’6” and weigh about 200 lbs. I purchased an XL and it fit nicely.

This shirt is great, I read a lot of reviews prior to purchasing and seemed there was different comments on size.  After lots of consideration I went with my normal size, medium.  This was a great choice as the medium fit great and had the nice "flowy" feel that the product picture shows.  Just for comparison, I am 5'8" and weigh about 145, I ordered a medium.The material is soft and not cheap looking or feeling either.  great price and shirt.

Love the shirt, it's super soft and comfortable. I sized up per others review, but wish I didn't. Normally I wear a large in women's which is what I bought. I would've been more comfortable in a medium as I was looking for a tighter fit, but if you like loose shirts this is perfect.For reference I'm 5'3 and 160# 38DD 34" waist and I have a pretty short torso.
Very pretty, well made top.  The material is that weird shiny, thinner fabric that snags easily but it is made well enough that it doesn't rip.  Colors are as advertised but does run a touch small.

This product is bigger than expected, so I'm glad I listened to the reviews and got a small. I'm 5'4" 130 pounds and usually get mediums, but I got the small and it fits well. It's kind of long so I'm my opinion it looks weird with shorts, but it will be cute with some leggings!

I really like the look of this shirt, and the fact that it's cute and casual. I followed the fit guide and ordered an XL (I'm 5'7" 165, smaller chest but long torso; I'm usually a M Tall or L) and the fit is great, except for under the arms, where it gaps out a bit. Not terrible, as I don't walk around with my arms out so people can see, but it is noticeable when I raise my arms. Other than that, I love it!

Bought the pink in Large. I'm between a Medium & Large in tops. With a tank top I'll buy Medium for more of a fitted look and Large if I want an oversized look. I bought Large in this for oversized look and I LOVE it! It's the perfect length and width. I'm not typically a pink kind of girl but I have tons of blue things and I liked the black but really like color so I let my husband decide and he went with pink. I'm so glad I did because it's such a nice bright pink that'll go great with denim. I'm excited for warmer weather when I'll be able to wear it. I have washed it and hung dry (only because I was going to bed and wouldn't be able to check dryer) and it washed really well and hung with no wrinkles once dry.

I like this shirt and keep wearing it. However, the perfectionist in me is really bothered by the fact that the stripe pattern is sown slightly lopsided. It's almost imperceptible and, unless someone is staring directly at my chest, they wouldn't notice that the top black line is tilted where it meets the salmon top.
