So, if you're looking for top quality, this might not be your top, but it is pretty cute despite its imperfection.

The shade of blue was much different in person compared to the pictures online but still super cute (you can see in the pictures I added)! I would say it runs very true to size. It is not a racer back, so you can wear a regular bra with it no problem. I did wear a cami underneath it because my bra could be seen a little bit through the tank material. You can see the cami in some of the pictures. Overall super cute and a great price!

First time wearing it, so I haven’t washed it. The material feels like it will shrink, so I’ll make sure not to dry it. I am a 36B or 34C chest size. Bought a medium. I actually really love this shirt.It would be cute with leggings too...perfect length.

Phone doesn't look as sleek in the case, but how could it? Color and looks show through well. Bumpers on top and bottom protect well against a drop. No raised bumpers on sides, so it is possible for my phone to fall screen first.

I was really excited to get my first OtterBox for an affordable price. The only thing is, as you can see in the pictures, the border/bumper of the case yellows EXTREMELY fast. I've only had the case for a little over a month and it's already turned yellow. I've ordered cheaper, clear cases that don't even yellow that fast. So it's something to be aware of before you purchase. If the discoloration doesn't bother you then by all means purchase it because the case is very durable, after all it is an OtterBox.

I really like the case but it did not fit my phone so I returned it.  Not the seller's fault......I didn't pay attention and ordered the S9 instead of S9+.  It was delivered very quickly and I received my refund promptly.
I received on June 1, I have now had to file an Otterbox claim as the case is scratched but more importantly the back of my phone is shattered.  This case did NOT protect my phone when dropped.

I mostly love this case! Great design, easy to put on and take off, doesn't interfere with buttons, in other words a great otterbox case. However when it does get scratches it seems to scratch quite deeply. The edges also have picked up a dirty looking blue from living in my back pocket, and the rubbery material makes it impossible to clean (if anyone has tips I'd love to hear them!). The phone is also more exposed due to the curved edges, so the 2 or 3 times I've dropped my phone the phone edge has caught and cracked my glass screen protector (previous phone and otterbox was for the S7 with a full edge wrap/ more protection)
I love how it gives my screen a bumper zone if dropped face down, easy to put on, works with screen protector, and is wireless charger compatible

Probably the lightest of the OtterBox series, This case will give you OtterBox protection with half the weight. The sides come up higher Knouff to protect the curved screen address and your screen protector. Particularly if you were using a ZAGG SCREEN PROTECTOR which has a tendency to crack if an edge touch is a hard flat surface.
Buttons are very stiff which makes it hard to lock/unlock the phone or use the volume buttons.

I've had this less than two months and the clear is already yellowing. I specifically bought it because I thought it would stay nicer for longer. Very disappointed in this case, not worth the extra money.
Fit well, Clear Case, does not block the Biometric button on lower back side of Galaxy S9 I recommend this case..

Nice dress. Sturdy. Great price. Lots of compliments. Wear with or without a petticoat. I like that I can ditch the petticoat for the summer and it will look good. Has actual sleeves. Belt is removable and not wrinkled. I bought several patterns. I'm wearing 2xl. 190lbs. 38dd bra, 45 bust, 37 waist, 48 hips.
The dress runs slightly small, but still a good purchase.  You will definitely need to iron it or take to the cleaners if you want a crisp wrinkle-free look.

I absolutely love this dress!!! It fit me perfectly and I got so many compliments! I will definitely be ordering other colors. I'm 5'9, bust size 38C, and I'm a size 12 so I ordered an XL. I even had a little extra room in the dress.

This dress is super cute! Can be dressed up or down! The fabric is nice as well. This was a quick buy I needed a dress for a family photoshoot I bought about 7 dresses n this was the winner even over a $200 dress!
Beautiful kelly green!!  im a size 12 jeans & 38D chest..  this dress fit a little tight around the bust.  I ordered in a XL & 2XL and there wasnt any difference.

I was interning at a nursing home and my position required that I was always in professional attire.  The residents of the home responded positively to my style of dress so I decided to amp it up and dress in a more retro style.  Everyone loved when I wore this dress. Most of them said it reminded them of 'I Love Lucy' and many fun conversations were had that day.I used the seller's sizing chart and I ordered a Medium. (I'm 5'6", 145lbs with a muscular/toned body Measurements: 34DD/26/36).  I could have ordered a small but I wanted to have a bit of room in the waist. (I also purchased a tutu/petticoat for the added fullness. I also replaced the matching belt with a length of red ribbon for the color contrast effect.)
This dress is adorable. I wore a petticoat underneath.
I'm 5'8 with a 45" bust ,35"waist and got the dress In a 3X and in Burgundy. It fits really well with the stretch material but needs to be ironed before every wear and can stain pretty easily.

I ordered this dress specifically for a retro night theme ballroom class. (But to wear again also!) it is beautiful. It fit amazingly. Only problem was the bust area is a bit large but that is to be expected with needing a bigger size and having a smaller chest😉 But I loved this dress so so much! It fit as expected, I am 5'9, 215lbs and ordered a XXL.. fit great! I got so many complements from complete strangers about this dress! I went to eat, dance and Walmart and probably got 20 compliments!😊 I have posted a video from my ballroom class to see how lovely this dress moves while dancing.. this is without a petticoat but I plan to wear one in the future. Looks great with or without one! Just in this video I have paired it with a black belt instead of the bow that comes with it, as that is in my hair :) I have been ballroom dancing just since march 24 of this year and this is a waltz :) hope this review helps anyone trying to decide 😊

This dress is absolutely divine. As seen in the double photo, the pic on the left is with the underskirt and, on the right, it’s without. I’ve also shown a sort of side view in the second pictiure and a close up in the third to show how the bust area fits.I am totally pleased. I am wearing an XXL. My bust is 38G and I’m presently at 211.2lbs. As I have a large hip, I can get away with wearing the dress with or without the underskirt. My hubby voted for me wearing the underskirt today. It is 26 inches long and light-weight.The price for this dress is unbeatable and it is well worth it!  I love it so much that I bought it in many other colors and prints. I recommend this dress!!!

Last year, I bought a number of Under Armour clothing and since then, Under Armour has become my favorite workout clothing brand! I love the quality of the clothes, color selection, and how they are designed to keep you cool (or warm, depending on the line). I decided to get some more workout shirts this year and wanted to try some with a pattern rather than just the solid shirts, since I have some of those already. I didn't have any of the Twist Tech shirts and decided to give them a try.This Under Armour Twist Tech shirt is part of Under Armour's HeatGear line, which is designed to keep you cool in warm weather. This shirt is considered a LOOSE fit, which means you will most likely want to purchase a smaller size for a more comfortable fit. The shirt has a flattering V-neck cut and has a twisted, or heathered, pattern that makes it different than a solid color shirt. These shirts are made in Jordan of 100% polyester. Washing instructions say to wash with similar colors. I always put these in the washing machine on a normal cycle, hang them up to dry, and I've never had a problem with shrinking.I initially purchased one of these shirts to make sure I had the right size and loved it so much I ordered two more! For size reference, I am 5'6", 165 pounds, with a 36D chest and some extra belly fat from my twin pregnancy and I purchased a medium. I typically wear a medium or large in shirts and, since this shirt is a loose fit, I went with the medium and it fits perfectly! These shirts are so comfortable and I wear them a lot for working out. They keep me as cool and dry as possible (of course, I still sweat). They wash up well and I am also able to wear them for everyday wear with yoga pants. My mom is in her early 60s and wears these shirts for everyday wear, along with under her scrubs for work. She loves them as much as I do and wants to get some more! The fit is nice and comes down to the top of my rear, which is just how I like. I purchased the colors Pink Shock/Metallic Silver, Mediterranean/Metallic Silver, and Absinthe Green/Metallic Silver and I'm considering purchasing a couple more.I love these shirts and feel they are great for working out or for everyday wear. Please note, this shirt is a LOOSE fit so you will want to purchase a smaller size for a more flattering fit. I'd say if you have two sizes of shirts you normally wear, purchase the smaller size for this shirt. The shirt is nice enough to wear in public and I also purchased Under Armour Women's Armour Mid Sports Bra, Pink Shock/Rhino Gray, Large so I could color-coordinate with my shirts. I love these shirts and highly recommend them!

I'm 5'6 195 and ordered two of the XL. The fit is perfect and form fitting, not lose and not tight and that's how I wanted it. I just hope it doesn't shrink much. I'm normally an XL or XXL on Amazon. I read reviews so I knew it should fit me because it's a lose fit shirt so order a size down if you want it to be a form fit. My only complaint is that it shows my tummy bulge more then I would like. It's still flattering and cool/comfortable. I would like to get more in a larger size to have less tummy bulge and allow for shrinkage but they don't have an XXL.. It's still pretty flattering. The peach looks really pretty on me and shows my tan more.

I'm 5'5" (168cm), 27.5' waist and ordered S. I was expecting semi-fitted but it happened to be a loose fit.As a loose fit, I chose the right size because it looks exactly like the model in the picture. Never snug around my waist.S is good for running but XS would have been better for weight training.(Size S width: chest 47cm, hem 51cm/ sleeve : 16cm/ length : 67cm)I learned that I should check the fit on the UA website before I buy.

I have four of these shirts and absolutely love them! They work great for all-day wear and hold up very well during my sweaty weightlifting sessions (1.5-2 hours long). My favorite feature of these shirts would have to be their ability to make you appear less sweaty than you actually are. As someone who does power lifting, Olympic lifting, and cardio in a non-air conditioned warehouse in the South, having a t-shirt that doesn't appear soaked in sweat, and doesn't showcase big armpit sweat stains (those are the worst), ten minutes into your workout, is a miracle. It also helps that these shirts are breathable and quick to dry. After each workout, I hand-wash the shirt with a little bit of soap, gently squeeze out the water from the shirt, put it on a hanger, and hang it from my shower head to dry - that way, I don't have to buy a week's worth of shirts or do the laundry every other day.Aside from functionality, the t-shirt, for me, fits as expected and per the size chart. I tend to prefer looser-fitting shirts and size medium, for my 34C-bra size, long torso - I'm 6 ft, and swimmer's shoulders (much broader than average), fits perfectly. I don't find these shirts to be transparent at all - I can wear a bright, different-colored sports bra underneath and it doesn't show through. The colors I have are vivid and bright as well (Cobalt, Water, Dynamo Blue, and Mega Magenta).I would definitely recommend Under Armour Women's Tech Twist V-Neck to anyone, especially those who participate in a sweat-prone activity or live in a hot, humid climate!

I recently started running (been a bit over 2 months) and I purchase more and more appropriate clothing. I came across this one and really liked the look and the price so decided to try it out. I am about 165 Ibs (75 kg) and 5'2"(158 cm) and the medium size first me very well.The shirt is very lightweight and comfortable. It doesn’t take in much sweat and dries out fairly quickly, which is very handy with my hour long exercise sessions. I owe a gray one, and it is not transparent at all.I have had this shirt for a bit over 3 weeks, absolutely love it and workout with it almost every day. So far I have no complaints at all, but will update if I get any! Absolutely recommend!
Loose fit. I'm  usually a medium. I Need a small. Would have been fine if the description said loose fit. Product itself is 5 stars gave 4 because lack of info on description.

Just received today.  Very happy.  Ordered XL and typically wear a L or XL.  It is roomy but in a good way.  Definitely not too big.  Very nice material and feels like it will be good for hot and humid days.

This is my go-to T-shirt now for the gym. I love it. It's been washing up beautifully. I intentionally got it a little large so I would have full range of motion in my arms for working out. It's clearly a quality product; well constructed, excellent material.

This is a great athletic shirt. The material is silky soft and very flattering. I wish I had listened to the other reviews about the loose fit of this shirt. I normally wear a medium and wish I had ordered a small in this particular style. I’m keeping the medium because it’s fine but a small would have been better. Otherwise I’m verg pleased with this purchase.
Very see-through, but ok with a tank underneath. Otherwise very pretty.

This is a good, high quality, casual shirt. The fabric is soft and feels well made. I purchased the Apricot color. It is more of a warm, soft, golden yellow than it appears in the photo. It is a beautiful color. The fabric is a bit thin, and see-theough, so I need to wear a camisole under. I wish it were thicker, but that is my only complaint.

I purchased this because I have been looking for tops that have REAL fabric in them.  Most women's tops have polyester, nylon, rayon, acrylic, spanx and other names the industry have created to call fabric that's not fabric.  These are petroleum-based manufactured fibers.  This top is not 100% petroleum but it, in my research of looking for ones with more real fabric this worked.  It's 97%cotton, 3%spandex but that 3% gives the top a lot of stretch.Another reason I purchased this is I was looking for a top that breathed.  The fake fabric tops don't allow the skin to breath and hold in body heat.  Not a god thing if you a warm bodied person or for women experiencing hot flushes of flashes.  I wore this shirt for the first time yesterday and it was comfortable.  I didn't get overheated or feel like the fabric was sticking to my skin.  However it is still cold here so I'll have to wait and see.  The top is plenty stretchy with jut 3% spanex.  Things I like about the top:Pros:The color:  The colors are vibrant and clear, not muted.The Cut:  The cut is tapered, not hanging like a tent like many of today's top.Less Spanx: This allows the top to be more relaxed and not fit like a second skin.The Cut: The scoop neck is not too revealing.The Cut: I like the length.  On me it's tunic length because I ordered the x-large.The Cut: Sleeve cut is nice.Cons:The Spanx:  Even though it's only 3% it could easily be less and have the same wearing experience.Fabric: It fits well but once the fabric settles it relaxes and become larger-that's because of the cotton which has a tendency to stretch out.The Fit: True to size?  What does that mean anymore?  There is a standardized size chart on most websites but there is no consistency in fit. I have ordered from Amazon clothes according to the size charts only to send them back because they didn't fit for one reason or another.  IMHO true to size means how do you want it to fit?  When I order more of this top I will order the large, but only because if I go smaller I'll lose the length I like.I would recommend this top.

This fit great and form fitting.  I usually wear a large but ordered a extra large because of my DD cups.  The shirt stops right below the buttocks and I have a small waist with nice size hips.  I will definitely be ordering this shirt in other colors.

I'm 5'11" with very broad shoulders and a long torso. I recently had a baby and ordered an XL to fit my shoulders and be sightly loose over my midsection. I can also easily nurse in this shirt if that matters to anyone. This shirt is amazing! I've never loved a T-shirt this much. It's so soft and it's long, which is hard for me to find. I love this. I'm going to buy more for sure.

I really like these blouses.  They are lightweight and nice looking.  The colors are very pretty too.  I like that the shirts are long, which is nice for people who want to detract attention from their mid-section.  I especially like the scoop neck.  I find that most T-shirts come up too high and if you are large-busted, they will just make you look fat.  The scoop neck on these pulls away from the neckline enough that it creates a really nice shape and hags well on the body.The only reason I did not give these 5 stars is because the material is so light and delicate that I would recommend hand washing and hanging to dry rather than running them through a machine if you really want them to last.  On the other hand, the shirts are very inexpensive, so replacing them may not be an issue for you.  I definitely recommend.

I'm very casual and have been replacing shirts with more simple tops as my older ones have worn out. I ordered 2 of these and loved the fit so much that I ordered more. The top is form-fitting but still flattering on me. The top goes down to the top of my thigh (I am 5'5, 178 lbs and an hourglass shape). I probably could have gone a size down to a Large, but wasn't sure if it would end up too tight across my D-cups.  The shirt is easy to dress up or down depending on the occasion. Have and would repurchase!

The first one I ordered was red in xxl.  I usually get xxl in tees because I have natural 36DDs and don't always want to have guys staring, especially at work which is where I intend to wear these.  However, the xxl was very boxy.  Pretty color, but ⬛.  So I figured I'd go down a size even though the difference between the xl and xxl is bigger than the difference between any of the other sizes, a 9" difference versus a 3" difference.  Thankfully, the xl, this time in burgundy, fits ok, not too tight in the chest so I won't feel self-conscious at work.  The red is a very vibrant and bold shade, while the burgundy has depth and warmth.  The material is soft but has weight, not that thin tissue paper-like material, and in those colors is not see-thru.  The seams are even and trim.  The shirts do come out of the dryer a little wrinkled, but that may be because I dry my clothes on "no heat" so they last longer.  Hanging them on hangers helps get rid of some of the wrinkles but if you fold your tees, you'll likely have a very wrinkled shirt.I intend to get more in the burgundy (for work) and some of the other colors (just cuz), in xl.
super comfy!  Nice & long.  will purchase again & think I need a L vs XL.  I am 5'1" & 140lbs

These are a great fit. They don't cling in the underarm area and are not skin tight. I am 5'4", 170 pounds (37ish inch waist, for reference), and I ordered the large. Not tight, and not super flow-y. I would say I am a large size in most tank tops/t-shirts, so definitely order the size that you would usually get unless you want it especially tight/loose. The colors are great and I saw no loose threads upon taking them out of the package.

I like the fit but I felt scammed because it is definitely not made out of cotton. The label said 95% cotton 5% spandex but I know it’s made out of rayon. Labeling and title are a lie these are not cotton. I will not purchase clothes from Chinese factories off Amazon again because I am tired of their products often being mislabeled on purpose to deceive customers.

I am 5’3 and 180 pounds. I got a XL. I normally wear a large from Maurice’s and places that are more women’s sizing, and XL from places that are smaller and more junior sizing. Super comfy and seams well made. I was expecting the arm holes to be to big because normally they are on me but these were just right.

I loved the top such much, I ordered 3 more in other colors. The fit is perfect , the weave is not see thru unless you go bra less, it shapes to your body line. It’s cool enough to wear on a hot day. I’m 162 lbs wear a 36B , I ordered an extra large since I hate wearing tight fitted tops. It fit me exactly how I like my tops. Love , love  them!!!!

I love this shirt! The waffle knit fabric feels good quality, the buttons are nice and the medium fits great. I did notice there’s a bit of a peek-a-boo between the buttons and fabric, I could see my bra. But if you wear a lighter cami underneath that would solve the problem! I am 5’6”, 132lbs and a 36A for reference.

Seriously these tops are amazing! I already had purchased this style in longer sleeved option from this brand and loved those ones too, but since I live in the hot Arizona desert I was very excited to see sleeveless options now! But then I made the mistake of buying from a different seller first as they had the same pictures, a pretty reputable brand on here... the other seller’s shirt was awful! Returned it immediately and found the IWOLLENCE listing for this shirt and it’s wonderful!!! It’s a true waffle knit, and also one of the softest shirts I’ve ever felt, but not in the “soft because the fabric is too thin” sort of way — this shirt’s fabric is basically made of magic. It’s the perfect weight, texture, looks exactly like they’re photos. I swear I’m not being paid and don’t know anyone from this company lol cause I know I sound like an advertisement here! This shirt is just that good though!Also sizing is exactly right! I’m 5’7” 145 pounds usually a medium in tops, that’s what I ordered, the fit is PERFECT.PS When taking my photos in the beautiful blue/green top I only had my son’s bathroom available for selfies so please excuse the mess behind me! Eek!

Great material, well made, very comfortable.  I am 36D with a 27 waist so I ordered a M.  I would not go with a large and a small would have been too small across the bust.  I am 5’5” and 137 lbs.  I bought the wine colored and will definitely purchase again in other colors.  The company even sent a cute silver necklace.  Happy with the product.

I bought three different items for my friend. She absolutely love these shirt!! Way better then expected feels wonderful and nice quality! The button detail in the front adds to the style of the shirts. The tie in the front make sit very adjustable . She has gotten lots of compliments. This fits true to size. She is 126lbs 5’5” and I got her a small one in white. See her photos. This fits great. They are real cute with skinny jeans and boots or sandals. I got another one for myself in different color.

I am surprised how much I like this shirt. It is super comfortable and light so perfect for the summer. My only complaint is that there is a huge amount of space between the buttons which causes large gaps in the chest area when you sit down. Since I got the black one I think I may sew the shirt closed to prevent that from happening. Otherwise wearing a tank top underneath it would be a must.

I ordered the rust red (which is more mauve- very pretty) and loved it so much I ordered another one in black. It’s so cute and comfortable. True to size, I’m 5’8 and 145lbs and a small fit perfectly. It still had a loose look but not super “oversized”.

These tops are great! Very lightweight and the waffle fabric is very breathable. I am 5'5" 175lbs and I typically wear a size 10-12. I order this top in a Large, in both the green and red colors. The fit is exactly what I wanted, not too tight, drapes nicely. I am 9 months post partum and still have a bit of a tummy pouch going on, and the draping of this shirt nicely covers that area, and the knotted feature helps camouflage it as well. The buttons down the front are functional and I can easily nurse in this top.

I’m top heavy, big belly, 38D, bottoms size 14, prefer oversized XXL tops.  It’s a roomy top (in a good way)  but not so big that you can see in the underarm holes.  I’m the type who can’t stand itchy material or tags in clothes so I find the waffle knit is  comfortable on my skin & the material is soft and natural feeling. There are tails in front that you tie into a knot. The knot draws attention to my fat gut so that is not a flattering look for me, but that’s not the shirt’s fault. Ive actually left it untied & the tails hanging down which looks better on me. I’ve worn this shirt a lot since I got it & I love it. It’s held up in the laundry probably 10 times since I got it in early May. I wore it during a trip to Florida and it was perfect for the heat. Easy to dress it up or down.

I was worried when I ordered this but was very pleased when I received it. It’s nice a flowing. Material is pleasing and it draps and covers my stomach very well. It stays put at the shoulders which is a huge dealTo me!! I am 5’4, 219 lbs, 38 B, and typically wear XL or 1X. Highly recommended this top!!

Really good quality and made well. Stays on shoulders. I’m 5’10 160lbs and got a medium and it fits just right. I do however have a long torso so when tied all the way it fits more like a belly shirt so just something to be aware of for tall girls.
I bought two colors in size medium. I am 5 ft 3, 140lbs, 38D bust. People love them, and so do I. I plan to order another color!
Comfortable and cute. Received many compliments!

I LOVE this top! I am 5’10 and about 180 lbs. I typically wear a 12-14 pant and an L or XL top (depending on the top).This top is a large. It’s more cropped in the front than I thought, but ties a little loser and I used a mid rise pant. Perfect! Thin material- but will be perfect for the concert in Vegas. Super cute!
WOW! This top is so cute. Just what I wanted. The material is great- Love it. I ordered a Large and I'm about a size 14/16

Super cute shirt! Will be ordering more colors. I got the XL, I am a size 16, 38DDD. Maybe could have gone with a size L? It fits perfectly tho, flowy and very light, I have thicker arms and top stays put off shoulders. Love how flattering it is, even slimming while hiding my tummy...and uhh muffin top issues. Ha.

Beautiful but, size up 1 or 2. I normally wear a L/XL but ordered a 2x based off of experience from ordering clothes online they tend to run smaller.  The 2x is a little big but, i believe my regular size would be a bit snug.  I love this one!

I bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it !  I don’t normally buy clothes for her.....but I saw this and just had a feeling she would love it!I especially want to thank all the beautiful ladies who also reviewed this and posted their photos.. it was extremely helpful to me in getting the correct size for my wife by seeing all the different body types and seeing what sizes they purchased. Thank you so much !!

Absolutely LOVE this shirt!!!! I would definitely buy again. Fits true to size. I usually wear a US Large and I bought a Large and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'2 180lbs and chest measurement is 46 inches. If you're on the fence buy it you won't regret it. I hope this review helps someone.

LOVE this tee. I am usually a M-L, with a little post-babies pooch, so I don't like clingy clothing. Ordered the olive in L, and it's PERFECT. I'm 5'9"+, between 135-145lbs. The material is breathable, and the cotton/modal/spandex blend makes it feel slightly more polished than plain cotton, and I love the somewhat thicker weight... I've washed it in cool water, and while I was planning to air-dry it, a helpful kiddo put the laundry through the dryer, normal heat. The shirt did not shrink at all- YAY! I came back today to order three more of these, in different colors. For the price, comfort, and fit, you cannot beat this shirt.

The fit and fabric of this shirt are wonderful - and the sizing is as expected. It's got a nice taper and the length is perfect for tucking into scrubs comfortably. The sleeves are tight, but not restrictive, so you don't have to worry about the opening of your sleeve dipping into any questionable substances. Overall, this long sleeve tee is worth every penny. I bought navy and white, and even the white is thick and doesn't have that sheer quality that some white tees have. Highly recommend this product.

These are the best basic long sleeve tees I’ve ever found!  They are a really nice light stretchy material, and they are actually long enough!  They aren’t like most shirts that are way too short and tight.  I’m 5’7” 112 lbs, and I got an XS.  It is a little bit loose, but that’s how I like my shirts to fit.  I have an extremely long torso, and these shirts are a perfect length for me.  I don’t even have to wear an undershirt.

This shirt is so so so fantastic! The torso is long, the sleeves are long, and the material is perfect. I had read another review that talked about a small vs. extra small, and how it may run a little big. I went with the XS because of that review and it fits perfectly. Not tight but not too loose either. I can't believe it was only $11!!! I will be buying all the colors :-)

I don't know why my images don't load right side up anymore. I am 5' 9" 145lbs, 37, 31, 38 as I write this, and the medium fits well as usual. I am always on the hunt for the perfect long sleeve tee, and this isn't it, but it's great for $11.  I ordered more colors, but after wearing this one for the day I think I'll return them. I want to see if Woolworth's long sleeve tees are the ones I'm searching for. Patty Boutik has gloriously long sleeves, but her tops tend to be low cut with tight sleeves.Pros:THE SLEEVES ARE LONG ENOUGH.The burgundy is a lovely deep purple hue just like on the model.The torso is also long enough.Neckline is comfy, not too high, not too low: I don't have to worry about bending over to chase kids and revealing anything.Cons:The material isn't cottony enough. I felt my pits get moist when I was moving around a lot earlier.The sleeves could be looser at the bottom, but maybe they'll stretch a bit. They're also a little snugger over all than I prefer, but not awful.The shirt does sort of cling to my meager chest. It doesn't form to my body quite the way I like. Like cotton. sigh.It's a nice shirt, but it's not THE shirt.UPDATE:I changed my review to 2 stars after stocking up on Eddie Bauer, Carhartt, and Woolrich long sleeve tees. They're all more cottony and move with my body better. This shirt sort of got caught on my bustline and I ended up adjusting often throughout the day.

Love the quality of this shirt.  Sleeves FINALLY long enough for me!  It runs big out of the box so I'm hoping it will shrink a bit.  And the shirt is really long. I may have to hem it.  But I'm very pleasantly surprised by the quality of the fabric and workmanship. Amazon, keep adding basics items like this at these fantastic prices and you will be my new go to clothing store!!

This shirt appears to have spandex in it, which I wouldn't have minded, if it is was so horribly small, for the size.I wear an XL, because I hate skin tight clothing.  This fit like a large.  If you buy it, order a size bigger.

This tee is perfect for a fall/winter layering piece..  The weight is thick and it's very stretchy.  Color is beautiful. I ordered my regular size large and it fit perfectly bu the size chart is off.  My bust is 45.5 inches but the large chart shows a 38" but, so go off your regular size and not the chart, unless you want the looser fit.  You won't be unhappy with these tees.

This would make a great layering piece (I ordered three colors and kept one for that purpose) but returned to Amazon.  I really wanted this to be a stand alone piece but it is too form fitting for me and shows every imperfection I've got.  I also wanted something a little more substantial. As far as sizing goes, I ordered my normal size and it fit fine.

If you have ever worn Lularoe leggings, then you know what kind of softness I’m comparing this shirt to. It’s buttery soft and with wonderful stretch. I love black and white strip cause it goes with everything from jeans to green army vests. I wore this shirt every week and even bought other colors. I bought an XL because I wanted the shirt to be loose on me. I just had a baby and didn’t want to accentuate my love handles that take time to go away. I was 195lbs when u bought the shirt and my chest was a DDD. It fit great. Long enough to come midway down my bottom (leggings approved shirt). Most Importantly- it didn’t shrink too much in the dryer like all my other thin shirts! That’s the major headliner. Because all my clothes from China shrink the the dryer.Stripes look awesome with solid colored vests! I posted pics. It’s just down right cozy, but you still look good enough to leave the house.

Such a cute top. The material is so soft too. I usually buy a large because im somewhat top heavy and end up having the shirt be way to big. I bought a medium in this and its perfect. Im 5'3 145lbs 36D if that helps anyone.

I think the swing type halter tops are probably the most flattering design on any body type. I saw this blouse some time ago and hesitated to order it even though I knew this style is typically flattering. I was unsure of the material, because some people posted pictures that were not good quality and they look wrinkled and not very flattering material. However,that's not what this  blouse turned out to be.I went ahead and ordered it based on one of the young ladies who posted her picture, she's a young blonde girl she gave incredible photos. Which I believe are factual photos. It fit me and looked identical to hers. The material is superb and it's as good a quality as I buy at high end retail department store. For me, it fits pretty true to what I expected. I'm 5 '11 and wear almost entirely a USA small 4/6 occasionally, if it's cut really small I do purchase a medium if it's for a 6/8 med. I did since this is over the internet purchase order medium, because it's always better to be a little loose than too small. It fits perfectly for what I was looking for. It fits well and it's skims the body ..it does not cling! I highly recommend this blouse.. in fact I'm going to be ordering more from this particular seller.

I was confused as there are 2 size charts for this. I went with the one in the photos, not the one in the link. Measure don't guess!!I am 5'7", most shirts I wear are small or medium (manufacturer determines this). By chart a medium should fit, but was concerned about tight/clingy from comments. Ordered a large.Fits very well, not tight across chest (was biggest concern), very flattering, very flowy material. Looks stunning with the skirt I wanted to wear it with and will be a great addition to my wardrobe this summer as will pair with jean shorts exceptionally.

This top is GORGEOUS! I love the color, kind of peacock blue/teal. I love the soft, drapey fabric. I love the gathered neckline. I would love this is more colors, but it appears they only have it in black and this color. I wear a 10-12 and the large fits perfectly. I do like the band at the hips, sometimes this is kind of "oompa-loompa" like and emphasizes an imperfect tummy, but this top is just really cute. I immediately ordered the black.

After purchasing one black top (the halter with the twist at the neck), I bought another black and a dark blue. It's really flattering if you like a halter top.  The banded waist helps hide my less-than-perfect belly.  I wear it with a racer back bra, or without one at all. Good for casual or going out - and a long necklace looks great nestled in the fabric. I ordered the cream and apricot versions, too, but they were both see-through so I returned them.  Highly recommend this top in the darker colors.
I don’t know if I got a defect but it looks so weird. It is sewn on one side of the shirt but not the other.

I am a size 12 or L. I ordered a M and it was pretty loose still. I use a clip or body tape to keep it secure. The tag in the top says M but the tag attached to it says XL. I ended up returning the first one because of this then I realized the second one they sent me said xl as well but on the top itself is labeled M.The color is beautiful, a true vibrant pink. The material is soft and is of good quality, not thin or see through at all. I definitely recommend it, just be aware of sizing. I’m 165lbs and usually wear a M or L in tops. If I order another one I will definitely do a small

Sending this back. It is way too big on me. I would need an xs, as the chest band is very loose. I’m a 32D bra, so I’m not tiny chested, either. I’m only 108, so maybe someone a little thicker would do just fine w a small. I tried putting on a padded strapless bra under it and that didn’t even help. Too short, compared to another brand I was able to get in an extra small.
Love the color and the style. Not too tight. Great stretch material.

What a cute style and it is very form fitting. Unfortunately, very difficult to button/unbutton since the "eyelets" are these very tight elastics.  I wound up having to tear one off to take the blouse off as the neck area is to small to take off.  Hooks would be a better option. The main downfall of this shirt...the stylized portion of the collar is inserted into the seams through two small holes...which are not sewn or reinforced.  They became more prominent by the second wear.  They literally look like the shirt is ripped.

I use these as regular tops and workout tops.  They are so light and comfortable!  They run a little large, I normally wear a medium, I wear a small in this.  I'm 5'7" 140lbs bust is 34DD, if that helps anyone try to figure out size.  Going by the size chart, I would think I would want a medium, but it was too baggy for me, small fits great!

I bought this shirt with some board shorts to go cave tubing on a cruise.  I normally wear a large and bought one size up based on some reviews. I'm tall and long waisted and was thrilled that the shirt is long enough for me!!  I love the fabric and the V-Neck, too!  Within 30 minutes if trying it on I bought another one in a different color!

I usually wear a medium in tee shirts.  36 bust. 5' 8" tall. It has a nice sized neck.  Not too low cut.  I can wear it, but I really should have ordered a large as I wear it for Pickleball and it is a little tighter than I like.  I also have one in a large which I love.  It is not too big.  It is a little wider in the hips which allows it to hang looser.
The quality is good. It fits larger than usual. Not good for petite folks. It is longer too. I usually wear S, might fit ok in XS in this style, but I haven't tried XS.

i bought this for my mom before our beach trip for her to wear instead of a bikini since she had a mastectomy this past year and can no longer wear bikini tops and feel confident. this top looked great on her, kept her from getting any kind of sunburn and is a great quality product especially since its a rash guard essentially and way less expensive than similar products. i think this would also be great for anyone in hot weather/ perspiration prone moments and needs a shirt that is quick dry and comfortable in the heat.

It is a terrific top, as a matter of fact, I am wearing it right now.  It packs very nice when traveling , taking up no space at all in my suitcase,  and so light in weight,  so I can pack more.  I love it so much, I plan to buy more in other colors.
This is a good quality shirt - feels great on & has washed very well.  I ordered 2 - one for me & one for my daughter.  We both love them!

Based on reviews, I bought my normal size and a size up. The larger size was HUGE. The regular size fit well. It was not tight at all, giving me plenty of room to breathe. Like other posted in Q&A, you can just wear a shorts bra underneath, but beware that even some sports bras don't have enough padding to keep things from showing through. Use a thicker bra. I've worn this shirt every time I've gone to the pool and I've been very happy with it. Would buy again.

I was very happy to receive this shirt in the mail. I ordered using the size chart for amazon and it fit perfectly. If I had to say if it was on the larger or smaller size of normal, I would say larger. The material is very lightweight, but opaque. I would buy this tee again, if I found I needed more.

I needed a swim top that was modest for the fitness center. This swim top is true to size. It does not have a built in bra, so if you tend to show things - you will need to wear something under. I did notice that tended to bubble up when I was in the jacuzzi. I had to tuck it into my swim shorts.

I have 4 of theseEmmalise Clothing Women's Basic Casual Plain Long tank top and just ordered 4 more. they fit perfect. I order s 2 XL because I am heavy set ( 5'6 - 260 lb)  and they are perfect. they are long and lay just below my zipper if not a little longer. They also dont ride up all the time like other tank tops and I layer everything. And riding up all day is such a pain. So thats huge for me. And when your plus size you never know how things are going to fit on line, but these are perfect.

As you can see this is a little too long but I also picked a size higher than I really should have. I usually buy an XL for the length due to my long torso but I could have gone down a size and would have had plenty of length. I'm 5'5 160 lbs and relatively larger chest. This doesn't have a restrictive bra insert either. Deffinitely a little see through but nothing layering won't help!

Ladies, Typically I wear a size large in shirts or XL if I want alose fit and a 38C or 36D cup at Victoria secrets.The tanks are comfy and soft. The material is worth the price. I paid less than $8 for each tank.I was looking for a layering tank and this is exactly what I expected and received.I wear size large yoga pants and size 14 jeans. The pic shows the length and stretch of the tank.Oh and I'm 5'3"

I really like this camisole. However, after I washed and dried it I immediately wished I had ordered a size bigger. I like a tight fitting tank, but this is too snug. They definitely run a size small. I'm a plus sized 43 year old and I'm pear shaped; I'm all backside. I just ordered three more in a larger size.What I like about it...It's fairly long and thin, so I can tuck it into my jeans or shorts and IT STAYS PUT without showing a tank line on my behind.It's tight enough that I can forgo my bra and my little girls get some support. I like the way my breasts look in this camisole and that's saying something. I wear mine solely under tanks, t-shirts and blouses.The fabric is a thin cotton blend and it's rather soft and stretchy. It's thin, but it's not too thin. There's no itchy tag and I'm grateful for that.The spaghetti straps are well constructed; I just love spaghetti straps.These camis are super affordable and my goodness... there are plenty of colors to choose from. It's a great little cami for this price.

These are perfect, fit well I am 5'2 around 240. I ordered a 3x and they are awesome, good quality, Long in length for layering and covering trouble spots. The bottom stays fitted and does not stretch out, and they hold up after a year of constant washing and wear. I have ordered these in multiple colors now. GREAT BUY!!
The color was suppose to be burgandy and it just looks plain red to me. I ordered this specific one because I wanted it to be dark, it's dark, but it's just not as dark as the picture.

I am so beyond impressed by this top. I bought a large. I am 5'4", 143 lbs and 6 months pregnant. It fits perfectly!! It has plenty of stretch and really flatters your curves. The length is longer than a normal top. It is more like a tunic length. Perfect for over leggings. I absolutely love the length aspect. The straps are adjustable too, which is awesome. I am definitely buying more. This shirt is perfect!

I ordered a ton of these in M and L. Def order a size up...especially if you have any boobage. Very long...I know most people like that and you get that w these...I just wish they sold these in a shorter option.

Great long tank! I'm 5'6 and 200lb, small chest with a lil belly from my first baby. The xl fits awesome, and doesn't stretch out on bottom. I've ordered three more! Also, plenty of wiggle room, so I think the xl would fit someone larger than me.

I was very disappointed in how this cami is totally see through! You'd need another cami or a bralette in order to wear the white one. Wish I could get a refund, but I'm not paying $3.95 to ship back a cheap tank.

Got a size XL after reading reviews. I absolutely love it! Will be buying more in different colors. I still have 25lbs if baby weight hanging around and still nursing. This too make me feel pretty! So comfy and soft. Love it!

I read all the reviews before I ordered and decided to go with a XXL when I normally wear a XL, because it sounded like the top fit a size too small. That was definitely not the case for me. I could have comfortably wore an XL and I’m 5’3”, 40E and 190lbs.It’s a very cute and good quality top. Somebody complained about pocket placement, but everything was good for me. I really like the shirt. I don’t plan to return it, even though it’s large. I can wear it knotted. I’ll probably buy again in a XL this time.I would recommend this top. (:

I am 5'2" , 135 pounds, 32DDD bra size, I ordered a medium and I love how it fits! It is not tight at all, flowy but doesn't make me look pregnant. Super cute! Nervous because it says dry clean only but hopefully washing it on delicate works out!

This top is extremely comfortable.  So much so, you can forget you're wearing it!I wore it travelling to the TCI and it looked fresh and felt fluid and soft at my destination.  It's not the dressiest of tops but for casual wear, it's a good buy, and a jacket dresses it up sufficientlyThis washes easily and DRIES QUICKLY.  I used it as a pajama top in a pinch and it made a cool sleep top, too.I plan on buying more in various colours.The top falls at hip length, making it flattering and versatile for many body types.  It runs a tad large perhaps but not overly so.The colour-blocked pocket detail makes this top stand out from dozens of other nondescript tops in one shade only.Similar tops LOOK lightweight but are surprisingly heavy to pack but this casual shirt is light and rolls up neatly in a suitcase or carry-on.Good buy, this.  Love it.Thank you for taking the time to read this review.  I hope it's been of help to you.
I ordered a size up. The shirt is very nice quality! Almost feels silky! Wearing it for a photo shoot !

This shirt is awesome!  I received so many compliments when I wore it!  The fit was perfect.  I can usually wear a size S or M, but I chose the M based on other reviews and because I wanted a looser fit.  The fabric is so soft and comfortable.  It washes well and doesn't wrinkle.  I dried the shirt on low heat after the first wash and high heat after the second (because I forgot), and it didn't shrink at all.  The shirt is perfect to wear with jeans for a casual look or to dress up with black pants.  The v of the neckline doesn't dip too low to show cleavage, and the white fabric isn't see-through, so there's no need for a cami underneath.  I highly recommend this shirt.  I would definitely buy this brand clothing from this seller again.

Super cute and comfy!! It's a little shear so I'll probably wear a cami under it but that's no biggie because I usually do anyway. I love that it is flowy at the bottom like the picture shows. A great shirt when you don't want to try too hard but still want to look cute! I'm 5'4, 140 lbs and still losing the baby weight so I love the fit! Would def buy again in diff colors!
Cute top and soft material. It is loose fitting like I wanted and it works tucked in or not. I’m 5’4 155 pounds with 38DD and I ordered a large and it fits great.

Comfy and cute. I'm 5'9" and 165lbs (carrying a little baby weight in my tummy) and I bought a large. I wanted it loose but still a good fit, and it's perfect. The shoulders and sleeves fit nicely and then it falls nicely. Covers the booty too. Soft and slinky - love it.
Love it! It looks exactly like the picture. It's a super cute casual shirt. Good material and breathable.

Phone doesn't look as sleek in the case, but how could it? Color and looks show through well. Bumpers on top and bottom protect well against a drop. No raised bumpers on sides, so it is possible for my phone to fall screen first.

I was really excited to get my first OtterBox for an affordable price. The only thing is, as you can see in the pictures, the border/bumper of the case yellows EXTREMELY fast. I've only had the case for a little over a month and it's already turned yellow. I've ordered cheaper, clear cases that don't even yellow that fast. So it's something to be aware of before you purchase. If the discoloration doesn't bother you then by all means purchase it because the case is very durable, after all it is an OtterBox.

I really like the case but it did not fit my phone so I returned it.  Not the seller's fault......I didn't pay attention and ordered the S9 instead of S9+.  It was delivered very quickly and I received my refund promptly.
I received on June 1, I have now had to file an Otterbox claim as the case is scratched but more importantly the back of my phone is shattered.  This case did NOT protect my phone when dropped.

I mostly love this case! Great design, easy to put on and take off, doesn't interfere with buttons, in other words a great otterbox case. However when it does get scratches it seems to scratch quite deeply. The edges also have picked up a dirty looking blue from living in my back pocket, and the rubbery material makes it impossible to clean (if anyone has tips I'd love to hear them!). The phone is also more exposed due to the curved edges, so the 2 or 3 times I've dropped my phone the phone edge has caught and cracked my glass screen protector (previous phone and otterbox was for the S7 with a full edge wrap/ more protection)
I love how it gives my screen a bumper zone if dropped face down, easy to put on, works with screen protector, and is wireless charger compatible

Probably the lightest of the OtterBox series, This case will give you OtterBox protection with half the weight. The sides come up higher Knouff to protect the curved screen address and your screen protector. Particularly if you were using a ZAGG SCREEN PROTECTOR which has a tendency to crack if an edge touch is a hard flat surface.
Buttons are very stiff which makes it hard to lock/unlock the phone or use the volume buttons.

I've had this less than two months and the clear is already yellowing. I specifically bought it because I thought it would stay nicer for longer. Very disappointed in this case, not worth the extra money.
Fit well, Clear Case, does not block the Biometric button on lower back side of Galaxy S9 I recommend this case..

First, let me say that these are the softest camisoles I've ever owned. You cannot beat the price for a three pack of these tanks. They are of good quality material and they are incredibly comfortable. As for the 4 stars, they are a bit big on me, but not so much that I would return them. I don't like it when camisoles are too tight. I'm 5'6", 160 lbs, 29.5" waist with an athletic build. I purchased the size large based on the size chart and on the other reviews. If I order more, which I'm considering, I would order the medium size. I'll update this review if I do.  These are great for layering clothing. The package arrived on time as well. Hope this review helps with your decision. Happy Shopping!

First off let me say these tanks are very soft and very well made. I ordered a size small after reading some reviews. When the package arrived last Friday I tried on the black tank. It was a little tight so I returned them and re-purchased them in the size medium, I received the 2nd package Monday and tried the black tank on Tuesday. The medium is just as tight IF not tighter than the small size?? I'm not sure how to advise others of buying these tanks. I am trying one more time, hoping the 3rd times the charm on this order. For reference I am 5′3'' and 135. I will update my review after trying on the large size.

Incredibly soft and comfortable tank tops.  Great for layering.  Fit true to size for me. I'm 5'9" 135 lbs and ordered size small.  These are the perfect length for me, not too long and not too short. Material is of medium thickness, in the picture added to the review I'm wearing a white bra underneath and it's not noticeable unless up close.

These camisoles are wonderrful! I rarely write a review of a product but I have found it hard to find the right camisole.  They are either too long or too tight.  I wear a camisole everyday and need something comfortable.  They are light and silky smooth and fit perfectly.  NOT too long or too tight.  Like a light, silky second skin.  And nice enough to wear by themselves.  I immediately bought 3 more

Im 5'2 and 155 lbs. After reading previous reviews I ordered 2 sizes up. I normally wear m-l and ordered xl. The fit is comfortable and just right. I purchased these to wear under my work shirts as I live in Florida and need the layer so my work shirt doesnt have giant sweat spots. The softness feels great on my skin. I just received today and I have only tried the tank top on, but plan on wearing to work today, so we will see how it holds up throughout a hot humid day.

Hands down the most comfortable tank tops I've worn. These are so soft and lightweight that it almost feels like I'm not wearing anything. Contrary to some reviewers' experience, I found these to run large and not transparent. I would be comfortable with wearing even the white and gray ones by themselves rather than layering pieces.The tops seem well-made, not cheap material. They don't cling to the body or my pants. But they are a bit too big on me. I'm 5'3, 115 lbs, normally XS/S. There's a gap between the chest (near the armpit) and the top, which I got in size small.

I bought these tanks because I have a large chest and always wear a tank under my shirts. They cover well, are very comfy and stretchy, and fit me just as expected. I am 5’3 and 180 lbs and bought an extra large.If I had one critique, I would say that the fabric is a bit thin and I would never wear one without a shirt or cardigan over it.

These really are pretty decent tank tops for the price.  They are super stretchy and pretty comfortable.  However...they are VERY thin...I mean PAPER THIN.  If you don't mind that, then this may be a great tank for you.  Sizing is what is expected.  The length on me (I'm 5' 8") was to my hip bones.  This is not a long tank.

This tank tops are exactly as described. I love the material so much, supersoft and lightweight. After being washed several times it is still like new. I wear it under shirts and as a sleepwear. It never dissapointed me. It is stretchy and I would recommend sizing down.

They came on time and packing was good.  Some people said they are really thin and wrinkles bad, but I bought them to wear under my outers, so they are fine.  It was really had for me to find tank tops which is not too long, not too short, not too tight, not too lose, not too low around neck, not too high around neck, not too thick, and not get shrank when I wash and dry.  So, I'm pretty happy with this product, and thinking about re-order different color ones too.

I was a little nervous ordering this top, due to the mixed reviews.I don't like my tops clingy to me; I prefer the flowy feel! I have a 38-40-D chest, which sometimes leaves this difficult. If I do find a top I love, it typically makes me feel extremely unproportionate. This top does NONE of that!!! I typically wear between a Large - XL top, and I ordered the XXL in this top and it fits beautifully!!! I'm comfortable, confident and not worried about my belly sticking out or it being too tight around my chest!!! I plan on buying more colors of this exact same top! I also love the cut of the sleeve, kind of a sexy look for women!!!!

Love the color, love the style, love the fit. It’s not long like the photo, it’s more of a slouchy look. But I love everything about this and will most likely order more! I’m 5’3”, size D cup and 130 pounds and I ordered a small

Pleasantly surprised with how quickly this arrived, well-packaged, and superior quality. The material, workmanship, and style are wonderful. In a store I would pay twice the cost for this quality. The material is soft, not too thin, stretchy and comfy looking. Beautiful true Navy Blue. Bought the tank as pictured and will consider more colors based on this one

The top looks a little more casual than the picture but overall totally love. Good material and the color was what I was expecting [ordered a blue one.] Arm holes are perfect size, comfortable but not a giant gaping hole that shows everything. Super comfortable. Actually came back to look for more and decided to review while I was at it.

The color is as pictured and very nice.  I love the fit and the tuck at the bottom gives it extra character.  The tank is loose enough to cover my "chunk" but also fitted enough to give me a long and lean look.  Paired it with some white shorts and a long necklace like the picture.  Super cute!

Just bought my second top for this vender. Super comfy and got compliments too I plan on buying a couple more as they come in different colors and designs. Perfect summer top. It hide my muffin top nicely as well.
Nice summer tank top, simple looking but fashionable. Fabric is very soft, smooth and silky. It is cute, thin and summery garment and my daughter loves it.
This is perfect for wearing under light weight cardigans in the spring with jeans. My regular size fit, but I also could have gone up a size for a looser fit like in the picture.

I love these tank tops. The material is so soft. Have not washed them yet so not sure on how they are after washing. The parts of the tank top that are straight down are longer than the knot which I did not expect but still cute. The knot adds some style.

I really like the material of this top. It is very light (but not see-through) and will be perfect this summer. The purple color I purchased goes beautifully with two different pair of leggings that I recently got.

So, I was really worried about buying a shirt on amazon. I wear an 18/20, and I got the 2x, and it fits great. If anything, it was a little big in the back. It definitely doesn't hug your belly (if you have one), and the hike in the thigh area is very cute. If you are like me and have a bit of an overhang in the stomach, don't worry, the shirt is long enough to cover it. You can buy this one confidently.
I usually wear a medium but after reading reviews, I figured I should order a small - and it’s fits perfect!
I really love this shirt. I'm 5'5" and 150lbs and got the medium and it fits perfectly
Exactly as pictured. Super cute, perfect length true to size. Very comfy but easy to dress up!
Love this shirt!!! It fits perfect and great quality!!
It's a very nice top.  I bought the white top and it is so soft and stylish. It is not too thick or thin. Just don't wear a black bra underneath. Otherwise, it works great with jeans or leggings.
Super soft and comfortable shirt.I'm 5'7" 132lbs and ordered a small, it fits nice!
The white floral of this design fits very large. I bought a large and am 5'8 160lbs and it's very big. I'd probably need a small. I am returning
Love this shirt! Hides the tummy with the knot on the bottom so no complaints there. It is long though.

This is a beautiful shirt.  Quality is great.  It's not thin and you can not see through.  I like my shirts a little longer and this one is perfect.  It will cover your bum which I like.  I usually wear a large, however I ordered a medium and it fits perfect.  I am 5'4 and weigh 160.

Note about pictures:  these are how they look after several months of wear.  I've included the Kadee next to the citilane so you can see the difference between unisex and standard sizing.I bought a pair of these in size 7 in black at the same as the size 7w citilane unisex crocs in red.  Very disparate ideas of what a size 7 is between both sandals.The citilane were very wide and chucky, and the straps ended up giving me a flew blisters.  These are vary narrow and a little undersized but are otherwise more comfortable to me and zero blisters.  These also feel a little less supportive and cushioned than the citilane, but I still find them more comfortable.I've worn them for months, and on several multi mile walks, and they've been nothing but comfortable.I figured I'd reorder in size 8 for my next pair (the lemon ones) because my heel sat a bit too close to the back on the 7.  Well, heel sits just as close on the 8 so the only difference is more length where the toes are and more width.I'm generally a size 7 to 7 and a half.  My foot is 10 inches in length from my big toe to my heel, and the widest part of my foot measures 9 inches around.

Warning- DO NOT leave these in the sun for any length of time. When these arrived, I loved them! They fit perfect, were lightweight, and were comfortable on my feet. I took them on a beach trip the first week I had them and they did great walking in the sand and were easy to clean. The issue came when I rinsed them off and left them on the deck to dry...they shrunk. When I say say shrunk, I mean they went from a perfect size 9 to a size 6!! They were in the sun for less than 2 hours when I tried to put them on and realized that my heel was hanging off the back. I compared them with another pair I bought in a different color and could not believe how small they had become! I would give them 5 stars if it were not for the incredible shrinkage.

I really wanted a pair of summer sandals that I could wear all day without dying of foot and leg pain at the end of the day and I know from experience the foot bed of the croc shoe is very comfy.  I also didn't want to break the bank. Problem is, I normally wear a size 8 but every size 8 croc's I've ever tried are too long for my feet, leaving more than a full inch of space from end of toe to tip of shoe. This causes me to trip over my own toes or 'drag' the toe every so often, so I no longer buy size 8 croc's. I also need a wide shoe and must beware of  multiple straps because they can pinch and bind in all the wrong places.  I decided on the tried and true flip flop, as they can usually accommodate wide feet due to the basic "openness" of the shoe. I took a chance and ordered down to a size 7 and glad I did because size 8 would have been way to long. I do wish the flops offered a little more arch support as I have high arches, but all in all, they are working out well. The back of my heel sits right at the heel cup and there is still room at the toe as you can see in the pics. I love the squishy bouncy feel of the shoe when walking or standing. I broke one of my toes before these arrived and will be wearing them daily until my toe heals.  FYI, I deducted one star for lack of half sizes and one star for mediocre arch support.

I decided to go one size up and they fit perfect! I normally order size 8 in sandals that have no half sizes but after reading reviews, I decided to go with a 9. I wear 8.5 in closed toe shoes and 8 in sandals. So go with a 9 if you normally wear an 8 or an 8.5. These shoes are a whole size off. I owned and loved my Kadee originals but my puppy chewed them up last week and I thought I could get another pair and they were no longer available. The Kadee 2's are just as comfortable on day one. The Kadee originals, I had to wear for a couple weeks and got a blister and then they fit well. These are good right out of the box. They are not as arch supportive as the originals but they will do. These feel a bit thinner.  Although, I am still looking for another pair to wear around the house on tile floors. These do have a bit of arch support but for flat floors, I feel I need a bit more. The price on these is a winner. I would buy them again, good shopping shoe but not all day support. If you have lower back problems like I do from gluten allergies and looking for all day wear on cement floors get another style. Good garden shoe, easy rinse and go.

My daughter needed shower shoes for college dorm use,  and these are  perfect for that: all rubber so they dry quickly, grippy bottom and inside, wide enough. But as for wearing them as regular flip-flops: probably not. They are very thin and flexible---if you walk too fast, the front edge can catch on the ground and bend completely under your foot, tripping you---and the raised-dot pattern on the soles is uncomfortable to walk or stand in for long periods of time.She normally wears a size 10, but ordered 11 in these so they'd be loose enough for easy showering. Good thing, because even with the full size up, her heel is right at the back!

I purchased these flip flops specifically for beach/pool wear. I was storing them in my car to have handy. On a day trip to the beach I reached for them to find that they had shrunk up to the size of something that would fit a toddler. Very disappointed. Beware.

While I LOVE these sandals and the colors they come in, I had to return the first two pairs on Amazon because they were too small in my size. Bought my third in one size up from Crocs and one more from Amazon. That worked, but I noticed something strange. The pair from Crocs site and the one from Amazon are different. Amazon pair is loose from the toe and where the strap sits and the one from Crocs in snug. The width is visibly different, too. I bought it here for the color. Not sure if these are original. I'm keeping them, though.

Soooo disappointed. Bought these 3 yrs ago, been wearing them since then...right out of the box. Great flip flop. The thong part popped on the right one. So I ordered the same pair, same size. Hit "order again". What I received was shorter, tighter, and feels hard. I put the old one next to the new one. The new one is not the same. The design inside of the flip flop is different. There is no crocodile in the heel bed. No wiggle room. I have wide feet and these are not comfortable. I'll try gorilla glue on the old ones. Btw, I ordered the size 11 for "end of work day comfort", and literally hit "order again". So disappointing...smh.

I recently wound up with a foot injury, needing more arch support and cushion in my shoes. I love wearing flip flops in the summer, whether to the beach, to muck around in the garden, or just kicking around town. Unfortunately, my old flip flops just killed my feet- I would have horrible pain even after taking out the garbage. I ordered these Crocs flip flops hoping they would be a better option, and they certainly are! The are very lightweight, surprisingly supportive for a flip flop, and a little bit cushy. As long as I am not walking or on my feet all day, they are comfortable for hours! My only minor disappointment was the color. I ordered bronze, thinking they would be the same dark gold, slightly sparkly color of the Crocs Mary Janes I had a few years back, but they are just a dark tan color. I do love that they are easy to clean through!

I ordered theses in size 8W/6M for myself who is somewhere between 7.5 and 8 in laides shoes.  These shoes are way too small.  Since they fit my moer who wear a size 6.5.  Asidefrom being to small, the quality is nothing impressive.  Not horrible but nothing near the quality the old Crocs were.  The Crocs I bought 7 years ago are soft, thick, durable and true to size.  My last couple puchases with Crocs were nothing but disappointing.

Very happy!!!  I was worried about getting this shirt in the white floral because most white T-shirts are see-through.  This is a very nice material  and I am able to wear it without a tank top under my shirt!  Huge bonus!!!
Super cute and seems well made. I’m 5’7” / 190 lbs  and I bought the XL

I get compliments on this shirt every time I wear it. It fits well, washes easily, doesn’t seem to shrink, the colors are fantastic— only good things! This is a looser fitting shirt, but I love the fit. Fits as expected based on the product images.

Based on the reviews, I originally ordered a large even though I usually wear a medium. The large was too big so I had to return it for a medium. The shirt fits great (I got the one with the roses). The material is thick enough that it doesn't see through and the colors are as vibrant as the picture. I am 5'2 and 155lbs. I love the shirt.

Great shirt. I wear size 18 and ordered 2x. It fits correctly. If I ordered 1x it would be too tight. It looks great on and the colors are just right- not too bright, more subtle. Very good top. Will buy again.

When I ordered this top, I did not think it would look nice and be well made let alone fit.  Well, was I surprised.  Quality is super, fit is great.  I wear a 12 or M to L top, I ordered the Large and it fits like a glove with plenty of room.  Hangs below the waist and hip area. LOVE it and ordered three more different patterns, however, the other three, sent two back as not made as well.  Overall would recommend this top.

I absolutely LOVE this shirt. I was skeptical of buying this shirt because I didn’t want it to be thin. The fabric is perfect! The print is super cute and just like the picture. The size was true to what I normally buy. I will buy others like it!
I only wish I had an extra small instead of small. This shirt is very cute, the pattern is gorgeous and the shirt looks very well made. I would definitely order this shirt again

I like the cut of this shirt. It hangs well and the large fit just right. I usually wear a medium, so I'm glad I sized up on this one. The only thing I really dont care for is the material. I feel like the print looks kind of cheap. The material kind of reminds me of that 70's pant suit material my mom used to wear, almost like polyester. I've worn it a couple times and will continue to wear it, it's just not my favorite. UPDATE!! After  submitting my review, the seller offered me a full refund or another shirt. I picked another shirt  and kept the one that I had previously bought and I couldn't be happier. Outstanding customer service!!!

I originally loved this shirt so much that I also bought one in white! The fitting of it was perfect and flattering, the material was nice and I loved the print. But after 2 washes, the black background color faded, a lot. The white one lasted a lot longer and that one I gave 5 stars. Overall I loved the shirt but I would just be mindful of the black or darker colors as they may fade quickly.

I love ordering clothes on Amazon, especially because having Prime makes it so easy to try on and return any clothes I don’t absolutely LOVE. As a single mom of a young son with multiple special needs, I haven’t had time to go shopping for myself since before he was born 4 years ago! Lately almost everything I’ve been getting from here has been a dud. So trying on this shirt was an extremely exciting surprise! It is PERFECT! In short, it looks and fits exactly like their picture depicts and is super soft, too!I’m 5’7” / 145 pounds / 36B bust and usually would wear a Medium in typical American young women’s shirts, so in order to make sure I got the fitted but loose look shown in their pictures, I went up a size and ordered it in Large and it worked out perfectly for me! So I’d recommend that anyone who can go up one size do so, at least if you want the fit to be the same as they show. I should note though that I suspect from the way this fits that my regular medium would’ve been okay too but just not as perfect as going one size up.Oh and if you’re like me, you’re wondering if the material really is heathered like shown in the pictures - maybe I’m the only one who cares about this but if anyone else out there does too than — YES, the shirt is heathered just like shown! I just can’t recommend this top enough! Great for a workout shirt, or a cute casual outfit, or just for lounging. I seriously think I’m going to get another in a different color which I never do! Just size up one size if available and enjoy!! 😀Ps Attaching pictures but they don’t do the shirt justice, the sellers pictures actually do a better job showing what it really looks like! Also adding a close up on the material to show the heathering etc, note that this close up pic is of the BACK of the top. Hope this helps someone!EDIT - Purchased a second top, same size and in purple and it’s just as wonderful as the first! Attaching photos of it too! And just to be clear, when looking at picture of back of purple shirt, yes that’s the tag I hadn’t taken off yet as I was so excited to try it on — I can’t think of the last top I loved enough to buy more than one of. These are so good!

It's very hard to find cotton shirts these days and this is a wonderful, light to medium weight, not see through sleeveless shirt. I followed the size guide from the manufacturer and it fits perfect! I'm 5'6", 125 lbs, 36C and ordered a Large for your comparison. This is a juniors top.I didn't realize that there is also a small diagonal line sewn across the from of the shirt for a little more detail. Very subtle. The stitching is done very well with no extra threads or loose stitching. Excellent quality! This shirt is very comfortable, lays very nicely, just the right length, hitting exactly as it does on the model. It doesn't flare out at the hips nor is it skin tight. It helps hide the small tummy bulge I've been gifted after menopause. I have a long tattoo going down the middle of my back and this shirt shows it off nicely. I purchased the wine color and I will be purchasing 2 more, one in blue and one in green.Very please with my purchase and I highly recommend this excellent cotton sleeveless shirt.

This is a simple shirt, but fits nicely. It is a T-shirt type material and also has an open triangle in the back. Very cute with jeans. I bought a medium which is what I typically buy and it fits as expected. Slightly stretchy, which is good since I have a slightly larger bust.
This is beautiful and professional. Not see through, good quality, and my bra doesn't show in the back. I will be ordering more colors.

Based on the measurements, I ordered an XXL (I usually wear M or L, depending on the brand) - turned out to be a perfect shirt! The fabric is soft and quite substantial, not clingy at all. It keeps its shape after the dryer. The cut is modest but interesting. Overall a great shirt - ordering more in other colors!
I’ll get another. I’m hefty on the breast area. I have enough room.

Great top, based on the size chart though I thought it would run small, so I ordered up. Normally I'm a size M-L depending on the brand but I ordered an XL fearing it would either be too tight or short for my tall torso (I'm 5'9'', measurements 37-30-40 and weigh 140 lbs). The XL doesn't look bad and can be worn with a looser fit, but since I wanted it to look a bit more fitted I'm thinking the L or even a M might've been fine for the width. Not sure about the length though. It's fine now but when I order smaller sizes I always run the risk of having a nice fitting top that's too short for me.
I’m 5’3”, and 4/6.  Medium Fit was looser than I wanted. So sexy though.

I am 5’5” and 125lb. Based on reviews, I ordered a medium (I don’t like my clothes tight) and found it to be a little too big/boxy. A small may fit me better so I may try that in the future. However, the material was very soft and seemed to be good quality which is why I gave this 4 stars. I would recommend ordering your normal size instead of sizing up.
We ordered these shirts to be screen printed with our logo as our company uniform top for the summer.  We love how these fit and wear. We will order more.

Phone doesn't look as sleek in the case, but how could it? Color and looks show through well. Bumpers on top and bottom protect well against a drop. No raised bumpers on sides, so it is possible for my phone to fall screen first.

I was really excited to get my first OtterBox for an affordable price. The only thing is, as you can see in the pictures, the border/bumper of the case yellows EXTREMELY fast. I've only had the case for a little over a month and it's already turned yellow. I've ordered cheaper, clear cases that don't even yellow that fast. So it's something to be aware of before you purchase. If the discoloration doesn't bother you then by all means purchase it because the case is very durable, after all it is an OtterBox.

I really like the case but it did not fit my phone so I returned it.  Not the seller's fault......I didn't pay attention and ordered the S9 instead of S9+.  It was delivered very quickly and I received my refund promptly.
I received on June 1, I have now had to file an Otterbox claim as the case is scratched but more importantly the back of my phone is shattered.  This case did NOT protect my phone when dropped.

I mostly love this case! Great design, easy to put on and take off, doesn't interfere with buttons, in other words a great otterbox case. However when it does get scratches it seems to scratch quite deeply. The edges also have picked up a dirty looking blue from living in my back pocket, and the rubbery material makes it impossible to clean (if anyone has tips I'd love to hear them!). The phone is also more exposed due to the curved edges, so the 2 or 3 times I've dropped my phone the phone edge has caught and cracked my glass screen protector (previous phone and otterbox was for the S7 with a full edge wrap/ more protection)
I love how it gives my screen a bumper zone if dropped face down, easy to put on, works with screen protector, and is wireless charger compatible

Probably the lightest of the OtterBox series, This case will give you OtterBox protection with half the weight. The sides come up higher Knouff to protect the curved screen address and your screen protector. Particularly if you were using a ZAGG SCREEN PROTECTOR which has a tendency to crack if an edge touch is a hard flat surface.
Buttons are very stiff which makes it hard to lock/unlock the phone or use the volume buttons.

I've had this less than two months and the clear is already yellowing. I specifically bought it because I thought it would stay nicer for longer. Very disappointed in this case, not worth the extra money.
Fit well, Clear Case, does not block the Biometric button on lower back side of Galaxy S9 I recommend this case..

So far I've ordered 5 of these shirts. I've worn and washed all 5 and feel comfortable leaving a realistic review for those of you unsure about purchasing.
