I ordered a 4X and the shirts fit me more like a regular tshirt than an oversized long tshirt but I am also 370lbs and top heavy. The shirts did not shrink much and I dried them on regular heat. The black did noticeably fade with one way but the others did not. From my experience I recommend washing on cold and hang drying. For the price, fit and comfort I will order these shirts regularly!!!
I am 5'6 and 220 lbs and am a 44 DDD in the chest I am normally a 3 x and I ordered a 3x and it fits awesomely ! It's soft and sexy and cute ! I will definitely be ordering more in the other colors!

I purchased several shirts at the same time hoping to find some that I liked with my leggings. Must cover booty, must be somewhat flowy. I loved the cobalt blue of this one but was so unsure of what size to get. I normally wear an XL shirt, size 16. In this shirt I ordered an XXL. It fits just the way I wanted. I love the color. Out of the 5 shirts I got, this one is my favorite.

Runs a little small but if you oder next size up, definitely worth it! Thesee shirts are light, thin, but very soft and comfortable. I absolutely love them! I have 4 already and ordering more! Probably every color 😉
True to size and fits nicely. I usually wear a size 3X but I ordered a 4X because I wanted it to be loose. I think I could've gone with a 3X.  Matches really well with my Aztec leggings:)
Love this top.

Was excited to see the other reviews for this top that it actually fit true to size. I am 5’6” and wear a 22/24 (24 jeans at Lane Bryant). I ordered the 3X based on the other reviews saying it ran true to size or a little big. I wanted a shirt that covered my butt and not cling. I’m not big into leggings but have a few pair I like I wear with boots during the fall and winter. This shirt will work great for that as long as it doesn’t shrink when it’s washed. The material is soft but not too thin or see-through.The biggest problem I have with short sleeve shirts from anywhere is with my arms. They are either too tight or too short and roll up. These sleeves are a great length and very comfy. And nice for Layering over a long sleeve.  Also, the neck line is cut low but I like it that.I plan on ordering some more colors soon. The red was the perfect color and as shown.Will update the review if it changes after washing
Love the materia! It's not to clingy, I usually wear. Xxl and that's what I ordered, 5'5 260 sort of large arms and it fits perfect to me
This has a tshirt neck. I expected low cut but received something that rubs my neck. And it falls to my knees. I got the 4x. I'm 5'4" and 250lbs

I was so disappointed in this product. Color was on point - quality was so poor. After only 2 wears the material was breaking down and looking so worn.  I would've bought every color if quality was better, but it's cheap and poorly made.

I found the size Small to be accurate for 34B. I liked all the colors but chose the wine color for its versatility in wearing either with jeans or nicer pants. The fabric of this top has a slight sheen and it is thin enough to be comfortable in summer yet it is not see through. I have washed it and it was wrinkle free after hung to dry.

The shirt material is extremely soft. Very well-made. Has a curve to the side which I appreciate being a curvy person. This is an American sizing so I suggest you get your normal size you get out of store. I highly recommend the shirt. I got it for work since I just moved and need a new work clothes.  The shirt material is extremely soft. Very well-made. Has a curve to the side which I appreciate being a Kirby person. This is an American sizing so I suggest you get your normal size you get out of store. I highly recommend the shirt. I got it for work since I just moved and need a new work clothes. I got a size bigger than my usual because I like looser shirts. I’m 5’3 and 145 pounds C cup in chest.
Love, love, love this one!  Fabric is so soft, colors vibrant, and fit is perfect.  I am 5'4" and weigh too much at 185, bought this in an XL, and adore it.
Really comfortable and fits as expected. I'm 5'3 130lbs; a medium fits perfectly. The quality is above what I expected as well. I'm going to purchase a couple more in different colors.
Very cute top but it runs small.  The large is like a fitted medium.

The blouse has a nice fit, is not too tight neither square, it helps to conceal mid section without looking too loose,  it has some stretch, and a little bit of silky shine. I use it mostly for the office, underneath my color jackets, I bought a black and white and the pattern is beautiful, you can use it also as is with jeans, loose or tucket in your pants, is a versatile item, I can see using it for the beach as it is a breathable fabric. With regards to cleavage is perfect is neither too revealing or too high, very classy. Item as easy to wash and dry, does not wrinkle, loose shape or shrinks (tumble dry low). Is not my favorite piece, but fulfills all my needs as expected, who knows may grow to be one of my favs with all these perks.

This product was to be delivered by June 22nd it just arrived today August 13th. It took so long to get to me I had forgotten I had even ordered the top, it runs a little large but not that much so I can still work with it I guess. Looks way better in the picture, most definitely was not blown away by the jersey material and the picture looks a bit more form hugging but I guess to get that effect you would have to order a size smaller maybe?
Very nice looking blouse. Not too snug on my size 18 curves. I bought the 2XL. I wore it with a pair of capri leggings and it looked nice. Dressy but comfortable.

Ladies, this top will see you through the summer fabulously. Got blue and just ordered two other colors. Looks modern and pulled together with white capris, crops or ankle pants. I'm sure they will look great with jeans, as well.  Great price and will be a staple in my closet for the summer.
It’s a pretty nice top. Love the fabric, but the black isn’t a true black. Looks a little brownish/black.
I love this blouse. I very rarely wear blouses with stripes and multiple colors....... yes I am a plain Jane. But I wanted to switch it up a lil' bit, and I am so glad I did.
The fabric feels great! It's just a tiny bit snug in the chest (bra size 36C), so I have to wear a tank underneath.
Great fit.....doesn't wrinkle after wash......love the style!!

This shirt is amazing. I'm curvy but not super curvy and I prefer looser clothing so I ordered a large (I'm 159 lbs and 5'6 with the majority of my weight in my hips). It's too long for me to wear untucked but tucking it in to high-waisted pants or a pencil skirt is perfect for work. And it's not a stretchy fabric exactly but I never felt constricted like I do in other shirts. It's also not see-through so I can just wear a bra underneath and not cause a stir at the office. Great professional look, great with some cute black or green jeans for after-hours, the possibilities are there. I really want to buy more but I'm just not a fan of the other colors.

I really love this blouse for the price - very comfortable and airy and not see through at all.  I ordered a large - 36D and I think I could actually go for the medium.  I am going to order several more in other colors.
Love this blouse!! I get so many compliments on it. Would definitely buy again!
Fits and looks great on.  Material is soft not hard or itchy.

So happy with this shirts.  Wasn't expecting much since it is so affordable, but the material is great.  Super soft and not thin or see through at all.  Fits great and very true to size in my opinion.  I am 5'7 and 150 pounds and I went with large, it is form fitting in the chest and loose around the stomach.  I plan on ordering another color!

Fits like a mans button down shirt, not flattering at all. The colors are completely different from the picture. In person they are bright tacky colors that make the top look cheap. Will not be wearing and it was a complete waste of money.

I liked it but it was too small in the armpit/chest area.  Had to return, don't think I will re-order.  Not comfortable.  Some things made in China ....well they can never get the sizing right.  They will make a larger size but not expand the arm holes for example.  I think this is the problem with this shirt.  It was roomy in the body but something wasn't right in the arm pit area.

Fit well, Clear Case, does not block the Biometric button on lower back side of Galaxy S9 I recommend this case..
This top is so comfortable. It's perfect for summer. The material is a soft stretchy material. I am a size medium and it fits just right.

Love this shirt!!! The colors labeled “varietied” truly do have the heathered appearance as appears in photos, yay! These runs a bit large but again just like depicted in their photos. I’m a med or large in shirts (5’7” / 150 lbs / 36B chest) and got the medium and it fits just like the seller’s photo shows, nice and loose but not too baggy. I wanted to wear with shorts since I live in the hot AZ desert but didn’t realize this was closer to tunic length and when worn as is it definitely looks better of leggings/jeggings, so I just tucked the front into my shorts a bit and voila, perfect! I recommend this shirt for sure, if you want the slightly looser fit shown on model than go for your regular size and if you’re between sizes I recommend picking your smaller size. If you want a more fitted look and/or aren’t wanting the tunic length you could try going down a size smaller than you usually wear as this medium I’m wearing is still roomy enough all around that I’m quite certain a small would’ve fit great for pairing with shorts. But I definitely don’t think anyone should size up, even if you’ve got a larger bust this offers plenty of room in the chest area, and I have rather big shoulders but again plenty of room there. Overall I think this is a beautiful and very versatile tank that is made for wearing with leggings/jeggings but can be tucked in to easily pair with denim shorts or skirts too! The fit should flatter most body types easily and stick to your true size, go with the smaller size if you can’t pick between two sizes, and avoid sizing up as I can’t imagine anyone needing to with this lovely loose and long length top. Enjoy!!!
This top is a great casual top. It looks great with jeans, shorts or yoga pants. It’s flowy & long enough to wear with leggings.

I adore these sleeveless v neck tunics. I'll be able to wear with shorts, leggings or skinny jeans, and it looks great under an open front cardigan. I am 5'8 and 160 lbs and the medium fit perfectly (even under the arms which I usually have issues with). I originally purchased in royal blue and shortly after white and green. I'm thrilled I found this tunic and I highly recommend!

I love the fit and flow of the shirt. It is just the length I was hoping for,  longer covering butt and crouch areas. I  purchased the shirt in white and it is Slightly see threw as most white shirts are.

When I tried it on it was OK, but I have too many clothes already so I try to avoid the "OK" items. Blue fabric was brilliant and beautiful. When thinking about quality, I couldn't help but wonder what kind of labor when into making the item. Getting a weird feeling that there's a good chance it was made in a sweatshop somewhere in Asia, I sent it back.
The fit is true to size and flowy at the bottom. This tank is perfect for layering.  I would love to have one in every color.
I am very happy with my purchase of the tunic.  I picked red & and thinking about getting other colors.  It is a perfect fit & very lightweight!  I would recommend this item to anyone

I am happy with this shirt. Nice quality. Medium material weight, definitely flows, doesn't cling - but yet not heavy enough to be hot in summer weather. I usually wear xxl and this fits as expected. Length is also good.  Long enough in back to wear with leggings or tighter pants. Shorter length in front keeps the shirt from looking like a maternity shirt. I liked this shirt enough to purchase another color.

This item...for the money...is quite nice. The material swings well and does not hang up all over you and look stupid. I  have not washed it yet and it seems that 30 degrees is too warm for a wash, I guess cold wash is best. I am an avid warm wash user. Hang dry only. Soo....some seems to be seen as to whether or not this is a great item. But as I stated, the price allowed me to test the waters. I ordered three, if all fails they can be sleep tops. I like the patterns and the style mucho.  If they pan out I will buy more. Cheers.

Check out Grandma in her Women's T-shirt.  She's rockin it and Grandpa's loving it!  Grandma is shown wearing a large.  I ordered her normal size to make sure that Grandma was comfortable in her shirt.  She was and she loved it!This turned out to be a very nice womanly fit.  Not a snug fitting junior style, but shorter sleeves and some curve to it, it's a nice fitting t-shirt without out it looking manly! Soft, nicely fitting t-shirts.  I ordered multiple sizes in these shirts for multiple people and they fit as expected.  I had pre-washed them and then put iron-on vinyl and tie-dyed them.  No major shrinkage in the wash, no fading or bleeding since they've been tie-dyed.  They are great.These shirts arrived as expected.My favorite quality is that these shirts REALLY ARE BREATHABLE.  They do wear cooler than most cotton t-shirt.  I put it on not expecting a large difference, but it's there.  And for a mama bear that gets HOT.....this is a great t-shirt!They are reasonably soft (about a 8 on the scale of 1-10)Softly shaped womanly fitNice round necklineCrisp clean color.No off-white yellow color.I'd order them again.
Cheap, see-through.  Has cap sleeves not full sized sleeves.  Returned it same day I got it.

I purchased ten of these shirts after trying various other brands of women's bulk tee shirts and being disappointed. Due to the fact that these are sold individually, my costs were higher than I would have preferred, but I assumed based on the pictures that this would be worth it. These tee shirts are not as pictured. In the photo of the white tee it looks like it is made of a thicker fabric than ordinary tee shirts, and this is why I purchased them. However, these shirts are as thin as any other cheap tee shirt that you might find out there, which I know because I have purchased several kinds of those shirts while trying to find something thicker. The white shirt is transparent to the point of being inappropriate when worn alone and would need to be worn as a layer. That said, there are several redeeming qualities for this shirt. The first is that they make an excellent undershirt and are very thin and breathable for that purpose. The second is that they are cut as a woman's tee shirt rather than a man's and this makes a big difference. Overall, I would say that this is an okay tee shirt, but probably not worth the money if you are buying them in bulk.
I tye dyed this t for a friend. 100% cotton.  looks great!

I returned the t-shirt. I am 5'4", 135 pounds, normally wear a size 10 or medium, but this t-shirt was very snug around my hips.  I asked my husband, "Have I become a "large" woman??"  He laughed and assured me not.  I'm 65 years old and not into body-hugging clothes, and this Tee was just not gonna make it for me.

The fabric is nicer than I expected, but the cut is strange.  It binds around the neckline and shoulders.  It's cut too narrow through the body and hips.  I'll save it to wear in emergencies but I won't order another one.  I'd love to find a nice, decent tee shirt like we used to get in years past.
Got it for my girlfriend to make a custom shirt and was a bit small but good for the price

I bought 9 of these in different colors from three different sellers.  They were all consistent in sizing--pretty small for a small.  I usually buy extra smalls, and these are not roomy on me.  The sleeves are a bit longer than they appear on the pictured model.  The fabric is too light-weight for my preference, and (even after two initial washings) the shirts are scratchy.  Not the quality I expected.  In the past, I have found Hanes to be reliable if not fashionable.  I bought these to wear around the house with tights.  Unfortunately, they may go into the rag bin.  They are just not comfortable enough.  For reference, I am 5'3" and 107 lbs.

I ordered this T-Shirt in 2X wanting and expecting it to be big and roomy. Not so!!  I always buy larger shirts for gardening, etc., and I have other T-shirts that are size 1X that are FAR larger than this T-shirt.I ordered the black T-shirt and the printed info on the shirt states that it is 100% cotton, not the 90/10 listed at the top of this page.  It is 100% cotton as stated lower in the description.  The one plus is that the fabric is super soft!But I am disappointed in the sizing. 😕  A 2X fits more like an extra-large, but the sleeves are also VERY short.  Although this is preshrunk, I still fear this will shrink in the wash so if I keep it, I will wash it in cold water and air dry.  It's almost like they made the shirts THEN shrunk them! 😐Bottom line -- order 1-2 sizes larger than you normally wear unless you are looking for a form-fitting T-shirt with cap sleeves. 😉

The material is a bit thinner than I prefer but not terrible and the fit tighter than I prefer, but I really wanted a pale pink T-shirt for working out that wasn't too expensive,so settled for this. These do shrink when washed and the side seams came out twisted after washing. And they come out of the dryer wrinkled, unlike the Fruit of the Loom brand I would buy if they had this style and color.Bought the looser fitting version in a larger size. Like it a bit better. Would not buy this again, though I read that shirts vary depending upon where they were made??

I don't want to paint the product unfairly, so I need to be clear: it did fit a little big, but that's just because I ordered a size too large, thinking it would run small. It doesn't - it runs true to size. I am 5`10, normally a size 18W no more no less. I ordered a 3X, I think (if I remember correctly), so I should have just gotten the 2X. I personally didn't care for the style and cut for my current body shape and size. I am largely built, but more or less proportional with a large chest, so I prefer a-line tops that hug the chest and have a gentle taper down to the waist. It wasn't as fitted as I'd like to be, but if I lost weight I might like the style better. Other than that, the top was beautifully made - looks more expensive than it is, soft fabric, rich full color and had a nice swing to it. Fair warning, if you are plus-sized and top heavy, it might make you look a little boxy. I do recommend both the brand and the seller. Great top overall!

Pleasantly surprised at how cute, comfy and wearable this nice top is. It should probably be washed first due to the fabric “new” smell and factory creases but other than that, it’s adorable and again very comfortable and I highly recommend it. I bought a xxL because I’m a bigger girl, but I can picture it on a thin person 😃.Extra fast shipping too! Very pleased.
I’m always weary of ordering tops online but this top fit great. The material is soft and the fit is perfect. I’m 5 feet and 145 pounds and ordered a large. I love the blue color too.
Love it so so so much

Size was true to description. I'm 5'5" and 155  lbs and usually wear a L because I don't like anything tight. The shirt was perfect size and very soft. It's a great price too so I'm going to order a few more in different colors. BTW, the mint green shirt I ordered is just that, mint green!

My 1st cold shoulder top. Wasn't sure what size so I usually size up but based on reviews I didn't. Glad I ordered regular size XL bcuz it fits perfectly! I'm 5'3 170lbs. The only negative is upon unpacking, it has a bad chemical smell. I popped it in the dryer on gentle with Downy dryer sheet & it's fine now.

Very pretty.  It came all wrinkled, so I threw it in the wash, and then accidently put it in the dryer.  It sat there a few days.  When I pulled it out, it was all wrinkly again, so I just hung it on a hanger and forgot about it for a few more days.  The wrinkles all just fell out and the shirt did not shrink!  Anyway, I received many compliments when I  finely wore it.  I recommended this shirt.
Soft material and fits as described, not too tight not too loose. Got myself a medium size. Can’t wait for the weather to be a little warmer 😊
I love the material! It isn’t see through and the material isn’t cheap. I liked it a lot when I got it and I got asked by my coworkers where I got it. I will purchase another color.

I ordered a larger size per other peoples comments but it was a tad too big.  I liked the top so I kept it and ordered another one in a smaller size.  The top is really cute and soft material.  It does not cling to your body at all and thats why I like it.  I have some rolls that I like to hide and this top does not give them away.

I got the gray one because I wanted the cut out shoulder detail. I think it adds a little edge to an otherwise casual top. I love the length, which makes it perfect for leggings or skinny jeans. It’s also quite comfortable and soft.

Looks like it’s photo with soft material that is not see through and secure stitching. I like that it is plenty long enough to cover my butt while wearing leggings while the front camouflages my tummy (the back doesn’t do much for my butt but I don’t blame the shirt for that). I wanted it to be on the loose side and ordered the XXL (I’m 5’4 and 240lbs).

Fabric is soft, color is lovely (blue). I'm 5'4, 210-ish lbs, size 16/18 jeans and the XL top fit as I hoped it would. It's a beautiful top and decently priced at around $17. If they were just a bit cheaper in price, I'd probably stock up on these. For their current price, I may buy one more color.

Absolutely LOVE this shirt!! I am 19 weeks pregnant, belly measuring 39inches, I am 5'6" and 155 pounds..I bought a medium. I have room to grow in it since it's a loose fitting style, but I think I may order a large as well for the end of my pregnancy. The top is so cute and comfortable!! Definitely would recommend this item. It's awesome that I can wear it during my pregnancy and continue to wear it afterwards too without looking like I'm wearing a maturity top.

The top portion of this shirt is everything. As a girl that still wears black in AZ Summer months it kept me relatively cool and cute. I’m 5’2 200lbs and I ordered a 2x. I could easily pull this off as a short dress and the shirt runs a little loose around the middle which I appreciated. Covers the booty and camel toe so I’ll definitely be reaching for this again and purchasing in another color when I want a cute, loose and relaxed look.

I ordered the grey top with the little shoulder strap. First off this is a really comfortable shirt. This shirt does fit true to size so no need to order a larger size. I ordered a 2x which is 2-3 sizes too big but I made it work woth a cute long necklace and some leggings.I plan to order more shirts in my correct size 😃 Super comfy and worth it
I’ve gotten this shirt from another company and wanted it oversized and it was just that. This one is not. If feels more like 3 sizes smaller. Not happy.

I am giving this a 4 stars because it is WAY to long. In the image I pulled it back so it wouldn’t be so long. The material is nice and it’s cute but way to long. I am 5”6 and have a normal torso and this hits to my mid thigh. The color is great and overall great. Just to long

This shirt looks absolutely adorable on! It is so comfortable to throw on with a pair of jeans or some shorts. It fits as expected and looks so flattering on. I love the knot in the front and the one shoulder strap. Its also easy to throw in the washer and dryer. I’m thrilled with this cute shirt!

I’m usually a little bit hesitant when it comes to floral patterns. They’re harder to judge online than solid colors. However, this shirt is so adorable and I’m so glad I took a leap of faith to “add to cart”. Here’s why:- Fabric: beautiful patterns- it’s not too vibrant or dull. It’s perfect for summer, spring, and fall because of the breathable fabric materials.- Fit: true to size. I’m usually a small and this shirt fits perfectly. I can see it fitting a good range of body type, big or smal busts.- Style: very cute. I love cold shoulders but sometimes they’re a little too much. This shirt offers one sided cold shoulder which makes it so stylish and adorable at the same time.Long story short - buy it! You won’t regret it.

I am obsessed with these tees! They are literally the only tee in my wardrobe. I now own 16 white, one black, one tan and one grey.As a minimalist of sorts, I’ve resolved to no longer investing lots of time into what I wear. I want to look nice and put-together without fretting over my wardrobe. These tees help with just that!I’m 5’6,” 125 pounds, 28G bra, 36-25-39 measurementsPros:- Long: I have larger breasts and a smaller waist and most shirts simply dont come down enough in the front for my comfort. These do!- Stretch: there is just enough give to give me the form-fit I’m looking for but not enough that it over-stretched to look frumpy- Bright Color: super white! I love how bright and true-white it is! I’m currently working on perfecting my washing routine to make these shirts stay ultra white.- Opaque: I can wear this shirt over a nude bra and there’s no seeing through it. As I’m wearing them primarily in the summer and I over-hear easily, this was a huge plus for me!- Inexpensive: Depending on the buyer, I can purchase one between $4.50 and $5.00 a shirt. That’s a great price for such a functional piece!- Higher V: The v neck isn’t so low that I have to wear an undershirt to feel modest. Again, just a nude bra under it and I feel comfortable!Cons:- Could be considered “fast fashion”: This is an inexpensively manufactured, imported product. Ideally I would be purchasing Made in America products only as they tend to last longer and discourage unethical business practices overseas.- Tan not Zenana brand: When purchased in the 4-pack, the tan shirt was a different brand.If this review was helpful, please click “helpful.” All reviews are my own and I am never compensated for my opinion. If I reviewed it, I bought it!

Buy bigger than you think you'll need. These are comfortable and cottony/spandex-y. Exactly what I was looking for.UPDATE: I liked the FIRST shipment I received. The second shipment I received was awful. I hit the button that said place your order again, and what i received were TENTS. I cannot wear them. They are not the SAME shirts I purchased 2 weeks ago. They even have different tags, they feel like thin cheap material and I am HIGHLY UPSET. They don't even feel like the same shirt I described above. DO NOT BUY FROM THESE PEOPLE more that ONCE, they'll sent you CRAP the second time.UPDATE: NOW they sent me an email ACKNOWLEDGING that they purposely sent me the wrong items because the ones I wanted were currently out of stock. But, they'll give me refund IF I send back the items. They wasted my time and money knowing that I wasn't going to be satisfied with my order, but did it anyways. SNEAKY, DISHONEST, WASTED MY TIME. DO NOT USE THESE PEOPLE TO BUY ANYTHING. I AM FURIOUS
I'm 5'8" and 135lbs and almost always get a small or medium but since I read some of the reviews, I got a large. They are perfect!! Incredibly cute!
I love the shirts.  Very comfy & light fitting.  The  material is really nice.  They aren't see through. Possibly the white but I haven't worn that one. Only downfall is that they are really long.

Wanted a t-shirt that would be longer, not super tight, yet light weight.Purchased these and LOVE them.  Needed some looser fitting t-shirts for those day I am not feeling "skinny".I ordered a L, I am generally a M/L in junior, and S/M in woman in shirts.I am 5'3, 135lbs, 36D.
Order size M, Good quality and comfy . Love them !

I used to buy these shirts all the time. I had 4 or 5 of them. I loved them. They were fitted and stretchy, very flattering. The sizing with these was always off. I wore a large but would need to buy a 1X. I've gained a little weight since last purchasing, so decided to size up one size and get a 2X. This company must have fixed their sizing issues because the 2X is huge on me. I'm glad they fixed their sizing but this is still disappointing. Main reason for 1 star, I ordered a 4 pack but only received 2 shirts. Not impressed.

I ordered the 4-pack of Zenana Brand shirts (Black, White, Taupe & Heather beige).  When I opened the package the barcode sticker read correctly, however, what I received was a 4-pack of Active Brand shirts and 2 of the colors were NOT correct nor did the description of how they fit match.  DON'T buy these!!

Like others mentioned, I recommend you to get bigger size. I usually wear M but ordered L and fits perfectly and comfortable.  I could see through my bra when I tried light gray one but that's easy fix if you wear nude color bra. Darker color ones were no see through.

Overall, the shirts are comfortable and that is what I was going for. I purchased these T-shirts to wear post-partum for nursing and comfort while I lost my baby weight. I purchased them in Mediums. They guit perfect. I'm 5'2" and they're a bit longer, which I like. They are nice and thick in quality. I definitely recommend the buy, however, be aware of a few things:-Shipping is slow, in spite of claiming Prime 2-day, it took 2 or more weeks for these to arrive.  On two separate occasions, as I have ordered twice.- The styles vary a bit. Some are genuine short-sleeved styles, while others are longer. They are somewhat awkward as to where the sleeve hem rests. Mid-biceps.-Colors are different than pictured.  The yellow appears to be a soft tone, but is more of a school bus yellow. The teal is more of an understated blue. I have yet to get other colors.-Sizes were mixed, even though I purchased size medium. I got smalls as well. Which I am okay with, as they both fit and these were purchased for nursing and to wear as I lose my baby weight.

Bought this for the Fourth of July. I’m a patriot but I abhor the current political climate of America. What I love about this shirt is that it singlehandedly (pun intended) takes us to the point of it all. Peace. I am typically a medium (38/33/46) in shirts. I ordered a small and fit like a medium.

I bought both the small and the medium because I can be between sizes. Medium shown in photo (washed and dried in high heat 2x).I am 5’5’, 140-145lbs (depending on how much pizza I ate the night before!), 34B+/C-, pear shape.The small fit pretty well. I did feel that the armpits came up a little too high. But it was a nice fitted tank other than that. The reason I didn’t keep it is I was afraid it would shrink in which case it would then be too tight and most likely cut hard into my armpits. I’m sending this back.The medium has me feeling a little like Goldilocks, because it’s just a bit too big. The medium fits a little bit closer to a large. The arm holes on it are pretty loose and baggy.  And it’s a bit too long. However I chose to keep the medium for a few reasons. 1) I felt if it shrank a little in the wash it would probably fit just like I was looking for – – but it doesn’t really shrink much unfortunately. 2) I’m buying it for two outdoor Florida pool/beach parties for the Fourth of July. In case you’re not aware, it’s darn hot in Florida. I didn’t want something too fitted - for this case, a bit baggy as a swim cover essentially is ok. 3) I really like the print, and I really didn’t want to look for anything else…All in all I think this will work well for my purpose, but if I was using it for a standard every day tank it’s probably just a tad too large.
This arrived quickly. The picture is bigger than I expected, but it did not disappoint. I loved it and got a lot of compliments, too!

I love this shirt! I ordered a large because I often find that tank tops are cut a lot smaller than they should be (I'm 5' 6", 155 lbs). This was true to size (an actual large), but it still looks cute with shorts or even as a beach coverup. The print is high quality and has lasted several washings so far. I get nothing but compliments on this shirt!

This company has so much cute stuff, but the overall quality is somewhat cheap :-/I thought the tank top material felt like cheap cotton and wasn't as soft as I had expected it to be.The length was good, but the chest and arm holes were small and tight. Had I gone up to a Medium, the overall shirt would have been too wide. I returned this item...

Awesome quality! I will definitely order additional items from this seller 😊Note: I am always a Medium but ordered a Large due to the ratings. This item IS true to size. I should have ordered Medium but this is at no fault to the seller.

I am never sure of what size I need so I always go up a size. I picked the XXL and it fit pretty well! I can sometimes be in between sizes and the size I got was pretty spot on. I would order again. Very comfortable and fit better than I expected
I bought an XL to be safe it is closer to american sizing so it runs a little big but it washed up great.

The color and the picture is exactly as it is in the picture. The fabric is thicker than expected but very nice and soft. I read multiple reviews on here saying the sizing ran a little bigger than expected..so although I normally get tanks in medium, i got this one in a small and it fits perfect! I like that the fit on the bottom of the shirt is loose/flowy. Excellent quality and very cute 😊
Great fit. Fabric stretches out by the end of the day though and doesn't fit well until you wash it again. Worried one day it wont bounce back.

This works great.  it comes with a plastic screen protector.  I removed it as you have to touch harder than I like.  Id idn't feel like i needed protection from scratches so I took it apart and pulled out the plastic screen protector.  Put it back together and it works great.  I love that i can sit it at two different angles.  All and all we are pleased and just ordered another for the 9.5" ipad pro.

Got this on amazon for 49.94 and absolutely love it, all of the ports are easily accessible and it doesn’t effect the sound, and I haven’t had any problems with the screen cover affecting the touch screen. Very sturdy and solid. You get what you pay for with otter box.
THE PROTECTIVE SCREEN IS VERY DURABLE AND THE HARD CASE WORKS WELL
Unlike other reviewers I have had no difficulty with the touch screen.  The Defender is a terrific case I have been using on my previous iPad for over 5 years surviving multiple drops.

Fits the iPad well, however I don’t like the way the flap for the pencil does not close.  My pen has dropped out a couple of times.  But over all it’s a good case.  They need to rethink this one.  P.s.  keep your eye on your pencil.
Big boy proof! Autism and iPad with serious sensory issues, we ONLY use OtterBox Defender for our devices.
Great quality!
No te defraudara
Love the fact it protects my iPad, and am happy
Great fit on the 11 inch IPad Pro I bought. Great way to protect your investment from all directions. Wouldn’t trust any other company to protect my investment!

Loved the bright colors, bought it for a photo shoot I’ll be having with my son for Fourth of July, so the colors will work wonders. It did fit larger than expected, I usually wear s/m so I ordered medium hoping it would fit a bit loose. It actually fits more like a medium/ large. Thought of returning it but then tried tying a knot on the bottom and that made it look perfect! I suggest buying a size smaller than what you usually wear

This tank is super cute for any patriotic holiday in the warmer weathers. The size runs pretty true to the standard size, and the length is perfect. The bow knot on the back is the cutest. It will look super cute with some shorts,  or ripped jeans and a sweater on top for the chillier months. Def a cute purchase!!

I bought a medium based off of the sizing chart and the shirt is too large. I definitely would have bought a size smaller. If you like the shirt baggy, order as the sizing chart says. If you want a more flattering, fitted size, buy a size smaller. The material is comfortable, lightweight, and breathable. It's a great shirt for summer or working out!

I am typically an XL so that’s what I ordered and it fits PERFECT!!! Quality material, no loose threads, and the neckline does not hang too low (I usually have this problem with tank tops). Love love love this top!!!

It will work for what I planned to wear it for- a casual 4th of July celebration.  I the color is a little muted/off in that the “white” almost looks like a dirty gray which makes this new shirt she already old and not really in a good way. Love this tank. The material is soft and very comfortable. Fit great.This American Flag Top is great with a pair of leggings,ripped skinny jeans or skirts
Not only did the shirt meet my expectations of how it fit, but the material is SO SOFT, but yet provides a cool feeling. I love it!
5’5”- 135-140lbs, 34B. Nice length and fits great. Can’t wait for 4th if July. ‘Merica!

This shirt feels very synthetic and cheap. The bow in the back is floppy but fixable with safety pins. I'm 5'3" and the shirt is so long it ends at the top of my thighs. Wouldn't purchase from this company again.
Fit was weird, so I had to return.  I ordered the medium tts and it fit, but just didn’t look flattering.

I’m loving this top. The twist front is adorable. I paired it with a tank top underneath so my midriff wasn’t showing. Very lightweight and comfortable. The colors weren’t exactly what I was expecting but still pretty nonetheless. Definitely recommend.

I bought this shirt in a medium, I'm usually a lg, but i didn't want to be swimming in it cause the models shirt looked like it ran lg around the arms and such so i thought medium would work. Love this shirt and floral print and good price for online purchase. Based on reviews I bought a large and am between a medium- large. Fits perfectly like images. I feel comfortable wearing for work and leisure.
Great top! Tons of compliments when I wore it.

This top is super cute. The pink on it is a little brighter than pictured but it’s cute. The material is slightly stretchy so there is some give. I’m 5’10”, 160lbs and ordered a large and it fits great. Great shirt for the price
I LOVE this top, so flattering and I got a lot of compliments . I normally wear a medium/large , but I ordered an extra large and I'm glad I did because it fit perfectly

This tshirt is my favorite! It took a bit to get because it was shipped from china but it was worth the wait! I wish I could find the exact tshirt in solid colors. I'm 5' 8" and it's a great length on me, has a slight flair to the bottom of it and is a nice thicker material.
Love this top.  Will be ordering in other colors.  Very comfortable and airy.
This shirt is as beautiful as it looks, with a nice loose fit making it comfortable and flattering. I'm thinking of buying it in the brown as well.

I purchased the royal blue top and I love it. It's soft and not see through. Long enough for someone with a long torso too! Got lots of complements on it. The colors are beautiful. I would say I thought it was a little big for being a medium but was very flattering on.

Ordered a medium size, which easily fit my chest, but was close on the waist.  You know...measure twice and cut once.I noticed the weight guidelines, and I did not fall into them.  I am greasy, short, and fat.  5'7" & 175 lbsI should have heeded those guidelines more carefully, because, as expected, the cut is a more athletic fit.Ah well, my bad.  A medium would have been the right size, if I didn't look like I was smuggling a watermelon..A larger size would look silly, it would be too long and be far too large around the chest.If I can do 200,000,000 crunches before July, I might be able to wear it this season...I'm on #5, so wish me luck.I would order again, easily, though at a different weight.I wish the shorts were a bit shorter.  I'm short so they just about reach my knees.  I suppose I could hem them easily.

It fits perfectly. It has the elastic around the waist which is a life saver. *This company has the correct fitting jumpsuit. Others dont have the elastic! Pay the extra to make sure you get the item that actually fits!!!

I think rompers for men were in fashion a few years ago, so I was really curious when I saw these on Amazon. I decided to pull the trigger since I wanted to be adventurous with my fashion and step out of my comfort zone.I’m a smaller frame (I wear XS a lot) so the fit was a bit bigger on me. It’s made of a nylon material so it definitely doesn’t breathe. Probably not great in really hot weather, but the benefit is that you can fully unzip in the front for a slightly sexy look. The downside for me was there was a strong plastic smell when it came out of the bag.Let’s be real here though. These aren’t everyday clothes. Hahah. You’re not gonna be able to wear some of the patterns often, and this was more of a gag gift/costume for me.For what it was and what I expected out of this outfit, it’s a solid romper!
The shape is a bit boxy and there’s not much of a waist but I used a fanny pack as a belt and it ended up being fantastic for Pride. I’m 6’4” and 130 lbs and a small fit really well.
I am 6’3” and 255 pounds.Bought an XXl.Tight in the belly and very tight in the shoulders. These run small I would say.

This doesn't actually fit very well. The top is too small, and the bottom/shorts portion is too big. Also, the romper is just too long -- for a medium, I would have expected a shorter torso portion.  The design is fun, but for something that I'll wear a couple of times a year at most, $40 seems like too much.

My husband and I wore these to San Francisco pride and we were basically celebrities all weekend.  There are a hit, comfortable and fit as I expected.  I am 5'9, 200lbs and a large was perfect even a little roomy. The pockets are a little shallow but I used a wallet case on my iphone and that is all I carried which worked great. If you wear the "jazz" aka free water cup print be ready for random strangers asking to take pictures with you.
I love it. I’ve worn it twice now and I am very happy with my purchase. Now all of my friends want one.

Bought this for my fiancé as a joke but it’s acrually kinda cute on him LOL - for anyone who wants this for themselves it’s good quality for the price and I recommend it. Fiancé might actually wear it out some day.

Bought this as a gag-gfit for my husband and it was hilarious. My girlfriends and I all got them for our husbands who are friends (we have an inside running joke about rompers).  I have yet to get my hubby into this but I'm not going to stop trying! haha. The quality is great, better than expected. arrived super fast too.
this is a very cute top, flowing and flattering, especially for larger women

Bust(fullest):45”  Waist: 41”  Hips: 45”  Bra: 40D💁🏻‍♀️I’m an 80’s girl & like my👚not to cling & to be below🐫!(Leggin’s Baby!) I almost always wear 2X (4 more “fitting”a1X) in non-Amazon stores.🌺REVIEW OF THIS TANK TOP/BLOUSE:  💖PRO’S:🌟Great “silky”,🌟quality,🌟“flowy” material that is🌟NOT see through!🌟Print is vibrant &🌟very cute! Even cuter/prettier than pics online!!!The gathered material at neckline (& same in the back) makes it🌟wear nicely &🌟not cling to the “bumper”😉🌟Great length!  💔CONS:Even though I rely on reviews in order to choose my size...along with the item’s size chart: I found this top to be🔻bigger than ANY shirt I’ve ordered on Amazon!!! 😳🔻The straps are NOT ADJUSTABLE & Because it is SO big,🔻 😬I’m afraid the shirt “arm” area will expose the (.)(.) while bending or reaching forward (especially wearing it bra-less after an upcoming surgery!😖) While leaning forward, will the arm area fall between (.)(.) & the strap catch in between (.)\(.) & remain there when I sit up??😮🔻No tag or anything to help distinguish front from back (not really a con?? HOW ARE PEOPLE SAYING TO SIZE UP?! I have a large bust (everything, actually) and went by the chart and this is humongous! Misleading reviews (!!!) along with the description convinced me the sizing was not US so I ordered the size I buy for China sizing (4x.) Do not do this. I am usually a 1x, sometimes a 2x depending on the cut of the shirt since I am apple shaped, but as you can see in the picture I can fit a whole 'nother me in this thing, and that is no small feat.I will say the material is very silky and flowy, seems like it would be cool and comfortable, and the cut does seem like it will be flattering once I have my right size. I will exchange and then update my rating.**Edit: Exchanged and updated my rating to four stars since the straps are shorter than what I'd like, bit closer to the armpits than what I'd prefer, but not painful. Got a 1x and it fits well, still very flowy and comfy, more than long enough to cover button and fly on pants. Buy your normal size, folks.
Absolutely love it! Fits perfectly
Love this top want more !

Nice and flowy. Light material. Nice design. I'm 5'3 250lbs and it fits without being tight in the wrong places. I carry most of my weight in my stomach and it hides it just fine. Plus length is great, past belly to cover any hang. Lol.Not sure how the fabric will hold up once washed. I plan to gentle cycle and hang dry.
Fits perfectly and the material is so soft and comfy :)

This top is smaller than the other top I ordered earlier in the same size (2X), which indicates customers can't count on consistency in sizing.  This newer top is also shorter in length. Both tops are wearable but I like the loose, longer fit of the first top better. It almost feels like there is a full size difference but the tags indicate they are the same size. Weird.
Very nice top. I went by the size chart first and my first try was way too big, I went a size down and it is comfortable.

This is the second tank top by Joelly I've purchased, and I love these. They are lightweight and very comfortable. The fit is loose but cut so it doesn't look like a bag, which is very much appreciated! The fabric is a very smooth polyester, and the print is really cute! The only drawback is that the bottom edge is not properly hemmed so it rolls up a little, I'm casually dressed most of the time so I don't think this is very obvious in what I wear, but if you're looking for a polished look this might turn you off. Overall, this is a very comfortable cute tank top, perfect for the summer!
I love this shirt fits perfect love the mid sleeves hides the arm wings for women who have lost weight is long enough to cover the bottom. Just perfect looking with any outfit great material Madewell

It looks very fashionable on.

It is great quality and will stand the test of time. It is neither too lose or too tight . It shaved about 5 years off of my age. Ha I ordered one of every color. I am 5’5” and weigh 135. I am 50.

Such a cute and comfy summer top. I live in Houston where it is VERY hot and this is a nice item to be able to toss on and look chic, hip, relaxed and cool.

Order a size up. I usually wear a small in tops, even with 34DD. Got a medium based on other reviews and it fit perfect. I've gotten compliments on this top. Would recommend. Super cute!
