This is a form fitting crop top. I embroidered flowers are really pretty, but I am skeptical about how it will hold up in the wash since they seem fragile and some of the edges are not sewn onto the shirt.

Love it! Definitely size up, especially if you have a larger chest. I’m 5’2”, 120 lbs and a 34F-I ordered a medium. I ordered the maroon color, and it’s a true maroon (my photo has a filter making it look more red)

Normally I wear a small but given that the material is not stretchy, I had to exchange mine for a M. My chest size is 34C, but it was too tight in a small. I think it’s a cute top to work out in but wish that the material could expand a little. Go a size up depending on your chest size.

It is an OK bra. I recently discovered that I've been wearing wrong size bras, so I did an extensive shopping for new ones. Instead of this bra I would recommend:Maidenform Comfort Devotion Demi (both Embellished and not)Maidenform Smooth ComfortWarner's Your BraIf you like some extra padding (not as in push up, just a little extra in the cup bottom) Maidenform Natural Boost Demi is very nice.All of the above are much softer all over - the cups, the straps, the band. Compared to them this bra feels somewhat stiff.

I wouldn't even give this bra a star if I didn't have to. I don't understand. I bought this exact same bra a year ago and it was amazing. I opened up my package today and this bra is thin, flimsy, and cheap looking. It's not even really nude it's like a white nude. What happened? Please send me a new one that is better so I can update this review. Bc I really do love Maidenform. But this bra was extremely disappointing. And frankly a waste of money.

I bought the white bra before a trip and it fit PERFECTLY. Most comfortable bra I've worn. I loved it so much I bought one in black from the same seller, in the same size. I was incredibly disappointed by the black bra. Both items have the same description and brand (Maidenform one fab fit t-shirt bra), and yet if you look at the photos I submitted there is a HUGE size discrepancy. Both are supposedly 36DD, and yet the band on the black bra is an entire 1.5 inches shorter! I am going to need to exchange the black for a longer band unfortunately. Also the fact that the labels are completely different for the same model makes me wonder about the authenticity of the brand. One is made in Bangladesh, the other in El Salvador. One has (R) by the brand name (white bra) and the other (TM/MC) (black bra) which leads me to believe the black one is a knock-off.

I bought this in the black with the heart print.  I bought the Maidenform women’s natural boost Demi bra (different style) at the same time. Comparing the two,  this bra is much more cheaply made then the natural boost demi bra.  The bra fit perfectly, and the print is cute. However, the fabric doesn’t feel as silky as the natural boost Demi bra by Maidenform.  The sides of this bra are not lined, but the natural boost Demi bra is. They are both about the same price. I am going to return this one and get another natural boost Demi bra. One upside to this bra is that it has minimal padding, so it feels very natural. The natural boost Demi bra has a little bit more padding, but not too much in my opinion. But when I put on the other bra, it felt luxurious. When I put on this bra, it felt cheap.Another bra I bought at the same time that feels luxurious and has the more subtle padding like this bra is the Calvin Klein demi bra. It it lovely and about the same price as well. All from Amazon!

Giving 3 stars due to inconsistent sizing. The one bra that did fit gets 5 stars. I was delighted to see these here after buying one at a store. I ordered black, blush, Moroccan blue, and beige. Sadly, only the Moroccan blue bra fit perfectly like the one I bought in store. The others were made of different materials that were not as comfortable and the bands were actually much shorter (I'm talking 1-2" difference). I would have needed to use those extenders at the biggest setting to be able to wear them, so I returned the 3 that were unbearably tight. The Amazon refund was speedy and return shipping was indeed free, so those were pluses. It's unfortunate that the sizing is so inconsistent because when you do happen upon one that actually fits as it should, these are really comfortable.

Maidenform style #7959 used to be a fuller coverage bra that was perfect for under T-shirts because it was a smooth cup with slight padding which formed to your own shape.  I have 6 that are wearing out and was so happy to see the style on this website for a great price.  I was very disappointed when I received this package and the demi version is a completely different bra marketed under the same style # as the ones I bought at a department store.  This new style is an oddly molded half bra that doesn't look natural under clothing - creating points where there shouldn't be any.  I've worn the same size and style for many years, and this product did not live up to the standard.

Yes, it fits well and looks good but one of the two bras I ordered was too scratchy to wear- threads were bunched up in the back strap at one place which made it unbearable after a few hours of wear. When I went to return this bra (and keep the other), I discovered that not only was there no free return shipping but that there is a "15% restocking fee" that makes the bra not worth returning.

I recently discovered I was wearing the wrong bra size. I never understood how women could be so unaware of something so crucial, but I, too, was way off. I was wearing a 36B, switched to a 36C, and presto -- the urge to rip off my bra and throw it across the room was gone!I cherish bras that disappear under my clothing and are good for all-day wear, and these fit the bill quite nicely. The straps are easily adjusted -- just move the little adjuster forward on the strap toward the cup, and the strap lengthens. I have a wide, strong torso, and this accommodates it beautifully.I first bought a beige and black one, and recently added the python patterned one to my brassiere collection. I tend to hand wash my bras, so I cannot speak to how these bras' cups hold up in the washing machine. I do own products that encapsulate bras in the wash so their shape is maintained, and I've had luck with those, so purchase one if you are concerned (I think I have a "Bra Buddy" -- picked it up at the State Fair of Texas years ago). Also, they break in easy rather than remaining stiff for a time like some DKNY and Calvin Klein bras do (and I ADORE CK bras after I wear them for awhile, but it's a fact -- their bras' bands are not always as malleable as I'd prefer). After the second or third time wearing it, it feels like it's always been your bra. I appreciate the lack of needless lace and silly embellishments that only make it lumpy under my clothing.I'll be checking back to see if more patterns in size 36C come back in stock. I am extremely satisfied. No longer do I groan when I have to put it on in the morning, nor do I immediately remove it as I leave work and begin my commute home.

First of all this is the first time since I can remember that I really do have a need for a bra. I have been very, very ‘small’ and could get away with wearing just a camisole under a top (sometimes not even that). For years I used to hate wearing a bra, perhaps it was a result of my not buying the correct size and style. I’m 5’3” and about 103 pounds - give or take a couple and do need some coverage on the top. This style was the first one I tried and I used the sizing that was given to find my correct size (34C). I didn’t realize it was an underwire bra but when I tried it on the wire didn’t even feel uncomfortable. I liked this bra style so much that I bought several additional ones (all in basic colors like black, white, nude, navy). The style is cut low and I guess that’s the reason it’s called a t-shirt bra. The shoulder straps are adjustable and the clasp in the back has 3 different positions, depending on how ‘wide’ you need it to be (for me I was most comfortable with it on the first clasp, making it the widest). I won’t even say how much (or how little!) these cost - at least when I bought them. There isn’t anything that I would consider negative and would definitely recommend this style for everything, not only t-shirts!

Cute bra.  Love the polka-dots.  I ordered it to replace a similar Maidenform model which I could not find in the correct size.  This bra is slightly smaller in fit than the other slightly different models I was replacing and that I ordered at the same time.  Both the band and the cups are smaller than expected, but not so much that I can't wear it.  Although it won't be my favorite.

I love this shirt! Even though it's sleeveless I don't have to use a bra strap to hide the shoulder straps of my bra.  I really like how this shirt fits and feels. Not too tight across the bust and flows over stomach issues that I prefer to hide. The arm holes are not too large and not too tight.  I encourage others to give this shirt a chance and just buy it.

The tank top is a true medium.It swings from the chest down.The top/armpit area fits well. It is more flattering than I thought it would be and gives a nice shape to my body.Soft fabric.Got this as an easy outfit to wear around the home, brunches, and running errands for Summer.Highly recommended.
I ordered 3 different XXL, and was concerned they would be too small. They fit just right, are very comfortable, and I received a lot of complements while wearing the shirts.

A little too clingy for me. It feels very nylon and stretchy across the busy. My husbands likes it.... lol.... but I really am not thrilled with it. It’s cute and made well... but order a larger size if you are large chested.

The material is not what I was expecting. It's just a strange blend and the top I ordered the seem didn't match... I am probably a bit OCD, but that's always been something that bothers me. I am going to give it 2stars because the print color is very nice
I truly LOVE this shirt! It is amazingly comfortable, fits just as I expected, well-made and the first time I wore it, I received compliments! Thanks for a quality product!
I’m 5’6, 145lbs, this is a small, I love it!  I’m pear shaped and small up top.  Fits great at chest and mid section.  Goes down to mid-hip area, I actually like the extra length there!
Fits well, feels great and goes with almost everything
I loved the design and color. I got this as a present for my cousin and she loved it. Perfect for hot weather.

Like the print but not the cut or sizing.  Shirt is way to long and since it is a plus size in my opinion the length makes me look larger then I am.  I also really did not find the cut at the bottom attractive.  Also it is form fitting around my stomach also a area I am not trying to highlight.  I am going to keep it but am having it altered.
Shirt is very comfortable. I sized up as I wanted a loose fit.

Within minutes of receiving this and trying it on, I’m getting it ready to ship back. Color is nice, shirt is awful. I tried following reviews and ordered up in size. Horrible idea. It’s WAY to big. The length I was looking for is also not there so I will not be reordering a smaller size. The detail at the neck looked great in the stock photos, did not look great in person. I don’t recommend this shirt.

For reference I am 5’1 and 160 pounds.  I carry all my weight in my belly.  I bought this shirt in an XL.  It fits perfectly without bunching at my stomach.  It hangs nicely and the arms and neck fit perfectly.  I would definitely recommend this item.
Absolutely love this shirt!!!  Super comfy and looks great after being washed.  Planning on getting another color.
I like the arm length and material feel. To me the length is just a little shorter then I like but I am still keeping it and wearing it.
I thought this I ordered too large of a size but it actually fit beautifully.  Not too long, not to short.  Love the color of purple that I ordered.
Cute shirt. It was a little smaller than expected. Size up if you are between sizes.
Overall I like this shirt a lot but the bottom hem started to come out the first time I wore it.
Little tight around the midsection. If it was a little bigger, I would have loved it.
I can not say enough good things about this shirt! I’m 150 lbs 36 DD and I purchased a large. It fits perfect and is an easy shirt to throw on and go. I want it in every color!
Love LifeProof cases....just not this one! The reviews about sound distortion are 100% accurate. I can’t believe that a case that costs what this one does, has such terrible sound quality.
I bought this for my sons iPhone and he accidentally dropped it on his bedroom floor and it cracked with the case on it. This is a expensive phone case and this shouldn’t happen. Not impressed

UPDATE 5.10.19After the rubber piece came out, the rubber film over the home button also ripped. I contacted their customer service for a warranty replacement and they sent one out right away, I just had to pay the $5-ish dollar shipping fee. Since receiving that new case mid February 2019, that case has cracked upon a drop (the plastic casing part on the front of the phone and the cover on the charging port is bent and won’t snap closed.  I contacted customer service for another warranty claim and they’re sending another out for just the cost of shipping, which is about $7-ish this time. Customer service has been great, but I’d rather just have a case that doesn’t fall apart.ORIGINAL:This is a good, durable case. Has protected my phone a lot, however, the little rubber piece that goes into the bottom to protect the seal where you charge the phone is removable.  I bought this because my daughter kept throwing my phone in the pool. It does work great, even for durability if dropped on the ground. I only knocked it down one star because that rubber piece (which is extremely important) does come out AND people complain about not being able to hear me very well on the phone.
Waterproof, drop proof, great. ONLY reason 4 instead of 5 stars is the stupid thing is so SLIPPERY now I drop it all the time. They need to make this with a non slip surface.

Love this item! Having a pink phone means you want to see your phone color. The regular lifeproof Fre cases do not allow you to see the color of your phone because it’s fully covers it. I like that this has the clear background, allowing me to see the actual color of the phone that I selected. I do wish that the case came in pink to match my phone, but the purple is close enough. I do recommend getting yourself a screen protector since this does not cover the screen from any scratches.

this is the 3rd lifeproof product that I have purchased. the last cases were perfect!  But now, It broke at the bottom where you insert the cable to charge......I am very disappointed for I have only owned it for 5 weeks...….I had loved all my previous ones for I am a serious hiker and am outdoors in all 4 seasons. It can not be used near any water or wet conditions. …….I need to return this faulty item.... not manufactured well.  the old ones were better.....I expect it to be replaced asap.

Not quite what I expected, very difficulty to put on and take off. One side "squeaks" and doesn't feel like it fits exactly right which makes me concerned about how waterproof it will be. Seems to impede the quality of the sound on your phone, I'm often told by callers that I sound like I am in a tunnel.

Love Love LOVE this case. I’ve had this over a year and not once have I broken a thing on my phone. Some grains of dirt did make its way into the back of the case when I would forget to close the charge port door and it etched small digits into the case and phone but that was my fault. Highly recommend this case and the glass screen protector that fits this case. Can’t remember the brand name (tequila?). I work in construction so a sealed/shock proof case was very important to me.

This is my first LifeProof product. I had read good reviews about it when I bought it. I have had this product for the last 7 months now. The case is good from protection perspective, however, the voice is muffled when put on speaker phone. Also, the material is not that great. The lid which closes the charging enclosure broke off. They should have constructed the case with better material. I don’t know how this will get covered under basic manufacturer’s warranty since it’s just about 7 months old.

Wouldn’t buy it again. It’s great that the phone was protected but when the case is on no one can hear me on the other end if the phone was on speaker phone (which I use a lot) and I could not use FaceTime.  Had more sound issues than just that. Extremely hard to take on and off so I couldn’t take it off every time I needed to have a phone call or FaceTime so just ended up taking it off for good. Really wanted to love it because it looked good and protected the phone but it just didn’t do it for me

I ordered the 12-18 month size for my son. It’s very cute but the onesie definitely shrinks so I should have ordered the next size up. My son is 31 inches tall and 20 lbs 8 ounces so the onesie though it does fit I can see that he won’t be able to use it for long. The shorts however will last a while longer then the onesie. The shoes fit well with some room for his feet to grow in. His feet are 5 inches long (just measured), so I’d say the shoe size is about 5.5 inches long. Here’s a pic so you can check out if it’ll work for you.

Absolutely adorable outfit, perfect for a summer day. Color is true navy, sailor type style with the striped shorts. Shoes dont have any grip on the bottom but I find this appropriate as I purchased this in size 6-9 months. If you were buying for one of walking age I would just caution as the shoes could be slippery for them. That being said the shoes are abdolutely the cutest piece, very stylish. We have been very happy with this purchase.

The fit of the onsie was a little large for our 5 week old, but the shorts are fine. in another few weeks we expect him to fill it out, shoes are a little big. I have to give 5 stars because of the quality of the product very soft and comy for baby and does not bleed or change after washing.

)Love it my precious Nipote (grandson) will certainly be a dapper dude if his Nona (grandmother) continues to spoil him in the same fashion I spoiled his father.  no he was not a momma’s boy, brat on the contrary he was extremely thankful, very compassionate and loving and extremely successful.  I could not be more proud.Appearance: A+.  Detail: B.  Quality: B
This is so cute! What a great nautical outfit. Even the shoes fit! I bought this for my 7 mo. grandchild. Can't wait to get pictures of this on baby.

This was part of a baby shower gift that included the matching outfit, blanket, photo album and calendar. The prospective mother was delighted as were the rest of the shower attendees. Pleased with my purchase.

Bought this outfit for my son who isn't born yet. Arrived in amazing condition and both my hubby and I LOVE it! Once he can wear it I will update my review but since he isn't here yet it'll be a little. Super happy with my purchase!

Very cute outfit but the sizing is off. My son is 14 months but average size of an 18-month-old. However the 18 month size is more like 24+ months. Too big! Had to order a 9-12 month size and it is still a little big but he will grow into it. However, the shoes now won’t fit because they are too small. He needed the shoes from the 18 month option, but the outfit from the 9-12 month option but since everything is tagged together, I won’t be able to get him the proper combination of sizes. So I have to basically buy the set for the clothes but the shoes are useless.

I ordered six of the outfit sets from Hudson Baby. They're so soft and well-made! We love them! The shoes are just for looks, they don't have a real sole on them. But what would you expect for $14-15?

I bought this as a present. My friend loved the outfit. Her son was a little too small to wear it but the shoes fit perfectly. He seems to love the shoes as he wears them everywhere and only wants those shoes. Once he fits the outfit it'll probably be his favorite too.

After a month of use the screen cracked in the corner. It was not immediately after a fall but there had been a fall from about 3 feet the day prior onto the corner of the case.I've had Otterboxes on all my phones since the HTC HD2. In over a decade of using OtterBox cases this is the first one I've had a phone break and the first time I've been disappointed in my purchase.I feel that each generation of Defender cases has been cheaper and flimsier. This one seems to have pinched the screen so much that it cracked as there is hard plastic on each side of the corner with no padding material.

I have always had Otterbox Defender cases on all of my phones because they had a built in screen protector. When I was looking at the Otterbox Defender for the Note 8 I saw that it did not have a built in screen protector and instead had tempered glass to be used with the case. When I ordered I thought that this would be ok. I received my order and put the phone in the case and installed the glass and the screen. Sensitivity with the Alpha Glass was horrible. So I tried 2 other screen protectors, glass and plastic film, neither worked for me. So I have ended up going with a different case.https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B075277YQY/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1This is a great alternative to the mistake that Otterbox decided to make. This case includes a built in screen protector. I have not noticed any screen sensitivity lose with the screen protector that is built into this case.Otterbox made a huge mistake by not including built in screen protectors with their most current cases. I hope they get the clue and decide to start including them again.

I expect better from Otterbox.This is the first time I have written a negative review for an Otterbox product. I thought that perhaps I got a bad one, so I bought a second one.I had the same exact issue on both of these.After a few months of use on a Samsung Note 8, with no overheating issues, the rubber in the case stretched to where it no longer fit the phone. It became loose and unsightly.I'm very careful to prevent overheating issues, so I always use good chargers, and keep an eye on the heat of the phone. No issues there, and no abuse of the phone or case.Clearly this is a design and production flaw in this model.It will protect your phone, but after a few months, it looks quite odd and keeps slipping off at the camera part.There are many cheaper cases that will protect your phone and don't have these types of issues. For the price, Otterbox needs to do better.

I've been using otter box for all my phones the last few years and am very happy because I tend to drop my phone a lot, it really protects like it's supposed to. This new model doesn't have the plastic front see through cover and I actually like it better this way. My old phone had the cover and if it got dirty or scratched, it was annoying taking it apart to clean, eventually the plastic became dull to see through and couldn't be removed. I also like that the otter box helps me avoid from touching the screen accidentally, it's flush with the phone but its sleek design keeps it from feeling bulky like older models.

Love this case. I bought a cheapo one before this and cracked my $1000 phone.  Thankfully i had insurance.  This time i splurged for the otterbox. It is sleek and pretty and fits perfect.  I have dropped it a couple times (minimal drops from the couch or slipped from my hand) and no breaks scratches or cracks anywhere.  Only complaint would be like everyone else: no screen protector. You have to buy separate, and the reviews were so bad I didn't want to waste another $60. The defender always came with total screen protection what gives now? I purchased an off brand through Amazon, and it has taken 3 different purchases to buy one that fits correctly on the phone and with the case.

I'll give Otterbox 5 stars for the case but 1 star for the holster for an average of 3 stars overall.The case fits well and the buttons work fine.  The case feels like it would provide some good cushioning if the phone dropped on a corner.  I'm not bothering with a screen protector for this phone because of the curved screen.  Seems like a lot are having problems and I'm just not up for trying to figure out which one works.Now the holster just plain sucks.  Flimsy.  When the phone is locked into the holster and you squeeze them both to remove from your belt the holster flexes so much that it almost touches the screen.  And there's no soft padding of any kind on the inside of the holster.  Poor design.  I tried to fix this by sticking some foam (~1/8" thick) on the holster so that the soft felt would contact the screen instead but it started leaving smudges.  I didn't know if over time it would leave a mark on the screen so I stopped using it.  Can't return it so I will just use the case alone.  Come on, Otterbox, stop cheaping out and fix the holster.  Seriously.  I'm disappointed because I've been an Otterbox fan for years.

Not sure why but it's been clicking near the volume and Bixby button. I have not dropped or removed the case since I purchased 3 weeks ago. I'll be returning, I'm disappointed because I loved the purple defender case

THE BEST DEFENSE AGAINST YOURSELF AND THE NOT SO SMART MOVES YOU MAKE.  The Otter Box saved my brand new Galaxy Note 8 when I forgot to grab my phone off the top of my car after loading up a ton of stuff after holiday shopping (needed a free hand and told myself multiple times....dont forget to grab it).  Yeah....so much for listening to myself.  Smashed to the ground 100 yds down the road after hitting a bump.  O. M. G.  The tiniest Road burn in the top left corner.  No cracks, dents, shrapnel,....nothing.  Lost the S-pen when it popped out and got run over.  The Alpha Glass protective screen cover took the brunt.....completely shattered.  The phone.....not a scratch....just the S-pen.  Had heard this was one of the best..... I AM A BELIEVER!!!!!!!  Lifetime fan of the Otter Box club now.  Thank you for creating such an amazing product.

Disappointed in this case. The belt clip feels more flimsy than previous models. The clip mechanism for the phone is weak. Not only is it difficult to tell if the phone is properly clipped in, but even if it is clipped in well, the slightest jolt will send the phone flying out of the clip. The fingerprint reader and pulse sensor are placed in a deep recess, making it difficult to use them. Only reason it got more than one star is that it's still more durable than other cases.

I wanted a lighter colored case so it would be more easily visible in my purse ... without it being pink or some tacky gold. With a limited selection I selected the orchid/gray one.I got a BLACK one. Yeah, deep, dark invisible in my purse BLACK.I was hesitant about buying another Otter box since the reason I needed a new phone via insurance rather than warranty was because when I took the Otter box off my maybe 2 year old phone with the poor battery life the entire back was shattered - like spider veins - I think Otter box owes ME $112 - the cost to replace my phone. I took a deep breath and bought the Defender instead of another POS Commuter-. But honestly all the reviews for other cases were OH, I love it or Oh its a piece of crap . . . Why on earth phones are made so fragile that they need to be encased in bubble wrap then won't fit in your pocket and weigh a ton is a true conundrum

This shirt is so soft, much more than just your regular T-shirt! I normally wear a large, so I bought an XL and ended up returning it for an XXL to get the relaxed fit I was after. Great shirt for the price.

This is the second shirt I bought from this company (different design) I am very pleased with my purchase. I'm 5ft 170 lb the material is soft, it feels like spandex and I got a lot of compliments off of this shirt.

I ordered my regular size, despite the reviews, and I'm happy I did. It fits like a standard tee, not too fitted not too baggy. Material is not a super soft jersey knit but does feel like a high spandex content cotton blend tee. I think it's a beautiful shirt. The people complaining about the quality are forgetting that this is a $10 shirt, you're not buying 100% supima cotton from some high end department store. The shirt is very comfortable, looks great, and is exactly as expected.
Going off the reviews I read here, I went up two sizes when ordering. I was swimming in it! Had to tie it in the back to look acceptable. Should have sized only one up..if that! Otherwise, cute top.

So cute!  Definitely go up at least a size if you want it to be loose.  The material is nice with stretch; if you want it to be closer fitting then get your original size.  The print is so cute and goes with so many outfits.  I did get the gray, black and white - but I think I’ll return the white one since I can’t keep anything white white!  It’s one of the cutest tees to wear this spring and summer.  I was looking everywhere for this design but couldn’t find it in stores.  Naturally I found it here on Amazon and got it in two days.  When in doubt, Amazon!  Love all the fashion finds.  If you’re on the fence, get it!  You won’t regret it!
Another example of reviewers giving bad sizing advice order your size or a size up, this top has stretch to it and will give a bit.

I had mixed reviews on whether this fit too small or true to size. I usually wear a small in loose clothes and a medium in tighter fitting clothes. I ordered a medium and it fits well all around, my only complaint was that it wasn’t as long as I usually prefer. I’m 5’9 so this could just be an issue for me, but keep it in mind if you’re tall and like longer shirts. But I get many compliments in the shirt, perfectly good to wear with some high waisted jeans.
Really nice shirt

I usually wear a XS/S but ordered a M based on other reviews. The M fit perfectly without being too clingy/tight. The material is great and stretchy. I have already washed and hung dry only (I always hang most of my clothes to dry as I find the heat of the dryer damaging) and the shape and color stayed. For reference, I am 5’1” and 125lbs.

Had to return bc I sized up to an XXL , it was way too big. I wear a medium in cotton t shirts and a large in all other shirts. I returned it and got an XL which does fit like a t shirt. I think the large would have fit me like a normal shirt.So if your like me order two sizes up from your t shirt size not your normal shirt size unless you want it fitted. I got the white, which I think would look better fitted. I think the black or gray would look better as a t shirt. Worst thing: The sleeves are not cuffed like the picture. Best thing: its long enough to wear with leggings

I have to start with, the quality of the fabric is AMAZING!!! I was shocked at how thick it is! The color is vibrant, the slogan to die for!With that being said, it’s made small. I like my tops looser. If you like tight fitting shirts, still size up. If you like a looser fit, go two sizes up. This is why it got 4 stars and not 5.All in all, I’ll stretch it a tad. Paired with black skinny jeans and sandals, it’s darling and worth the price.

Just got the shirt & tried it on. I bought the large because someone said if you want more of a baggy fit then go a size up. I wanted it to fit more like a tshirt than fitted and that's exactly how it fits me. I'm 5'7 135lbs 36B*gave 4 stars because I've not yet washed it & haven't worn it for longer than a minute.It looks like the lettering might stick together in the wash & dryer, it's that thicker sticky texture

This shirt fit great, it's true to size and looks just like the picture.  I like the quality of the shirt, it seems like it will hold up well and is really soft.  The shirt had a slight odor to it when it first came but once I washed it, it was gone.  It might just have been the packaging.  I've worn it a few times and it washes well.  Definitely one of my favorites.
Super soft material. A little smaller for the size but still fit well. Overall great shirt, I would highly recommend it.
I love this tee shirt it is soft and super cute I ordered a medium and it fits great if you want a baggy tee shirt I order a size up
Order a size up, so feels like large.
Love the saying on this shirt, and had to have this Tee.
ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. Material and color. I tried to buy more because it just feels great. But there is not a lot to choose from. 😥

If you have had a commuter series before you can expect the same with this one. I don't feel the rubber is as dense as previous phone models. There also is zero texture on the plastic sides. I would have like to see otterbox put some sort of edges or grip to it. As it stands this case is EXTREMELY slippery.Fits perfect and has raised bumpers for it if falls on its face. No problem with charging cables fitting. I need to test the wireless charging capability and will update my review.[Update] worked with Samsung branded wireless charger. No issues wireless charging

OtterBox makes quality cases for phones, this one isn't an exception. The most important factor with a phone case is protection of the phone around the corner edges, OtterBox cases do a great job of that. The Commuter series cases are simple - 2-piece cases, soft/silicone rubber for the inner case which wraps around the phone, then a hard case that covers the back. I prefer the hard shell on the exterior because the phone slides in and out of pocket easier. I had the Defender case for my S8+ which had a silicone exterior and plastic shell interior, the Commuter case is definitely less bulky overall. I don't see the Defender and Commuter styles all that different as far as protection of the phone.Easy to install, fits the phone like a precision-made glove, and it's easy to remove/keep clean. This case also allows for easier installation of tempered glass screen protectors since there's not a hard plastic interior frame that pushes against the screen protector. Any of the OtterBox cases are well worth it for protecting your investment, considering these phones have price tags in the $900-$1000 range.

Otterbox is a well-known name in the phone case business. They are known for being highly protective, but I’ve noticed over the yrs their quality and durability has decreased big time. The phone was in this case and in the breast pocket of a nomax uniform, and when I tripped and fell (the phone stayed in my pocket and didn’t fall out or anything) I checked the phone and it was shattered terribly. Have had many issues lately with other otterboxes (symmetry, commuters, etc) NOT protecting my familys’ devices from falls that other cheaper, seemingly less protective cases have withstood.

I have owned many OtterBox cases over the years. From the original Defender for my iPhone 3gs, to this case for my gf's new Galaxy S9+. I have also owned many other cases along the way, in an attempt to find a good alternative to OtterBox. For my own Galaxy S9+, I actually use a Lifeproof FRE. While it is nice if you need one totally water sealed, the material quality cannot come close to OtterBox (not to mention OB is cheaper!). All in all, this Commuter was in very simply packaging, and was removed and installed in under a minute. I'd call that a win.

Love the color.  It compliments the Coral Blue Galaxy9+ extremely well.  The only drawback to the Galaxy is the lack of pretty cases (iphone has tons).  So pleased with this case.  Doesn't add much bulk but enough to actually have something to hang on to.  Doesn't interfere with the fingerprint capabilities.  Will be adding a tempered glass protector and attempting wireless charging.  If either of these don't work with this case I will update accordingly.

It's a good thing this case is rugged! The back is so smooth that it sometimes slides out of my hand, as if maybe Otterbox wants to prove it will protect my phone by making it easy to drop! But on the other hand it slides very easily in and out of my pocket. So what can I say?I had this same series case on a Galaxy S7 for 3 years, no issues, multiple drops. One time I left the phone on my trunk lid and drove off. Went back and there was my phone, face down on asphalt, without a scratch or crack.Would give 5 stars if there was just a little more rubber up and down the sides instead of hard plastic.

like all otterboxes i have owned, it works very well. they are super expensive, especially for what they are, but i also don't upgrade my phone every year. i think this is the 4th phone i have put an otterbox on and i have not had to replace a phone due specifically to the fact that i always have an otterbox on my phone. i was also a bit worried with this phone due to the curved screen silliness that samsung is on, but this case works well even with that stupid phone feature.

I wanted a thinner case that was still very protective. This case is working well. I've dropped my phone a few times, and it's kept my phone safe. The case hasn't cracked either.There is some slight discoloration around the rubber parts of the case (if you look at the product picture, it's the darker colored part of the case). I put it in my back pocket and in my purse a lot, so I think it's from that. Not that big of a deal, just wanted to share because it does make the case look a bit dirty.

Great product. My wife tosses it on my head when I'm too engaged with TV and while I get bumps the size of eggs on my head, my phone remains intact and protected, which is great. It is sleek and stylish too. I recommend you buy this for your phone, and if you are married, choose the otterbox case and helmet combo.
My 2 sons are frequently grabbing (and often dropping) my phone. The case provides durability and protection without compromising the screen.I wish there were more color choices.

This tank is true to size with the only downfall being that it is just slightly too big in the arms for me. I'm nursing though and wearing full coverage bras so that might be the problem. With a lesser bra, it might not show.  The tank is semi racer back but not full racer back which is my preference. The stitching at the bottom looks solid and not like it will come unraveled as I have had happen several times recently with the more affordable solid shirts. And the hair tie is a great bonus!!! I have lots of hair and this seems like it will give me far less hair breakage than what I have been using.  I've attached a few pics! Please give me a "helpful" rating if my review helped you! I received this product at a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review :)

I was looking for something that  fell a little bit more relaxed and flowy like the description implies, however this did not fit relaxed OR flowy. True they are looser toward the bottom which is fine however I was looking for a looser fit. They'll work for wearing around the house so I'll keep them. BTW I am usually a size 16. This fit like a medium.

Pros: comfy cotton, I'll be keeping as a sleep shirt...make that dress lol!Cons: I am 5'2" and slightly overweight. Followed the size chart and ordered an XL. It skims my body but I wouldn't say it's "flowy." I wouldn't wear it out in public. Also the white is completely see thru. The photo shows the hem landing about an inch above the model's crotch- on me it fell about 3" below making it look more like a dress. If you're short like me and looking for something cool to lounge around or sleep in, this will do.

I like this top for the cotton feel. Its thin enough to be cool, but doesn't make you sweat.  It fits true to size and is long enough.  I would give 5 stars but one problem!  After having my tops for about a year, almost every top I bought has small holes in the tummy area.  Not sure if from my pant's button rubbing on the shirt or the seat belt but definitely many small holes.  Its OK I wear them for everything, and for the price, one whole year works for me. I ordered more.

These "EttelLut Loose Fit Relaxed Flowy Knit Tank Top: Athletic Workout Jersey Sexy Cheap Pack" are great thin, light-weight, loose fit tank tops, which is exactly what I was looking for.  I ordered the white/gray 2-pack and liked them so well that I ordered the same thing a second time.  While the fabric is thin, the white is not see-thru/transparent.  The arm holes are a good size (not too deep).  I wouldn't call them "sexy" as listed in the product title, but I wasn't looking for something sexy.  The sewn in label says "hand wash," but I machine washed and dried them without a problem (perhaps a little shrinkage, but I ordered one size larger to accommodate some shrinkage, which is what I commonly do).  I'd say they're better quality than the Hanes regular-fit (not loose) tank tops I ordered that came with "straps" of different widths(!) and a bottom hem that fell apart in the wash (and then the thread got all tangled and knotted up other items in the wash).  I wish these Ettellut loose fit tanks came in more colors.

Love these tanks! Nice material, not sheer or too thin.  I like the shape.  Looks just as pictured. Didn’t shrink too much, barely noticed.  I ordered two different sizes.  small and medium.  Not knowing which would fit better for my needs.  Both fit as sized.  I did not find them to be larger around the arm pits like some reviews say.  They are long and wide at the bottom just as I needed.  I used these after mastectomy recovery to cover my apron that held my 4 drains.  Covered everything perfectly and discreetly.  I was hoping that the shoulders/neck would be wide enough to step into.  But it’s not.  So I simply cut the shoulder and applied Velcro to the ends.  Perfect!  Cheaper than buying the mastectomy shirts sold!  Going to order again, these will be perfect for summer too.

Wasn't sure about these tanks because Ive been mostly disappointed in tank tops ordered online, but was pleasantly surprised! The material is thin enough to be cool, but provides enough coverage that it doesn't feel like you're wearing jersey material (i.e. they don't show every outline of your waistline, pants, or leggings!). I'm 5'8" and 140 lbs., athletic build, and am bottom heavy with wider hips. Finding long tanks that don't stretch weirdly across my hips is sometimes hard, but these are true to fit and description! They hang loose enough in the hips that it isn't tight or causing bunching at my chest in a strange way. Although they are longer and looser the neckline is flattering. The arm holes arent huge either, as sometimes happens with loose tank tops so you still get side coverage. These would be great under a blazer/ cardigan as a layering base with open front top pieces, but would probably be too bulky for underneath pullover sweaters. They would also make excellent work out tanks. I'm definitely ordering more in other colors now!

Perfect shirt. Lays perfectly. True to size. It’s super soft. Not too heavy, and not thin.I usually wear a SZ 12-14-L 38DD and I sized up to an XL because I didn’t want to to fit to tightly. I’m very pleased.

Gorgeous Tshirt. Looks better on than you would expect it to. Arrived as promised. Fits well. Great color for family holiday photo. Fit is good; large enough for someone busty but then the body tapers a bit so it doesn't look like you are wearing a bag like some shirts do. I would buy again.

I love this shirt! It’s cute, looks classy and has held up very well with multiple washes. I typically wear L or XL in shirts depending on how I want it to fit. While the sizing is correct, when I purchase another one I will buy a L instead of an XL because it is very “flowey”. Overall this shirt is a good buy!

Overall this shirt is absolutely beautiful! The material is great. I get nervous buying on amazon so I got a large and I could have gotten medium but I’m still in love with this shirt and will buy another in a different color!! Beautiful buy it!!

I didn't know how to feel when I ordered this, but it's actually super cute! I was worried it was going to be too large when I unpackaged it, but upon trying it on, it fits great. Super cute and may get it in another color soon.

I really like the color and the fabric. It washes up very well on machine hand-wash and then air dry, and I barely have to iron it. I love this shirt. I wasnt sure if I loved the crossing strings, or if they would work on a larger chest. They don't sit exactly like the picture on me for that reason, but it does look really cute still. The color is awesome, and the fabric is light and soft, but not see through in the slightest. Great summer top.
I love this top. . It’s very flattering and looks super cute with jeans. I’m 5’4 127pounds, I ordered a small and it’s true to size
This has quickly become my go to casual shirt. The fabric doesn’t cling and is loose and comfortable. I will be purchasing this shirt in every color.

My baby girl still loves to be swaddled.  At 5 months and nearly 20lbs swaddling has become increasingly more difficult.  We have lots of swaddle blankets.  Our collection includes the expensive A+A brand (both with and without bamboo) and while the A+A brand is nice and loved by many, more often than not I am pushing them aside for one of these.  Why are they better?  They wash better than other brands and are softer after multiple washes.  The ones I ordered before my daughter was born still look brand new.  These blankets are also 3 inches larger than other brands.

I had had the Aiden & Anais blankets for my first daughter and thought that they were absolutely amazing!  Gave them out as gifts.  When I had my second daughter recently, my older daughter would not give me the blankets back....because she needed them for her dollies, of course!!So, I bought these instead and love them!  They are bigger than the A&A wraps, which I always thought were big.  This makes for an easier swaddle.  I also think that they are a tighter swaddle!!!  They do not start out as soft as the A&A blankets, but do get softer with washing.  So, if you are buying these before your little one arrives, I recommend washing them a few times to get them softer!

I got this Christmas present for my sister before my nephew was delivered.  He was born on Jan. 14th of this year and he's been using it every night.  Each time he takes a shower, we would give him a new blanket.  This swaddle blanket isn't thick which is good.  After the bath, we would give him a new fresh of clothes to put on such as mitts (so he won't scratch his face) and socks.  After that, we wrap him in this thin swaddle blanket and especially for the first two weeks, his arms had to be down beside his body because when he sleeps with his arms up, he gets shaken up like he was falling in his sleep.  And after the swaddle blanket, we put a thick baby blanket on him for him to sleep so he can stay warm.  This product is good too where after he showers, you can use the swaddle old blanket as a towel to dry him.  I recommend this product and if she needs another set, I'd purchase it again.

I bought these swaddles as well as a set of Aden and Anais swaddle blankets. I loved the price and figured after reading other reviews they were comparable to the ever raved about Aden and Anais blankets. Since getting these swaddle blankets I have been pretty disappointed.After washing them in dreft baby detergent and drying on medium heat the fabric has bunched up and gotten really scratchy. They have shrunk so much that the original design is indistinguishable. I can no longer use these as swaddles because they have lost their ability to stretch and I can't create a tight swaddle.I still gave these 3 stars instead of 1 because I have gotten a lot of use out of them as burp clothes and rags. I would not recommend these to someone for the use as a swaddle blanket.If you are looking for a good quality swaddle blanket go with Aden and Anais!

My daughter LOVES these blankets.  They are thin enough that I don't worry when she falls asleep with them, yet can be folded over to keep her warm if need be.  They wash great and have become even better with wear.  They are not the absolute softest blankets in the world, but they are soft enough for my 4 month old to want to cuddle up to.  The pink is beautiful, however the sheep pattern on the other blanket is a bit light.  It would be hard to tell what it was if you didn't already know.  I would purchase these again, great value for the price!

I've used these every.day. for the last 9 months with my daughter!!  They are my absolute favorite! When she was a newborn, they were a little large, so I folded them in half and then swaddled her up in them, but I honestly liked that because she was born in the fall and could use an extra layer.  They are the perfect weight and so soft!  They are really breathable too, because I've never had a problem with her getting too hold or cold in them.  I STILL swaddle my baby up for naps/night (she's 9 months), and these blankets have the perfect amount of stretch and movement that she can feel snuggled, but can also move her hands under hands and arms. (You can easily do a tighter swaddle to "lock them in" as well!)  The color faded a bit, but that was a small price to pay for the size, softness, and durability.Update 11/17/18: We have rotated both of these blankets daily for 2 years, and they are still in fantastic shape! Very little fading, super soft, no rips or tears... and we have not been gentle with them!

I bought these swaddle blankets when my baby was just born and they are still going (baby is 19 months now). Initially I used them to swaddle the baby and as a burp cloth (my baby had bad reflux). As the baby got older, I used them as a blanket for her while she took a nap in the stroller. I would also clip them to the canopy of the stroller so the sun wouldn't go in her eyes while she took a nap.The fabric is soft, breathable, lightweight and washes well. After, 18 months of regular use the sheep print has faded but the fabric is still fine. Relative to the other swaddle blankets I had, these are much larger.Also, these are nicely packed and would make a cute and practical gift.

I have probably 20 of these types of blankets between my 2 year old son and infant daughter.  My favorite are the Hudson Baby decorative style blankets.  (In this item that would be the leaf designed blanket as compared to the solid colored dark blue blanket.)The Hudson Baby decorative blanket is my favorite because: 1) great price, 2) large sized, 3) super soft, and 4) cute design.This item only received 4 stars because...1) The solid colored style in this set seems to get white fuzzes on it if I wash the blanket with the wrong things - like towels.  That happens with two kids under 2 though!and 2) I wish they sold the blankets individually so I could pick the solid colors at will.  Since they are sets I have ended up with multiple light pink, dark pink, light blue and dark blue blankets from the 2-Packs.

These are a little smaller in size than the Aidan and anais brand, but are still quite large for a baby blanket. They are perfect for swaddling little babies or for toddlers to snuggle. I love the print on these in particular. I bought it for the foxes but now that I have them I find that I like the arrows the very best. I use them along with my other Muslin blankets almost exclusively. If you don't already have Muslin blankets and you are expecting or have a small baby then please buy these or one similar for your little one. You'll be so glad you did. They are light weight, soft and absorbent. My favorite...and I'm a mother of 5, I've tried a lot.

I really wanted to like these. The alternative Muslim swaddling blankets are quite pricey and the reviews were so good. However, I own a SwaddleDesign and an Aden and Anais classic swaddle blanket and there really is no comparison.  These blankets are too puffy; yes they're thin but the weave makes it much thicker to work with. Baby doesn't look comfortable at all after I swaddle unlike using the other swaddle blanket. When I wrap my baby using HB, then the other blankets I own, there is a VERY noticeable difference in her size. She is literally higher off the crib mattress. I don't think the material is as breathable.If you're not sure which one to get, I would recommend you get the SwaddleDesign or A&A. Instead of buying multiples of the HB, get the quality brand because you might need fewer. Due to the quality and thinness, I find them easier to wash. I even handwash my SD blanket and hung dry; it was fine to use again by nighttime.

Beautiful movement and feel.  Very flowy.  Pleasantly surprised.  I ordered black to check it out first.  Now I'll get the pink.  Very stylish and cute!  Its awesome when sellers provide what they show.  No hidden foolishness, just a great top!
LOVE LOVE LOVE!!  Bought the white, not too sheer, perfect length front and back.  Buying another color.5'7. 130 lbs  32DD. Bought small which is perfect

I bought this bad boy in 3 colors and I’m so glad I did! I have a bit of junk in my trunk and this top glides over it nicely :)  It’s very flattering and perfect for wine tasting w the girls! You can dress it up or wear it super casual. I like to wear mine with jeans with torn knees and a pair of block heel sandals:)
Beautiful top - I get many compliments - I wear this top with Capri jeggings and wedge shoes .
I LOVE this top....the light pink is really pretty and so flattering....Love high/low tops. My daughter and husband really like it and my husband said I should buy more colors...that’s a first!!! Lol

I just wish it had been more true to size.
LOVE IT! I bought a size XXL and it's perfect fit! I usually wear size XL-XXL Tops and size 16 jeans. Top is super soft, nice and thin, and print of Willie is nice and bright. Very happy.

Super cute - I was worried it would be too small when I ordered the medium -I’m constantly returning tops because they are either too small or too bigI’m normally a large -in these baby tees )Ordered the medium and it’s perfect 👌 just the right amount of lose fit I was looking for .Soft ,not overly thick but not sheer eitherIf more designs come out with this material and fit I’d order more— mine didn’t have the necklace 😐

I was really disappointed in this product !  The picture is crooked to the point I cannot wear it , the material is super thin, I could almost see my hand through the material. It is also suppose to be an XL but it fit like a medium, it is super stretchy so I could wear it like a fitted shirt but the quality is just not there. runs small--did not like-returned it.

Fits well.  The neckline is high but once it’s later in the day that’s fine.  I just normally like a looser neckline.
I normally wear a size Large or 10/12. I am 5'4 155lbs. I ordered the large and it fit nicely. I like the way it flows. The colors are nice but not super flashy to wear all summer long.

I like it! I wanted an Americana style shirt for the 4th of July and am so glad I started with this one. It’s perfect and a great value! The print, the fit, it’s all awesome. I’m 5’7” 150 pounds, pretty top heavy (broad shoulders, long torso and my mommy pooch gives me a larger waist; but my hips are smaller and I’ve got very thin legs), and usually in either a Med or Large in tops. Bought this in Large and the fit is perfect! Nice and loose in the cutest way, not at all too baggy, and super flattering — and I always worry with tank tops as it’s very hit or miss with me and my shoulders but this one is just so perfect. And it’s so soft I don’t want to take it off! I might wear it to bed haha. I probably could’ve worn a medium fine too but I’m glad I got my larger size as the fit is brilliant and I wouldn’t want to change it! I 10000% recommend this top! I’d say to stick TTS unless you’re between two sizes than pick your larger one if possible. But luckily I think this top is so flattering that most could easily pull off two different sizes in it so my best advice is don’t fret too much about size! It’s a great top, if you like it do yourself a huge favor and just go for it! You’ll be glad you did :)Ps Attaching pictures but it’s even cuter than my pictures show! It really looks and fits just like the seller shows on the model. You’ll love it!

I bought this top as 4th of July was approaching & I wanted something that looked good & was different from what anyone else might have. This top did not disappoint as I received many compliments on it. I usually wear a small, but after looking at the size charts I ordered a small. Fits perfect.

I overall was very happy with this product! Im a large/medium and im also 7 months pregnant so i went with a large. Was roomy for my baby belly and fit very comfortably! The material was light but durable. Perfect for summer!
This is a very nice t-shirt. Very nice design, fits perfectly and looks fashionable and festive. The fabric is amazing- soft, smooth and silky. The shirt stretches very nice and fits good.

I absolutely love this tank.  The material is super soft.  The cut is very flattering.  I am not a thin woman therefore I've got a bit of tummy.  The cut of this shirt minimizes the look.  I cant believe the amou t if compliments saying how nice this shirt looks on me I got when I wore.  I want more in different colors for sure

The colors were spot on design and print was as expected the material is a little strange I expected more of a cotton feel but it is not. Overall I really like it it’s comfortable not too tight hides the love muffin top LOL
Love the way this top fits! A little tighter in the chest and looser in the stomach! So comfy!

I love this shirt so much I’m ordering more in other colors. It is soft and comfortable and looks great with jeans or whatever. I was leery from other reviews saying the fabric was too thin but I don’t find that to be the case at all. I also find it to be true to size. I know I will wear this a lot.
Love this shirt and good material
Cute top for summer. it's more fitted, but I like that it isn't tight at the waist or hips. Will be nice for summer.

Shoulders are too boxy and unflattering, can’t really see it in the photo but it looks very ill fitting in real life. Fabric isn’t cotton nor does it have a relaxed fit. It’s the type of top that doesn’t absorb your sweat and so it just kind of sits there, kind of like an unabsorbent kitchen towel. Length is just right and falls to my navel. However, it feels slightly tight? Like the shoulders were sewn on too close to the body. Tried to fold the sleeves to give it some dimension but it still didnt do anything. Quality wise, this top feels like it really costs $3. Not something I recommend or would buy again. I’m 4’11, 32A, 24-25” waistline. Looks better on taller people who arent flat chested like I am
Will be wearing this top all summer and fall. The rips add a cute detail and it's cropped but not too much so I can wear high waisted jeans and not show my stomach!

Love this top! I bought it to just have and i decided I'm going to use this for working out and casual wear so i will be ordering another one. i am 5'4 130 and ordered a size small. it fits great and is really comfy

This looks like it would be a cotton top, and the tag inside says its 100% cotton. But, it definitely is not cotton. It's like some sort of plastic/stretch/idk what. If it were cotton, I'd like it a lot more. But it came really quickly! It is also kinda short and wide. (I'm about 5f 6i and 135# and got the pink in Medium.) Not terrible for the price I guess.

This shirt is a cute basic workout shirt, it did fit kind of small for an XL size. I do love the fabric though, I worked out in it and was sweating a ton but the fabric still felt dry on the outside and showed no sweat.

I wasn't very impressed with this... But then again it is cheap, that's why I can't give it less than 3 stars. It's cheap material, you can tell. Looks good out of the bag... But then I washed it and the collar stretched out super weirdly. Or it's just shaper strange. I woukd suggest going with the Bella cropped white tee or any color they have - it's super soft and the same price. Just get a size smaller than usual because it's baggy.
I love this shirt! It is super comfortable and fit very well.

I'm 5'4, 136lbs, 36D. I ordered a size medium. Probably should have went with the large. The material is smooth and super stretchy. Shorter than I expected but I can still wear it with regular pants/leggings without it looking too weird.

Very dry, stiff and scratchy coming out of the bag so I toss in the wash right away. After soak and wash in cold and hang dry, it comes out softer. Cut and shape doesn't seem to have changed. Pretty cute and good enough for a fast fashion item, although definitely not a sustainable option.  Have not worn it out or sweated in it so not sure how fabric will feel on skin in the Texas heat, or at the gym.

I ordered a large because some of the comments mentioned that it ran small...but it actually was too big for me. I am 5ft 7 and weigh 160. I have a sewing machine so I took it in about one inch on each side and it is fine. The material is not thick but it has spandex so it is stretchy.  Have not worn or washed it but I expect it will be fine.

I love these shirts, have four of them now.  Ladies - if you have any heat problems this shirt is comfortable and will help you stay cool.  I have a closet full of things I can no longer wear because of women problems.  Generally I add a small square scarf (light) and always get compliments.  They are colorful and do not fade, wash easily, put it in the dryer on low for a few minutes and you will be good to go.  I get a medium and weigh 128 lbs. and am 5' tall.

I wear Columbia  shirts all the time, This shirt was my first women, and I bought it for the color. Men shirts have limited  colors. But they fit so good.I normally ware a 16 in women's and this shirt I bought in 16-18. sad to say it was too tight across the chest. So ladies, no  matter the size these shirts run small.

A great performance shirt that I hesitated to buy because of its somewhat plain look but am very glad that I did buy it, after all. The shirt is super breathable, the stains can be simply wiped off with a damp cloth and it dries immediately. It also protects somewhat from the wind. I am size 8 and 5'7" and the medium was somewhat large on me. I think I should have gone a smaller size.
Great for working outdoors in hot weather. The "pear" color is much more vibrant than pictured. I prefer more muted colors.This style runs a little large.

Bought this to wear in the unbearable heat and sun.  I would buy this item again, and plan to.  Nonbinding and practically weightless, cleans up like a dream.  I usually buy a medium and this shirt in medium fits me not too tight and not too baggy.  To go braless, I would suggest buying one size larger than normal.  Will purchase more of these; would be nice if they offered earth colors like pale olive and pale rust; dark colors just seem to soak up the sun.  If you are looking for this NYLON shirt, be careful not to confuse it with the other Columbia Bahama shirts made of polyester knit or cotton, etc.  My review refers only to this nylon version. Thanks Amazon

These shirts are perfect for being outside or fishing. They are also great for traveling as they don't take up much room and can be easily washed out. They are made of pretty thin (but nice) fabric that is breathable so you stay cool. They are not meant to be fitted so they may seem to run a little big if you aren't used to wearing fishing shirts. I wear a small in most shirts and also wear a small in these.

Was true to size for me (but remember these are fishing type shirts so they are not going to form fit and go with your skinny jeans). Liked the long tails on them that made them easy to keep tucked in when working in a warehouse. Other than the color look very professional. Back venting is AMAZING in a hot warehouse. Biggest perk though is you can pull them out of the drier wrinkled as heck and one night hanging in the bathroom while your husband takes a hot shower will cause all the wrinkles to drop out. Thank you Columbia for freeing me from ironing! :)

I love Columbia products! I did order this a size too big (my own fault), but it's still quite comfortable. It's great on a warmer day as it will wick some of the moisture away from your skin. It's light and is perfect for active living. I have a blue one a size smaller and it fits perfectly-just enough wiggle room. I just wear a tank under the pink one and leave it unbuttoned.

I ordered this shirt one size down based on the reviewers who state that this shirt runs large -- and they were right!  I usually wear size M and size S fits me perfectly.  It's well constructed and feels very comfortable.  I took off one star because the color is not exactly as shown on the website.  The color on the photo appears muted but in reality, it's more neon color -- not exactly my favorite.  I'm keeping it to wear on hot and humid summer days.

I was looking for a quick dry shirt that could go from a session of kayaking to getting lunch at a restaurant. This shirt fit the bill perfectly! I absolutely love it. It fits perfectly. It looks very nice on me. The material feels soft to the touch. It is really a cute shirt. Love the color. It goes with everything. When I first put it on, I just smiled. It feels and looks wonderful. And it fits so nicely. You can be really active in it, but it looks tailored. Would highly recommend it to anyone!

I love these shirts! They're form fitting, a bit stretchy, comfortable - everything I would want in a workout shirt! They look just like the pictures and feel well made. I'm 5'5" and 124lbs and ordered XS, which I often wear, so they're true to size.

These tanks are cute and not too tight, which I was worried about. They are fitted, though. I am roughly 5’3” about 135lb and I ordered a small. They fit very well and are nice and stretchy. The material is soft and these could even be worn as non-workout tanks. I gave these 4 stars only because I sweat through them pretty easily. If they had been a bit more moisture wicking, is given them 5 stars. I still recommend buying.

At first when I pulled the large out, I was worried it looked too big but now that I have it on, it fits perfectly.Normally I’m 150 and 5’7 and would order medium.  But being in the 3rd trimester of pregnancy, having gained 25 pounds, I went with the large. I plan to wear these to the gym for the last 8 weeks of pregnancy. They will probably fit looser once I’m not pregnant anymore but for now they’re just what I needed.
Perfect length very soft and giving.

I love it!  It is so comfortable and the size and length works out perfect for me. It feels light and exactly what I want when I exercise. The color is good. I can also wear them for non exercise moments!
fits perfect

Surprisingly nice quality for a multi-pack of tops. The fabric has a smooth sheen. I'm a 34B bra size with a long torso. The cut is a bit generous so I probably could have gone a size down from the recommended size.

Quality, fit and comfort is what I found in these functional tops. I exercise regularly at yoga and dance and have a tough time finding cute tops that are also functional at a decent price. These tops are all three. I would give 5 stars but I am waiting to see how they stand up to frequent use over time. So far I am happy with this purchase.

I'm 5'7" and 130#, B-C cup.  I absolutely love this product! I wear it as an undershirt daily for my off grid lifestyle and it's such a comfortable cut - goodbye spaghetti straps! It's not as long as I usually prefer however it's tight without being so tight that the shirt flips up so I don't mind it falling just below my hips.  For a bustier gal this might be a bit too tight but smaller busts can get away with using it as a loose sports bra - but beware the headlights can still be seen as it's not a double layer. Would definitely repurchase.

These tank tops are great. I wear them with leggings and they are long enough to cover my booty. You have to be careful when you wash them but they're great if you care for them. They're perfect, thin enough to feel like nothing yet thick enough to feel like you aren't naked. Highly recommend.
It’s cuter in photo! And runs a size smaller than should be!
Very cute shirt, good quality but..... it's basically just a scoop-neck t-shirt that you pull off your shoulder. Recommend to size up if you want it to hang properly.

I absolutely love this shirt !it came as described,goes off shoulder perfect fit, although it is true to size,so if you want a more loose fit order a size up ,I'm usually a small ordered a medium and it fits perfect just a little more roomy .
This shirt did not come with the quarter sleeve as pictured. Shirt is fitting...should order up a size. Cute shirt, just didn’t come as expected
I really loved this shirt! The quality is really good and does not feel cheap at all. It fit well, and i got alot of compliments on it. I would definitely recommend this shirt!
I like it. I had to go up a size. Sent the medium back because it was way too tight on my chest (34D). The large fit much better

I ordered a size up based on reviews Should have ordered my normal size but it still works I tied it to the side bc it's pretty long I'm 5'4. The shirt works off the shoulders or to the side which is something I was looking for.
Cute shirt! I normally wear an XL but bought an XXL for a looser fit. It's not loose but fits well.
Great looking and comfortable shirt. It washes well. I received a few compliments on it.
Super cute and sexy...wont be wearing it just at holidays!!! Love me some America.

This is a nice top, I recently had a baby and needed something that wasn’t hugging the few extra pounds that i have right now. I also like my shirts a little longer because I live my life in leggings right now. This is perfect. Cute enough to dress up for work or dress down to go to the park with the kids. It’s a nice white and very soft.

This tops is pure perfection and may be one of my absolute favorite clothing purchases on Amazon. I ordered a Medium in the long sleeve shirt. The length is exactly what I was hoping it would be. It falls about an inch below my butt in the back and it’s slightly shorter in the front. The fabric is incredibly soft and almost has a slightly silky feel to it. It’s light weight and airy, yet not see through.The Lace detail on the bottom is absolutely beautiful and feels durable so I’m not worried about it falling apart which is a huge relief. I love that this has the feel of a comfy tee, but the detail on the bottom allows you to dress it up. You could pair this with jeans for a casual look or dress pants and heels to dress it up for work. I highly recommend this top.
Cute comfy top, perfect sleeve length for spring, I love simple tops with just a little flair for an easy outfit. Happy with the price! Fits well.

I chose this blouse to go along with my many fun skirts and leggings that are basically blue but have a lot of other color. I wanted something to drape nicely and be fun. This is a beautiful blouse. it fits well and the color is intense. I hope it lasts a long time, because it's already a favorite!

The fabric feels like a soft cotton.  Nice length for me (I'm 5'8.5") and it's long enough in the front that it will hide a bit of tummy and the back is a bit longer but not way over the butt.  I think this will be a good all purpose top for wearing over leggings. Happy with my purchase and after I wear it a few times I might order other colors.
Love this top! The fabric is nice, great quality for the price! Perfect top for Spring and Summer!I have purchased a second in another color!
This is a beautiful top,  well made and fits exactly as expected.  True to size,  would recommend.
I bought this for my mom, it's good shirt for spring and the material it's very soft, recommended

This top is something you can wear to work or you can wear on a day just to hang out. The shirt is true to size so get your normal size. The fabric is not heavy. The shirt has a lot of stretch. All in a decent shirt.

Very pleased with purchase. Great quality.....will probably hand wash to keep color and material like new. I’m hard to please on purchasing clothes online but this was spot on. Will purchase from this company again.

Arrived on time, packaged nicely and fits great! I ordered a large and I am 5.3/135 pounds/36DDD. Very soft material and is long enough to cover my butt. Haven’t washed it yet...don’t think I will dry it fully...might dry for a few then let air dry as I don’t want it to shrink. I am impressed and plan to order a few more in different colors. Great price also!

This shirt is AWESOME!!!!!!!!! I bought it for an 80's themed party, and not only is it perfect for it, it's totally OK to wear normally, too. As other reviewers said, the material is super soft. I am about 5'6 and range from 150-160 lbs. And the large fit me, perfectly. I wanted baggy. And it is baggy, but not overly baggy. Enough to pull the side down, on the shoulder. I can even knot it on the side and it's still baggy. A medium would have fit me, perfectly, but the look I was going for, needed baggy. This shirt is just so cute and you couldn't beat the price for $14. AND it came nicely folded in a heavier zip block bag. Which sounds silly, but it's nice it wasn't just thrown in an envelope.

So this is nice enough...I guess.  Thez material is awfully thin.  If you want it to fit like the girl pictured, order up 2 sizes. I typically wear a large, I ordered an XL,  it fits but again, not as nice as the model.
Great top! I’m 5’6 and if worn off the shoulders some it covered my butt nicely. Lots of compliments on my entire outfit! If there was a size I’m sure I bought a small.

Totally love this shirt.  The quality is good, but the sizing is WAY off.  I went with other's reviews and sized up.  I normally wear a large, but sized up to the 2X and it fits great.  If you're looking for a tighter fit, go with one size up, but if you're looking for a little looser fit, I'd go up two sizes.  It's not super baggy, but just a comfortable loose fit.  Otherwise, great material for the price and the print is good.
It was perfect for what it was used for! 80's night fundraiser was a blast!

Soft and comfy. Fit as expected. Really cute!! Only thing is I thought it could be a little longer and I don’t have a long torso for those who do it will be shorter then excepted in my opinion. Otherwise I love it!!
Omg😍 This is just awesome! I got the xxl. I’m 5’1” and 180 lbs for reference! So soft and perfect style! I could give it 10 stars!

The sleeves are not as pictured, they’re fitted in the arms. The picture is misleading. I usually wear a small/medium in shirts. I ordered the large for the oversized off the shoulder look. It’s ok, but I am disappointed by the sleeves. If I can find a better shirt before my event, I’ll probably return it.

Okay so I love this shirt.  I was skeptic at first but I read the reviews and just thought to myself that it is cheap so if I get it and don't like it then at least I didn't spend a lot of money on it or I could give away as a gift.  When I received it I was super surprised.  The material is amazing.  It is so soft and just feels perfect on my skin.  I do wish it came off the shoulder in a more baggy way but that Is just because I bought it to where it was the perfect fit I believe next time I will get a size bigger so that I can have one to laze around in and etc.  However, the size I got was perfect and I love it a lot.  It makes me feel so good about myself.  it shows off just the right amount of curves.  It is definitely worth the cost I paid. I couldn't believe how inexpensive it was.  I will definitely buy more clothes like these from here hehe.
I’m surprised by the bad reviews yeah the fringe was a little clingy but honestly not that big of deal. I wore it to boots in the park and it was just fine. Ordering a second in Black for Stagecoach.
Great for hippie costume

I absolutely loved this vest! It was cute, comfy, and good quality!I wore it to outside lands music festival in San Francisco and it looked adorable with my outfit! I will definitely be wearing it again soon!I am 5'6 and about 160 pounds and the Medium fit perfect.
It was Everything that I expected! It was. Tiny bit snug, but I am a plus size woman! Other than that I was very pleased! Everyone loved it! Got so many compliments
Beautiful, I love the quality, light . and I really like the knot it has. ^_^ 💕

A great little vest for the money.  I wore it to a Woodstock party and got loads of compliments.  It does run true to size.  I had ordered an extra large, assuming it would run small, when I usually wear a large.  The large would have been a better fit but it still worked.  Light weight!
Very nice. A perfect piece to add to your hippy look. Looked awesome on for a 60’s /70s party!I’m 5’8 and these were very very long on me...other than that, nice fabric very comfortable.

I was pleased with the vest. I bought it to replace the vest to a hippy costume and it works great. So much better quality than the one than came with my costume.  It is soft, not a heavy weight fabric, flows well, and I like the long fringe. The lacing along the edges in front is stylish.  It doesn't have to be worn as a costume but it's not really heavy duty enough to be worn a lot.

this is a really cute piece and honestly, nice enough to wear as a regular piece of clothing not just for costumes.  It is very lightweight but feels well constructed and the fringe is all secure.  The fabric feels like light suede.  I don't know how it will hold up over time but for the occasional times I'll use it, I'm thrilled with the style and price.

I bought this vest for attending a rodeo and it was perfect!  The only slightly negative feedback (and why I didn't give 5 stars) I have is that the fringes can get pretty tangled, however, can easily be undone by running your fingers through the tassels.  Overall very satisfied for the cost, would buy again!
